The polarizers are formed by connecting two identical rib waveguides with a specially designed PE-induced channel to filter out either the TM or the TE polarization. A polarization extinction ratio larger than 20 dB across the (C+ L ) band and beyond is achieved experimentally. The polarization splitter is formed by treating one arm of a waveguide branch by the PE process, so that the two arms of the waveguide branch have different anisotropic index profiles to separate the two polarizations. Our experimental device shows a polarization extinction ratio larger than 20 dB at either output port of the device across the (C+ L ) band and beyond and a polarization-dependent loss of ∼0.3dB. The PE-induced anisotropy, which is wavelength-insensitive, offers design possibilities for the realization of ultra-broadband devices on the LNOI platform.
data.title_cn: 基于质子交换诱导各向异性的薄膜铌酸锂波导器件
data.abstract_cn: 绝缘体上铌酸锂（LNOI）是开发高密度光子集成电路的一个有前途的平台。在本文中，我们基于LNOI中质子交换（PE）过程引起的强各向异性，探索了一种在LNOI上形成紧凑波导器件的技术。为了展示该技术的潜力，我们在 LNOI 上设计和制造了多个波导器件，其中包括 TE 通偏振器、TM 通偏振器和偏振分束器。偏振器是通过将两个相同的肋形波导与专门设计的 PE 诱导通道连接起来形成的，以滤除 TM 或 TE 偏振。通过实验，在 (C+ L ) 频段及以上频段实现了大于 20 dB 的偏振消光比。偏振分光器是通过对波导分支的一臂进行PE工艺处理而形成的，使得波导分支的两臂具有不同的各向异性折射率分布，以分离两种偏振。我们的实验装置显示，在 (C+ L ) 频段及以上频段，装置任一输出端口的偏振消光比大于 20 dB，偏振相关损耗约为 0.3dB。 PE引起的各向异性对波长不敏感，为LNOI平台上实现超宽带器件提供了设计可能性。

data.title: Cancer cell identification in tissue imaging via phasor map analysis in polarization-resolved two-photon excitation fluorescence microscopy
data.author: Ali Mohebi, Lasse Bo Mortensen, Gavrielle R. Untracht, Madhu Veettikazhy, Aymeric Le Gratiet, Peter E. Andersen
data.summary: While cancer characteristics can vary significantly across types, methods that distinguish malignant cells from normal ones hold promise by targeting shared cellular anomalies. Among these, morphological differences play a key role in driving the aggressive behavior and altered function typical of cancer cells. Detecting and analyzing such cells within complex, densely packed tissue environments requires advanced imaging techniques. Polarization-resolved fluorescence microscopy offers rich insights into cellular composition, molecular binding affinities, and structural organization, particularly in revealing biomolecular order and subcellular polarity loss. In this work, we study polarization-resolved two-photon excitation fluorescence tissue imaging microscopy in vitro to investigate ordered versus disordered chromatin organization within cell nuclei. We employ an innovative phasor map analysis to facilitate quick interpretation, using colorectal cancer identification and liquid crystal as a case study and baseline, respectively. Our method aims to identify cancer within tissue by adding polarimetric contrast to fluorescence due to the anisotropic feature of fluorescent molecular probes. Accordingly, the proposed phasor map provides a graphically transformed representation of polarization-based fluorescence imaging for histopathological tissue identification on a pixel-wise basis, facilitating comprehensive classification of diverse tissue samples. This study presents initial steps toward showing the potential for cancer identification and lays a foundation for future diagnostic strategies.
data.title_cn: 通过偏振分辨双光子激发荧光显微镜中的相量图分析进行组织成像中的癌细胞识别
data.abstract_cn: 虽然不同类型的癌症特征可能存在显着差异，但通过针对共享的细胞异常来区分恶性细胞和正常细胞的方法有望实现。其中，形态差异在驱动癌细胞的攻击行为和典型功能改变方面发挥着关键作用。在复杂、密集的组织环境中检测和分析此类细胞需要先进的成像技术。偏振分辨荧光显微镜为细胞组成、分子结合亲和力和结构组织提供了丰富的见解，特别是在揭示生物分子顺序和亚细胞极性损失方面。在这项工作中，我们在体外研究偏振分辨双光子激发荧光组织成像显微镜，以研究细胞核内有序与无序的染色质组织。我们采用创新的相量图分析来促进快速解释，分别使用结直肠癌识别和液晶作为案例研究和基线。我们的方法旨在通过由于荧光分子探针的各向异性特征而向荧光添加偏振对比度来识别组织内的癌症。因此，所提出的相量图提供了基于偏振的荧光成像的图形变换表示，用于在像素基础上进行组织病理学组织识别，从而促进对不同组织样本的综合分类。这项研究提出了展示癌症识别潜力的初步步骤，并为未来的诊断策略奠定了基础。

data.title: Enhanced sampling density in one-shot polarization interferometry with a polarization camera
data.author: Hsing-Hsien Tsai, Ju-Yi Lee
data.summary: This paper introduces a technique to enhance the sampling density in one-shot phase imaging with a polarization camera, thereby overcoming the limited sampling density of the 2 × 2-pixel configuration, which generates a reconstructed image only one-quarter the size of the original. The effectiveness of the proposed technique was evaluated using a Michelson interferometer to adjust the fringe spacing. In experiments with an original image resolution of M × N , the conventional approach yielded a phase image with a resolution of [ (M/2)] × [(N/2)] , whereas the proposed technique yielded an image resolution of ( M–1) × (N–1) , which is very close to the original.
data.title_cn: 使用偏振相机增强单次偏振干涉测量中的采样密度
data.abstract_cn: 本文介绍了一种增强偏振相机单次相位成像采样密度的技术，从而克服了 2 × 2 像素配置的采样密度有限，生成的重建图像只有原始图像的四分之一大小。使用迈克尔逊干涉仪调整条纹间距来评估所提出技术的有效性。在原始图像分辨率为 M × N 的实验中，传统方法产生的相位图像分辨率为 [ (M/2)] × [(N/2)] ，而所提出的技术产生的图像分辨率为 ( M–1) × (N–1) ，非常接近原始图像。

data.title: Case study of a coherent FSO system with adaptive modulation: performance analysis in Isfahan
data.author: Masoud Deyranlou, Alireza Maleki Javan
data.summary: Free space optics (FSO) systems provide high-speed wireless communication but are vulnerable to atmospheric attenuation and weather variations. This paper presents a coherent FSO system with adaptive code modulation (ACM), evaluated under the climate conditions of Isfahan, Iran. The system dynamically switches between 16QAM, 4QAM, and PAM according to real-time SNR to maintain link reliability. Results show 40 Gbps performance over 1 km during dry and hazy periods and 10 Gbps over 6 km during fog and snow. The approach achieves 92% annual link availability with seamless modulation transitions, demonstrating suitability for reliable, high-capacity communication in arid environments.
data.title_cn: 具有自适应调制的相干 FSO 系统案例研究：伊斯法罕的性能分析
data.abstract_cn: 自由空间光学 (FSO) 系统提供高速无线通信，但容易受到大气衰减和天气变化的影响。本文提出了一种采用自适应编码调制 (ACM) 的相干 FSO 系统，并在伊朗伊斯法罕的气候条件下进行了评估。系统根据实时信噪比在16QAM、4QAM、PAM之间动态切换，保持链路可靠性。结果显示，在干燥和雾霾期间，1 公里范围内的性能为 40 Gbps，在雾和雪期间，6 公里范围内的性能为 10 Gbps。该方法通过无缝调制转换实现了 92% 的年度链路可用性，证明了在干旱环境中可靠、大容量通信的适用性。

data.title: Spiral-galaxies-inspired structured light and optical trapping
data.author: Yufeng Sun, Lu Peng, Jiongchao Zeng, Jun Yao, Yidong Liu, Sheng Sun, Wen Xiao, Yuxuan Ren, Huanyang Chen, Jun Hu, Yuanjie Yang
data.summary: Spiral galaxies are the most common type of galaxies in the universe, and most spiral galaxies contain a supermassive black hole in their center. However, thus far, the formation of spiral galaxies is still not fully understood, and especially, what determines the number of spiral arms is still an open question as well. Here, inspired by fascinating spiral galaxies, we demonstrate that such a spiral-galaxy-shaped optical field can be generated by interference of a vortex wave and a trumpet wave. Interestingly, we show it is the topological charge of the vortex wave that determines the number of spiral arms in our model. Moreover, we experimentally trap nanoparticles using the structured light and get a spiral-galaxy-like model in a lab. Lastly, we discuss the origin of the trumpet wave through transformation optics and discuss the similarity between our model and spiral galaxies.
data.title_cn: 受螺旋星系启发的结构光和光捕获
data.abstract_cn: 螺旋星系是宇宙中最常见的星系类型，大多数螺旋星系的中心都包含一个超大质量黑洞。然而，迄今为止，旋涡星系的形成仍不完全清楚，尤其是旋臂数量由什么决定仍然是一个悬而未决的问题。在这里，受到迷人的螺旋星系的启发，我们证明了这种螺旋星系形状的光场可以通过涡旋波和喇叭波的干涉来产生。有趣的是，我们证明涡流波的拓扑电荷决定了模型中旋臂的数量。此外，我们利用结构光实验捕获纳米颗粒，并在实验室中获得了类似螺旋星系的模型。最后，我们通过变换光学讨论了喇叭波的起源，并讨论了我们的模型与螺旋星系之间的相似性。

data.title: Multiplexable tilted fiber Bragg grating sensors based on dispersive microwave-photonic frequency domain reflectometry
data.author: Chen Zhu, Ruimin Jie, Chenxi Huang, Huaijun Guan, Jie Huang
data.summary: Tilted fiber Bragg gratings (TFBGs) have seen rapid development and widespread deployment in diverse sensing applications, ranging from biochemical detection to in-situ monitoring in energy systems. Their ability to generate rich spectral features via cladding mode coupling enables highly sensitive, multi-parameter, and label-free sensing. However, accurate interrogation typically requires broadband spectral measurements to resolve fine spectral structures—posing significant challenges for scalable and cost-effective multiplexing in practical settings. In this work, we propose and experimentally demonstrate a dispersive microwave-photonic frequency domain reflectometry (D-MPFDR) system for high-resolution, multiplexable TFBG interrogation. By integrating chromatic-dispersion-induced wavelength-to-time mapping with microwave frequency-domain reflectometry, the system reconstructs complete TFBG spectral information entirely in the RF domain. This enables each sensor to be both temporally resolved and spectrally analyzed. Experimental results verify the system’s high and tunable sensitivity through temperature and refractive index sensing. The multiplexing capability is further validated by simultaneously interrogating three TFBG devices with minimal crosstalk. This work presents a compact, scalable, and high-performance solution for real-time, multi-point fiber-optic sensing using TFBGs.
data.title_cn: 基于色散微波光子频域反射计的可复用倾斜光纤布拉格光栅传感器
data.abstract_cn: 倾斜光纤布拉格光栅（TFBG）在各种传感应用中得到了快速发展和广泛部署，从生化检测到能源系统中的原位监测。它们能够通过包层模式耦合产生丰富的光谱特征，从而实现高灵敏度、多参数和无标记传感。然而，准确的询问通常需要宽带光谱测量来解析精细的光谱结构，这对实际设置中的可扩展且经济有效的多路复用提出了重大挑战。在这项工作中，我们提出并通过实验演示了一种用于高分辨率、可复用 TFBG 询问的色散微波光子频域反射计 (D-MPFDR) 系统。通过将色散引起的波长到时间映射与微波频域反射测量相结合，该系统完全在 RF 域中重建完整的 TFBG 光谱信息。这使得每个传感器都可以进行时间解析和光谱分析。实验结果验证了系统通过温度和折射率传感的高灵敏度和可调灵敏度。通过以最小的串扰同时询问三个 TFBG 器件，进一步验证了多路复用功能。这项工作提出了一种紧凑、可扩展且高性能的解决方案，用于使用 TFBG 进行实时多点光纤传感。

data.title: High-energy 2 μ m waveguide laser on a fluoride platform
data.author: Ji Eun Bae, Pavel Loiko, Fabian Rotermund, Gurvan Brasse, Alain Braud, Blandine Guichardaz, Patrice Camy
data.summary: Chip-scale laser sources capable of delivering high power and energy in the eye-safe 2 μm spectral range are essential for applications in medicine and environmental sensing. We report a remarkable advancement in pulsed 2 μm waveguide laser technology through the integration of high-quality large-mode-area Tm 3+ -doped fluoride channel waveguides with low-loss, directly deposited single-walled carbon nanotubes on cavity mirrors, serving as efficient saturable absorbers. Comprehensive characterization of these nonlinear mirrors revealed optimized chirality distribution of carbon nanotubes and favorable nonlinear absorption dynamics, enabling efficient passive Q -switching. The proposed configuration achieved a record output power exceeding 1 W and an optical efficiency over 60%—the highest reported for any pulsed, integrated 2 μm coherent light source to date, significantly outperforming silicon-photonics-based systems. Additionally, the device delivered microjoule-level pulse energies at MHz-level high repetition rates, establishing a new milestone in compact, high-performance waveguide laser architectures.
data.title_cn: 氟化物平台上的高能 2 μm 波导激光器
data.abstract_cn: 能够在人眼安全的 2 μm 光谱范围内提供高功率和能量的芯片级激光源对于医学和环境传感应用至关重要。我们报告了脉冲 2 μm 波导激光技术的显着进步，通过将高质量大模面积 Tm 3+ 掺杂氟化物通道波导与低损耗、直接沉积在腔镜上的单壁碳纳米管集成，用作高效的可饱和吸收器。这些非线性镜的综合表征揭示了碳纳米管的优化手性分布和有利的非线性吸收动力学，从而实现高效的被动调Q。所提出的配置实现了超过 1 W 的创纪录输出功率和超过 60% 的光学效率，这是迄今为止所有脉冲集成 2 μm 相干光源的最高报告，显着优于基于硅光子的系统。此外，该器件以 MHz 级高重复率提供微焦级脉冲能量，在紧凑型高性能波导激光器架构方面树立了新的里程碑。

data.title: Broadband bifunctional manipulation of a fiber-emitted sub-wavelength structure light beam based on a fiber-integrated metasurface
data.author: Jiankang Xu, Zhiqiang Quan, Siyuan Cheng, Ming Chen, Houquan Liu, Jian Wang
data.summary: Structured light beams have significant application value in fields like optical communication, microscopic imaging, and biomedicine due to their unique spatial field distribution characteristics. However, traditional structured beam generation systems based on discrete optical components have inherent drawbacks such as strict alignment requirements and poor tunability, which severely limit their practical applications. This paper proposes a new method for broadband bifunctional generation of structured beams based on fiber-integrated metasurfaces: by integrating spin-multiplexing bifunctional phase metasurfaces with the end faces of optical fibers, broadband sub-wavelength Bessel beams and focused vortex beams were, respectively, generated on demand in an all-fiber configuration when different circularly polarized light was input. The experimental measurements showed that the transmission characteristics of the generated beams were highly consistent with the numerical simulation results. Our scheme fully exploits the flexible waveguide (bendable) advantage of fibers, breaking through the constraint of poor optical path tunability in traditional “hard connection” systems due to strict alignment requirements. Since the implemented device simultaneously possesses broadband operation, sub-wavelength-scale field control, and spin-multiplexing characteristics, this study provides a new paradigm for multidimensional and multifunctional dynamic light field manipulation, and it holds significant application potential in fields such as fiber-optic imaging and fiber sensing.
data.title_cn: 基于光纤集成超表面的光纤发射亚波长结构光束的宽带双功能操控
data.abstract_cn: 结构光束因其独特的空间场分布特性，在光通信、显微成像、生物医学等领域具有重要的应用价值。然而，传统的基于分立光学元件的结构光束产生系统具有严格的对准要求和较差的可调谐性等固有缺陷，严重限制了其实际应用。本文提出了一种基于光纤集成超表面的宽带双功能结构光束生成新方法：通过将自旋复用双功能相位超表面与光纤端面集成，当输入不同的圆偏振光时，在全光纤配置中分别按需生成宽带亚波长贝塞尔光束和聚焦涡旋光束。实验测量表明，产生的光束的传输特性与数值模拟结果高度一致。我们的方案充分发挥了光纤柔性波导（可弯曲）的优势，突破了传统“硬连接”系统中由于严格的对准要求而导致光路可调性差的限制。由于所实现的器件同时具有宽带操作、亚波长尺度场控制和自旋复用特性，该研究为多维、多功能动态光场操纵提供了新的范式，在光纤成像和光纤传感等领域具有重要的应用潜力。

data.title: Continuous-wave III–V micro-ring lasers with position-controlled vertical QWs laterally integrated on SOI
data.author: Zhenhua Wu, Zili Lei, Zhaojie Ren, Cong Zeng, Ying Yu, Ying Xue, Yu Han, Siyuan Yu
data.summary: Minimizing the footprint and energy consumption of integrated III–V lasers necessitates tight optical confinement in all three dimensions. Limited by the small index contrast of conventional vertical epitaxy, light confinement in the vertical direction is often achieved via undercutting sacrificial layers or transferring onto foreign low-index substrates. In contrast, selective lateral heteroepitaxy enables the architecture of III–V-on-insulator and supports strong vertical mode confinement. However, lasers fabricated by this method are all limited to pulse pumping due to inadequate understanding of the gain characteristics of laterally grown vertical quantum wells (QWs). Here, we demonstrate continuous-wave (CW) III–V micro-ring lasers monolithically integrated on SOI using selective lateral heteroepitaxy. We carefully analyzed the influence of position and strain of the vertical QWs on the optical gain of micro-ring cavities and strategically placed compressive-strained vertical QWs at the field maximum of the TE ∥ mode. With effective surface passivation, we achieved CW lasing at room temperature with a low threshold of 10.1 μW and stable CW lasing up to 80°C. Our results provide a compelling solution for compact CW micro-lasers monolithically integrated on SOI.
data.title_cn: 连续波 III-V 微环激光器，具有横向集成在 SOI 上的位置控制垂直 QW
data.abstract_cn: 最大限度地减少集成 III-V 族激光器的占地面积和能耗需要在所有三个维度上进行严格的光学限制。受传统垂直外延的折射率对比度较小的限制，垂直方向的光限制通常通过底切牺牲层或转移到国外低折射率衬底上来实现。相比之下，选择性横向异质外延可实现绝缘体上 III-V 族的架构，并支持强垂直模式限制。然而，由于对横向生长垂直量子阱（QW）的增益特性了解不够，用这种方法制造的激光器都仅限于脉冲泵浦。在这里，我们展示了使用选择性横向异质外延单片集成在 SOI 上的连续波 (CW) III-V 微环激光器。我们仔细分析了垂直量子阱的位置和应变对微环腔光学增益的影响，并策略性地将压缩应变垂直量子阱放置在 TE ∥ 模式的场最大值处。通过有效的表面钝化，我们在室温下实现了 10.1 μW 低阈值的连续激光发射，并在高达 80°C 的温度下实现了稳定的连续激光发射。我们的研究结果为单片集成在 SOI 上的紧凑型 CW 微型激光器提供了引人注目的解决方案。

data.title: On-chip multidimensional dynamic manipulation of terahertz spoof surface waves based on graphene metasurfaces
data.author: Xunjun He, Mingzhong Wu, Guangjun Lu, Ying Zhang, Zhaoxin Geng, Yuqiu Qu
data.summary: The multidimensional dynamic manipulation of spoof surface waves (SSWs) is crucial for terahertz (THz) on-chip integrated systems. However, existing metasurfaces are limited to passive, single-function wavefront shaping of SSWs, which precludes on-chip multidimensional dynamic control and hinders their practical applications. To address these limitations, we propose a polarization multiplexing THz graphene metasurface. This structure comprises two key sections: a central metacoupler composed of graphene-integrated cross-shaped meta-atoms that excites SSWs, and flanking plasmonic metal regions that support the SSW propagation along the interface. By tuning the dimensions and rotation angles of the cross-shaped meta-atoms along with the graphene Fermi level, the metasurface enables polarization multiplexing, spatial wavefront shaping, and amplitude modulation of the SSWs under orthogonal circular polarization (CP) incidences simultaneously. To validate this design, we experimentally fabricated the graphene metasurface, achieving multidimensional dynamic control of a spoof surface focusing beam (SSFB) and a spoof surface Bessel beam (SSBB) under different CP illuminations. Therefore, the scheme realizes on-chip multidimensional dynamic manipulation of SSWs, offering significant potential for THz on-chip communication and integrated photonic applications.
data.title_cn: 基于石墨烯超表面的太赫兹欺骗表面波片上多维动态操控
data.abstract_cn: 欺骗表面波 (SSW) 的多维动态操纵对于太赫兹 (THz) 片上集成系统至关重要。然而，现有的超表面仅限于SSW的无源、单功能波前整形，这排除了片上多维动态控制并阻碍了其实际应用。为了解决这些限制，我们提出了一种偏振复用太赫兹石墨烯超表面。该结构包括两个关键部分：由石墨烯集成的十字形元原子组成的中央元耦合器，可激发 SSW，以及支持 SSW 沿界面传播的侧翼等离子体金属区域。通过调整十字形元原子的尺寸和旋转角度以及石墨烯费米能级，超表面能够在正交圆偏振（CP）入射下同时实现偏振复用、空间波前整形和SSW的幅度调制。为了验证这一设计，我们通过实验制作了石墨烯超表面，实现了不同CP照明下欺骗表面聚焦光束（SSFB）和欺骗表面贝塞尔光束（SSBB）的多维动态控制。因此，该方案实现了SSW的片上多维动态操控，为太赫兹片上通信和集成光子应用提供了巨大的潜力。

data.title: Imaginary Poynting momentum-driven particle rotation by cylindrically polarized Gaussian beams
data.author: Xue Yun, Linquan Guo, Yansheng Liang, Jiahao Zhong, Tianyu Zhao, Shiqi Kuang, Ming Lei
data.summary: Imaginary Poynting momentum (IPM) provides a new degree of freedom for particle manipulation. However, the application of IPM in experiments has been largely unexplored. Here, we demonstrate the IPM-driven particle rotation by cylindrically polarized Gaussian (CPG) beams that have no spin or orbital angular momentum. Theoretical analysis and experimental measurements demonstrate that gold microparticles will be rotated in the azimuthal direction while being confined in the radial direction. We achieved controllable rotation of the particle by tuning the cylindrical polarization state. These findings are promising for light–matter interactions and particle manipulations.
data.title_cn: 圆柱偏振高斯光束的假想坡印廷动量驱动粒子旋转
data.abstract_cn: 虚坡印廷动量 (IPM) 为粒子操纵提供了新的自由度。然而，IPM 在实验中的应用在很大程度上尚未得到探索。在这里，我们通过没有自旋或轨道角动量的圆柱偏振高斯 (CPG) 光束演示了 IPM 驱动的粒子旋转。理论分析和实验测量表明，金微粒将在方位角方向上旋转，同时被限制在径向方向上。我们通过调节圆柱偏振态实现了粒子的可控旋转。这些发现对于光与物质相互作用和粒子操纵来说是有希望的。

data.title: Short-exposure annular LED array-based digital refocusing microscopy via multiplexed illumination
data.author: Junzheng Peng, Yifu Ma, Shiheng Li, Kaihui Zhang, Manhong Yao, Shiping Li, Jingang Zhong
data.summary: Digital refocusing microscopy based on light-emitting diode (LED) arrays extends the depth of field of conventional microscopes without mechanical scanning. However, its sequential image acquisition process inherently limits temporal resolution. To overcome this limitation, we propose a short-exposure digital refocusing microscopy using multiplexed illumination. This approach not only shortens the imaging time of LED-array-based digital refocusing microscopy but also addresses the common issues of low contrast in dark regions and loss of fine image details under short-exposure conditions. Consequently, it enables achieving higher imaging speed while preserving high-quality digital refocusing images. To further reduce the number of required measurements, we propose a digital refocusing microscopy based on an annular LED array. Compared with conventional full circular arrays, the annular configuration reduces the measurements from 37 to 16 while enhancing image contrast and spatial resolution. Experimentally, the proposed method improves the structure similarity index measure (SSIM) of the refocused images in the dark regions by at least 3.16 times relative to sequential single-LED illumination. Collectively, these two strategies establish a practical and efficient framework that improves the temporal resolution of LED-array-based digital refocusing microscopy, thereby enabling its application to the dynamic observation of biological samples.
data.title_cn: 通过多重照明的短曝光环形 LED 阵列数字重聚焦显微镜
data.abstract_cn: 基于发光二极管 (LED) 阵列的数字重聚焦显微镜无需机械扫描即可扩展传统显微镜的景深。然而，其顺序图像采集过程本质上限制了时间分辨率。为了克服这一限制，我们提出了一种使用多重照明的短曝光数字重聚焦显微镜。这种方法不仅缩短了基于 LED 阵列的数字重聚焦显微镜的成像时间，而且解决了暗区对比度低以及短曝光条件下精细图像细节丢失的常见问题。因此，它能够实现更高的成像速度，同时保留高质量的数字重聚焦图像。为了进一步减少所需测量的数量，我们提出了一种基于环形 LED 阵列的数字重聚焦显微镜。与传统的全圆形阵列相比，环形配置将测量次数从 37 个减少到 16 个，同时增强了图像对比度和空间分辨率。实验上，该方法相对于顺序单 LED 照明，将暗区重聚焦图像的结构相似性指数测量 (SSIM) 提高了至少 3.16 倍。总的来说，这两种策略建立了一个实用且有效的框架，提高了基于 LED 阵列的数字重聚焦显微镜的时间分辨率，从而使其能够应用于生物样本的动态观察。

data.title: AuNP-enhanced DNA microcavity for the highly sensitive detection of lead ions in Chinese herbal medicines
data.author: Ruijie Wu, Ziyihui Wang, Ziyi Hou, Bahetiguli Asilibieke, Xiaofang Cui, Jianying Jing, Kun Liu, Junfeng Jiang, Tiegen Liu
data.summary: The safety of Chinese herbal medicines (CHMs) is compromised by heavy metal contamination, particularly lead (Pb 2+ ), which requires ultrasensitive detection methods to mitigate health risks. Herein, we report a gold nanoparticle (AuNP)-amplified whispering gallery mode (WGM) biosensor for highly sensitive and specific Pb 2+ monitoring. The sensing platform leverages the strong volumetric effect of AuNPs to magnify subtle DNA conformational changes induced by Pb 2+ -dependent DNAzyme cleavage. When the DNAzyme cleaves its substrate strand, AuNP-tagged oligonucleotides are released, causing a pronounced shift in the WGM resonance wavelength. The incorporation of AuNPs significantly enhanced detection sensitivity, achieving a limit of detection of 14.15 nM—a notable improvement over AuNP-free systems. The sensor demonstrated excellent selectivity against interfering species and successfully quantified Pb 2+ in complex CHM samples such as goji berry and astragalus, showing high consistency with standard ICP-MS measurements. This AuNP-enhanced WGM strategy offers a powerful tool for quality assurance in medicinal products and environmental safety monitoring.
data.title_cn: AuNP增强DNA微腔用于高灵敏检测中草药中的铅离子
data.abstract_cn: 中草药（CHM）的安全性受到重金属污染的影响，特别是铅（Pb 2+ ），需要超灵敏的检测方法来减轻健康风险。在此，我们报告了一种金纳米颗粒 (AuNP) 放大回音壁模式 (WGM) 生物传感器，用于高灵敏度和特异性 Pb 2+ 监测。该传感平台利用 AuNP 的强大体积效应来放大由 Pb 2+ 依赖性 DNAzyme 裂解引起的细微 DNA 构象变化。当 DNAzyme 裂解其底物链时，AuNP 标记的寡核苷酸被释放，导致 WGM 共振波长发生明显变化。 AuNP 的加入显着提高了检测灵敏度，检测限达到 14.15 nM，与不含 AuNP 的系统相比有了显着改进。该传感器对干扰物质表现出出色的选择性，并成功定量了枸杞和黄芪等复杂 CHM 样品中的 Pb 2+，与标准 ICP-MS 测量结果具有高度一致性。这种 AuNP 增强型 WGM 策略为医药产品的质量保证和环境安全监测提供了强大的工具。

data.title: Optimized design of a Figure-9 fiber laser for high-precision time-of-flight ranging
data.author: Xiguang Mao, Wanzhuo Ma, Yanwei Fu, Zhi Liu, Qitong Wu, Tianlun Li
data.summary: This study targets the need for environmentally robust femtosecond lasers in high-precision time-of-flight (ToF) ranging. A self-starting mode-locked Figure-9 fiber laser with a non-reciprocal phase shifter was designed; the shifter boosts nonlinear interference, enabling self-initiated mode locking and noise suppression. Stable mode locking was achieved at a pump power of 420 mW over a 30° waveplate angle range, yielding a pulse signal-to-noise ratio of 67.347 dB and a phase noise of −120dBc/Hz. ToF experiments revealed that compressing the pulse width from 4.18 ps to 798 fs reduced the ranging standard deviation by approximately 75%, underscoring the laser’s potential for high-precision ranging and compact, low-noise light source design.
data.title_cn: 用于高精度飞行时间测距的Figure-9光纤激光器的优化设计
data.abstract_cn: 这项研究的目标是满足高精度飞行时间 (ToF) 测距中对环境稳定的飞秒激光器的需求。设计了带有不可逆移相器的自启动锁模Figure-9光纤激光器；移位器增强非线性干扰，实现自启动锁模和噪声抑制。在 30° 波片角度范围内，泵浦功率为 420 mW，实现了稳定的锁模，脉冲信噪比为 67.347 dB，相位噪声为 -120dBc/Hz。 ToF 实验表明，将脉冲宽度从 4.18 ps 压缩到 798 fs 可将测距标准偏差降低约 75%，凸显了激光器在高精度测距和紧凑、低噪声光源设计方面的潜力。

data.title: Hybrid high-precision autofocus method based on deep learning and variable-step hill-climbing
data.author: Xinzhe Ma, Xiaohua Xia, Shuhao Yuan, Haoming Xiang
data.summary: In traditional autofocus algorithms, the determination of the optimal focus position relies on identifying the lens location that yields the maximum image sharpness. However, during the initial search stage, the difficulty in selecting an appropriate step size often causes the algorithm to be trapped in local optima, and under complex lighting and scene conditions, it further suffers from time-consuming iterative computations, leading to prolonged processing time. Meanwhile, current deep learning-based autofocus methods still face challenges in achieving high focusing accuracy. To address these challenges, we propose a hybrid high-precision autofocus algorithm that combines an improved deep learning network with a variable-step hill-climbing strategy. Specifically, the convolutional block attention module (CBAM) and efficient channel attention (ECA) mechanisms are integrated into ShuffleNetV2 to enhance multi-level feature extraction. The classification layer is replaced with a three-layer fully connected structure to directly regress the defocus distance. The predicted value is then used to guide the variable-step local search, thus achieving final accurate localization. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed method reduces the average focusing error by 47% to 91% and decreases processing time by 63% to 88%. In addition, robustness is improved, with a 26% to 81% reduction in the standard deviation of the average focusing errors. Together, these improvements offer an efficient and reliable autofocus solution for complex imaging scenarios.
data.title_cn: 基于深度学习和变步长爬山的混合高精度自动对焦方法
data.abstract_cn: 在传统的自动对焦算法中，最佳焦点位置的确定依赖于识别产生最大图像清晰度的镜头位置。然而，在初始搜索阶段，难以选择合适的步长往往导致算法陷入局部最优，并且在复杂的光照和场景条件下，又会遭受耗时的迭代计算，导致处理时间延长。同时，当前基于深度学习的自动对焦方法在实现高对焦精度方面仍面临挑战。为了应对这些挑战，我们提出了一种混合高精度自动对焦算法，该算法将改进的深度学习网络与可变步长爬山策略相结合。具体来说，ShuffleNetV2 中集成了卷积块注意力模块（CBAM）和高效通道注意力（ECA）机制，以增强多级特征提取。将分类层替换为三层全连接结构，直接回归离焦距离。然后利用预测值指导变步长局部搜索，从而实现最终的精确定位。实验结果表明，该方法将平均聚焦误差降低了47%至91%，处理时间缩短了63%至88%。此外，鲁棒性也得到提高，平均聚焦误差的标准偏差降低了 26% 至 81%。这些改进共同为复杂的成像场景提供了高效可靠的自动对焦解决方案。

data.title: Cavity-enhanced frequency doubling for preparing the 455.6 nm single-frequency blue laser: LBO versus PPKTP
data.author: Yuhui Yang, Rui Chang, Tao Wang, Yuewei Wang, Yirong Wei, Jun He, Junmin Wang
data.summary: The 455.6 nm single-frequency blue laser corresponds to the cesium transition line, which is crucial for applications such as high-resolution cesium spectroscopy, cesium ladder-type Rydberg excitation systems (455.6 nm + 1060 nm), and cesium laser cooling and trapping. In this study, a continuous-wave Ti:sapphire laser (911.2 nm) was used as the fundamental source, and a bow-tie-type four-mirror ring frequency-doubling cavity combined with Hänsch–Couillaud (HC) locking technology was constructed to stabilize the doubling cavity. We systematically investigated the core parameters (output power, beam quality, and power stability) of 455.6 nm single-frequency blue lasers generated via cavity-enhanced resonant frequency doubling using PPKTP and LBO crystals. The nonlinear coefficient (9.4 pm/V) and nonlinear conversion coefficient (1.03%/W) of Type-0 PPKTP are significantly higher than the nonlinear coefficient (0.84 pm/V) and nonlinear conversion coefficient () of the LBO crystal. Under a mode-matched fundamental power of 318.3 mW, Type-0 PPKTP crystals achieve 130.1 mW of the blue laser output with a frequency-doubling efficiency as high as 40.8%, even when the input transmittance is below the impedance-matching condition. While PPKTP delivers excellent beam quality, its long-term stability is compromised by thermal effects. In contrast, LBO yields the 51.2 mW blue laser output with a 15.5% frequency-doubling efficiency under a 329.5 mW mode-matched fundamental power. Although LBO shows lower efficiency at low powers and requires prism-based beam shaping, it offers superior long-term stability.
data.title_cn: 用于制备 455.6 nm 单频蓝色激光器的腔增强倍频：LBO 与 PPKTP
data.abstract_cn: 455.6 nm单频蓝色激光对应于铯跃迁线，这对于高分辨率铯光谱、铯梯型里德堡激发系统（455.6 nm + 1060 nm）以及铯激光冷却和捕获等应用至关重要。本研究以连续波钛宝石激光器（911.2 nm）为基础光源，构建了蝴蝶结型四镜环倍频腔并结合汉施-库约（HC）锁定技术来稳定倍频腔。我们系统地研究了使用 PPKTP 和 LBO 晶体通过腔增强谐振倍频产生的 455.6 nm 单频蓝色激光器的核心参数（输出功率、光束质量和功率稳定性）。 Type-0 PPKTP的非线性系数(9.4 pm/V)和非线性转换系数(1.03%/W)明显高于LBO晶体的非线性系数(0.84 pm/V)和非线性转换系数()。在318.3 mW的模式匹配基波功率下，即使输入透射率低于阻抗匹配条件，Type-0 PPKTP晶体也能实现130.1 mW的蓝色激光输出，倍频效率高达40.8%。虽然 PPKTP 提供出色的光束质量，但其长期稳定性会受到热效应的影响。相比之下，LBO 在 329.5 mW 模式匹配基波功率下产生 51.2 mW 蓝色激光输出，倍频效率为 15.5%。尽管 LBO 在低功率下表现出较低的效率并且需要基于棱镜的光束整形，但它提供了卓越的长期稳定性。

data.title: Magnetic field and temperature-modulated photoluminescence and magneto-optical anisotropy of Sn-doped CdS nanowires
data.author: Le Zhang, Ye Tian, Liangjie Li, Huan Fei Wen, Jun Tang, Jun Liu
data.summary: Sn-doped CdS nanowires exhibit unique magneto-optical properties due to their anisotropic structure and defect-mediated exciton behavior. In this work, Sn-doped CdS nanowires were successfully prepared by CVD, and their photoluminescence behavior was systematically investigated under magnetic field, temperature, and laser power modulation. Variable-temperature PL spectra show that elevated temperature leads to thermal dissociation of excitons and lattice expansion, which triggers peak redshift and non-radiative recombination enhancement. At low temperature (1.7 K), the intensities of both the band-edge emission peaks (∼500nm) and the defect state emission peaks (550–600 nm) are significantly higher than those at room temperature (300 K). The magneto-optical anisotropy of Sn-doped CdS is significantly revealed by the modulation of the magnetic field polarization degree; through the Zeeman splitting and spin-polarization effects, the polarization degree of the band-edge emission can be modulated in the range of −0.4 to 0.8. Our results will contribute to the understanding of the competition and coupling mechanism between exciton and defect states in Sn-doped CdS.
data.title_cn: Sn掺杂CdS纳米线的磁场和温度调制光致发光及磁光各向异性
data.abstract_cn: Sn 掺杂 CdS 纳米线由于其各向异性结构和缺陷介导的激子行为而表现出独特的磁光特性。本工作采用CVD法成功制备了Sn掺杂CdS纳米线，并系统研究了其在磁场、温度和激光功率调制下的光致发光行为。变温PL光谱表明，升高的温度会导致激子的热解离和晶格膨胀，从而引发峰值红移和非辐射复合增强。在低温（1.7 K）下，带边发射峰（∼500 nm）和缺陷态发射峰（550-600 nm）的强度均明显高于室温（300 K）。 Sn掺杂CdS的磁光各向异性通过磁场极化度的调制而显着显现；通过塞曼分裂和自旋偏振效应，带边发射的偏振度可以在-0.4至0.8范围内调制。我们的结果将有助于理解 Sn 掺杂 CdS 中激子和缺陷态之间的竞争和耦合机制。

data.title: Quantitative analysis of cesium in kelp using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy combined with multivariate models
data.author: Min Zhang, Chang Sun, Xizhu Wang, Xiaoyang Guo, Xiaoliang Liu, Xiaoyan Li, Xuesen Xu, Xiangfeng Liu
data.summary: Kelp is a marine product with a strong bioaccumulation capacity, and its Cs concentration can effectively reflect both marine environmental pollution and seafood safety. In this study, LIBS spectra of kelp samples with varying Cs concentrations were acquired using a nanosecond laser under ambient air conditions. A total of five quantitative models were developed, including a univariate calibration curve (CC) model and four multivariate PLSR models based on different spectral preprocessing methods (Raw, SNV, Total, and Max), to achieve accurate prediction of Cs concentrations in kelp. For raw spectra, the CC model yielded a calibration curve with an R 2 of only 0.7866, and predictions for 400 and 800 ppm samples exhibited RE of 18.88% and 22.42%, respectively. By contrast, the Raw-PLSR model substantially improved predictive performance, reducing RE to 2.59% and 7.40% for the test-set samples. Further enhancement was achieved with spectral preprocessing, which improved both accuracy and precision. Among the four PLSR models, SNV-PLSR demonstrated the best overall predictive performance. Although its RMSEC was slightly higher than that of Total-PLSR, it produced the lowest RMSEP—reduced by 13.57% relative to the other three models—and the highest R 2 (0.9802). Consistently, SNV-PLSR yielded the most accurate predictions at both low and high concentrations, with RE values of 0.02% and 2.34%, respectively. In terms of stability, all four PLSR models showed relatively high RSDs for the 400 ppm sample, reflecting the challenges of low-concentration prediction; nevertheless, SNV-PLSR achieved the lowest RSD (18.58%). For the 800 ppm sample, all models performed well, with RSDs below 13.25%. Additionally, three other multivariate methods (RF, PCR, and SVR) were also employed to construct new models by combining different spectral preprocessing methods. The model combinations with the best performance in terms of calibration and prediction indicators were selected and compared with the SNV-PLSR model. The results of the RMSE, R 2 , and test-set MRE further demonstrated the superiority of the PLSR model in the field of multivariate analysis methods. These results demonstrate that LIBS combined with PLSR and appropriate spectral preprocessing can significantly enhance the accuracy and stability of Cs quantification in kelp, providing a promising approach for rapid detection of heavy metals in marine products and monitoring of marine environmental pollution.
data.title_cn: 激光诱导击穿光谱结合多元模型定量分析海带中的铯
data.abstract_cn: 海带是一种具有很强生物富集能力的海产品，其Cs浓度可以有效反映海洋环境污染和海产品安全。在这项研究中，使用纳秒激光在环境空气条件下获取了具有不同 Cs 浓度的海带样品的 LIBS 光谱。基于不同的光谱预处理方法（Raw、SNV、Total和Max），总共开发了五个定量模型，包括一个单变量校准曲线（CC）模型和四个多元PLSR模型，以实现海带中Cs浓度的准确预测。对于原始光谱，CC 模型生成的校准曲线的 R 2 仅 0.7866，400 和 800 ppm 样品的预测 RE 分别为 18.88% 和 22.42%。相比之下，Raw-PLSR 模型显着提高了预测性能，将测试集样本的 RE 降低至 2.59% 和 7.40%。通过光谱预处理实现了进一步的增强，从而提高了准确性和精度。在四种 PLSR 模型中，SNV-PLSR 表现出了最佳的整体预测性能。尽管其 RMSEC 略高于 Total-PLSR，但它产生了最低的 RMSEP（相对于其他三个模型降低了 13.57%）和最高的 R 2 (0.9802)。一致的是，SNV-PLSR 在低浓度和高浓度下都产生了最准确的预测，RE 值分别为 0.02% 和 2.34%。稳定性方面，4个PLSR模型对400 ppm样品均表现出较高的RSD，反映出低浓度预测的挑战；然而，SNV-PLSR 实现了最低的 RSD (18.58%)。对于 800 ppm 样品，所有模型均表现良好，RSD 低于 13.25%。此外，还采用其他三种多元方法（RF、PCR和SVR）通过结合不同的光谱预处理方法来构建新模型。选择在校准和预测指标方面性能最佳的模型组合，并与SNV-PLSR模型进行比较。 RMSE、R 2 和测试集MRE的结果进一步证明了PLSR模型在多变量分析方法领域的优越性。这些结果表明，LIBS结合PLSR和适当的光谱预处理可以显着提高海带中Cs定量的准确性和稳定性，为海产品中重金属的快速检测和海洋环境污染监测提供了一种有前途的方法。

data.title: On-chip nonlinear optical physical unclonable function based on a thin-film lithium niobate array
data.author: Pengfa Chang, Tianqi Duan, Xinwei Li, Yuxi Lv, Zhenzhong Hao, Yuanyuan Guo, Longsheng Wang, Zhiwei Jia, Tong Zhao, Anbang Wang
data.summary: We propose and simulate an optical physical unclonable function (PUF) scheme that exploits nonlinear modulation in an integrated thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN) scattering array. The device consists of a silica grating structure, which randomly scatters components of different wavelengths, and a random lithium niobate array, which induces mutual temporal modulation among the input signals. First, simulations examine the wavelength-dependent scattering and the resulting nonlinear effects, confirming the theoretical basis for temporal encryption via mutual modulation in the lithium niobate pattern. Next, simulations verify the PUF’s unpredictability, reproducibility, and unclonability. By varying the challenge wavelength and its coding format, we further demonstrate a strategy for expanding the challenge-response pair (CRP) space, which is calculated to be approximately one million. Subsequently, an identity authentication scheme is proposed, and its security under link attacks is analyzed. This work lays the foundation for the design and implementation of TFLN PUF and provides a new security authentication solution for IoT devices.
data.title_cn: 基于薄膜铌酸锂阵列的片上非线性光学物理不可克隆函数
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出并模拟了一种光学物理不可克隆函数（PUF）方案，该方案利用集成薄膜铌酸锂（TFLN）散射阵列中的非线性调制。该装置由一个二氧化硅光栅结构和一个随机铌酸锂阵列组成，二氧化硅光栅结构随机散射不同波长的成分，随机铌酸锂阵列在输入信号之间引起相互时间调制。首先，模拟检查了与波长相关的散射以及由此产生的非线性效应，证实了通过铌酸锂图案中的相互调制进行时间加密的理论基础。接下来，模拟验证了 PUF 的不可预测性、再现性和不可克隆性。通过改变挑战波长及其编码格式，我们进一步演示了扩展挑战响应对（CRP）空间的策略，计算得出约为一百万。随后提出了一种身份认证方案，并分析了其在链路攻击下的安全性。这项工作为TFLN PUF的设计和实现奠定了基础，并为物联网设备提供了一种新的安全认证解决方案。

data.title: Wideband frequency-hopping measurement based on quantum compressed sensing
data.author: Wei Li, Jianyong Hu, Yanhua Zang, Yongchuang Sun, Guosheng Feng, Zhixing Qiao, Changgang Yang, Jianqiang Liu, Ruiyun Chen, Chengbing Qin, Guofeng Zhang, Liantuan Xiao, Suotang Jia
data.summary: Wideband frequency-hopping measurement is crucial for the stable operation of frequency-hopping communication systems. Traditional digital signal processing methods based on the Nyquist-Shannon sampling theorem are limited by bandwidth. Although compressed sensing reduces the sampling rate for analog-to-digital converters, its reliance on high-speed pseudo-random sequences restricts practical applications. In this paper, we propose a wideband frequency-hopping measurement method based on quantum compressed sensing, which enables dynamic capture of wideband frequency-hopping signals. By utilizing coherent state as quantum resources and mapping frequency-hopping signal onto photonic wave functions via an electro-optical modulator, a compressive measurement system is constructed that leverages the inherent randomness of coherent photon measurement collapse, and successfully achieved measurement and reconstruction of a frequency-hopping signal with 5 GHz bandwidth and a hopping rate of 100 kHop/s. A high data compression ratio of 2.1 × 10 3 was attained at a frequency-hopping rate of 1 kHop/s. By integrating time-frequency analysis methods with Bayesian optimization algorithm for frequency-hopping parameter estimation, a time estimation accuracy of 1 μs is achieved. Our research offers what we believe to be a new solution for wideband frequency-hopping measurement and can be extended to various fields such as radar and cognitive radio.
data.title_cn: 基于量子压缩感知的宽带跳频测量
data.abstract_cn: 宽带跳频测量对于跳频通信系统的稳定运行至关重要。基于奈奎斯特-香农采样定理的传统数字信号处理方法受到带宽的限制。尽管压缩感知降低了模数转换器的采样率，但其对高速伪随机序列的依赖限制了实际应用。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于量子压缩感知的宽带跳频测量方法，该方法能够动态捕获宽带跳频信号。利用相干态作为量子资源，通过电光调制器将跳频信号映射到光子波函数上，构建了利用相干光子测量崩溃固有的随机性的压缩测量系统，成功实现了5 GHz带宽、跳频速率为100 kHz/s的跳频信号的测量和重构。在1 kHz/s的跳频速率下获得了2.1×10 3 的高数据压缩比。通过将时频分析方法与贝叶斯优化算法相结合进行跳频参数估计，实现了1 μs的时间估计精度。我们的研究为宽带跳频测量提供了一种新的解决方案，并且可以扩展到雷达和认知无线电等各个领域。

data.title: Single plane spatial mode sorter
data.author: Khen Cohen, Yoav Yosif-Or, Yaron Oz, Ady Arie
data.summary: A mode sorter separates a set of M orthogonal spatial modes in a shared input channel into M different output channels. Here we present an analytic derivation and experimental validation of a single plane device for sorting spatial modes from a diverse variety of mode families, including Hermite-Gaussian (HG), Laguerre-Gaussian (LG), and Bessel-Gaussian (BG), with almost no cross-talk. This sorting capability is required for a wide range of applications that employ classical or quantum light. We also show that applying this design in order to sort a set of Orbital Angular Momentum (OAM) modes with zero radial index reproduces the well-known Fork grating configuration. Furthermore, by taking the limit of M → ∞, we present an analytical expression for sorting all the modes of a given family. By operating this device in reverse, it can be used to generate arbitrary modes by illuminating it with a Gaussian beam. The power transmission coefficient for this sorter goes as O ( M −1 ), and we provide a mathematical proof that this is optimal for any typical arrangement of the detector positions. We further study the sorter's sensitivity to wavelength and random phase noise.
data.title_cn: 单平面空间模式分类器
data.abstract_cn: 模式分类器将共享输入通道中的一组 M 个正交空间模式分离为 M 个不同的输出通道。在这里，我们提出了单平面设备的分析推导和实验验证，用于对来自各种模式族的空间模式进行排序，包括厄米高斯（HG）、拉盖尔高斯（LG）和贝塞尔高斯（BG），几乎没有串扰。使用经典光或量子光的各种应用都需要这种分选能力。我们还表明，应用这种设计来对一组具有零径向折射率的轨道角动量（OAM）模式进行排序，可以重现众所周知的叉形光栅配置。此外，通过取 M → ∞ 的极限，我们提出了一个对给定族的所有模式进行排序的解析表达式。通过反向操作该设备，它可以通过用高斯光束照射它来生成任意模式。该分类器的功率传输系数为 O ( M −1 )，我们提供了数学证明，证明这对于探测器位置的任何典型布置都是最佳的。我们进一步研究了分选机对波长和随机相位噪声的敏感性。

data.title: Range precision prediction model for three-dimensional laser gated range-intensity correlation imaging
data.author: Bo Song, Yue Zhang, Xinwei Wang, Liang Sun, Yurun Zhang, Yan Zhou
data.summary: Three-dimensional laser gated range-intensity correlation imaging (GRICI) can obtain long-range 3D images in real time with high resolution by suppressing backscatter and background noise outside the 3D depth of field. Range precision is crucial for evaluating the performance of 3D GRICI. However, traditional range precision models can only estimate it from experimental results, or cannot accurately predict it theoretically due to over-simplified analysis or insufficient theoretical modeling capability. In this paper, we present a range precision prediction model for 3D GRICI based on the law of error propagation and stochastic process analysis. Particularly, we take into account the photo-electronic process and the temporal jitter of a 3D GRICI system. Based on the classic laser range-gated imaging model, the signal-to-noise model, and the compound random distribution, the mean intensity value and the shot noise can be solved. Thus, the range precision within the 3D depth of field can be accurately predicted. We conducted experiments to validate this model. The results demonstrate that its predictions are more consistent with the experimental results compared to the traditional models. The relative error of the traditional models at 13.45 m is 76.9%, while the relative error of the proposed prediction model is only 3.1%. This research can support the design of 3D gated imaging systems.
data.title_cn: 三维激光门控距离-强度相关成像距离精度预测模型
data.abstract_cn: 三维激光门控距离-强度相关成像（GRICI）可以通过抑制3D景深之外的后向散射和背景噪声，实时获得高分辨率的长距离3D图像。距离精度对于评估 3D GRICI 的性能至关重要。然而，传统的距离精度模型只能根据实验结果进行估计，或者由于分析过于简化或理论建模能力不足而无法从理论上准确预测。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于误差传播定律和随机过程分析的 3D GRICI 距离精度预测模型。特别是，我们考虑了 3D GRICI 系统的光电过程和时间抖动。基于经典的激光测距选通成像模型、信噪比模型以及复合随机分布，可以求解平均强度值和散粒噪声。因此，可以准确预测3D景深内的距离精度。我们进行了实验来验证这个模型。结果表明，与传统模型相比，其预测与实验结果更加一致。传统模型在13.45 m处的相对误差为76.9%，而本文提出的预测模型的相对误差仅为3.1%。这项研究可以支持 3D 门控成像系统的设计。

data.title: Analysis of the impact of timing jitter on dual-comb ranging
data.author: Yuetang Yang, Runkun Zhao, Haochen Tian, Jiayang Chen, Xu Zheng, Guanhao Wu
data.summary: Dual-comb ranging is a typical absolute-distance measurement method. Noise in ranging systems limits improvements in ranging precision. Timing jitter is a primary noise source, and its relationship with ranging precision remains to be explored. In this study, we established a model to describe this relationship from the perspective of the noise power spectral density (PSD). We propose a corresponding simulation method and analyze the coupling between the timing jitter and intensity noise. Furthermore, we validated this model using dual combs with different noise levels, including the measurement of timing jitter PSD and analysis of ranging precision, which confirms the correctness of our model. The proposed model for timing jitter and ranging precision can help comprehend the mechanism and design dual-comb ranging systems for practical applications.
data.title_cn: 时序抖动对双梳测距的影响分析
data.abstract_cn: 双梳测距是一种典型的绝对距离测量方法。测距系统中的噪声限制了测距精度的提高。定时抖动是主要噪声源，其与测距精度的关系仍有待探索。在本研究中，我们建立了一个模型，从噪声功率谱密度（PSD）的角度来描述这种关系。我们提出了相应的仿真方法并分析了定时抖动和强度噪声之间的耦合。此外，我们使用不同噪声水平的双梳验证了该模型，包括定时抖动PSD的测量和测距精度的分析，这证实了我们模型的正确性。所提出的定时抖动和测距精度模型可以帮助理解该机制并设计实际应用的双梳测距系统。

data.title: Dual-band dual-circularly polarized and orbital angular momentum multiplexed reflectarray
data.author: Yuhui Ren, Yutian Ma, Kejuan Li, Lehu Wen, Bohang Zhang, Mingyang Gao, Wu Zhao, Handong Wu
data.summary: In this letter, a dual-band dual-circularly polarized (CP) orbital angular momentum (OAM) multiplexed reflectarray (RA) is proposed, capable of generating vortex electromagnetic beams with distinct polarizations, mode numbers ( l ), and radiation directions across different bands. First, it presents an innovative approach to achieving dual-band dual-CP decoupling. Second, the proposed RA integrates multiple multiplexing techniques, including frequency, polarization, and OAM. Specifically, a low-profile metasurface unit cell is designed, utilizing only a dielectric substrate and a metal patch, achieving a bandwidth ranging from 10.6 GHz to 18.1 GHz (52.2%). Furthermore, an RA constructed from these units fulfills the duplex communication requirements of Ku-band satellite systems. It generates a left-handed CP OAM beam with l =+1 in the downlink band (10.7-12.75 GHz), and a right-handed CP beam with l = -2 in the uplink band (12.75-18.1 GHz), with each beam exhibiting a distinct radiation direction.
data.title_cn: 双波段双圆偏振和轨道角动量复用反射阵列
data.abstract_cn: 在这封信中，提出了一种双波段双圆偏振（CP）轨道角动量（OAM）复用反射阵列（RA），能够在不同波段产生具有不同偏振、模式数（l）和辐射方向的涡旋电磁束。首先，它提出了一种实现双频双CP解耦的创新方法。其次，所提出的 RA 集成了多种复用技术，包括频率、极化和 OAM。具体来说，设计了一种薄型超表面单元，仅利用介电基板和金属贴片，实现了10.6 GHz至18.1 GHz（52.2%）的带宽。此外，由这些单元构建的RA满足Ku波段卫星系统的双工通信要求。它在下行链路频段 (10.7-12.75 GHz) 生成 l =+1 的左手 CP OAM 波束，在上行链路频段 (12.75-18.1 GHz) 生成 l = -2 的右手 CP OAM 波束，每个波束呈现出不同的辐射方向。

data.title: Efficient geometric modeling and joint calibration for biaxial MEMS-based fringe projection profilometry
data.author: Yupei Miao, Ziwei Wang, Xiaojie Zhang, Qijian Tang, Xiaoli Liu
data.summary: Fringe projection profilometry (FPP) enables high-precision 3D shape measurement and is increasingly deployed with biaxial micro-electro-mechanical system (MEMS) laser-scanning projectors for large-range projection. However, the fast and slow axes of a biaxial MEMS mirror exhibit coupled and nonlinear motion, causing the actual scanning trajectory to deviate from an ideal separable sweep. Consequently, points sharing the same phase no longer lie on straight lines or planar isophase surfaces, but instead follow curved spatial loci, making accurate calibration challenging. This work introduces a phase-angle-ray model (PARM) that establishes a bivariate polynomial mapping between the phase and MEMS deflection angles, from which projected rays are analytically derived. Two calibration frameworks based on pinhole and ray-based imaging models are developed by integrating geometric constraints from a standard plane and multiple standard spheres. Experiments demonstrate that the proposed method achieves high calibration accuracy, improved metric consistency, and precise 3D reconstruction.
data.title_cn: 基于 MEMS 的双轴条纹投影轮廓测量的高效几何建模和联合校准
data.abstract_cn: 条纹投影轮廓测定法 (FPP) 可实现高精度 3D 形状测量，并且越来越多地与双轴微机电系统 (MEMS) 激光扫描投影仪一起部署以进行大范围投影。然而，双轴MEMS反射镜的快轴和慢轴表现出耦合和非线性运动，导致实际扫描轨迹偏离理想的可分离扫描。因此，共享相同相位的点不再位于直线或平面等相面上，而是遵循弯曲的空间轨迹，这使得精确校准具有挑战性。这项工作引入了相位角射线模型 (PARM)，该模型在相位和 MEMS 偏转角之间建立二元多项式映射，并从中分析导出投影射线。通过集成标准平面和多个标准球的几何约束，开发了两种基于针孔和基于射线的成像模型的校准框架。实验表明，该方法具有较高的标定精度、提高的度量一致性和精确的 3D 重建。

data.title: Counter-diabatic driving in a bent mode-evolution coupler
data.author: Yu-Kai Lee, Yue Ban, Xi Chen, Shuo-Yen Tseng
data.summary: We present an implementation of counter-diabatic (CD) driving in mode-evolution couplers through axis bending, enabling compact and robust photonic devices. Using coupled-mode theory, we derive an analytical framework that reveals how geometric deformation introduces an effective Hamiltonian term, allowing the CD protocol to be realized in a physically feasible bent waveguide system. Beam propagation method (BPM) simulations confirm complete light transfer and minimal nonadiabatic transitions in a 500 μ m bent coupler, validating the theoretical predictions. Beyond reducing length, the approach offers deterministic design rules and paves the way for shortcuts to adiabaticity photonic components that maintain robustness to structural perturbations.
data.title_cn: 弯曲模式演化耦合器中的反绝热驱动
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种通过轴弯曲在模式演化耦合器中实现反绝热（CD）驱动的方法，从而实现紧凑而坚固的光子器件。利用耦合模式理论，我们推导出了一个分析框架，揭示了几何变形如何引入有效的哈密顿项，从而允许 CD 协议在物理上可行的弯曲波导系统中实现。光束传播方法 (BPM) 模拟证实了 500 μm 弯曲耦合器中的完整光传输和最小非绝热跃迁，从而验证了理论预测。除了减少长度之外，该方法还提供了确定性设计规则，并为绝热光子组件的捷径铺平了道路，以保持对结构扰动的鲁棒性。

data.title: High-resolution Dante spectrometer based on quasi-monochromatic multilayer mirror array for soft X-ray spectral measurement in plasma diagnostics
data.author: Hao Xu, Ke Dong, Ermeng Zhang, Huiyao Du, Haoxuan Si, Jun Chen, Yongtang Liu, Zhe Zhang, Zhanshan Wang, Bo Tang, Shengzhen Yi
data.summary: Soft X-ray spectroscopic diagnostics based on Dante spectrometers are essential for evaluating plasma conditions driven by Z-pinch or laser fusion. A Dante spectrometer configuration capable of achieving low spectral measurement uncertainty remains a bottleneck problem at present. This paper develops a quantitative uncertainty-analysis framework for Dante spectrometers employing an array of quasi-monochromatic multilayer mirrors. Accordingly, we further developed a set of practical methods, including the precise synchrotron radiation calibration and optimized spectrometer installation, to effectively suppress these measurement uncertainties. For implementation, we developed a Dante spectrometer covering 100–1000 eV and validated it on a Z-pinch platform. The relative expanded uncertainty of individual channels was maintained within 2%–3%, and the reconstructed spectral-distribution uncertainty was better than 3.2%.
data.title_cn: 基于准单色多层镜阵列的高分辨率 Dante 光谱仪，用于等离子体诊断中的软 X 射线光谱测量
data.abstract_cn: 基于 Dante 光谱仪的软 X 射线光谱诊断对于评估 Z 箍缩或激光聚变驱动的等离子体条件至关重要。能够实现低光谱测量不确定度的 Dante 光谱仪配置目前仍然是一个瓶颈问题。本文为采用准单色多层镜阵列的 Dante 光谱仪开发了一种定量不确定性分析框架。因此，我们进一步开发了一套实用的方法，包括精确的同步辐射校准和优化光谱仪安装，以有效抑制这些测量不确定性。为了实现这一点，我们开发了覆盖 100-1000 eV 的 Dante 光谱仪，并在 Z 箍缩平台上对其进行了验证。各个通道的相对扩展不确定度保持在2%~3%以内，重建光谱分布不确定度优于3.2%。

data.title: Multifunctional chip-scale plasmonic optical tweezers enabled by a polarization- and wavelength-dependent metasurface
data.author: Ying Yu, Cheng Chi, Lanqi Lian, Dan Wang, Qiao Jiang
data.summary: The ability of surface plasmons to confine light at a subwavelength scale enables new perspectives and opportunities in the field of nanotechnology. Making use of this unique advantage, plasmonic trapping techniques have been developed to tackle new challenges in a wide range of areas from physics to biology. However, it is still a challenge to achieve multifunctional chip-scale manipulation of small particles in a single plasmonic device. Here, we proposed a polarization- and wavelength-dependent plasmonic metasurface to realize multifunctional plasmonic optical tweezers. By fully utilizing the polarization and wavelength of light, it is shown that different kinds of SPP fields can be generated, which leads to integration of more than four optical manipulation functions, including plasmonic trapping as well as plasmonic spanner that can control both the rotation direction and radius of trapped particles. Furthermore, the metasurface also enables double-well optical trapping under linear polarization incidence. The proposed multifunctional metasurface facilitates diverse manipulation, which may open up new opportunities in biology, photonics, sensing, and related fields.
data.title_cn: 由偏振和波长相关的超表面实现的多功能芯片级等离子体光镊
data.abstract_cn: 表面等离子体激元将光限制在亚波长范围内的能力为纳米技术领域带来了新的视角和机遇。利用这一独特优势，等离子体捕获技术已被开发出来，以应对从物理学到生物学等广泛领域的新挑战。然而，在单个等离子体装置中实现小颗粒的多功能芯片级操控仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们提出了一种偏振和波长相关的等离子体超表面来实现多功能等离子体光镊。通过充分利用光的偏振和波长，可以产生不同类型的SPP场，从而集成四种以上的光学操纵功能，包括等离子体捕获以及可以控制捕获粒子的旋转方向和半径的等离子体扳手。此外，超表面还能够在线性偏振入射下实现双阱光捕获。所提出的多功能超表面有利于多样化的操作，这可能会在生物学、光子学、传感和相关领域开辟新的机遇。

data.title: Directional Smith-Purcell radiation via coupled high-index gratings
data.author: Thomas Delplace, Ilyes Bouanati, Gilles Rosolen, Bjorn Maes
data.summary: The emission of light when an electron passes by a periodic photonic structure, called Smith–Purcell radiation (SPR), creates new types of adjustable light sources. Here, we investigate directional or asymmetric SPR from a high-index dielectric double-grating structure. By introducing a lateral shift between the two gratings, we break the symmetry and enable directional emission through interference between coupled Bloch modes, thus without the need for a mirror-type structure as in previous designs. Using full-wave simulations and eigenmode analysis, we identify the modes responsible for radiation and describe their coupling properties. A coupled mode theory (CMT) model is developed to capture the transition between symmetric and asymmetric regimes, offering fast and intuitive insight into the emission behavior. This work highlights a compact and efficient approach for controlling SPR directionality in dielectric photonic structures.
data.title_cn: 通过耦合高折射率光栅的定向史密斯-珀塞尔辐射
data.abstract_cn: 当电子通过周期性光子结构时发出的光，称为史密斯-珀塞尔辐射（SPR），创造了新型的可调光源。在这里，我们研究了高折射率介电双光栅结构的定向或非对称 SPR。通过在两个光栅之间引入横向位移，我们打破了对称性，并通过耦合布洛赫模式之间的干涉实现定向发射，因此不需要像以前的设计那样使用镜式结构。通过全波模拟和本征模分析，我们确定了导致辐射的模式并描述了它们的耦合特性。开发了耦合模式理论 (CMT) 模型来捕获对称和不对称状态之间的转变，从而提供对发射行为的快速直观的了解。这项工作突出了一种紧凑而有效的方法来控制介电光子结构中的 SPR 方向性。

data.title: Machine learning assisted authentication using chaotic diversity index modulation for data centers
data.author: Xinshuai Liang, Chongfu Zhang, Wenjun Zeng, Jiebing Xia, Yue Lin, Yanwei Li
data.summary: We propose a data center secure communication scheme that uses chaotic diversity index modulation for identity authentication, and design a neural network (NN) that balances decryption and detection for the receiver. Chaotic diversity is obtained from a randomly partitioned standard 16QAM constellation. The watermark is subsequently embedded into the symbol index by leveraging this diversity. Finally, the constructed data frames composed of symbols across different time slots and subcarriers is disrupted, and the watermark is concealed within the massive data transmission. The receiver takes the received signal and chaotic diversity as inputs for the NN to obtain the watermark, and achieves identity authentication by comparing it with the locally stored watermark. The 56.37Gb/s transmission verification was conducted on a 10 km standard single-mode fiber (SSMF), and the results showed that the scheme has high security. The total key space can reach 10 90 . The watermark is hidden in the index of the symbol, making it difficult for eavesdroppers to detect. The combination of chaotic diversity and NN can cause data pollution to eavesdroppers, making it difficult to steal the correct NN. The accuracy of NN detection exceeds that of the log-likelihood ratio (LLR) detector, and it can reduce the time complexity of detection by 4 orders of magnitude. The recognition accuracy of watermarks can reach 100% under high optical power, and the legitimate and illegitimate parties can be effectively distinguished, making identity disguise attacks difficult to achieve.
data.title_cn: 使用混沌多样性指数调制的数据中心机器学习辅助身份验证
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种使用混沌分集索引调制进行身份认证的数据中心安全通信方案，并设计了一个平衡接收器解密和检测的神经网络（NN）。混沌分集是从随机划分的标准 16QAM 星座中获得的。随后通过利用这种多样性将水印嵌入到符号索引中。最后，跨不同时隙和子载波的符号构成的数据帧被打乱，水印隐藏在海量数据传输中。接收器将接收到的信号和混沌分集作为神经网络的输入来获取水印，并通过与本地存储的水印进行比较来实现身份认证。在10 km标准单模光纤（SSMF）上进行56.37Gb/s传输验证，结果表明该方案具有较高的安全性。总的密钥空间可以达到10 90 。水印隐藏在符号的索引中，使得窃听者难以察觉。混沌多样性与神经网络的结合会对窃听者造成数据污染，使得窃取正确的神经网络变得困难。 NN检测的精度超过了对数似然比（LLR）检测器，并且可以将检测的时间复杂度降低4个数量级。高光功率下水印识别准确率可达100%，可有效区分合法与非法双方，身份伪装攻击难以实现。

data.title: High-energy, 3 ps, 1.5 μm optical parametric conversion based on a periodic KTA crystals array
data.author: Zhenling Li, Aonan Zhang, Jingya Zhang, Ke Liu, Lin Han, Yading Guo, Yongguang Zhu, Qingbang Shu, Congke Wang, Gensheng Zha, Xiaojun Wang
data.summary: We demonstrate a compact, cavity-free approach to generate high-energy, few-picosecond (<5 ps), high beam quality near and mid-infrared (NIR-MIR) sources. This approach overcomes the size limitation of conventional synchronously pumped optical parametric oscillator (SPOPO). By using a mode self-reproduction periodic array of four KTA crystals pumped by a 1 MHz Nd:YVO 4 MOPA system, we produce microjoule-level pulses from a tens centimeter-scale device. The device delivers 3 ps pulses with 2.6 μJ of energy at 1535 nm (signal light) and 0.8 μJ at 3467 nm (idler light).
data.title_cn: 基于周期性 KTA 晶体阵列的高能、3 ps、1.5 μm 光学参量转换
data.abstract_cn: 我们展示了一种紧凑、无腔的方法来产生高能量、几皮秒 (<5 ps)、高光束质量的近红外和中红外 (NIR-MIR) 光源。这种方法克服了传统同步泵浦光参量振荡器（SPOPO）的尺寸限制。通过使用由 1 MHz Nd:YVO 4 MOPA 系统泵浦的四个 KTA 晶体的模式自复制周期性阵列，我们从数十厘米级的设备产生微焦耳级脉冲。该器件在 1535 nm（信号光）下提供 3 ps 脉冲，能量为 2.6 μJ，在 3467 nm（闲频光）下提供 0.8 μJ 能量。

data.title: Widely tunable lasing in Nd-doped titanate glass prepared by aerodynamic levitation melting
data.author: Jared Tolliver, Alexander Neumann, Ganesh Balakrishnan, Abdulrahman Alrubkhi, Stephen K. Wilke, Richard Weber, Brian Topper
data.summary: Nontraditional glasses obtained from containerless processing techniques such as aerodynamic levitation melting have attracted much attention in recent decades for their unique structural motifs and optical properties. Herein, we report what we believe is the first demonstration of lasing from any glass produced by levitation melting. Spectroscopic properties are studied in detail, and the host is seen to have a high active ion solubility, with a quenching concentration of 6.7 × 10 20 ions/cm 3 . Laser experiments were carried out with a 1 mm thick glass disk of composition 0.5 Nd 2 O 3 -16.5 La 2 O 3 -83 TiO 2 glass. Slope efficiency with respect to absorbed power reaches 40%, and beam quality is good with an average M 2 = 1.88. Notably, the inhomogeneous broadening driven by the unconventional glass network’s structural diversity enables a wide continuous tuning range spanning 1058–1121 nm. These outcomes provide impetus to continue research into spectroscopic and lasing properties of nontraditional glass gain media.
data.title_cn: 通过空气动力悬浮熔化制备的掺钕钛酸盐玻璃中的广泛可调激光
data.abstract_cn: 近几十年来，通过无容器加工技术（例如空气动力悬浮熔化）获得的非传统玻璃因其独特的结构图案和光学特性而备受关注。在此，我们报告了我们认为是悬浮熔化生产的玻璃产生激光的首次演示。详细研究了光谱特性，发现主体具有高活性离子溶解度，猝灭浓度为6.7×10 20 ions/cm 3 。使用组成为0.5 Nd 2 O 3 -16.5 La 2 O 3 -83 TiO 2 玻璃的1mm厚玻璃盘进行激光实验。吸收功率的斜率效率达到40%，光束质量良好，平均M 2 = 1.88。值得注意的是，由非常规玻璃网络的结构多样性驱动的不均匀展宽能够实现跨越 1058-1121 nm 的宽连续调谐范围。这些结果为继续研究非传统玻璃增益介质的光谱和激光特性提供了动力。

data.title: On-chip reconfigurable polarization splitter-rotator fabricated on a thin-film lithium niobate photonic integrated circuit platform
data.author: Florian Dubois, Alberto Della Torre, Jacopo Leo, Dorian Herle, Arno Mettraux, Homa Zarebidaki, Hamed Sattari, Michel Despont
data.summary: We report the conception and experimental demonstration of a tunable polarization splitter-rotator (PSR) integrated into a thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN) photonic platform based on a 45° PSR. The device operates over the C-band and leverages the thermo-optical tunability of TFLN to achieve precise and stable manipulation of the polarization in a millimeter scale footprint. The PSR exhibits a polarization extinction ratio of 23.3 dB on average near 1550 nm, enabling separation of both polarization channels. This performance highlights the potential of TFLN for dual-polarization applications in optical communications, sensing, and beyond.
data.title_cn: 在薄膜铌酸锂光子集成电路平台上制造的片上可重构偏振分离器-旋转器
data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了集成到基于 45° PSR 的薄膜铌酸锂 (TFLN) 光子平台中的可调谐偏振分离器旋转器 (PSR) 的概念和实验演示。该器件在 C 波段运行，并利用 TFLN 的热光可调性来实现毫米级足迹内精确稳定的偏振控制。 PSR 在 1550 nm 附近表现出平均 23.3 dB 的偏振消光比，从而能够分离两个偏振通道。这一性能凸显了 TFLN 在光通信、传感等领域双偏振应用的潜力。

data.title: Dynamic optical torque control via a single linearly polarized plane wave in an inverse-designed coherent optical environment
data.author: Xiaoshu Zhao, Xu Yuan, Hongxia Zheng, Huajin Chen, Zhifang Lin
data.summary: We propose a scheme for dynamically controlling optical torque on Mie-sized particles using a single linearly polarized plane wave, assisted by a fixed coherent optical environment constructed from multiple interfering plane waves and designed using a back-propagation-based inverse design algorithm. Our design accounts for all physical mechanisms that can induce optical torque, rather than relying solely on spin angular momentum. Such an approach ensures an accurate one-to-one mapping between the polarization of the control wave and the resulting torque orientation. The method introduces an additional degree of freedom for dynamic and programmable torque control using simple, physically realizable plane waves and offers a strategy for polarization-encoded optical torque control.
data.title_cn: 在逆向设计的相干光学环境中通过单个线偏振平面波进行动态光学扭矩控制
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种使用单个线性偏振平面波动态控制米氏尺寸颗粒上的光学扭矩的方案，辅以由多个干涉平面波构建的固定相干光学环境，并使用基于反向传播的逆设计算法进行设计。我们的设计考虑了所有可以引起光学扭矩的物理机制，而不是仅仅依赖于自旋角动量。这种方法确保了控制波的偏振和产生的扭矩方向之间的精确的一对一映射。该方法使用简单的、物理上可实现的平面波为动态和可编程扭矩控制引入了额外的自由度，并提供了偏振编码光学扭矩控制的策略。

data.title: Multispectral imaging and computational fusion for virtual staining with extended depth-of-field
data.author: Bingshan Chen, Chaoqiang Wu, Junhong Huang, Tingdong Kou, Wenyi Jing, Hongying Zhang, Junfei Shen
data.summary: Although virtual staining has emerged as a promising alternative to chemical staining through strong feature extraction and color representation capabilities of artificial intelligence, most methods suffer from poor robustness and limited compatibility with the existing clinic workflow. In this Letter, we propose a deep learned label-free virtual staining method to realize accurate and plug-and-play pathological examination with extended depth-of-field by encoding inherent spectral priors into stained visual representations. A custom imaging system with highly flexible optical parameters is constructed for multidimensional pathological spectral information acquisition. An end-to-end supervised spectral stained network (SSNet) is established for efficient spectral cue extraction and accurate stained feature learning. Experimental results across various tissues indicate that the proposed approach achieves robust virtual staining with high morphological accuracy and color fidelity. The proposed method completely gets rid of the utilization of exogenous dyes before imaging, which provides a new panel for fast diagnosis and in-vivo examination.
data.title_cn: 用于具有扩展景深的虚拟染色的多光谱成像和计算融合
data.abstract_cn: 尽管通过人工智能强大的特征提取和颜色表示能力，虚拟染色已成为化学染色的一种有前景的替代方案，但大多数方法都存在鲁棒性差以及与现有临床工作流程的兼容性有限的问题。在这封信中，我们提出了一种深度学习的无标签虚拟染色方法，通过将固有的光谱先验编码为染色视觉表示，实现具有扩展景深的准确且即插即用的病理检查。构建了具有高度灵活的光学参数的定制成像系统，用于多维病理光谱信息采集。建立了端到端监督光谱染色网络（SSNet），以实现高效的光谱线索提取和准确的染色特征学习。各种组织的实验结果表明，所提出的方法实现了具有高形态准确性和颜色保真度的稳健虚拟染色。该方法完全摆脱了成像前外源染料的使用，为快速诊断和体内检查提供了新的组合。

data.title: Dual-side snapshot light field imaging for accurate 3D volumetry of opaque and drifting underwater particles
data.author: Fengming Huang, Yifan Song, Zibang Zhang, Zhisheng Zhou, Liangpei Chen, Jianping Li
data.summary: Accurate in-situ volume measurement of small (1 mm–10 cm) drifting underwater particles is critical for marine ecology and pollutant monitoring, yet it demands snapshot 3D imaging to avoid motion artifacts. Existing imaging techniques—including digital holography and conventional light field imaging—face a fundamental limitation in recovering the complete surface geometry of opaque and semi-transparent particles due to optical occlusion and limited perspective sampling. We overcome this challenge with a face-to-face dual light field camera (F2F-DLFC) system, which simultaneously captures both sides of a target under incoherent dark-field illumination. This dual-side snapshot strategy enables full 3D reconstruction of opaque particles, with experimental results showing volume errors below 6% for targets such as live fish and irregular pellets. While semi-transparent objects still present reconstruction challenges, this work establishes a foundational methodology for in-situ volumetric instrument development, providing a viable approach for accurate volumetry of a wide range of underwater particles.
data.title_cn: 双面快照光场成像，可对不透明和漂浮的水下颗粒进行精确的 3D 体积测量
data.abstract_cn: 对小型（1 mm–10 cm）漂浮水下颗粒进行准确的原位体积测量对于海洋生态和污染物监测至关重要，但它需要快照 3D 成像以避免运动伪影。由于光学遮挡和有限的透视采样，现有的成像技术（包括数字全息术和传统光场成像）在恢复不透明和半透明粒子的完整表面几何形状方面面临着根本限制。我们通过面对面双光场相机 (F2F-DLFC) 系统克服了这一挑战，该系统在不相干暗场照明下同时捕获目标的两侧。这种双面快照策略可以实现不透明颗粒的完整 3D 重建，实验结果显示活鱼和不规则颗粒等目标的体积误差低于 6%。虽然半透明物体仍然存在重建挑战，但这项工作为原位体积仪器开发建立了基础方法，为各种水下颗粒的精确体积测定提供了可行的方法。

data.title: Brillouin–Mandelstam scattering-based cooling of traveling acoustic waves from cryogenic temperatures
data.author: Lisa Fischer, Laura Blázquez Martínez, Changlong Zhu, Robin Chenevière, Johann Troles, Birgit Stiller
data.summary: Thermal phonons are a major source of decoherence in quantum mechanical systems. Operating in the quantum ground state is therefore often an experimental prerequisite. Additionally, to passive cooling in a cryogenic environment, active laser cooling enables the reduction of phonons at specific acoustic frequencies. Brillouin cooling has been used to show efficient reduction of the thermal phonon population in waveguides at GHz frequencies down to 74 K. In this Letter, we demonstrate the cooling of a 7.608 GHz acoustic mode by combining Brillouin active cooling with precooling from 77 K using liquid nitrogen. We show a 69% reduction in the phonon population, resulting in a final temperature of 24.3 ± 1.9 K, 50 K lower than previously reported.
data.title_cn: 基于布里渊-曼德尔斯坦散射的低温传播声波冷却
data.abstract_cn: 热声子是量子力学系统中退相干的主要来源。因此，在量子基态下运行通常是实验的先决条件。此外，相对于低温环境中的被动冷却，主动激光冷却能够减少特定声频下的声子。布里渊冷却已被用来展示在 GHz 频率低至 74 K 时波导中热声子数量的有效减少。在这封信中，我们通过将布里渊主动冷却与使用液氮从 77 K 预冷相结合，演示了 7.608 GHz 声模的冷却。我们发现声子数量减少了 69%，最终温度为 24.3 ± 1.9 K，比之前报道的低 50 K。

data.title: Morphing quantum erasure effect based on the vectorially structured photon
data.author: Ye Yang, Shuya Zhang, Yongkun Zhou, Xinji Zeng, Kaixuan Ren, Dong Wei, Klaus Müller-Dethlefs, Chengyuan Wang, Yun Chen, Hong Gao, Fuli Li
data.summary: Whether a photon exhibits wavelike or particlelike behavior depends on the observation method, as clearly demonstrated by the quantum erasure (QE) experiments. Here, we propose a novel, to the best of our knowledge, version of the QE experiment that leverages a single photon prepared in an arbitrary polarization superposition state. Unlike traditional approaches that have a definite erasure method, the erasure in our experiment is determined intrinsically by the photon’s quantum state at the moment of measurement. Furthermore, we observe continuous morphing between wave and particle behavior, enabled by continuous path information erasure in the photon’s transverse mode. This dynamic transition challenges the classical dichotomy of waves and particles. These findings provide deeper insight into Bohr’s complementarity principle and expand the conceptual framework of quantum mechanics.
data.title_cn: 基于矢量结构光子的变形量子擦除效应
data.abstract_cn: 光子是否表现出波状或粒子状行为取决于观察方法，量子擦除（QE）实验清楚地证明了这一点。在这里，据我们所知，我们提出了一种新颖的 QE 实验版本，该实验利用了在任意偏振叠加态下制备的单光子。与具有明确擦除方法的传统方法不同，我们实验中的擦除本质上是由测量时光子的量子态决定的。此外，我们观察到波和粒子行为之间的连续变形，这是通过光子横向模式中的连续路径信息擦除实现的。这种动态转变挑战了波和粒子的经典二分法。这些发现为玻尔互补原理提供了更深入的见解，并扩展了量子力学的概念框架。

data.title: Harnessing disclination and topological defect edge states for second harmonic generation in photonic crystals
data.author: Lanxin Luo, Weipeng Hu, Yanhong Zou, Xiaoyu Dai, Yuanjiang Xiang
data.summary: The study of topological phase transitions induced by defects has emerged as a significant research focus. The introduction of topological defects in valley photonic crystals offers a novel degree of freedom for manipulating electromagnetic waves. These defects give rise to robust edge states with bending resistance and flexibility, promising for new waveguide designs. However, their impact on nonlinear effects remains largely unexplored, and disclination states related to nonlinearity have received little attention. Here, we propose a scheme for nonlinear frequency conversion via the coupling of different defect states. By designing harmonic transmission waveguides of various shapes, we achieve a significant enhancement in conversion efficiency. The transmission shape of harmonics can also be customized, offering flexibility. Our work paves new pathways for investigating nonlinear defect states in photonic crystals and holds significant reference value for defect regulation.
data.title_cn: 利用向错和拓扑缺陷边缘态产生光子晶体中的二次谐波
data.abstract_cn: 由缺陷引起的拓扑相变的研究已成为一个重要的研究热点。在谷光子晶体中引入拓扑缺陷为操纵电磁波提供了新的自由度。这些缺陷产生了具有抗弯曲性和灵活性的鲁棒边缘态，为新的波导设计带来了希望。然而，它们对非线性效应的影响在很大程度上仍未被探索，与非线性相关的向错态也很少受到关注。在这里，我们提出了一种通过不同缺陷态耦合进行非线性频率转换的方案。通过设计各种形状的谐波传输波导，我们实现了转换效率的显着提高。谐波的传输形状也可以定制，提供灵活性。我们的工作为研究光子晶体中的非线性缺陷态开辟了新的途径，并对缺陷调控具有重要的参考价值。

data.title: Modeling terahertz magneto-optical spectroscopic ellipsometry with conductive sheet approximation for semiconductor thin films
data.author: Akihiro Okamoto, Masaya Nagai, Masaaki Ashida, Takashi Fujii
data.summary: We present a simplified model for analyzing the reflection coefficients of anisotropic semiconductor thin films in terahertz magneto-optical ellipsometry. Derived from electromagnetic boundary conditions, the model is valid when the film thickness is much smaller than the wavelength. Its applicability is demonstrated through terahertz time-domain spectroscopic ellipsometry of two doped GaAs thin films under an external magnetic field. The approach allows direct extraction of sheet conductivity spectra and accurately reproduces the observed magneto-optical response, offering a non-invasive method for characterizing various thin-film materials.
data.title_cn: 利用半导体薄膜的导电片近似对太赫兹磁光光谱椭圆测量进行建模
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一个简化模型，用于分析太赫兹磁光椭圆偏振中各向异性半导体薄膜的反射系数。根据电磁边界条件推导出来，当薄膜厚度远小于波长时，该模型是有效的。通过在外部磁场下对两个掺杂 GaAs 薄膜进行太赫兹时域光谱椭圆光度测量，证明了其适用性。该方法可以直接提取片层电导率谱，并准确地再现观察到的磁光响应，为表征各种薄膜材料提供了一种非侵入性方法。

data.title: Enhanced holographic polymer-dispersed liquid crystal gratings through RAFT photopolymerization
data.author: Feirong Liu, Wenbo Mu, Run Tian, Penglei Li, Yulan Fu, Yiwei Zhang, Jinxin Guo, Xinping Zhang
data.summary: Holographic polymer-dispersed liquid crystal (HPDLC) gratings have great potential for applications in displays and data storage due to their exceptional optical modulation capabilities. Since their optical performance strongly depends on the phase separation between the polymer and liquid crystal (LC) induced by the photopolymerization, it is essential for improving the performance of HPDLC through the photokinetic aspect. In this work, we report (for the first time, to our knowledge) an enhanced HPDLC grating by using the reversible addition-fracture chain transfer (RAFT) agent. Experimental results show that a p -polarization diffraction efficiency ( η ) of 84% and a refractive index modulation (Δ n ) as high as 0.07 with the addition of RAFT are achieved in a 3-μm HPDLC grating. Significantly, comparing with the undoped grating, this corresponds to a near two-fold enhancement on η and an improvement of 62% on Δ n . Moreover, we confirm that an increase in the size of LC-rich phase leads to a decreasing in the threshold voltage. We believe that the enhancement of HPDLC performance by RAFT provides an effective path to optimize the holographic photopolymer materials for uses of AR display and holographic data storage.
data.title_cn: 通过RAFT光聚合增强全息聚合物分散液晶光栅
data.abstract_cn: 全息聚合物色散液晶（HPDLC）光栅由于其卓越的光学调制能力，在显示和数据存储方面具有巨大的应用潜力。由于它们的光学性能很大程度上取决于光聚合引起的聚合物和液晶（LC）之间的相分离，因此通过光动力学方面提高 HPDLC 的性能至关重要。在这项工作中，我们报告（据我们所知，这是第一次）通过使用可逆加成断裂链转移（RAFT）剂来增强 HPDLC 光栅。实验结果表明，添加RAFT后，3μm HPDLC光栅的p偏振衍射效率（η）达到84%，折射率调制（Δn）高达0.07。值得注意的是，与未掺杂的光栅相比，这相当于 η 提高了近两倍，Δ n 提高了 62%。此外，我们证实富LC相尺寸的增加会导致阈值电压的降低。我们相信，RAFT 对 HPDLC 性能的增强为优化用于 AR 显示和全息数据存储的全息光聚合物材料提供了一条有效途径。

data.title: Lensed fiber-based photoacoustic endomicroscopy for microvascular mapping in small luminal organs
data.author: Xue Wen, Zijian He, Shihan Kang, Hongji Chen, Dongyu Zhang, Zhongwen Cheng, Lvming Zeng, Kedi Xiong, Xuanrong Ji
data.summary: Miniaturization is crucial for translating photoacoustic (PA) endomicroscopy (PAE) into luminal environments that are beyond the reach of conventional endoscopes. Existing PAE probes rely on discrete optical components, which not only constrain further miniaturization but also suffer from assembly complexity and inconsistent optical performance. Here, we present a 1.4-mm-diameter PAE catheter based on astigmatism-corrected (AC) lensed fiber (LF), integrating optical focusing and acoustic detection in a compact capsule. It achieves 28 μm lateral and 19 μm longitudinal resolution at a 1.1 mm working distance (WD), enabling three-dimensional (3D) microvascular imaging in multiple small luminal organs of live mice. This universal, high-resolution platform expands PAE to previously inaccessible small luminal environments.
data.title_cn: 基于透镜光纤的光声内窥镜用于小管腔器官的微血管标测
data.abstract_cn: 小型化对于将光声 (PA) 内窥镜 (PAE) 转化为传统内窥镜无法到达的管腔环境至关重要。现有的 PAE 探头依赖于分立的光学元件，这不仅限制了进一步的小型化，而且还存在装配复杂性和光学性能不一致的问题。在这里，我们提出了一种基于散光校正 (AC) 透镜光纤 (LF) 的 1.4 毫米直径 PAE 导管，将光学聚焦和声学检测集成在紧凑的胶囊中。它在 1.1 毫米工作距离 (WD) 下实现 28 μm 横向和 19 μm 纵向分辨率，从而能够对活体小鼠的多个小管腔器官进行三维 (3D) 微血管成像。这个通用的高分辨率平台将 PAE 扩展到以前无法进入的小型管腔环境。

data.title: Atom-based quantum sensing of electromagnetic fields
data.author: John Kitching, James P. Shaffer, Dmitry Budker
data.summary: The spin and electronic degrees of freedom in atomic systems provide sensitive and versatile means for detecting electromagnetic fields, from DC to THz frequencies, with spatial resolutions ranging from the nanoscale to meter scale. Such sensors offer unique advantages compared to classical approaches, resulting from their intrinsic quantum nature. We review three different sensor modalities: atomic vapor magnetometers, nitrogen-vacancy-center magnetometers, and radio-frequency sensors based on Rydberg atoms. We emphasize the unique features and capabilities of these types of sensors in the context of real-world applications.
data.title_cn: 基于原子的电磁场量子传感
data.abstract_cn: 原子系统中的自旋和电子自由度为检测从直流到太赫兹频率的电磁场提供了灵敏且通用的手段，空间分辨率范围从纳米级到米级。与传统方法相比，此类传感器因其固有的量子特性而具有独特的优势。我们回顾了三种不同的传感器模式：原子蒸气磁力计、氮空位中心磁力计和基于里德伯原子的射频传感器。我们强调这些类型的传感器在实际应用中的独特特性和功能。

data.title: Mechanical de-skewing enables high-resolution imaging of thin tissue slices with a mesoSPIM light-sheet microscope
data.author: Steven Moreno, Sharika Mohanan, Ahmed Elnageh, Erin Boland, Lewis Williamson, Camilla Olianti, Leonardo Sacconi, Godfrey Smith, Eline Huethorst, Caroline Müllenbroich
data.summary: Optical clearing combined with light-sheet microscopy enables high-resolution imaging of extended tissue at scale. However, standard mesoSPIM systems are optimised for intact organs and are not suited to thin tissue slices. We present an oblique compensation scanning method using obliquely mounted samples held between refractive-index-matched slides in a 3D-printed frame. This enables mechanical de-skewing during acquisition, minimising post-processing requirements. We demonstrate feasibility in fluorescent bead phantoms and rabbit heart tissue, achieving a 4.8 × reduction in processing time and a 1.5 × improvement in axial resolution ((13.15±1.36) μm to (8.72±1.80) μm) compared to conventional z scan. The oblique compensation acquisition method extends mesoSPIM’s utility to fragile, laterally extended tissue sections.
data.title_cn: 机械去偏可以使用 mesoSPIM 光片显微镜对薄组织切片进行高分辨率成像
data.abstract_cn: 光学透明与光片显微镜相结合，可以对扩展组织进行大规模高分辨率成像。然而，标准 mesoSPIM 系统针对完整器官进行了优化，不适合薄组织切片。我们提出了一种倾斜补偿扫描方法，该方法使用倾斜安装的样品，该样品固定在 3D 打印框架中折射率匹配的载玻片之间。这可以在采集过程中进行机械去偏，从而最大限度地减少后处理要求。我们证明了荧光珠模型和兔心脏组织的可行性，与传统 z 扫描相比，处理时间减少了 4.8 倍，轴向分辨率提高了 1.5 倍（（13.15±1.36）μm 至（8.72±1.80）μm）。倾斜补偿采集方法将 mesoSPIM 的实用性扩展到脆弱的横向延伸的组织切片。

data.title: Evaluation of the coupling efficiency of large-diameter nanofiber Bragg cavities
data.author: Kengo Sakamoto, Konosuke Shimazaki, Hideaki Takashima, Shigeki Takeuchi
data.summary: We analyze the coupling efficiency of a single dipole with a nanofiber Bragg cavity (NFBC) for single photon sources. Conventionally, NFBC diameters are set at approximately half of the emission wavelength to maximize coupling efficiency, but these thin structures are fragile at low temperatures. By employing three-dimensional finite difference time domain simulations, we investigate NFBCs with diameters ranging from 450 to 600 nm, which offer more mechanical robustness. Our results show that NFBCs with diameters of 450 and 500 nm achieve coupling efficiencies exceeding 80%. This study paves the way for practical single-photon sources with enhanced mechanical stability, which is crucial for applications in quantum networks and quantum computing.
data.title_cn: 大直径纳米纤维布拉格腔耦合效率评估
data.abstract_cn: 我们分析了单偶极子与纳米纤维布拉格腔 (NFBC) 对于单光子源的耦合效率。传统上，NFBC 直径设置为发射波长的大约一半，以最大限度地提高耦合效率，但这些薄结构在低温下很脆弱。通过采用三维有限差分时域模拟，我们研究了直径范围为 450 至 600 nm 的 NFBC，它们具有更高的机械鲁棒性。我们的结果表明，直径为 450 和 500 nm 的 NFBC 实现了超过 80% 的耦合效率。这项研究为具有增强机械稳定性的实用单光子源铺平了道路，这对于量子网络和量子计算的应用至关重要。

data.title: Spectral-spatial feature fusion of hyperspectral imaging for skin lesion classification
data.author: Eunbin Kim, Yoosang Baek, Onseok Lee
data.summary: Atopic dermatitis (AD) is a chronic inflammatory skin disease characterized by poorly defined borders and a widespread distribution. Clinical evaluations of AD commonly rely on surface imaging, limiting insight into subsurface skin changes. This study investigates the utility of hyperspectral imaging for visualizing subsurface skin changes and identifying optimal data combinations to assess AD severity. A feature-level fusion model was constructed to extract both spectral and spatial features across different skin layers. The classification performance of each configuration was analyzed to assess its effectiveness in determining the severity of AD. The combination of Range C (750–900 nm) and spatial features achieved the best severity classification performance among the fusion models, yielding an accuracy of 0.95 ± 0.07. Combinations including Range C consistently outperformed the others, suggesting that this spectral band significantly contributed to accurate severity assessment. This study advances AD evaluation by shifting from surface-focused methods to a multilayered approach that incorporates deep structural information.
data.title_cn: 高光谱成像光谱空间特征融合用于皮肤病变分类
data.abstract_cn: 特应性皮炎（AD）是一种慢性炎症性皮肤病，其特征是边界不清、分布广泛。 AD 的临床评估通常依赖于表面成像，限制了对皮下皮肤变化的了解。本研究调查了高光谱成像在可视化皮下皮肤变化和确定评估 AD 严重程度的最佳数据组合方面的效用。构建了特征级融合模型来提取不同皮肤层的光谱和空间特征。对每种配置的分类性能进行了分析，以评估其在确定 AD 严重程度方面的有效性。范围 C (750–900 nm) 和空间特征的组合在融合模型中实现了最佳的严重性分类性能，准确度为 0.95 ± 0.07。包括范围 C 在内的组合始终优于其他组合，表明该光谱带对准确的严重性评估有显着贡献。这项研究通过从表面聚焦方法转向包含深层结构信息的多层方法，推进了 AD 评估。

data.title: Lorentz-invariant space-time wave packets
data.author: Vinzenz Zimmermann, Miguel A. Bandres
data.summary: Non-diffractive space-time wave packets (nSTWPs) represent a broad class of optical pulses capable of propagating without diffraction or dispersion in linear media. In this work, we introduce a complete family of nSTWPs that remain invariant under transverse Lorentz boosts. The Lorentz-invariant behavior of these STWPs is rigorously analyzed through their associated spectral line function, providing new insights into their fundamental properties. Furthermore, we quantify the limitations of this invariance and compare the robustness of the proposed nSTWPs against conventional nSTWPs. These findings highlight the potential of Lorentz-invariant nSTWPs for applications in robust wave packet design and space-based optical communications.
data.title_cn: 洛伦兹不变时空波包
data.abstract_cn: 非衍射时空波包 (nSTWP) 代表了一类广泛的光脉冲，能够在线性介质中无衍射或色散地传播。在这项工作中，我们介绍了一个完整的 nSTWP 系列，它们在横向洛伦兹增​​强下保持不变。通过相关的谱线函数对这些 STWP 的洛伦兹不变行为进行了严格分析，为它们的基本特性提供了新的见解。此外，我们量化了这种不变性的局限性，并将所提出的 nSTWP 与传统的 nSTWP 的鲁棒性进行了比较。这些发现凸显了洛伦兹不变 nSTWP 在鲁棒波包设计和天基光通信中应用的潜力。

data.title: Giant Faraday rotation in high- Q all-dielectric magneto-optical metasurfaces embedded in photonic crystal cavities
data.author: Weihao Yang, Shuang Xia, Tianchi Zhang, Jialong Wang, Zixuan Wei, Hanbin Wang, Yiqing Chen, Yuting Zhou, Jun Qin, Aimin Hu, Yingli Liu, Longjiang Deng, Lei Bi
data.summary: The pursuit of high-efficiency and ultrathin magneto-optical devices remains a critical challenge in modern integrated photonics, particularly for developing compact nonreciprocal devices essential for optical isolation and quantum information processing. While all-dielectric magneto-optical metasurfaces, which show strong light–matter interaction and lower optical loss, have been demonstrated to enhance magneto-optical effects, the absolute Faraday rotation value achieved thus far remains insufficient for practical applications. Here, we report a hybrid structure that synergistically combines dielectric metasurfaces with photonic crystal to overcome these limitations.
