By introducing Mie resonators and magneto-optical films as defect layers into a one-dimensional photonic crystal, 60% transmittance and giant Faraday rotation ( θ F =41°) at 1468.93 nm with an ultrahigh quality factor ( Q >10 5 ) can be achieved simultaneously. The extraordinarily large Faraday rotation originates from the coupling between a waveguide mode in the photonic crystal and the electric quadrupolar mode of Mie resonators. Our work establishes, to our knowledge, a new design paradigm for magneto-optical and active photonic devices, opening avenues for free-space optical isolators, magnetically tunable metasurfaces, and quantum photonic interface applications.
data.title_cn: 嵌入光子晶体腔的高 Q 全电介质磁光超表面中的巨大法拉第旋转
data.abstract_cn: 对高效和超薄磁光器件的追求仍然是现代集成光子学的一个关键挑战，特别是对于开发对于光隔离和量子信息处理至关重要的紧凑型不可逆器件。虽然全介电磁光超表面具有较强的光-物质相互作用和较低的光学损耗，已被证明可以增强磁光效应，但迄今为止所实现的绝对法拉第旋转值仍不足以满足实际应用。在这里，我们报告了一种混合结构，它将介电超表面与光子晶体协同结合以克服这些限制。通过将米氏谐振器和磁光薄膜作为缺陷层引入一维光子晶体中，可以同时实现60％的透射率和1468.93 nm处的巨大法拉第旋转（θ F = 41°）和超高品质因数（Q > 10 5 ）。极大的法拉第旋转源于光子晶体中的波导模式与米氏谐振器的电四极模式之间的耦合。据我们所知，我们的工作为磁光和有源光子器件建立了一种新的设计范式，为自由空间光学隔离器、磁可调超表面和量子光子接口应用开辟了道路。

data.title: All-optical analog-to-digital converters based on a thin-film lithium niobate modulator and a star coupler
data.author: Shengqi Gong, Xijie Wang, Haohua Wang, Gengxin Chen, Kangping Zhong, Changjian Guo, Guowu Zhang, Liu Liu
data.summary: In this paper, a phase-quantization all-optical analog-to-digital converter (ADC) scheme is proposed and experimentally demonstrated using a thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN) Mach–Zehnder modulator (MZM) and a star coupler, overcoming the limitations of traditional phase-shift quantization approaches where increasing output ports leads to significantly higher design complexity. With the TFLN MZM integrated, the fabricated device supports up to 40 GHz analog input at 100 GS/s sampling rate. Specifically, within the dynamic range, the demonstrated all-optical ADC device achieves an effective number of bits (ENOB) of 5.07 bits for triangular waves and 4.4 bits for sinusoidal waves at low-speed testing (1 MHz). For high-speed testing, 1.25 GHz triangular and arbitrary analog input waveforms are successfully recovered and the corresponding ENOBs are 4.2 bits and 3.9 bits. Moreover, the proposed all-optical ADC scheme demonstrates strong scalability—when the input voltage exceeds the dynamic range, additional quantization levels can be algorithmically recovered and an ENOB of 5.8 is experimentally observed.
data.title_cn: 基于薄膜铌酸锂调制器和星形耦合器的全光模数转换器
data.abstract_cn: 本文提出了一种相位量化全光模数转换器（ADC）方案，并使用薄膜铌酸锂（TFLN）马赫-曾德调制器（MZM）和星形耦合器进行了实验演示，克服了传统相移量化方法的局限性，即增加输出端口会导致设计复杂性显着提高。通过集成 TFLN MZM，所制造的器件支持高达 40 GHz 的模拟输入和 100 GS/s 的采样率。具体来说，在动态范围内，所演示的全光 ADC 器件在低速测试 (1 MHz) 下，三角波有效位数 (ENOB) 为 5.07 位，正弦波有效位数 (ENOB) 为 4.4 位。对于高速测试，成功恢复了1.25 GHz三角波和任意模拟输入波形，对应的ENOB为4.2位和3.9位。此外，所提出的全光 ADC 方案表现出强大的可扩展性——当输入电压超过动态范围时，可以通过算法恢复额外的量化级别，并通过实验观察到 ENOB 为 5.8。

data.title: Conical nonlinear Raman–Nath diffraction from submicron-thick periodically poled lithium niobate thin film
data.author: Xiaoni Li, Lingzhi Peng, Yu Zou, Baoqin Chen, Man Zeng, Yuanyuan Zhao, Xuanming Duan, Lihong Hong, Zhiyuan Li
data.summary: Conventional nonlinear Raman–Nath diffraction (NRND) spots exhibit a straight-line distribution when the pump laser enters the nonlinear dielectric grating at normal incidence or at oblique incidence. Here, we report on the first observation of the conical NRND phenomenon from a submicron-thick periodically poled lithium niobate thin film (PPLNTF) sample under a near-infrared femtosecond pulse laser excitation at various cone angles. All the multi-order second harmonic generation (SHG) diffraction signals present a novel evolution arc-shaped arrangement feature. When the PPLNTF is pumped by a laser of a specific wavelength, each SHG diffracted laser shifts under different conical configurations, allowing us to further discuss how to obtain partial sample information from the pattern. The PPLNTF at the submicron scale is essentially considered unconstrained by phase matching to a certain extent, realizes appreciable diffraction efficiencies benefiting from the domain wall enhancement, and has no significant energy fluctuations even at different cone angles. These studies not only greatly enrich physical and optical insights into novel on-chip NRND effects but also add a sufficient degree of freedom in modulating nonlinear optical interactions. Our proposed conical NRND scheme would offer a potential technique for rapid preliminary large-area nondestructive inspection of thin film chips with one-dimensional (1D) periodic microstructures, with instructive implications for the creation of multi-order laser sources in customized spatial field distributions by tuning various degrees of freedom.
data.title_cn: 亚微米厚周期性极化铌酸锂薄膜的锥形非线性拉曼-纳斯衍射
data.abstract_cn: 当泵浦激光以法向入射或斜入射进入非线性介质光栅时，传统的非线性拉曼-纳斯衍射（NRND）斑点呈现直线分布。在这里，我们报告了在不同锥角的近红外飞秒脉冲激光激发下，首次观察到亚微米厚周期性极化铌酸锂薄膜（PPLNTF）样品的圆锥形 NRND 现象。所有的多阶二次谐波产生（SHG）衍射信号都呈现出一种新颖的演化弧形排列特征。当 PPLNTF 被特定波长的激光泵浦时，每个 SHG 衍射激光在不同的圆锥配置下发生位移，使我们能够进一步讨论如何从图案中获取部分样本信息。亚微米尺度的PPLNTF本质上被认为在一定程度上不受相位匹配的约束，得益于磁畴壁的增强，实现了可观的衍射效率，并且即使在不同的锥角下也没有明显的能量波动。这些研究不仅极大地丰富了对新型片上 NRND 效应的物理和光学见解，而且还为调制非线性光学相互作用增加了足够的自由度。我们提出的圆锥形 NRND 方案将为具有一维 (1D) 周期性微结构的薄膜芯片的快速初步大面积无损检测提供一种潜在的技术，对于通过调整不同自由度在定制空间场分布中创建多阶激光源具有指导意义。

data.title: Full spectral response of grating-induced loss in photonic crystal microrings
data.author: Daniel Pimbi, Yi Sun, Roy Zektzer, Xiyuan Lu, Kartik Srinivasan
data.summary: Photonic crystal microrings (PhCRs) have emerged as powerful and versatile platforms for integrated nonlinear photonics, offering precise control over frequency and phase matching while maintaining high optical quality factors. Through grating-mediated mode coupling, PhCRs enable advanced dispersion engineering, which is critical for wideband nonlinear processes such as optical parametric oscillation, Kerr frequency comb generation, and dual-pump spontaneous and Bragg scattering four-wave mixing. Beyond dispersion control, PhCRs also facilitate the manipulation of orbital angular momentum (OAM) emission, a key functionality for encoding high-dimensional quantum states in emerging quantum photonic platforms. Despite these advances, the broadband spectral behavior of grating-induced losses in PhCRs remains largely unexplored, with most studies focusing on grating periods near the modal wavelength or its half. Such losses can significantly impact broadband nonlinear processes, where excess loss at unintended wavelengths can degrade device performance. In this work, we experimentally characterize grating-induced losses in PhCRs and reveal their full spectral response as a function of the ratio between modal wavelength and grating period. We identify distinct loss channels arising from either radiation or mode conversion, including a broad excess-loss region attributed to vertical out-coupling into OAM-carrying states. These observations are supported by three-dimensional finite-difference time-domain simulations and further analyzed through OAM radiation angle and phase-mismatch analysis. The resulting broadband loss spectrum highlights critical design trade-offs and provides practical guidelines for optimizing PhCR-based devices for nonlinear photonic applications involving widely separated frequencies.
data.title_cn: 光子晶体微环中光栅引起的损耗的全光谱响应
data.abstract_cn: 光子晶体微环 (PhCR) 已成为集成非线性光子学的强大且多功能的平台，可精确控制频率和相位匹配，同时保持高光学品质因数。通过光栅介导的模式耦合，PhCR 可实现先进的色散工程，这对于光学参量振荡、克尔频率梳生成以及双泵自发和布拉格散射四波混频等宽带非线性过程至关重要。除了色散控制之外，PhCR 还有助于操纵轨道角动量 (OAM) 发射，这是新兴量子光子平台中编码高维量子态的关键功能。尽管取得了这些进展，但 PhCR 中光栅引起的损耗的宽带光谱行为在很大程度上仍未得到探索，大多数研究都集中在模态波长或其一半附近的光栅周期。这种损耗会严重影响宽带非线性过程，其中非预期波长的过量损耗会降低器件性能。在这项工作中，我们通过实验表征了 PhCR 中光栅引起的损耗，并揭示了它们的全光谱响应作为模态波长与光栅周期之间比率的函数。我们确定了由辐射或模式转换引起的不同损耗通道，包括由于垂直耦合到 OAM 承载态而产生的广泛的超额损耗区域。这些观测结果得到三维有限差分时域模拟的支持，并通过 OAM 辐射角和相位失配分析进行进一步分析。由此产生的宽带损耗谱突出了关键的设计权衡，并为优化涉及广泛分离频率的非线性光子应用的基于 PhCR 的器件提供了实用指南。

data.title: Single-mode sapphire fiber Bragg grating high-temperature sensor
data.author: Jiafeng Wu, Xizhen Xu, Jia He, Zhuoda Li, Zhiyong Bai, Xiaoyu Weng, Liwei Liu, Junle Qu, Yiping Wang, Jun He
data.summary: Sapphire fiber has been widely utilized in ultra-high-temperature environments. A sapphire fiber Bragg grating (SFBG) is a potential high-temperature sensor, but the multimodal behavior results in a broadband reflection spectrum and poor precision. In this article, we report a helical tapered depressed cladding waveguide (HTDCW) by using a femtosecond laser direct writing technique to realize single-mode operation of SFBG. The HTDCW was created using helical negative refractive index modification by forming a depressed cladding. The helical pitch was set as 0.7 μm, and the helical diameter linearly increased from 10 μm to 60 μm along the tapered length of 10 mm. We fabricated this structure into a coreless silica fiber and inserted it between a single-mode fiber (SMF) and an SFBG. According to the simulation result and mode field measurement, such a structure can effectively suppress the higher-order modes of sapphire fiber, and the fundamental mode distribution can be obtained eventually. In addition, the HTDCW can reduce the mode field mismatch between sapphire fiber and SMF. Based on this method, we successfully obtained a single-mode reflection spectrum with a signal-to-noise ratio of 11 dB and a narrow −3 dB bandwidth of 0.62 nm. In addition, such a single-mode operation SFBG sensor can be employed to measure temperatures ranging from 25°C to 1600°C, exhibiting much better repeatability and stability.
data.title_cn: 单模蓝宝石光纤布拉格光栅高温传感器
data.abstract_cn: 蓝宝石光纤在超高温环境下得到了广泛的应用。蓝宝石光纤布拉格光栅（SFBG）是一种潜在的高温传感器，但多模态行为导致宽带反射光谱和精度差。在本文中，我们报道了一种螺旋锥形凹陷包层波导（HTDCW），通过使用飞秒激光直写技术来实现SFBG的单模操作。 HTDCW 是通过形成凹陷包层，使用螺旋负折射率修改来创建的。螺距设定为0.7μm，螺旋直径沿10mm的锥度长度从10μm线性增加到60μm。我们将此结构制作成无芯石英光纤，并将其插入单模光纤 (SMF) 和 SFBG 之间。根据仿真结果和模场测量，这种结构可以有效抑制蓝宝石光纤的高阶模，最终可以获得基模分布。此外，HTDCW还可以减少蓝宝石光纤和SMF之间的模场失配。基于该方法，我们成功获得了信噪比为11 dB、窄-3 dB带宽为0.62 nm的单模反射谱。此外，这种单模式操作的SFBG传感器可用于测量25°C至1600°C的温度范围，表现出更好的重复性和稳定性。

data.title: High-efficiency, large-scale, high-numerical-aperture achromatic flat lens via focal phasor matching
data.author: Yuning Ye, Mengdi Luo, Jisen Wen, Dazhao Zhu, Cuifang Kuang, Xu Liu
data.summary: Flat lenses, including metalenses and diffractive lenses, have attracted considerable attention for enabling miniaturized optical systems. However, achieving large-scale flat lenses with both a large numerical aperture (NA) and high achromatic performance remains a significant challenge. In this work, we propose a structural height optimization method named focal phasor matching to achieve high-performance designs for large apertures. To ensure computational accuracy, an interfacial diffraction integral approach is further employed to account for the complete diffraction process in free space. Numerical results demonstrate that this method achieves significantly higher focusing efficiency than the height sequence obtained through direct optimization. For all considered apertures, the minimum relative intensity at focus is improved to 57% using the proposed method. Experimentally, we successfully design and fabricate an achromatic multi-level diffractive lens (MDL) with a diameter of 0.4 mm and 0.5 NA by two-photon polymerization lithography. The fabricated MDL exhibits excellent achromatic performance, with a focal shift of less than 1%. Due to the single-layer structure and the use of low-refractive-index material, the designed MDL has the potential to be economically and efficiently replicated using nanoimprint lithography.
data.title_cn: 通过焦相量匹配实现高效、大尺寸、高数值孔径消色差平面透镜
data.abstract_cn: 平面透镜，包括超透镜和衍射透镜，由于实现小型化光学系统而引起了相当大的关注。然而，实现具有大数值孔径 (NA) 和高消色差性能的大型平面透镜仍然是一个重大挑战。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种称为焦点相量匹配的结构高度优化方法，以实现大孔径的高性能设计。为了确保计算精度，进一步采用界面衍射积分方法来解释自由空间中的完整衍射过程。数值结果表明，该方法比直接优化得到的高度序列获得了显着更高的聚焦效率。对于所有考虑的光圈，使用所提出的方法，焦点处的最小相对强度提高到 57%。通过实验，我们通过双光子聚合光刻成功设计并制造了直径为0.4 mm、NA为0.5的消色差多级衍射透镜（MDL）。所制造的 MDL 具有出色的消色差性能，焦移小于 1%。由于单层结构和低折射率材料的使用，所设计的 MDL 有潜力使用纳米压印光刻经济有效地复制。

data.title: Information content analysis of shadow imaging of GEO satellites
data.author: David G. Sheppard, Bobby R. Hunt, Peter N. McMahon-Crabtree
data.summary: Space situational awareness (SSA) is important for understanding the space environment to ensure safe operation of space missions. SSA activities include detecting, identifying, tracking, and characterizing artificial satellites and orbital debris. SSA objectives rely on the information that can be gained from ground-based and space-based sensors, such as optical telescopes and radar. For space objects at geosynchronous altitudes, obtaining resolved imagery from Earth is not feasible with practical instruments. Shadow imaging , however, offers the possibility of obtaining a high-resolution silhouette of the object from the shadow cast when it passes between the observer and a stellar source. Prior analyses have concluded that such a method is feasible. Herein, we discuss the usage of information-theoretic methods to understand the limitations of stellar shadow imaging. Scene-based information applied to the irradiance pattern treated as an image is investigated, as well as task-based information that links knife-edge localization, a surrogate for system resolution, to Shannon information.
data.title_cn: GEO卫星阴影成像信息内容分析
data.abstract_cn: 太空态势感知（SSA）对于了解太空环境以确保太空任务的安全运行非常重要。 SSA 的活动包括探测、识别、跟踪和表征人造卫星和轨道碎片。 SSA 目标依赖于从地面和天基传感器（例如光学望远镜和雷达）获得的信息。对于地球同步高度的空间物体，使用实用仪器从地球获得解析图像是不可行的。然而，阴影成像提供了当物体经过观察者和恒星源之间时从阴影投射中获得物体的高分辨率轮廓的可能性。先前的分析表明这种方法是可行的。在这里，我们讨论使用信息论方法来理解恒星阴影成像的局限性。研究了应用于被视为图像的辐照度图案的基于场景的信息，以及将刀口定位（系统分辨率的替代品）与香农信息联系起来的基于任务的信息。

data.title: Grating mosaic error evaluation method based on dual-wavelength diffraction spot centroid analysis
data.author: Chenguang Xin, Zeteng Sun, Yichao Zhang, Xiaochen Ma, Hao Yang, Mengwei Li
data.summary: To meet the demands of large-range, high-precision grating displacement sensing and high-energy laser systems for large-aperture gratings, grating mosaic technology has become a critical manufacturing process. Addressing the technical challenge that traditional grating mosaic methods struggle to achieve composite detection of the five-dimensional mosaic errors, this paper proposes a method for evaluating grating mosaic errors based on dual-wavelength diffraction spot centroid analysis. By establishing a quantitative mapping model between the five-dimensional mosaic errors and the centroid displacement of the diffraction spots, and utilizing a dual-wavelength laser to decouple the mixed error signals, the centroid coordinates of the spots are extracted using an improved centroid localization algorithm. This verifies the linear relationship between the alignment errors of the mosaic gratings and the centroid positions of the diffraction spots. Experimental results demonstrate that this method can effectively distinguish and measure both angular and displacement errors during the grating mosaic process. Under the condition of a CCD pixel size of 2.4 µm, the achieved detection resolution for angular errors is 0.09 µrad, and for linear displacement errors, it is 0.02 µm. This work provides a non-contact solution for the composite detection of multi-dimensional errors in the fabrication of large-scale mosaic gratings, holding significant application value in the fields of large-aperture grating manufacturing and grating-based displacement sensing.
data.title_cn: 基于双波长衍射光斑质心分析的光栅镶嵌误差评估方法
data.abstract_cn: 为满足大范围、高精度光栅位移传感和高能激光系统对大孔径光栅的需求，光栅镶嵌技术已成为关键的制造工艺。针对传统光栅镶嵌方法难以实现五维镶嵌误差复合检测的技术难题，提出一种基于双波长衍射光斑质心分析的光栅镶嵌误差评估方法。通过建立五维镶嵌误差与衍射斑质心位移之间的定量映射模型，并利用双波长激光器对混合误差信号进行解耦，采用改进的质心定位算法提取斑点的质心坐标。这验证了马赛克光栅的对准误差与衍射斑的质心位置之间的线性关系。实验结果表明，该方法能够有效区分和测量光栅镶嵌过程中的角度误差和位移误差。在CCD像素尺寸为2.4μm的条件下，实现的角度误差检测分辨率为0.09μrad，线性位移误差为0.02μm。该工作为大规模镶嵌光栅制造中多维误差的复合检测提供了一种非接触式解决方案，在大口径光栅制造和光栅位移传感领域具有重要的应用价值。

data.title: Scattering imaging based on the phase retrieval algorithm of an adaptive partitioned support domain
data.author: Mingxia Liu, Zhifang Feng, Meigang Duan, Xun Liu, Wei Li, Yuan Liu
data.summary: To address the issue of iterative stagnation caused by twin-image artifacts in conventional phase retrieval methods based on global support constraints, an adaptive partitioned support constraint (APS) of the phase retrieval algorithm utilizing a discrimination of correlation coefficient threshold is proposed in this paper. The algorithm calculates the correlation coefficient δ between the Fourier amplitude obtained through iterative updates and the target Fourier amplitude obtained from the speckle autocorrelation. When the correlation coefficient δ is below the presupposed threshold, the processing mechanism of support constraint divided into two pieces is automatically triggered. Numerical simulations demonstrate that, compared to conventional methods, the phase retrieval algorithm of adaptive partitioned support constraint dramatically mitigates the impact of twin images, showing advantages by both the sum-squared error (SSE) and the image universal quality index (UQI) evaluation metrics. The phase retrieval algorithm of adaptive partitioned support constraint mitigates the interference of twin images during the iteration process, providing new, to our knowledge, insights into the speckle autocorrelation imaging and promoting practical applications of scattering imaging technology in fields such as biomedicine and deep-sea exploration. Furthermore, this algorithm can be combined with X-ray imaging and Fourier ptychographic microscopy (FPM) technology to reduce imaging time and improve imaging quality.
data.title_cn: 基于自适应划分支持域相位恢复算法的散射成像
data.abstract_cn: 针对传统基于全局支持约束的相位检索方法中双图像伪影引起的迭代停滞问题，提出一种利用相关系数阈值判别的自适应分区支持约束（APS）相位检索算法。该算法计算迭代更新得到的傅里叶幅度与散斑自相关得到的目标傅里叶幅度之间的相关系数δ。当相关系数δ低于预设阈值时，自动触发支持约束分为两部分的处理机制。数值模拟表明，与传统方法相比，自适应分区支撑约束的相位检索算法极大地减轻了孪生图像的影响，在平方和误差（SSE）和图像通用质量指数（UQI）评价指标上都显示出优势。自适应分区支撑约束的相位检索算法减轻了迭代过程中孪生图像的干扰，为散斑自相关成像提供了新的见解，促进了散射成像技术在生物医学、深海探测等领域的实际应用。此外，该算法可以与X射线成像和傅立叶叠层显微术（FPM）技术相结合，以减少成像时间并提高成像质量。

data.title: Theoretical analysis of communication systems based on low-coherence interferometry
data.author: Eneas N. Morel, Santiago Cerrotta, Jorge R. Torga
data.summary: This paper presents a detailed analysis of crosstalk, dispersion, and the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) in an optical communication system based on low-coherence interferometry (LCI-Cs). This technique enables the generation of spatially localized carriers through optical path differences using a single central wavelength, introducing what we believe to be a new degree of freedom for data modulation. As a result, both spectral and spatial multiplexing become feasible, substantially increasing the number of transmission channels. The study examines the main factors that affect signal integrity in optical links, including chromatic dispersion, inter-channel crosstalk, interference from other stations, and optical noise—particularly amplified spontaneous emission (ASE) generated by optical amplifiers. The results show that the proposed system exhibits strong resilience to these impairments, primarily due to the partial coherence of the superluminescent source and the architecture of the interferometric setup. From a theoretical standpoint, the influence of the random phase of the optical field on interference formation is analyzed, demonstrating that this phase cancels when the fields originate from the same coherent source. Dispersion effects are modeled using a Taylor expansion of the refractive index as a function of the wavenumber, enabling accurate predictions of pulse broadening and phase shifts introduced by the transmission medium. Finally, a unified noise model is presented, capable of representing both ASE noise from discrete EDFAs and noise arising from distributed amplification schemes such as Raman amplification. The SNR is evaluated in the presence of this noise, and it is shown that when the detection interferometers are properly balanced, the system effectively suppresses common-mode noise and allows robust recovery of the transmitted signal.
data.title_cn: 基于低相干干涉测量的通信系统理论分析
data.abstract_cn: 本文对基于低相干干涉测量 (LCI-Cs) 的光通信系统中的串扰、色散和信噪比 (SNR) 进行了详细分析。该技术能够使用单个中心波长通过光程差生成空间局部载波，从而引入我们认为的数据调制的新自由度。因此，频谱和空间复用都变得可行，从而大大增加了传输通道的数量。该研究研究了影响光链路信号完整性的主要因素，包括色散、通道间串扰、其他站的干扰以及光噪声，尤其是光放大器产生的放大自发发射 (ASE)。结果表明，所提出的系统对这些损伤表现出很强的恢复能力，这主要是由于超发光源和干涉装置的架构的部分相干性。从理论角度来看，分析了光场的随机相位对干涉形成的影响，证明当场源自同一相干源时，该相位会抵消。使用折射率的泰勒展开作为波数的函数来对色散效应进行建模，从而能够准确预测传输介质引入的脉冲展宽和相移。最后，提出了一个统一的噪声模型，能够表示来自离散 EDFA 的 ASE 噪声和分布式放大方案（例如拉曼放大）产生的噪声。在存在这种噪声的情况下评估了 SNR，结果表明，当检测干涉仪适当平衡时，系统可以有效抑制共模噪声，并实现传输信号的稳健恢复。

data.title: Fiber-to-chip grating couplers for lithium niobate on sapphire
data.author: Xiang Chen, Jia-Qi Wang, Yuan-Hao Yang, Zheng-Xu Zhu, Xin-Biao Xu, Ming Li, Xi-Feng Ren, Guang-Can Guo, Chang-Ling Zou
data.summary: Lithium niobate on sapphire (LNOS) is an emerging platform for photonic integrated circuits, offering unique properties such as a wide transparency window, high nonlinearity, and strong electro-optic, nonlinear, and acousto-optic effects. Efficient light coupling between optical fibers and on-chip waveguides is crucial for practical applications. We present the design, simulation, and experimental demonstration of high-efficiency fiber-to-chip grating couplers for LNOS. The grating coupler design employs a self-imaging approach with a fixed period and linearly diminished filling factor, enabling a negative diffracted angle to match the fiber array and suppress higher-order diffraction. Numerical simulations predict a coupling efficiency of 42% at a 1550 nm wavelength. The grating couplers are fabricated on an X-cut, 400 nm thick LN film with a 220 nm etching depth using electron beam lithography and inductively coupled plasma etching. Experimental characterization using a fiber array and a six-axis displacement stage reveals a single-end coupling efficiency exceeding 20%, confirming the effectiveness of the design. The demonstrated grating couplers pave the way for efficient light coupling in LN-on-sapphire photonic circuits, enabling diverse applications in classical and quantum information processing, sensing, and nonlinear optics.
data.title_cn: 用于蓝宝石上铌酸锂的光纤到芯片光栅耦合器
data.abstract_cn: 蓝宝石上铌酸锂（LNOS）是一种新兴的光子集成电路平台，具有宽透明窗口、高非线性以及强电光、非线性和声光效应等独特特性。光纤和片上波导之间的高效光耦合对于实际应用至关重要。我们展示了用于 LNOS 的高效光纤到芯片光栅耦合器的设计、仿真和实验演示。光栅耦合器设计采用自成像方法，具有固定周期和线性减小的填充因子，使负衍射角能够匹配光纤阵列并抑制高阶衍射。数值模拟预测 1550 nm 波长处的耦合效率为 42%。光栅耦合器采用电子束光刻和感应耦合等离子体蚀刻在 X 切、400 nm 厚的 LN 薄膜上制造，蚀刻深度为 220 nm。使用光纤阵列和六轴位移台进行的实验表征表明单端耦合效率超过 20%，证实了设计的有效性。所演示的光栅耦合器为蓝宝石上 LN 光子电路中的高效光耦合铺平了道路，从而实现了经典和量子信息处理、传感和非线性光学中的多种应用。

data.title: Rapid convergence of mid-spatial-frequency errors based on a vibration-assisted polishing strategy
data.author: Linqiang Gong, Yunfei Zhang, Longxiang Li, Yiran Li, Kuo Hai, Jiahao Yu, Yuchuan Chen, Baichen Cai, Yingjie Lu, Nianju Li, Lei Zhang
data.summary: Silicon carbide and other high-hardness materials are widely used in lightweight space telescope mirrors and laser optical systems due to their high specific stiffness, low thermal expansion coefficient, and excellent thermal conductivity. However, their high hardness and brittle removal mechanism lead to a significant reduction in the material removal rate during polishing, making it difficult for conventional process optimization and path planning methods to substantially improve the convergence limit of mid-spatial-frequency (MSF) errors. To address this challenge, this paper presents what we believe to be a novel industrially robot-integrated, unidirectional vibration-assisted polishing tool with adjustable vibration direction. By introducing micro-scale vibrations at the tool-workpiece interface, this tool effectively expands the coverage area of abrasive particles, improves their distribution uniformity, and enhances the activation level of abrasive grains. This mechanism successfully breaks the anisotropy of the removal function in the polishing of high-hardness materials and reduces the periodic accumulation of regular errors, thereby significantly improving the convergence efficiency of the MSF error and the robustness of the process. Corresponding experimental results validate the positive contribution of the vibration-assisted polishing strategy to the convergence of mid-spatial-frequency errors.
data.title_cn: 基于振动辅助抛光策略的中频误差快速收敛
data.abstract_cn: 碳化硅等高硬度材料因其比刚度高、热膨胀系数低、导热性能优良等优点，广泛应用于轻型空间望远镜镜面和激光光学系统。然而，它们的高硬度和脆性去除机制导致抛光过程中材料去除率显着降低，使得传统的工艺优化和路径规划方法难以实质性改善中空频（MSF）误差的收敛极限。为了应对这一挑战，本文提出了一种我们认为是一种新颖的工业机器人集成、单向振动辅助抛光工具，其振动方向可调。该刀具通过在刀具与工件界面处引入微尺度振动，有效扩大了磨粒的覆盖面积，提高了磨粒的分布均匀性，提高了磨粒的活化水平。该机制成功打破了高硬度材料抛光中去除函数的各向异性，减少了规则误差的周期性累积，从而显着提高了MSF误差的收敛效率和过程的鲁棒性。相应的实验结果验证了振动辅助抛光策略对中频误差收敛的积极贡献。

data.title: Surface profile measurement using heterodyne moiré signals with an adjustable grating period
data.author: Kun-Huang Chen, Chia-Hung Tsai, Sheng-Chun Hung, Jing-Heng Chen
data.summary: This paper presents a heterodyne moiré fringe technique with real-time tunable fringe pitch for high-precision surface profilometry. The proposed method combines tunable fringe projection, heterodyne frequency-shifting, and a least-squares sinusoidal fitting algorithm to achieve stable and high-resolution phase extraction and surface reconstruction. A computer-generated dynamic grating pattern is projected onto a spatial light modulator, and the reflected fringe pattern, deformed by the object’s surface profile, is captured by a camera. This deformed fringe is then digitally superimposed with a virtual reference grating to generate a time-varying heterodyne moiré signal. Phase information is retrieved through phase analysis and unwrapped when necessary to reconstruct the continuous 3D surface profile. Experimental validation using a coin and a plaster statue demonstrated a height measurement error of approximately 1.4 µm. Compared with conventional physical grating systems, the proposed approach offers real-time pitch tunability, non-contact operation, a simplified setup, and ease of use, demonstrating strong potential for applications in precision optical metrology.
data.title_cn: 使用具有可调光栅周期的外差莫尔信号进行表面轮廓测量
data.abstract_cn: 本文提出了一种具有实时可调条纹间距的外差莫尔条纹技术，用于高精度表面轮廓测量。该方法结合了可调条纹投影、外差频移和最小二乘正弦拟合算法，以实现稳定、高分辨率的相位提取和表面重建。计算机生成的动态光栅图案被投影到空间光调制器上，并且由物体表面轮廓变形的反射条纹图案被相机捕获。然后，将该变形的条纹与虚拟参考光栅进行数字叠加，以生成随时间变化的外差莫尔信号。通过相位分析检索相位信息，并在必要时展开相位信息以重建连续的 3D 表面轮廓。使用硬币和石膏雕像进行的实验验证表明，高度测量误差约为 1.4 µm。与传统的物理光栅系统相比，所提出的方法提供了实时间距可调性、非接触式操作、简化的设置和易用性，展示了在精密光学计量中的巨大应用潜力。

data.title: Temporal-spatial-modulation-based light separation for high-resolution 3D reconstruction under complex scenarios
data.author: Hao Yuan, Qican Zhang, Yajun Wang
data.summary: Due to the light interference problem, three-dimensional (3D) reconstruction of complex scenarios remains challenging, especially when multiple reflections or light scattering exist. Although some attempts have been made to tackle this issue, there is still a lack of effective method simultaneously achieving high-accuracy and high-resolution reconstruction. In this work, we present a temporal-spatial modulation (TSM) framework to address those challenging issues by modulating illumination in both temporal and spatial dimensions. In the temporal dimension, TSM separates aliased light through frequency encoding and discrete Fourier analysis. In the spatial dimension, TSM leverages the physical imaging model and the Fourier power spectrum coefficients of direct light to reconstruct high-resolution fringe patterns and phase. Notably, the proposed method can be realized with off-the-shelf components such as the camera and projector, which is compatible with traditional structured light system. We validate our method in several challenging scenarios, including a sculpture with a mirror on its side, an L-shaped workpiece, and a ceramic bowl. The experiment results demonstrate the versatility of the proposed method.
data.title_cn: 基于时空调制的光分离，用于复杂场景下的高分辨率 3D 重建
data.abstract_cn: 由于光干扰问题，复杂场景的三维（3D）重建仍然具有挑战性，特别是当存在多次反射或光散射时。尽管人们已经做出了一些尝试来解决这个问题，但仍然缺乏同时实现高精度和高分辨率重建的有效方法。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个时空调制（TSM）框架，通过在时间和空间维度上调制照明来解决这些具有挑战性的问题。在时间维度上，TSM通过频率编码和离散傅立叶分析来分离混叠光。在空间维度上，TSM利用物理成像模型和直射光的傅立叶功率谱系数来重建高分辨率条纹图案和相位。值得注意的是，所提出的方法可以使用现成的组件（例如相机和投影仪）来实现，并且与传统的结构光系统兼容。我们在几个具有挑战性的场景中验证了我们的方法，包括侧面有镜子的雕塑、L 形工件和陶瓷碗。实验结果证明了该方法的通用性。

data.title: Low-loss splicing between anti-reflection coated SMF and hollow-core fiber without back-reflection degradation
data.author: Cong Zhang, Jiajie Chen, Di Lin, Jianping Li, Meng Xiang, Yuwen Qin, Radan Slavík, Songnian Fu
data.summary: Anti-reflection (AR) coating is an effective technique for reducing back-reflection and insertion loss (IL) in the interconnection between standard single-mode fiber (SSMF) and hollow-core fiber (HCF). However, the difference in thermal expansion coefficient between the fiber and coating leads to performance degradation during fusion splicing. To address this limitation, we report an embedded fiber splicing technique that uses a tapered borosilicate glass tube (BGT) as a splicing bridge, thereby avoiding direct heating of the AR coating. Theoretical analysis shows that a minimal IL of 0.13 dB can be achieved by optimizing the structural parameters, including the GRIN length and the air-cavity length, when the HCF mode field diameter ranges from 17 to 21 μm. Then, the SSMF with an AR-coated GRIN end is inserted into a tapered BGT, with the untapered side spliced to the HCF. By managing the GRIN length, the air gap, and the splicing offset, a low-IL interconnection can be achieved without the back-reflection penalty. Finally, an SSMF-HCF-SSMF interconnection link with an IL of 0.6 dB and a back-reflection of −33.8 dB is experimentally achieved. Meanwhile, higher-order mode coupling is well suppressed to below −35 dB. The proposed embedded splicing technique can facilitate HCF applications in a harsh environment.
data.title_cn: 防反射涂层 SMF 和空心光纤之间的低损耗熔接，无背反射衰减
data.abstract_cn: 增透膜（AR）是标准单模光纤（SSMF）和空心光纤（HCF）互连中减少背反射和插入损耗（IL）的有效技术。然而，光纤和涂层之间的热膨胀系数差异导致熔接过程中性能下降。为了解决这一限制，我们报告了一种嵌入式光纤熔接技术，该技术使用锥形硼硅酸盐玻璃管（BGT）作为熔接桥，从而避免直接加热增透膜。理论分析表明，当HCF模场直径在17~21 μm范围内时，通过优化GRIN长度和气腔长度等结构参数，可以实现0.13 dB的最小IL。然后，将带有 AR 涂层 GRIN 端的 SSMF 插入锥形 BGT，将非锥形侧拼接到 HCF。通过管理 GRIN 长度、气隙和拼接偏移，可以实现低 IL 互连，而不会产生背反射损失。最后，通过实验实现了IL为0.6 dB、背反射为-33.8 dB的SSMF-HCF-SSMF互连链路。同时，高阶模耦合被很好地抑制到-35 dB以下。所提出的嵌入式拼接技术可以促进HCF在恶劣环境下的应用。

data.title: DSM-LT: direct slope measurement for large-aperture optical telescope evaluation
data.author: Jae-Cheul Lee, Sang-Won Park, In-Ung Song, Ho-Soon Yang
data.summary: Accurate slope measurement in large-aperture optical systems is limited by drift and reference optics. We present DSM-LT—a direct slope measurement technique that employs a 2 × 2 mirror or collimator array with retro-reflected beams. Hardware-based differential detection suppresses common-mode pointing errors without requiring software-based tilt compensation. Wavefronts are reconstructed using a zonal least-squares method, enabling precise localized feature recovery. DSM-LT supports flexible scan patterns and can seamlessly resume after scan interruptions. Simulation results confirm nanoradian-level slope accuracy and robustness against noise. A dual-detector configuration with polarization-separated beams mitigates turbulence effects. DSM-LT provides a compact, resilient, and scalable metrology solution for large-aperture and space-based telescopes.
data.title_cn: DSM-LT：用于大口径光学望远镜评估的直接斜率测量
data.abstract_cn: 大孔径光学系统中的精确斜率测量受到漂移和参考光学器件的限制。我们提出了 DSM-LT——一种直接斜率测量技术，采用带有回射光束的 2 × 2 镜子或准直器阵列。基于硬件的差分检测可抑制共模指向误差，无需基于软件的倾斜补偿。使用区域最小二乘法重建波前，从而实现精确的局部特征恢复。 DSM-LT 支持灵活的扫描模式，并且可以在扫描中断后无缝恢复。仿真结果证实了纳弧度级的斜率精度和抗噪声鲁棒性。具有偏振分离光束的双探测器配置可减轻湍流效应。 DSM-LT 为大口径和天基望远镜提供紧凑、弹性和可扩展的计量解决方案。

data.title: Highly hardware-efficiency implementation for W-band PAM8 signal reception with additive powers-of-two quantization
data.author: Sheng Hu, Kaihui Wang, Chengzhen Bian, Tianqi Zheng, Bohan Sang, Xinda Sun, Jie Zhang, Jingtao Ge, Jianjun Yu
data.summary: In this study, we demonstrate a hardware-efficient post-equalization implementation for PAM8 signals on an FPGA platform by utilizing an additive power-of-two (APoT) quantization scheme. This approach reduces hardware resource consumption by over 70% compared to conventional methods while preserving critical performance metrics. In a 300-m W-band wireless communication experiment, the system reliably transmits 22.1184 Gbit/s PAM8 signals and satisfies the 2.4 × 10 −2 soft-decision forward error correction (SD-FEC) standard. Notably, under a host-assisted workflow, the APoT scheme achieves performance equivalent to 16-bit uniform quantization and exhibits superior stability than PoT quantization.
data.title_cn: 通过加性二次幂量化实现 W 频段 PAM8 信号接收的高硬件效率
data.abstract_cn: 在本研究中，我们通过利用加性二次幂 (APoT) 量化方案，在 FPGA 平台上演示了 PAM8 信号的硬件高效后均衡实现。与传统方法相比，这种方法可减少 70% 以上的硬件资源消耗，同时保留关键性能指标。在300米W频段无线通信实验中，系统可靠传输22.1184 Gbit/s PAM8信号，满足2.4 × 10 -2 软判决前向纠错（SD-FEC）标准。值得注意的是，在主机辅助工作流程下，APoT 方案实现了与 16 位均匀量化相当的性能，并且表现出比 PoT 量化优越的稳定性。

data.title: Pulse-width dependence of terahertz parametric generation in the sub-picosecond regime
data.author: Sota Mine, Kaito Abe, Shusaku Nakajima, Joel Edouard Nkeck, Kodo Kawase, François Blanchard, Kosuke Murate, Chiko Otani
data.summary: The present study investigated the generation characteristics and phase stability of terahertz parametric generation in the ultrashort pulse regime. The experimental results clearly demonstrated the emergence of parametric gain in LiNbO 3 , with the generation threshold appearing at a pulse width of approximately 700 fs, which closely corresponds to the Raman linewidth of the crystal. The generated terahertz waves were found to exhibit high inter-pulse phase stability. These findings indicate that parametric terahertz generation with gain in the sub-picosecond regime can serve as a basis for developing broadband pulsed sources suitable for terahertz time-domain spectroscopy.
data.title_cn: 亚皮秒范围内太赫兹参数生成的脉冲宽度依赖性
data.abstract_cn: 本研究研究了超短脉冲范围内太赫兹参量产生的产生特性和相位稳定性。实验结果清楚地证明了LiNbO 3 中参量增益的出现，产生阈值出现在大约700 fs的脉冲宽度处，这与晶体的拉曼线宽密切对应。发现所产生的太赫兹波表现出高脉冲间相位稳定性。这些发现表明，具有亚皮秒范围增益的参数太赫兹产生可以作为开发适用于太赫兹时域光谱的宽带脉冲源的基础。

data.title: High-range-resolution and long-distance CO 2 profiling using a single-photon differential absorption lidar
data.author: Mingjia Shangguan, Simin Lin, Xianghui Guo, Jinxian Fang, Guojing Dong
data.summary: Lidar has become an increasingly attractive approach for CO 2 monitoring. However, simultaneously achieving long-range detection and high-range resolution remains a fundamental tradeoff. To address this issue, first, a superconducting nanowire single-photon detector is integrated into lidar to significantly enhance long-range sensitivity, enabling detection of backscattered signals up to 10 km. In addition, a new retrieval algorithm is proposed to retrieve range-resolved CO 2 concentrations from high-SNR column measurements, effectively improving profile resolution and stability. Three consecutive nights of field tests show that the system achieves 30 m range resolution, 5 min temporal resolution, and a near-8-km range. Compared with the traditional CO 2 retrieval algorithm, the proposed method improves the range resolution by more than one order of magnitude while still achieving a 3.8-fold enhancement in retrieval accuracy. Cross-validation with in-situ observations shows that the standard deviation between the two datasets is approximately 10 ppm, further confirming the accuracy and robustness of the method. This work underpins future high-resolution CO 2 monitoring networks and supports carbon-cycle studies.
data.title_cn: 使用单光子差分吸收激光雷达进行高分辨率长距离 CO 2 分析
data.abstract_cn: 激光雷达已成为一种越来越有吸引力的 CO 2 监测方法。然而，同时实现远程检测和高分辨率仍然是一个基本的权衡。为了解决这个问题，首先，将超导纳米线单光子探测器集成到激光雷达中，显着增强远距离灵敏度，能够检测最远10公里的反向散射信号。此外，还提出了一种新的反演算法，可从高SNR柱测量中反演距离分辨的CO 2 浓度，有效提高剖面分辨率和稳定性。连续三个晚上的现场测试表明，该系统实现了30 m的距离分辨率、5 min的时间分辨率和近8 km的射程。与传统CO 2 反演算法相比，该方法在距离分辨率提高了1个数量级以上的同时，反演精度仍实现了3.8倍的提升。与现场观测的交叉验证表明，两个数据集之间的标准偏差约为10 ppm，进一步证实了该方法的准确性和鲁棒性。这项工作支撑了未来的高分辨率CO 2 监测网络并支持碳循环研究。

data.title: Voltage-tunable graphene/β-Ga 2 O 3 heterojunction solar-blind photodetector enabling photovoltaic and photoconductive dual-mode operation
data.author: Shuren Zhou, Lin Chen, Aijiang Yan, Hong Zhang, Yan Tang, Di Pang, Honglin Li, Lijuan Ye, Peng Yu, Wanjun Li
data.summary: Solar-blind ultraviolet photodetectors based on β-Ga 2 O 3 are attractive for both military and civilian applications, yet photoconductors suffer from slow response and photovoltaic photodiodes suffer from limited responsivity. Herein, we report a voltage-tunable graphene/β-Ga 2 O 3 heterojunction photodetector with dual-mode operation. Under reverse bias, it functions as a photodiode with 150 mA/W responsivity, 71% external quantum efficiency (EQE), and 0.5 ms response time at 254 nm. Forward bias switches it to photoconductive mode, achieving 71 A/W responsivity and EQE above 35,000% with 60 ms response time. This bias-selectable behavior integrates high-speed and high-gain operation in one device, enabling advanced communication and imaging applications.
data.title_cn: 电压可调石墨烯/β-Ga 2 O 3 异质结日盲光电探测器可实现光伏和光电导双模式操作
data.abstract_cn: 基于β-Ga 2 O 3 的日盲紫外光电探测器对于军事和民用应用都很有吸引力，但光电导体的响应速度慢，光伏光电二极管的响应率有限。在此，我们报告了一种具有双模式操作的电压可调石墨烯/β-Ga 2 O 3 异质结光电探测器。在反向偏压下，它充当光电二极管，具有 150 mA/W 响应度​​、71% 外量子效率 (EQE) 和 254 nm 波长下 0.5 ms 响应时间。正向偏压将其切换至光电导模式，实现 71 A/W 响应度​​和 35,000% 以上的 EQE，响应时间为 60 ms。这种偏置可选行为将高速和高增益操作集成在一个器件中，从而实现了先进的通信和成像应用。

data.title: Optically excited nano-mechanical modes of a droplet
data.author: Bhupal Singh, Amarnath, Nisha Kumawat, Manoranjan Mishra, Kailash C. Jena, Kamal P. Singh
data.summary: We show that a surging radiation pressure excites well-defined nanoscale optomechanical discrete modes of a sessile droplet. Using a pump-probe approach, we isolate growth and damped oscillations of droplet modes from background evaporation and steady-state bulge. For a microlitre droplet, we find that the amplitude of a mode increases linearly with the rate of pump power surge, reaching ∼20 nm for 2.7 kW/s. The mode frequency is characteristic of droplet geometry and physical properties but independent of the optical excitation. A Navier–Stokes model of droplet for realistic parameters reproduces the key experimental results. Furthermore, we show phenomenon of frequency splitting for the n = 3 mode of non-spherical droplets. This work opens a route to probe nanoscale shape oscillations of complex droplets subjected to spatiotemporally structured stimulus.
data.title_cn: 液滴的光激发纳米机械模式
data.abstract_cn: 我们表明，激增的辐射压力会激发固着液滴的明确定义的纳米级光机械离散模式。使用泵浦探针方法，我们将液滴模式的生长和阻尼振荡与背景蒸发和稳态膨胀隔离开来。对于微升液滴，我们发现模式的振幅随着泵浦功率浪涌的速率线性增加，在 2.7 kW/s 时达到~20 nm。模式频率是液滴几何形状和物理性质的特征，但与光学激发无关。真实参数的纳维-斯托克斯液滴模型再现了关键的实验结果。此外，我们还展示了 n = 3 模式的非球形液滴的频率分裂现象。这项工作开辟了一条探测复杂液滴在时空结构刺激下的纳米级形状振荡的途径。

data.title: Unidirectional bulk magnetoplasmons at terahertz frequencies
data.author: Ye Tian, Qingyu Li, Hongyan Lou, Shiqing Li, Linfang Shen
data.summary: Unidirectional electromagnetic modes, as an extreme regime of wave propagation, enable extraordinary and counterintuitive optical effects. These modes are typically realized as tightly confined surface waves in photonic crystals or materials with topologically nontrivial bandgaps. Here, we show that a structure comprising a magnetized semiconductor layer sandwiched between electro- and magneto-opaque materials can support unidirectional bulk magnetoplasmons at terahertz frequencies, in which all field components maintain constant amplitudes within the core layer. These modes exhibit modal properties that are independent of the core thickness, allowing the modal spot to extend over several wavelengths. Numerical simulations further confirm their immunity to backscattering. By combining the tunability of modal spot with the robustness of unidirectional propagation, these unidirectional bulk modes offer more degrees of freedom for the manipulation of terahertz waves.
data.title_cn: 太赫兹频率下的单向体磁等离子体
data.abstract_cn: 单向电磁模式作为波传播的极端状态，能够产生非凡且违反直觉的光学效应。这些模式通常以光子晶体或具有拓扑非平凡带隙的材料中严格限制的表面波的形式实现。在这里，我们表明，由夹在电和磁不透明材料之间的磁化半导体层组成的结构可以支持太赫兹频率的单向体磁等离子激元，其中所有场分量在核心层内保持恒定的幅度。这些模式表现出与纤芯厚度无关的模态特性，允许模态点扩展到多个波长。数值模拟进一步证实了它们对反向散射的免疫力。通过将模态点的可调谐性与单向传播的鲁棒性相结合，这些单向体模式为太赫兹波的操纵提供了更多的自由度。

data.title: Reconfigurable GSST-based metasurfaces for simultaneously demultiplexing optical spin and orbital angular momenta
data.author: Kangzhun Peng, Shiqi Luo, Hengyue Luo, Zhi-Yuan Li, Wenyao Liang
data.summary: Light beams carrying spin angular momentum (SAM) and orbital angular momentum (OAM) have garnered significant interest owing to their potential in optical communications, imaging, and micromanipulation. Although simultaneous detection of multiple SAM and OAM modes through demultiplexing is highly necessary, it remains challenging due to the static optical responses of conventional metasurfaces after device fabrication. Here, we propose a multifunctional metasurface demultiplexer utilizing the phase-change material Ge 2 Sb 2 Se 4 Te 1 (GSST) for reconfigurable, simultaneous detection of multiple SAM and OAM modes. When GSST is amorphous, the coaxial beams carrying SAM and OAM modes are spatially demultiplexed into distinct vortex beams with defined topological charges, and each propagates to a predetermined position. The information of SAM and OAM of the incident beam can be determined by observing the position of the solid spot. Upon transition of GSST into the crystalline state, demultiplexing ceases due to the loss of phase modulation capability, thereby preventing mode retrieval. This reconfigurable detection strategy offers a promising platform for dynamically switchable devices in applications such as encrypted optical communications and dynamic holography.
data.title_cn: 可重构的基于 GSST 的超表面，用于同时解复用光学自旋和轨道角动量
data.abstract_cn: 携带自旋角动量（SAM）和轨道角动量（OAM）的光束由于其在光通信、成像和显微操作方面的潜力而引起了人们的极大兴趣。尽管通过解复用同时检测多个 SAM 和 OAM 模式非常必要，但由于器件制造后传统超表面的静态光学响应，这仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们提出了一种利用相变材料Ge 2 Sb 2 Se 4 Te 1 (GSST) 的多功能超表面解复用器，用于可重构、同时检测多个SAM 和OAM 模式。当 GSST 为非晶态时，携带 SAM 和 OAM 模式的同轴光束在空间上被解复用为具有定义的拓扑电荷的不同涡旋光束，并且每个光束都传播到预定位置。通过观察实心点的位置可以确定入射光束的SAM和OAM信息。当 GSST 转变为结晶态时，由于相位调制能力的丧失，解复用停止，从而阻止模式恢复。这种可重新配置的检测策略为加密光通信和动态全息术等应用中的动态可切换设备提供了一个有前景的平台。

data.title: Self-coherent photonic terahertz link at 300-GHz-band against modulated jamming
data.author: Shenghong Ye, Yoshiki Kamiura, Bo Li, Ryota Kaide, Yiqing Wang, Ming Che, Yuya Mikami, Yuta Ueda, Kazutoshi Kato
data.summary: Terahertz (THz) intensity modulation technology is crucial for future low-cost 6G networks but is vulnerable to jamming. While frequency hopping (FH) counters single-tone jamming, our evaluation demonstrates its weakness against modulated jamming. Specifically, we demonstrated that while FH with a 40 GHz carrier separation is effective against single-tone jamming, it fails against modulated jamming. To address the vulnerability, we propose a self-coherent THz system where the transmitter generates both the radio frequency and local oscillator signals. This architecture separates the desired signal from the modulated jamming for secure communication. Moreover, using wavelength-tunable lasers for FH, the system resists both modulated and single-tone jamming. We demonstrate secure 1-Gbit/s transmission at 275 GHz against a 235 GHz modulated jamming signal and the reverse case. This cost-effective scheme improves THz link resilience to multiple jamming types and supports secure THz wireless communications.
data.title_cn: 300 GHz 频段的自相干光子太赫兹链路可抵抗调制干扰
data.abstract_cn: 太赫兹 (THz) 强度调制技术对于未来低成本 6G 网络至关重要，但容易受到干扰。虽然跳频 (FH) 可以对抗单音干扰，但我们的评估表明它在对抗调制干扰方面存在弱点。具体来说，我们证明了虽然具有 40 GHz 载波间隔的 FH 可以有效对抗单音干扰，但它无法对抗调制干扰。为了解决该漏洞，我们提出了一种自相干太赫兹系统，其中发射器生成射频信号和本地振荡器信号。该架构将所需信号与调制干扰分开，以实现安全通信。此外，该系统使用波长可调谐激光器进行跳频，可以抵抗调制干扰和单音干扰。我们演示了在 275 GHz 下针对 235 GHz 调制干扰信号和相反情况的安全 1 Gbit/s 传输。这种经济高效的方案提高了太赫兹链路对多种干扰类型的恢复能力，并支持安全的太赫兹无线通信。

data.title: Differentiable ray tracing optimization of freeform spectacle lenses for astigmatism correction
data.author: Hanni Qiu, Xinghua Pan, Zexin Feng
data.summary: Refractive error is a global public health challenge, with astigmatism correction being one of the key issues. While spherocylindrical lenses compensate for static astigmatism, they fail to address optical axis shifts during eye movement. To address this problem, we propose a single vision lens design method with freeform surfaces based on differentiable ray tracing. Our method integrates the rotation model of the human eye into the optical design framework. Besides, it leverages the high design freedom of the freeform surface to realize effective correction of optical focus errors across different fields of view. To verify the effectiveness of the method, we develop spectacle lens designs to correct astigmatism in the human eye through systematic comparison of traditional spherocylindrical and aspheric lenses with various freeform designs, including deformed XY polynomials and both single- and double-Zernike surfaces. Results show that our method achieves superior off-axis aberration correction at equivalent optimization orders, demonstrating its technical advantage for vision correction.
data.title_cn: 用于散光矫正的自由曲面眼镜片的可微分光线追踪优化
data.abstract_cn: 屈光不正是一项全球公共卫生挑战，其中散光矫正是关键问题之一。虽然球柱镜可以补偿静态散光，但它们无法解决眼睛运动期间的光轴偏移问题。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种基于可微分光线追踪的自由曲面单光镜片设计方法。我们的方法将人眼的旋转模型集成到光学设计框架中。此外，它利用自由曲面的高设计自由度，实现不同视场光学聚焦误差的有效校正。为了验证该方法的有效性，我们开发了眼镜镜片设计，通过对传统球柱面和非球面镜片与各种自由形状设计（包括变形 XY 多项式以及单泽尼克曲面和双泽尼克曲面）进行系统比较，开发了矫正人眼散光的眼镜镜片设计。结果表明，我们的方法在等效优化阶数下实现了优异的离轴像差校正，展示了其在视力校正方面的技术优势。

data.title: High-sensitivity SNSPD-enabled swept source Raman spectroscopy for cancer detection with SERS nanoparticles
data.author: Yifan Liu, A. K. M. Atique Ullah, Timothy M. Rambo, Aniwat Juhong, Bo Li, Cheng-you Yao, Min Li, Jeremy S. Doredla, Stephanie Boyd, Gary D. Luker, Ming Han, Aaron J. Miller, Xuefei Huang, Zhen Qiu
data.summary: Highly sensitive and specific molecular detection is essential for advancing early cancer diagnosis. In this paper, we present an imaging system that combines swept source Raman spectroscopy with surface-enhanced Raman scattering (SERS) nanoparticles to enhance cancer detection capability. By incorporating a high-efficiency superconducting nanowire single-photon detector (SNSPD), the system achieves remarkable detection sensitivity to the femtomolar concentrations. This performance was demonstrated under practical conditions using only 30 mW excitation power and 40 ms wavelength point exposure time, enabling ultra-sensitive acquisition. Imaging experiments on both cell and tissue samples confirm the system’s compatibility with various biological applications. Combining high sensitivity, speed, and specificity, this platform offers a promising approach for molecular imaging and early stage cancer detection using SERS-based probes.
data.title_cn: 支持高灵敏度 SNSPD 的扫频拉曼光谱，用于使用 SERS 纳米粒子检测癌症
data.abstract_cn: 高度灵敏和特异性的分子检测对于推进早期癌症诊断至关重要。在本文中，我们提出了一种成像系统，将扫频拉曼光谱与表面增强拉曼散射（SERS）纳米颗粒相结合，以增强癌症检测能力。通过采用高效超导纳米线单光子探测器（SNSPD），该系统对飞摩尔浓度实现了卓越的检测灵敏度。这种性能在实际条件下仅使用 30 mW 激发功率和 40 ms 波长点曝光时间就得到了证明，从而实现了超灵敏采集。对细胞和组织样本的成像实验证实了该系统与各种生物应用的兼容性。该平台结合了高灵敏度、速度和特异性，为使用基于 SERS 的探针进行分子成像和早期癌症检测提供了一种有前途的方法。

data.title: Watt-level actively Q-switched intracavity frequency-doubled Pr:LiYF 4 laser at 261 nm
data.author: Zihao Tong, Lei Zhu, Changsheng Zheng, Kui Wu, Yongguang Zhao, Zhengping Wang, Haohai Yu, Huaijin Zhang
data.summary: We report on a watt-level nanosecond 261-nm laser from an acousto-optically Q-switched visible Pr:YLF laser through intracavity second-harmonic generation (SHG). By implementing direct water-cooling for thermal management and an intracavity mirror for double-passing nonlinear crystal, a maximum average power of 1.03 W has been achieved at a repetition rate of 40 kHz, which, to the best of our knowledge, is the highest power ever reported from an intracavity-frequency-doubled pulsed, short-wave ultraviolet (UV-C) laser at 261 nm. Decreasing the repetition rate to 20 kHz, a single-pulse energy of 43.4 µJ can be obtained. This approach with a robust and simple structure demonstrates a promising way toward the direct generation of high-power UVC laser pulses.
data.title_cn: 瓦特级主动调Q腔内倍频Pr:LiYF 4 激光器，波长261 nm
data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了通过腔内二次谐波产生 (SHG) 的声光 Q 开关可见 Pr:YLF 激光器产生的瓦特级纳秒 261 nm 激光器。通过实施用于热管理的直接水冷和用于双通非线性晶体的腔内镜，在 40 kHz 的重复频率下实现了 1.03 W 的最大平均功率，据我们所知，这是迄今为止报道的 261 nm 腔内倍频脉冲短波紫外 (UV-C) 激光器的最高功率。将重复频率降低至 20 kHz，可获得 43.4 µJ 的单脉冲能量。这种结构坚固且简单的方法展示了直接生成高功率 UVC 激光脉冲的一种有前途的方法。

data.title: Dispersion-engineered subwavelength grating microring resonator for high-sensitivity and wide-range on-chip sensing
data.author: Shibo Sun, Xinzhe Xiong, Meiyu Chang, Yameng Xu, Mei Kong, Li Shen
data.summary: Silicon-based microring resonator sensors are promising components for lab-on-chip sensing systems. However, developing a microring resonator sensor with both high sensitivity and wide detectable range has remained challenging. Here, we experimentally demonstrate a high-sensitivity and wide-range subwavelength grating microring resonator sensor by leveraging its dispersion properties. These properties enable the formation of an envelope spectrum. By tracking this envelope spectrum for sensing, the detectable range is liberated from the limitation of the free spectral range. Moreover, the dispersion properties are crucial for the improvement of sensitivity. Through dispersion engineering, the subwavelength grating microring resonator achieves a refractive index sensitivity of 791 nm/RIU, with the detectable range no longer limited by the free spectral range. This work advances the design principles for microring resonator sensors and paves the way for high-performance on-chip optical sensing platforms.
data.title_cn: 色散设计的亚波长光栅微环谐振器，用于高灵敏度和宽范围片上传感
data.abstract_cn: 硅基微环谐振器传感器是芯片实验室传感系统中很有前途的组件。然而，开发具有高灵敏度和宽检测范围的微环谐振器传感器仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们利用其色散特性，通过实验演示了一种高灵敏度、宽范围的亚波长光栅微环谐振器传感器。这些特性使得包络谱能够形成。通过跟踪该包络光谱进行传感，可检测范围摆脱了自由光谱范围的限制。此外，分散特性对于灵敏度的提高至关重要。通过色散工程，亚波长光栅微环谐振器实现了791 nm/RIU的折射率灵敏度，可检测范围不再受到自由光谱范围的限制。这项工作推进了微环谐振器传感器的设计原理，并为高性能片上光学传感平台铺平了道路。

data.title: Epsilon-near-zero material assisted metasurface saturable absorber for ultrafast Yb-doped fiber lasers
data.author: Ji Su Kim, Byeong Kwon Choi, Soyeon Ahn, Sung Yoon Cho, Min Su Kim, Minjun Kim, Yeonsang Park, Min Yong Jeon
data.summary: The recent progress in semiconductor processing technology has served as a major driving force behind the rapid development of nanophotonics research. Among the emerging applications, metasurfaces have attracted significant attention as saturable absorbers (SAs) for mode-locked laser systems that generate short pulses. In this study, we present the comprehensive design, fabrication, and experimental demonstration of a metasurface-based SA operating in the 1 μm wavelength range, leveraging both the localized surface plasmon resonance (LSPR) phenomenon and the epsilon-near-zero (ENZ) effect of indium tin oxide. The proposed metasurface SA significantly enhances the nonlinear optical response by combining the effects of LSPR and ENZ phenomena. The design was optimized using finite-difference time-domain simulations, which enabled both structural optimization and comprehensive characterization of optical properties. Based on the simulation results, the metasurface SA was fabricated via a commercial electron-beam lithography process. Linear transmission measurements of the fabricated SA confirmed the presence of LSPR around 1050 nm. Nonlinear transmission measurements revealed a modulation depth of 10.9% and a saturation intensity of 10.98 MW / cm 2 . The metasurface SA was successfully integrated into a mode-locked Yb-doped fiber laser, achieving stable Q -switched mode-locking operation at a central wavelength of 1058 nm. The resulting laser exhibited a spectral bandwidth of 11.7 nm, a repetition rate of 16.15 MHz, and a pulse envelope duration of approximately 2.6 μs. These results validate the reliability and effectiveness of the metasurface-based approach. The experimental findings highlight the strong potential of metasurface SAs incorporating ENZ materials as a versatile platform for next-generation high-performance ultrafast fiber lasers. The integration of plasmonic metasurfaces with ENZ effects offers a promising pathway toward compact, efficient, and tunable ultrafast laser sources for applications in communications, spectroscopy, and precision measurement.
data.title_cn: 用于超快掺镱光纤激光器的ε近零材料辅助超表面可饱和吸收器
data.abstract_cn: 半导体加工技术的最新进展成为纳米光子学研究快速发展的主要推动力。在新兴应用中，超表面作为产生短脉冲的锁模激光系统的可饱和吸收器（SA）引起了人们的广泛关注。在这项研究中，我们利用局域表面等离子体共振（LSPR）现象和氧化铟锡的ε近零（ENZ）效应，展示了在1μm波长范围内工作的基于超表面的SA的全面设计、制造和实验演示。所提出的超表面 SA 通过结合 LSPR 和 ENZ 现象的影响显着增强了非线性光学响应。使用有限差分时域仿真对设计进行了优化，从而实现了结构优化和光学特性的综合表征。根据模拟结果，超表面 SA 通过商业电子束光刻工艺制造。所制造的 SA 的线性透射测量证实了 1050 nm 左右的 LSPR 的存在。非线性传输测量显示调制深度为10.9%，饱和强度为10.98 MW/cm 2 。该超表面SA成功集成到锁模掺镱光纤激光器中，在中心波长1058 nm处实现了稳定的调Q锁模操作。所得激光器的光谱带宽为 11.7 nm，重复率为 16.15 MHz，脉冲包络持续时间约为 2.6 μs。这些结果验证了基于超表面的方法的可靠性和有效性。实验结果凸显了采用 ENZ 材料的超表面 SA 作为下一代高性能超快光纤激光器的多功能平台的巨大潜力。等离子体超表面与 ENZ 效应的集成为紧凑、高效、可调谐超快激光源提供了一条有前途的途径，可用于通信、光谱学和精密测量等领域。

data.title: Lithium niobate micro-waveguides for efficient supercontinuum generation and frequency comb self-referencing
data.author: Yongzhi Tang, Jing Qiu, Wenjun Ding, Tingting Ding, Xingze Song, Tianhao Xian, Hao Li, Shijie Liu, Luqi Yuan, Yuanlin Zheng, Xianfeng Chen
data.summary: Optical frequency combs (OFCs) and supercontinuum generation (SCG) facilitate a plethora of important applications in metrology, spectroscopy, optical clocks, etc. Recent advances in integrated photonics offer an attractive avenue to implement compact or chip-integrated comb sources. However, the prevalent method based on nano-waveguides usually exhibits low output power and large coupling losses during the SCG process. Here, we experimentally demonstrate over two-octave-spanning SCG with high output power in dispersion-engineered magnesium-oxide-doped lithium-niobate-on-insulator (MgO:LNOI) micro-waveguides using a high-repetition-rate femtosecond fiber oscillator laser. The micro-waveguide can deliver high-power SCG due to its excellent fiber compatibility, lower insertion loss, and higher optical damage threshold. The designed waveguide also allows for birefringence phase matched second-harmonic generation (SHG), realizing simultaneous f -2 f interference in a single-pass configuration. Measurement and stabilization of carrier-envelope offset frequency ( f CEO ) are achieved with over 36-dB signal-to-noise ratio for OFC self-referencing. Furthermore, a nonlinear envelope equation model is established to simulate the spectral broadening and frequency conversion process regarding cascaded χ (2) and χ (3) nonlinearities. This work provides a compact and convenient solution for f -2 f self-referencing frequency combs using photonic micro-waveguide technology.
data.title_cn: 用于高效超连续谱生成和频率梳自参考的铌酸锂微波导
data.abstract_cn: 光学频率梳 (OFC) 和超连续谱产生 (SCG) 促进了计量学、光谱学、光学时钟等领域的大量重要应用。集成光子学的最新进展为实现紧凑型或芯片集成梳状源提供了一条有吸引力的途径。然而，基于纳米波导的流行方法在SCG过程中通常表现出低输出功率和大耦合损耗。在这里，我们使用高重复率飞秒光纤振荡器激光器，在色散工程掺杂氧化镁掺杂绝缘体上铌酸锂 (MgO:LNOI) 微波导中实验演示了两个八度跨度的 SCG 具有高输出功率。微波导由于其优异的光纤兼容性、较低的插入损耗和较高的光损伤阈值，可以提供高功率SCG。设计的波导还允许双折射相位匹配二次谐波产生（SHG），在单通道配置中实现同时 f -2 f 干涉。载波包络偏移频率 (fCEO) 的测量和稳定是通过 OFC 自参考超过 36dB 的信噪比实现的。此外，建立了非线性包络方程模型来模拟级联χ(2)和χ(3)非线性的谱展宽和变频过程。这项工作为利用光子微波导技术的 f -2 f 自参考频率梳提供了一种紧凑且方便的解决方案。

data.title: Cross-coupling effects of surface plasmon polaritons and guided mode resonances toward tunable light trapping
data.author: Chao Xie, Wenxuan Liu, Hongyi Chen, Yutu Li, En-Ming You, Renxian Gao, Zhilin Yang, Shaoxin Shen
data.summary: Achieving the precise control over high-quality ( Q ) resonances, particularly bound states in the continuum (BICs), within plasmonic metasurfaces remains a substantial challenge due to inherent material losses, which can undermine the modulation efficiency and device performance in practical settings. Here, we introduce a mechanism, termed dual-channel-driven BICs, which exploits the cross-coupling between surface plasmon polaritons and guided mode resonances to enable the delicate formation and manipulation of high- Q bound states in dissipative plasmonic platforms. This mechanism is concretized through the design of plasmonic resonant waveguide metagratings, which support controllable modal transitions from bulk-like guided modes to interface-coupled resonances, thereby facilitating the energy transfer between low-loss dielectric components and metal-associated local regimes. The proposed strategy is experimentally validated via a proof-of-concept prototype, accompanied by theoretical modeling that elucidates the governing mechanism. Furthermore, we numerically demonstrate the potential of this approach in developing high-figure-of-merit filtering and sensing. Insights derived from this work offer a versatile yet effective design framework for dissipationless manipulation of light-matter interactions at the nanoscale, thereby expanding functional capabilities of high- Q metaphotonic systems.
data.title_cn: 表面等离子体激元和导模共振对可调谐光捕获的交叉耦合效应
data.abstract_cn: 由于固有的材料损失，在等离子体超表面内实现对高质量（Q）共振，特别是连续体中的束缚态（BIC）的精确控制仍然是一个巨大的挑战，这可能会破坏实际设置中的调制效率和器件性能。在这里，我们引入了一种称为双通道驱动 BIC 的机制，它利用表面等离激元极化子和导模共振之间的交叉耦合，从而能够在耗散等离激元平台中精细地形成和操纵高 Q 束缚态。这种机制通过等离子体谐振波导元光栅的设计具体化，它支持从体状导模到界面耦合谐振的可控模态转变，从而促进低损耗介电元件和金属相关局部状态之间的能量转移。所提出的策略通过概念验证原型进行实验验证，并附有阐明控制机制的理论模型。此外，我们还以数字方式证明了这种方法在开发高品质过滤和传感方面的潜力。这项工作的见解提供了一个通用而有效的设计框架，用于在纳米尺度上无耗散地操纵光与物质的相互作用，从而扩展高Q元光子系统的功能能力。

data.title: NSGA-II-driven design of a multispectral compatible metasurface with broadband microwave polarization conversion and low infrared emissivity
data.author: Weisheng Zhang, Mingbao Yan, Ruichao Zhu, Sai Sui, Yajuan Han, Weiqiang Gong, Jiechu Liu, Jiafu Wang
data.summary: Given the conflict between high microwave absorption and low infrared emissivity performance in electromagnetic-controlled metasurface design, achieving multispectral compatibility between low microwave reflectivity and low infrared emissivity remains challenging. Leveraging the non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm II (NSGA-II), this study presents a three-layer lightweight metasurface comprising a metal-patterned F4B substrate with a metal backplate, designed to achieve simultaneous ultra-wideband polarization conversion and low infrared emissivity. The NSGA-II is employed to engineer distinct electrical lengths along the two orthogonal decomposition components of the incident electromagnetic wave, enabling dominant resonant mode conversion across multiple frequency bands, which facilitates efficient broadband polarization conversion while maintaining low infrared emissivity. Simulation results show that the polarization conversion efficiency is greater than 90% in the 7.7–12.1 GHz band, and the experimentally measured mean infrared emissivity is 0.36, which is close to the theoretical value with angular stability. This feature enables it to be directly applied to the stealth coating of military targets and the field of polarization multiplexing communication, doubling the transmission channel capacity.
data.title_cn: NSGA-II 驱动的具有宽带微波偏振转换和低红外发射率的多光谱兼容超表面设计
data.abstract_cn: 鉴于电磁控制超表面设计中高微波吸收和低红外发射率性能之间的冲突，实现低微波反射率和低红外发射率之间的多光谱兼容性仍然具有挑战性。利用非支配排序遗传算法 II (NSGA-II)，本研究提出了一种三层轻质超表面，包括金属图案 F4B 基板和金属背板，旨在实现同时超宽带偏振转换和低红外发射率。 NSGA-II 用于沿入射电磁波的两个正交分解分量设计不同的电长度，从而实现跨多个频段的主导谐振模式转换，从而促进高效的宽带偏振转换，同时保持低红外发射率。仿真结果表明，在7.7~12.1 GHz频段偏振转换效率大于90%，实验测量的平均红外发射率为0.36，与角稳定理论值接近。这一特性使其能够直接应用于军事目标的隐身涂层和偏振复用通信领域，使传输通道容量成倍增加。

data.title: Sub-nanometer address grid in variable shaped e-beam lithography for efficient inscription of high-precision large-area optical gratings
data.author: Martin Heusinger, Thorsten A. Goebel, Michael Banasch, Daniel Richter, Ria G. Krämer, Christian Voigtländer, Eike Linn, Thomas Siefke, Andreas Tünnermann, Ernst-Bernhard Kley, Stefan Nolte, Uwe D. Zeitner
data.summary: High-performance, large-area optical gratings for applications like chirped pulse amplification, gravitational wave astronomy, and X-ray optics require sub-nanometer line placement control over several cm 2 . Electron beam lithography with a variable shaped beam (VSB) is well suited but limited by tool-dependent address grid discretization. We adapted address grid interpolation to the VSB method, reducing the effective placement grid to 25 pm, as confirmed by stray light measurements. The technique was further demonstrated on a 0.5 cm ×5 cm phase mask for chirped fiber Bragg gratings (100 pm/mm), achieving excellent spectral broadband reflection quality.
data.title_cn: 可变形状电子束光刻中的亚纳米地址网格，用于高效刻写高精度大面积光栅
data.abstract_cn: 用于啁啾脉冲放大、引力波天文学和X射线光学等应用的高性能、大面积光栅需要数cm 2 的亚纳米线布局控制。具有可变形状束（VSB）的电子束光刻非常适合，但受到工具相关的地址网格离散化的限制。我们将地址网格插值调整为 VSB 方法，将有效放置网格减少到下午 25 点，正如杂散光测量所证实的那样。该技术在啁啾光纤布拉格光栅 (100 pm/mm) 的 0.5 cm ×5 cm 相位掩模上得到进一步验证，实现了出色的光谱宽带反射质量。

data.title: 3D holographic metasurface design by deep learning with partitioned loss function
data.author: Yunxin Guo, Yi Yang, Fan Huang, Jianqiang Gu, Chunmei Ouyang, Quan Xu, Xueqian Zhang
data.summary: Deep learning has significantly accelerated the automation of metasurface design and reduced its dependence on empirical approaches. However, it still has not fully demonstrated its capabilities in the most challenging light field manipulation: 3D holography. In this paper, we present a framework that integrates a fully connected forward prediction network with a 3D convolutional inverse design network to design terahertz 3D holographic metasurfaces. By using a limited number of target image planes as the ground truth, the network learns the concept of true 3D holography, where patterns rotate and translate as they propagate, and designs metasurfaces to realize the corresponding holograms. From a practical perspective, we propose a partitioning and weighting method for calculating the loss function to enhance the recognizability of 3D holographic imaging. Compared to the analytical method and Gerchberg–Saxton algorithm, the proposed network not only exhibits superior imaging performance but also meets the demands of physically unreasonable 3D holography by adopting the approximate solution. This paper provides a novel and effective method for exploring the immense potential of deep learning in the inverse design of metasurfaces, enabling metasurfaces to better meet the requirements of complex light field manipulation across various wavelength bands. The proposed 3D holographic metasurfaces hold significant potential for advancing terahertz devices that generate specific modes requiring strict and continuous control in 3D space.
data.title_cn: 通过深度学习和分区损失函数进行 3D 全息超表面设计
data.abstract_cn: 深度学习显着加速了超表面设计的自动化，并减少了其对经验方法的依赖。然而，它仍未完全展示其在最具挑战性的光场操纵：3D 全息术中的能力。在本文中，我们提出了一个框架，将完全连接的前向预测网络与 3D 卷积逆设计网络相集成，以设计太赫兹 3D 全息超表面。通过使用有限数量的目标图像平面作为地面实况，网络学习真正的 3D 全息图的概念，其中图案在传播时旋转和平移，并设计超表面以实现相应的全息图。从实用的角度来看，我们提出了一种计算损失函数的分区和加权方法，以增强3D全息成像的可识别性。与解析方法和Gerchberg-Saxton算法相比，所提出的网络不仅表现出优越的成像性能，而且通过采用近似解来满足物理上不合理的3D全息的要求。本文提供了一种新颖有效的方法来探索深度学习在超表面逆向设计中的巨大潜力，使超表面能够更好地满足跨波段复杂光场操纵的要求。所提出的 3D 全息超表面对于推进太赫兹设备具有巨大的潜力，这些设备产生需要在 3D 空间中严格和连续控制的特定模式。

data.title: Design of a broadband, high-power, off-axis spiral polarization reflector
data.author: A. Nicholas Black
data.summary: Spirally polarized beams are known to produce a strong longitudinal field under high numerical aperture focusing. We report on the design of a reflective optical element with an off-axis geometry that is capable of transforming a uniformly polarized beam into a predominantly spirally polarized beam. By utilizing the retardance present in Fresnel reflection, our device can operate over a broad range of wavelengths. The output polarization and intensity structure of a beam passing through the reflector are calculated using polarization and scalar ray tracing. Vector diffraction is used to calculate the polarization and intensity structure under f /0.656 focusing. The off-axis reflective design is well-suited for high-power laser applications and could enable current and future laser-based particle accelerators to achieve strong longitudinal fields at focus.
data.title_cn: 宽带、高功率、离轴螺旋偏振反射器的设计
data.abstract_cn: 众所周知，螺旋偏振光束在高数值孔径聚焦下会产生强纵向场。我们报告了具有离轴几何形状的反射光学元件的设计，该元件能够将均匀偏振光束转换为主要是螺旋偏振的光束。通过利用菲涅耳反射中存在的延迟，我们的设备可以在很宽的波长范围内工作。使用偏振和标量光线追踪来计算穿过反射器的光束的输出偏振和强度结构。矢量衍射用于计算 f/0.656 聚焦下的偏振和强度结构。离轴反射设计非常适合高功率激光应用，可以使当前和未来的基于激光的粒子加速器在焦点处实现强纵向场。

data.title: Deep learning-based deflection angle regression network for measurement of the atmospheric refractive index structure constant
data.author: Baoyi Li, Jian Jiang, Yunyun Chen, Zhiqin Huang
data.summary: The measurement of the refractive index structure constant plays a crucial role in the study of atmospheric turbulence. This paper proposes a method based on deflection angle regression network (DARN) for measuring the atmospheric refractive index structure constant. First, the feasibility and superiority of this method are verified through numerical simulation. The dataset used for deep learning training consists of 3600 frames of moiré fringes and a label dataset composed of 3600 frames of deflection angle information in one-to-one correspondence with them. Then, the trained model is used to predict the deflection angle, based on which the refractive index structure constant can be obtained. The simulation results show that the relative error of this method is about 0.3%, while that of the traditional method (TM) is about 2.1%. Finally, it is applied to the measurement of real atmosphere flow fields by moiré deflectometry. The experimental results indicate that the deep learning model not only achieves minimal training loss and rapid convergence of validation loss but also maintains a negligible prediction error, confirming its excellent performance.
data.title_cn: 基于深度学习的偏转角回归网络测量大气折射率结构常数
data.abstract_cn: 折射率结构常数的测量在大气湍流的研究中起着至关重要的作用。提出一种基于偏转角回归网络（DARN）的大气折射率结构常数测量方法。首先，通过数值模拟验证了该方法的可行性和优越性。用于深度学习训练的数据集由3600帧莫尔条纹和与它们一一对应的3600帧偏转角度信息组成的标签数据集组成。然后，利用训练好的模型来预测偏转角，据此可以获得折射率结构常数。仿真结果表明，该方法的相对误差约为0.3%，而传统方法（TM）的相对误差约为2.1%。最后将其应用于莫尔偏转测量真实大气流场。实验结果表明，深度学习模型不仅实现了最小的训练损失和验证损失的快速收敛，而且保持了可忽略的预测误差，证实了其优异的性能。

data.title: Lightweight dense U-Net for 3D tracer particle field reconstruction in synthetic aperture PIV
data.author: Xiangju Qu, Yang Song, Yulong Qi, Xiaoqiang Guo, Liang Liang, Zhiqiang Hu, Zhenhua Li
data.summary: Synthetic aperture particle image velocimetry (SAPIV) has emerged as an advanced technique for investigating complex fluid dynamics, providing nonintrusive flow measurements with an extended depth of field, robustness at high particle concentrations, and improved three-dimensional resolutions. In SAPIV, accurate reconstruction of three-dimensional tracer particle fields is critical for ensuring the reliability and precision of flow measurements. In this study, a three-dimensional dense U-Net network is proposed to extract tracer particles from the synthetic aperture refocused image volume. Designed with a lightweight architecture, the network eliminates down-sampling and promotes feature reuse via dense blocks and skip connections. The 1×1×1 structure of the dense blocks allows for the reduced computational load while maintaining high spatial resolution. Validation in simulated vortex ring and uniform flow fields confirmed the method’s accuracy in reconstructing tracer particle and displacement vector fields. Quantitative assessments using reconstruction quality Q and 3D structural similarity demonstrated that the method achieves high-quality reconstruction of 3D tracer particle fields. Furthermore, a real experiment involving flow around a circular cylinder was conducted to demonstrate the practical applicability of the method.
data.title_cn: 用于合成孔径 PIV 中 3D 示踪粒子场重建的轻量级密集 U-Net
data.abstract_cn: 合成孔径粒​​子图像测速 (SAPIV) 已成为研究复杂流体动力学的先进技术，提供具有扩展景深、高粒子浓度下的鲁棒性和改进的三维分辨率的非侵入式流量测量。在 SAPIV 中，三维示踪粒子场的精确重建对于确保流量测量的可靠性和精度至关重要。在本研究中，提出了一个三维密集 U-Net 网络来从合成孔径重聚焦图像体积中提取示踪粒子。该网络采用轻量级架构设计，消除了下采样，并通过密集块和跳过连接促进特征重用。密集块的 1×1×1 结构可以减少计算负载，同时保持高空间分辨率。模拟涡环和均匀流场的验证证实了该方法在重建示踪粒子和位移矢量场方面的准确性。使用重建质量Q和3D结构相似性进行定量评估表明，该方法实现了3D示踪粒子场的高质量重建。此外，还进行了圆柱绕流真实实验，验证了该方法的实际适用性。

data.title: Polarization-based real-time diffraction efficiency measurement of reflection volume holographic gratings
data.author: Rajveer Kaur, Komal Sharma, Saikat Saha, Raj Kumar
data.summary: Holographic gratings play a crucial role in various applications, including spectroscopy, displays, security holograms, and sensing technologies. Real-time monitoring of the diffraction efficiency of these gratings is essential for improving fabrication processes and performance optimization. For many applications, such as displays and sensing, reflection volume holographic gratings (RVHGs) are preferred over transmission gratings due to their high wavelength selectivity. Existing real-time diffraction efficiency measurement setups typically rely on the Bragg degenerate method, which requires two lasers, resulting in increased cost and bulkiness. Also, it requires precise wavelength tuning and alignment, making the system more complex. Therefore, we propose a polarization-based novel, to the best of our knowledge, setup that performs real-time measurement of the diffraction efficiency of RVHGs with a single laser source. In this approach, the probe beam, having a different polarization state than the recording beams, provides real-time measurements, demonstrating a simplified method for the characterization and optimization of RVHGs. Furthermore, the refractive index modulation and polymerization rates are calculated for RVHGs recorded in photopolymer film, which are essential for determining grating quality and optical performance. Application of the proposed method is demonstrated in the optimization of holographic couplers required for the holographic waveguide-based near-eye augmented reality displays.
data.title_cn: 基于偏振的反射体全息光栅实时衍射效率测量
data.abstract_cn: 全息光栅在光谱学、显示、安全全息图和传感技术等各种应用中发挥着至关重要的作用。实时监测这些光栅的衍射效率对于改进制造工艺和性能优化至关重要。对于显示器和传感等许多应用，反射体全息光栅 (RVHG) 由于其高波长选择性而优于透射光栅。现有的实时衍射效率测量装置通常依赖于布拉格简并方法，该方法需要两个激光器，导致成本增加和体积增大。此外，它需要精确的波长调谐和对准，使系统更加复杂。因此，据我们所知，我们提出了一种基于偏振的新型装置，可以使用单个激光源实时测量 RVHG 的衍射效率。在这种方法中，探测光束具有与记录光束不同的偏振态，可提供实时测量，展示了一种用于表征和优化 RVHG 的简化方法。此外，还计算了光聚合物薄膜中记录的 RVHG 的折射率调制和聚合速率，这对于确定光栅质量和光学性能至关重要。该方法的应用在基于全息波导的近眼增强现实显示器所需的全息耦合器的优化中得到了证明。

data.title: Estimation of skin optical properties with a Monte Carlo simulation and a genetic algorithm
data.author: Murilo Sanches Sampaio, Luismar Barbosa da Cruz Junior, Renato Tinós, Lilian Tan Moriyama, Luciano Bachmann
data.summary: Designing laser-based therapies and diagnostics requires knowledge of the tissue’s optical properties in order to avoid adverse effects such as burns and overdosing. These optical properties are usually estimated from measured reflectance and Monte Carlo (MC) light transport models, but most existing MC databases are built by sweeping parameters uniformly and often yield spectra that sit outside the range of real skin tones. This study closes this gap by guiding MC simulations with a color-space constraint. A three-layer skin model was implemented in PyXOpto, parameterized by biologically relevant variables and optimized by a genetic algorithm (GA) to ensure that the simulated colors remain within the bounds of the individual typology angle (ITA ∘ ). Validation against ex vivo human skin demonstrates high accuracy for different skin tones. These results indicate that the color-constrained framework can replicate and estimate the optical properties of real skin.
data.title_cn: 使用蒙特卡罗模拟和遗传算法估计皮肤光学特性
data.abstract_cn: 设计基于激光的疗法和诊断需要了解组织的光学特性，以避免烧伤和用药过量等不良影响。这些光学特性通常是根据测量的反射率和蒙特卡罗 (MC) 光传输模型来估计的，但大多数现有的 MC 数据库是通过均匀扫描参数构建的，并且通常会产生位于真实肤色范围之外的光谱。这项研究通过用色彩空间约束指导 MC 模拟来缩小这一差距。在 PyXOpto 中实现了三层皮肤模型，通过生物学相关变量进行参数化，并通过遗传算法 (GA) 进行优化，以确保模拟颜色保持在单个类型学角度 (ITA ∘ ) 的范围内。针对离体人体皮肤的验证表明，不同肤色的准确性很高。这些结果表明颜色约束框架可以复制和估计真实皮肤的光学特性。

data.title: Decoupled two-stage multi-task learning with channel attention for optical image compression–reconstruction and classification
data.author: Nai-Wei Hsing, Bo-Ya Pan, Po-Jui Chiang
data.summary: We present a decoupled multi-task framework trained via a two-stage scheme and augmented with channel attention for optical image compression–reconstruction and classification. In Stage 1 (classification-focused pretraining), the encoder is optimized without quantization noise to learn stable, semantically discriminative representations. In Stage 2, quantization and decoding are enabled, and channel attention is inserted to emphasize high-information-carrying channels, preserving key structures and textures under compression. The design exploits shallow low-level cues (edges and textures) for reconstruction and deep high-level semantics (object structure and category) for classification, yielding complementary cross-task benefits. Experiments demonstrate a robust trade-off: across bit-per-pixel (BPP) settings, classification accuracy remains at 81.40%, surpassing a joint MTL baseline (60.20% at BPP=0.0362) and a JPEG2000 + VGG19 pipeline (20.80%). The model uses only 1.97×10 7 parameters—over 33% fewer than alternatives—and achieves nearly ×3 faster training under identical settings. In sum, the proposed approach jointly ensures classification accuracy, reconstruction quality, and computational efficiency, delivering high performance, a lightweight footprint, and strong deployability for resource-constrained, low-bandwidth edge scenarios.
data.title_cn: 用于光学图像压缩、重建和分类的具有通道注意的解耦两阶段多任务学习
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一个解耦的多任务框架，通过两阶段方案进行训练，并通过通道注意进行增强，以进行光学图像压缩、重建和分类。在第一阶段（以分类为重点的预训练）中，编码器在没有量化噪声的情况下进行优化，以学习稳定的、语义上有区别的表示。在第 2 阶段，启用量化和解码，并插入通道注意力以强调高信息承载通道，在压缩下保留关键结构和纹理。该设计利用浅层低级线索（边缘和纹理）进行重建，利用深层高级语义（对象结构和类别）进行分类，从而产生互补的跨任务优势。实验证明了一种稳健的权衡：在每像素位数 (BPP) 设置下，分类精度保持在 81.40%，超过了联合 MTL 基线（BPP=0.0362 时为 60.20%）和 JPEG2000 + VGG19 管道（20.80%）。该模型仅使用 1.97×10 7 个参数（比替代方案少 33% 以上），并且在相同设置下实现了近 3 倍的训练速度。总之，所提出的方法共同确保了分类精度、重建质量和计算效率，为资源受限、低带宽边缘场景提供高性能、轻量化和强大的可部署性。

data.title: HeNe laser for a high-precision phase-shifting interferometer based on peak power locking and weak thermal coupling
data.author: Qi Wang, Pei Jing, Zhigang Han, Zhanpeng Cui, Rihong Zhu, Ming Liu
data.summary: Aiming at the problem of lacking several-milliwatt HeNe lasers with stable output in the field of precise interferometry, a light source schema based on peak power locking and weak thermal coupling is proposed in this paper. A weak thermal coupling structure driven by thermoelectric coolers (TECs) is developed based on the thermal conduction model of the laser tube, and the operating temperature of the tube is regulated through the feedback of the intensity signal of the reference light. Eventually, a two-milliwatt laser output with a wavelength drift of 0.04 pm within 24 h is achieved. The power loss, which is faced by the commercial frequency stabilization technique for HeNe lasers, is avoided by locking the operating mode at the peak gain position in the proposed method. In addition, stable single-longitudinal-mode output is achieved through this method, solving the issue of unstable interferogram contrast in spatiotemporal domain associated with the laser coherence fluctuation. Based on these characteristics, the new, to our knowledge, laser is applied for the surface shape measurement of an irregular-shape monocrystalline silicon component, resulting in the single-measurement error being reduced and the repeatability accuracy in the vibrating environment being improved.
data.title_cn: 基于峰值功率锁定和弱热耦合的高精度相移干涉仪氦氖激光器
data.abstract_cn: 针对精密干涉测量领域缺乏稳定输出的几毫瓦氦氖激光器的问题，提出一种基于峰值功率锁定和弱热耦合的光源方案。基于激光管的热传导模型，开发了热电冷却器（TEC）驱动的弱热耦合结构，通过参考光强度信号的反馈调节管的工作温度。最终实现了24小时内波长漂移为0.04 pm的2毫瓦激光输出。该方法通过将工作模式锁定在峰值增益位置来避免商用氦氖激光器频率稳定技术所面临的功率损失。此外，该方法实现了稳定的单纵模输出，解决了激光相干波动引起的时空域干涉图对比度不稳定的问题。基于这些特点，据我们所知，新型激光应用于不规则形状单晶硅元件的表面形状测量，从而减少了单次测量误差，提高了振动环境下的重复精度。

data.title: Elliptically polarized light obtained from tilted high-contrast grating VCSELs
data.author: Valerio Torrelli, Martino D’Alessandro, Alberto Gullino, Matteo G. C. Alasio, Alberto Tibaldi, Connie Chang-Hasnain, Pierluigi Debernardi
data.summary: We show that ultrathin elliptically polarized VCSELs can be realized with standard high-contrast gratings (HCGs) whose bars are tilted to the semiconductor crystalline axes on the transverse plane, without relying on any 2D chiral layer. Revisiting orthogonal polarization suppression ratio (OPSR) measurements, we demonstrate that the reduced OPSR for tilted gratings is related to elliptical lasing polarization rather than degraded polarization selectivity. Simulations confirm that the polarization state can be tuned by balancing intrinsic and HCG-induced anisotropies. These devices provide integrated elliptically polarized and wavelength-tunable sources for chip-scale atomic devices.
data.title_cn: 从倾斜高对比度光栅 VCSEL 获得的椭圆偏振光
data.abstract_cn: 我们证明，超薄椭圆偏振 VCSEL 可以使用标准高对比度光栅（HCG）来实现，其光栅在横向平面上与半导体晶轴倾斜，而不依赖于任何 2D 手性层。重新审视正交偏振抑制比 (OPSR) 测量，我们证明倾斜光栅的 OPSR 降低与椭圆激光偏振有关，而不是与偏振选择性下降有关。模拟证实，可以通过平衡固有各向异性和 HCG 引起的各向异性来调节偏振态。这些器件为芯片级原子器件提供集成椭圆偏振和波长可调源。

data.title: Deep learning for optical misalignment diagnostics in multi-lens imaging systems
data.author: Tomer Slor, Dean Oren, Shira Baneth, Tom Coen, Haim Suchowski
data.summary: In the rapidly evolving field of optical engineering, precise alignment of multi-lens imaging systems is critical yet challenging, as even minor misalignments can significantly degrade performance. Traditional alignment methods rely on specialized equipment and are time-consuming processes, highlighting the need for automated and scalable solutions. We present two complementary deep learning-based inverse-design methods for diagnosing misalignments in multi-element lens systems using only optical measurements. First, we use ray-traced spot diagrams to predict five-degree-of-freedom (5-DOF) errors in a 6-lens photographic prime, achieving a mean absolute error of 0.031 mm in lateral translation and 0.011 ∘ in tilt. We also introduce a physics-based simulation pipeline that utilizes grayscale synthetic camera images, enabling a deep learning model to estimate 4-DOF, decenter, and tilt errors in both two- and six-lens multi-lens systems. These results show the potential to reshape manufacturing and quality control in precision imaging.
data.title_cn: 多镜头成像系统中光学失准诊断的深度学习
data.abstract_cn: 在快速发展的光学工程领域，多镜头成像系统的精确对准至关重要但又具有挑战性，因为即使是微小的未对准也会显着降低性能。传统的对准方法依赖于专用设备并且是耗时的过程，突出了对自动化和可扩展解决方案的需求。我们提出了两种基于深度学习的互补逆向设计方法，用于仅使用光学测量来诊断多元件透镜系统中的未对准。首先，我们使用光线追踪点图来预测 6 镜头摄影定焦镜头中的五自由度 (5-DOF) 误差，横向平移的平均绝对误差为 0.031 毫米，倾斜的平均绝对误差为 0.011 ∘。我们还引入了基于物理的模拟管道，该管道利用灰度合成相机图像，使深度学习模型能够估计两镜头和六镜头多镜头系统中的 4 自由度、偏心和倾斜误差。这些结果显示了重塑精密成像制造和质量控制的潜力。

data.title: Light shift suppression in a CPT magnetometer using linear polarization and double frequency interrogation
data.author: M. A. Maldonado, Yang Li, James A. McKelvy, Andrey Matsko, Irina Novikova, Eugeniy E. Mikhailov, John Kitching, Ying-Ju Wang
data.summary: We demonstrate a suppression of the light shift in a Coherent-Population-Trapping (CPT) atomic magnetometer by using linearly polarized light and a differential measurement between magnetic resonances. The radio frequency that creates the optical sidebands for CPT quickly switches between two magnetic sensitive transitions, and the magnetic field is extrapolated from the difference of the center frequencies of the magnetic resonances. Light shifts and common drifts like collisional shifts can be suppressed through careful choice of measured resonances, and we show the light shift reduction by more than a factor of 20 compared to excitation with circularly-polarized light. Various limitations of the method are discussed.
data.title_cn: 使用线性偏振和双频询问的 CPT 磁力计中的光移抑制
data.abstract_cn: 我们通过使用线偏振光和磁共振之间的差分测量来证明相干粒子捕获（CPT）原子磁力计中光移的抑制。为 CPT 创建光学边带的射频在两个磁敏感跃迁之间快速切换，并且根据磁共振中心频率的差异推断出磁场。通过仔细选择测量的共振，可以抑制光位移和常见漂移（例如碰撞位移），并且我们发现与圆偏振光激发相比，光位移减少了 20 倍以上。讨论了该方法的各种局限性。

data.title: Ranging beyond synthetic wavelengths with an undersampled spectral signal using tunable wavelength laser interferometry
data.author: P. Harikrishnan, Dinesh N. Naik
