data.summary: Range extension achieved beyond the longest synthetic wavelength is possible by continuous tuning of the source wavelength and with the use of tilted interference for excess fraction extraction from a spectrally undersampled signal. This allows for the unique measurement of the extended range. For a correctly assumed fringe order for the initial source wavelength, the non-divergence of the estimated range as a function of wavelength tuning provides the potential range locations. These are further zeroed in by repeating the analysis by varying the tuning steps. A cascaded Michelson interferometer is used to uniquely measure the extended range as well as the spatial profile of the sample from a single set of wavelength scan. The excess fraction is accurately measured using the Fourier transform method of fringe analysis by virtue of tilted interference. With the support of sub-nanometer resolution in wavelength tuning, precise centimeter-scale ranging, along with micrometer-level profile resolution, is achieved.
data.title_cn: 使用可调谐波长激光干涉测量法，通过欠采样光谱信号超越合成波长
data.abstract_cn: 通过连续调谐光源波长并使用倾斜干涉从光谱欠采样信号中提取多余部分，可以实现超出最长合成波长的范围扩展。这允许对扩展范围进行独特的测量。对于正确假设的初始源波长的条纹阶数，作为波长调谐函数的估计范围的不发散提供了潜在的范围位置。通过改变调整步骤重复分析，可以进一步将这些归零。级联迈克尔逊干涉仪用于通过单组波长扫描独特地测量扩展范围以及样品的空间轮廓。利用条纹分析的傅立叶变换方法，利用倾斜干涉，精确测量过量部分。在波长调谐的亚纳米分辨率的支持下，可以实现精确的厘米级测距以及微米级的轮廓分辨率。

data.title: Long-period grating on thin-film lithium-niobate waveguide for polarization mode conversion
data.author: Mengke Wang, Wei Jin, Kaixin Chen, Kin Seng Chiang
data.summary: We design and fabricate a long-period grating (LPG) on a thin-film lithium-niobate (TFLN) rib waveguide for achieving effective conversion between two orthogonally polarized modes. Our experimental device, which employs a 330-µm long dual SiO 2 grating structure, achieves a mode conversion efficiency of ~99% at 1550 nm with a 10-dB bandwidth of ~20 nm, in good agreement with our theoretical results. This compact polarization mode converter, or polarization rotator, can serve as a basic component in TFLN-based photonic circuits. Our study extends the conventional functions of LPGs as mode converters for the same polarization and thus opens up new possibilities in the development of polarization-controlling devices for applications in high-density integrated photonics.
data.title_cn: 用于偏振模式转换的薄膜铌酸锂波导上的长周期光栅
data.abstract_cn: 我们在薄膜铌酸锂（TFLN）肋波导上设计并制造了长周期光栅（LPG），以实现两种正交偏振模式之间的有效转换。我们的实验装置采用 330 µm 长的双 SiO 2 光栅结构，在 1550 nm 处实现了约 99% 的模式转换效率，10 dB 带宽约为 20 nm，与我们的理论结果非常吻合。这种紧凑型偏振模式转换器或偏振旋转器可用作基于 TFLN 的光子电路中的基本组件。我们的研究扩展了LPG作为相同偏振模式转换器的传统功能，从而为开发用于高密度集成光子学应用的偏振控制器件开辟了新的可能性。

data.title: Coupled plasmonic-passivation luminescence enhancement in InGaN quantum wells with Ag/AlN capping
data.author: David S. Pate, Joshua N. Blum, Iftikhar Ahmad, Vitaliy Avrutin, Ümit Özgür
data.summary: Ag/AlN is investigated as an advantageous metal/dielectric combination for enhancing the radiative efficiency of InGaN multi-quantum well (MQW) structures via both passivation and plasmonic mechanisms. Steady-state and time-resolved photoluminescence (PL) measurements facilitate separation of these coupled effects, demonstrating almost complete elimination of parasitic recombination channels via AlN-related surface passivation alone. In agreement with theory, an additional Ag layer yields PL enhancements of 7.0–8.3× in the top QW closest to the plasmonic metal interface, with progressive reduction in deeper QWs. The high passivation efficiency of even thin AlN enables close proximity of the plasmonic layer and MQW active region, with increased spontaneous emission rates as high as 8.1× resulting from strengthened resonant coupling to Ag surface plasmons.
data.title_cn: Ag/AlN 封盖的 InGaN 量子阱中的耦合等离子体钝化发光增强
data.abstract_cn: Ag/AlN 被研究为一种有利的金属/电介质组合，可通过钝化和等离子体机制提高 InGaN 多量子阱 (MQW) 结构的辐射效率。稳态和时间分辨光致发光 (PL) 测量有助于分离这些耦合效应，证明仅通过 AlN 相关的表面钝化就几乎完全消除了寄生复合通道。与理论一致，额外的 Ag 层在最靠近等离子体金属界面的顶部 QW 中产生 7.0-8.3 倍的 PL 增强，并且在更深的 QW 中逐渐减少。即使很薄的 AlN 也具有高钝化效率，使得等离子体层和 MQW 活性区域非常接近，由于与 Ag 表面等离子体激元的共振耦合增强，自发发射率高达 8.1 倍。

data.title: Tunable 300 W single-frequency 2 μm fiber amplifier
data.author: Reagan R. D. Weeks, Ryan A. Lane, Brian M. Anderson
data.summary: We present an all-fiber design for a Tm-based fiber amplifier that can tune over 1992–2065 nm with 300–350 W single-frequency (<100 kHz) output. Over 180 W is achieved out to 2085 nm with <10% ASE content without utilizing ASE spectral filters. The amplifier employs both Tm- and Tm/Ho-doped gain fibers in two preamplifier stages in addition to longer sections of Tm fiber to extend the bandwidth of the Tm-based high-power amplifier to longer wavelengths (>2050 nm). Efficiencies of ∼55% are realized across the full bandwidth. Roll-off occurs beyond 2085 nm where ASE becomes intractable. The amplifier has an average M 2 value of 1.39 at high power due to the presence of light guided within the fiber pedestal. Estimates of the pedestal light and higher-order mode contents are provided.
data.title_cn: 可调谐 300 W 单频 2 μm 光纤放大器
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种基于 Tm 的光纤放大器的全光纤设计，可以在 1992-2065 nm 范围内调谐，并具有 300-350 W 单频（<100 kHz）输出。在 2085 nm 处可实现超过 180 W，且 ASE 含量 <10%，无需使用 ASE 光谱滤光片。除了 Tm 光纤的较长部分之外，该放大器在两个前置放大器级中还采用了 Tm 和 Tm/Ho 掺杂增益光纤，以将基于 Tm 的高功率放大器的带宽扩展到更长的波长 (>2050 nm)。在整个带宽上实现了约 55% 的效率。滚降发生在 2085 nm 之外，此时 ASE 变得难以处理。由于光纤基座内存在引导光，放大器在高功率下的平均 M 2 值为 1.39。提供了基座光和高阶模式内容的估计。

data.title: Programmable solvent-responsive PDMS microstructures via 3D direct laser writing
data.author: Qingbo Jiao, Yimin Zhang, Wenbo Wang, Ge Jiang, Wei Wang, Mengdan Qian
data.summary: This study addresses the three-dimensional (3D) fabrication of polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS) for intelligent micromechanical systems through a novel PDMS-based photoresist compatible with two-photon polymerization (2PP). By optimizing a 2PP system, photosensitivity and processability were significantly enhanced, enabling complex 3D structures with sub-micron precision. Using programmable 2PP direct laser writing (DLW) and by controlling the processing parameters and scanning strategies, we established a quantitative model for structural fidelity and achieved spatial control over the crosslinking density. Thus, solvent-responsive components used for encrypted micropillar arrays and smart microvalves were successfully fabricated, demonstrating the precise and controllable deformation upon solvent stimulation. Excellent cytocompatibility is also confirmed by biocompatibility tests. This research breaks through conventional PDMS microfabrication limitations, providing innovative material solutions and processing pathways for intelligent micro-systems in soft robotics and biomedical fields.
data.title_cn: 通过 3D 直接激光写入可编程溶剂响应 PDMS 微结构
data.abstract_cn: 本研究通过与双光子聚合 (2PP) 兼容的新型基于 PDMS 的光刻胶，解决了用于智能微机械系统的聚二甲基硅氧烷 (PDMS) 的三维 (3D) 制造问题。通过优化 2PP 系统，光敏性和可加工性显着增强，从而实现亚微米精度的复杂 3D 结构。使用可编程2PP直接激光写入（DLW）并通过控制加工参数和扫描策略，我们建立了结构保真度的定量模型并实现了交联密度的空间控制。因此，成功制造了用于加密微柱阵列和智能微阀的溶剂响应组件，展示了溶剂刺激时精确且可控的变形。生物相容性测试也证实了优异的细胞相容性。该研究突破了传统PDMS微加工的局限性，为软体机器人和生物医学领域的智能微系统提供了创新的材料解决方案和加工途径。

data.title: Spectral broadening and pulse shaping in the deep ultraviolet
data.author: Julia Codere, Brett J. Pearson, Brian Kaufman, Loc Thi-Hoang Ngo, Martin G. Cohen, Matthew Bain, Thomas Weinacht, Ruaridh Forbes
data.summary: We report the generation and shaping of ∼20 femtosecond pulses in the deep ultraviolet (DUV). Our approach combines spectral broadening in a stretched hollow-core fiber with compression and shaping via an acousto-optic modulator-based pulse shaper. The pulse shaper allows for automatic compression, useful for in-air delivery of pulses to two-dimensional (2D) spectroscopy and other time-resolved experiments. Unlike previous DUV pulse generation schemes that lack phase stability, our method enables programmable generation of phase-locked pulse-pairs with attosecond-level stability. We demonstrate pulse characterization via self-diffraction frequency-resolved optical gating and dispersion scan methods in the DUV and validate performance through a pump-probe experiment resolving electronic dynamics on attosecond timescales.
data.title_cn: 深紫外光谱展宽和脉冲整形
data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了深紫外 (DUV) 中约 20 飞秒脉冲的生成和整形。我们的方法将拉伸空心光纤中的光谱展宽与通过基于声光调制器的脉冲整形器的压缩和整形结合起来。脉冲整形器允许自动压缩，适用于将脉冲在空气中传输到二维 (2D) 光谱和其他时间分辨实验。与之前缺乏相位稳定性的 DUV 脉冲生成方案不同，我们的方法能够可编程生成具有阿秒级稳定性的锁相脉冲对。我们通过 DUV 中的自衍射频率分辨光选通和色散扫描方法演示了脉冲表征，并通过解析阿秒时间尺度上的电子动力学的泵浦探针实验验证了性能。

data.title: Application of deep learning to single-shot gas-phase laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy
data.author: Nathan P. Brown, Elijah R. Jans, Garrett W. Idler
data.summary: Single-shot fs laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy (LIBS) has the potential to capture ns-scale electrode desorption phenomena in pulsed power fusion drivers. However, the successful implementation of the diagnostic for this purpose is challenging, as it requires interpreting single-shot measurements collected from low-density gas mixtures. In this work, we demonstrate the efficacy of a Bayesian-optimized convolutional neural network (CNN) to interpret these measurements. We generated 256 distinct measurement conditions at relevant gas pressures ranging from 80–530 mTorr by mixing 100–250 sccm H 2 and 50–200 sccm CH 4 in increments of 10 sccm. Despite the considerable overlap between signals separated by 20 sccm, the CNN is able to predict the H 2 flow rate with a root-mean-square error (RMSE) of 15.9 sccm and the CH 4 flow rate with an RMSE of 12.0 sccm. The average relative prediction error is <9% for each gas and largely remains below or near 10%.
data.title_cn: 深度学习在单次气相激光诱导击穿光谱中的应用
data.abstract_cn: 单次飞秒激光诱导击穿光谱 (LIBS) 有潜力捕获脉冲功率聚变驱动器中的纳秒级电极解吸现象。然而，成功实现此目的的诊断具有挑战性，因为它需要解释从低密度气体混合物中收集的单次测量结果。在这项工作中，我们展示了贝叶斯优化卷积神经网络 (CNN) 解释这些测量结果的有效性。我们通过以 10 sccm 增量混合 100–250 sccm H 2 和 50–200 sccm CH 4，在 80–530 mTorr 的相关气压下生成 256 个不同的测量条件。尽管间隔 20 sccm 的信号之间存在相当大的重叠，CNN 仍能够预测均方根误差 (RMSE) 为 15.9 sccm 的 H 2 流速和 RMSE 为 12.0 sccm 的 CH 4 流速。每种气体的平均相对预测误差<9%，并且大部分保持在低于或接近10%。

data.title: Photonic integrated circuit optical parametric oscillators
data.author: Xiyuan Lu, Robert M. Gray, Jordan Stone, Selina Zhou, Nicolas Englebert, Alireza Marandi, Kartik Srinivasan
data.summary: Optical parametric oscillators (OPOs) are versatile nonlinear optical devices for wavelength generation from the visible to the mid-infrared. Recently, OPO research has merged with photonic integrated circuits (PICs) in the advancement of miniaturized, on-chip light sources utilizing second-order ( χ (2) ) or third-order ( χ (3) ) nonlinearities. This mini-review of PIC-based OPOs begins with an overview of their history, applications, and underlying physics. We then discuss χ (2) and χ (3) implementations in depth, highlighting material and device platforms, recent breakthroughs, and key engineering strategies across different wavelength regions. Finally, we outline future directions in PIC OPO technology and its application to spectroscopy, sensing, quantum optics, and photonic computing.
data.title_cn: 光子集成电路光参量振荡器
data.abstract_cn: 光参量振荡器 (OPO) 是通用非线性光学器件，用于产生从可见光到中红外的波长。最近，OPO 研究与光子集成电路 (PIC) 相结合，利用二阶 ( χ (2) ) 或三阶 ( χ (3) ) 非线性推动小型化片上光源的发展。这篇基于 PIC 的 OPO 的简短回顾首先概述了它们的历史、应用和基础物理。然后，我们深入讨论 χ (2) 和 χ (3) 的实现，重点介绍材料和器件平台、最新突破以及不同波长区域的关键工程策略。最后，我们概述了 PIC OPO 技术及其在光谱学、传感、量子光学和光子计算方面的应用的未来方向。

data.title: Longitudinal investigation of prostate tumor spheroid proliferation with dynamic line-field optical coherence tomography
data.author: Steph Swanson, Keyu Chen, Elahe Cheraghi, Ernest Osei, Kostadinka Bizheva
data.summary: Recently, it has become widely recognized that culturing cancer cells in vitro in small, 3D aggregates known as tumor spheroids provides a more physiologically relevant model of in vivo tumor behavior compared to 2D monolayer cultures. Dynamic optical coherence tomography (dOCT) is a non-invasive imaging modality that, by analyzing temporal fluctuations in the light scattered from biological tissue, does not require exogenous contrast agents to visualize and quantify cellular activity within 3D cell cultures. However, recent volumetric dOCT studies have encountered challenges due to low acquisition speeds. In this study, we present morphological and dynamic analyses of prostate tumor spheroid growth over a two-week longitudinal period, utilizing a line-field dOCT platform. Volumetric dOCT data were acquired for each spheroid in 16 seconds. Our method clearly differentiated between active cellular metabolism in live spheroids and the lack of activity in spheroids fixed with formaldehyde. Quantitative validation of the dynamic signal was conducted using the Alamar Blue proliferation assay, while qualitative validation was provided by live/dead fluorescence microscopy.
data.title_cn: 动态线场光学相干断层扫描对前列腺肿瘤球体增殖的纵向研究
data.abstract_cn: 最近，人们广泛认识到，与 2D 单层培养物相比，在体外以称为肿瘤球体的小型 3D 聚集体培养癌细胞，可以提供更生理相关的体内肿瘤行为模型。动态光学相干断层扫描 (dOCT) 是一种非侵入性成像方式，通过分析生物组织散射光的时间波动，不需要外源造影剂即可可视化和量化 3D 细胞培养物中的细胞活动。然而，最近的体积 dOCT 研究由于采集速度低而遇到了挑战。在这项研究中，我们利用线场 dOCT 平台对两周纵向期间的前列腺肿瘤球体生长进行形态学和动态分析。在 16 秒内获取每个球体的体积 dOCT 数据。我们的方法清楚地区分了活球体中活跃的细胞代谢和用甲醛固定的球体中缺乏活性的细胞代谢。使用 Alamar Blue 增殖测定对动态信号进行定量验证，而通过活/死荧光显微镜提供定性验证。

data.title: Simultaneous real-time multispectral fluorescence and reflectance imaging for enhanced intraoperative guidance
data.author: Kyriakos Pentarakis, George Kakavelakis, Constantinos Petridis, George Themelis
data.summary: Intraoperative fluorescence imaging enhances surgical precision, but current systems require switching between anatomical and fluorescence views, disrupting workflow and forcing surgeons to mentally overlay separate images. We developed a dual-sensor multispectral imaging system that uniquely enables simultaneous visualization of full-color anatomy and multiple fluorescence signals (protoporphyrin IX, fluorescein sodium, and indocyanine green) in real-time, a capability not available in existing surgical platforms. By employing custom optical filters and linear unmixing algorithms, the system captures all imaging modes concurrently, providing perfectly co-registered anatomical and fluorescence information in a single unified view. Phantom validation demonstrated accurate fluorophore separation while maintaining color fidelity for tissue visualization. This approach eliminates mode-switching delays and mental image fusion, streamlining surgical workflow with a practical platform designed for clinical integration.
data.title_cn: 同时实时多光谱荧光和反射成像，增强术中指导
data.abstract_cn: 术中荧光成像提高了手术精度，但当前的系统需要在解剖视图和荧光视图之间切换，这会扰乱工作流程并迫使外科医生在心里重叠单独的图像。我们开发了一种双传感器多光谱成像系统，能够实时同步显示全彩色解剖结构和多种荧光信号（原卟啉 IX、荧光素钠和吲哚菁绿），这是现有手术平台所不具备的功能。通过采用定制光学滤波器和线性解混合算法，该系统可以同时捕获所有成像模式，从而在单个统一视图中提供完美共同配准的解剖和荧光信息。体模验证证明了准确的荧光团分离，同时保持了组织可视化的颜色保真度。这种方法消除了模式切换延迟和心理图像融合，通过专为临床集成设计的实用平台简化了手术工作流程。

data.title: Analytical study of the effect of refractive index and scattering angle on the light scattering ratio of aerosol particles
data.author: Haibin Wang, Xueying Bai, Jinhao Li, Yvcheng Dong, Li Deng, Quanyi Liu
data.summary: The precision of fire detection technology is essential for protecting lives and property, with the light scattering characteristics of aerosol particles being critical factors influencing the performance of fire detection systems. This study employs Mie scattering theory to analyze the light scattering ratio in fire detection, examining the effects of refractive index and scattering angle on aerosol particles to enhance fire detection technology. The findings reveal that scattering efficiencies vary with refractive index and size parameters, while extinction efficiencies are closely linked to these factors. Additionally, the study highlights the significant impact of scattering angle combinations on light scattering ratios, emphasizing the potential advantages of multi-wavelength detection technology in accurately identifying smoke particles and reducing false alarm rates.
data.title_cn: 折射率和散射角对气溶胶颗粒光散射比影响的分析研究
data.abstract_cn: 火灾探测技术的精度对于保护生命和财产至关重要，而气溶胶颗粒的光散射特性是影响火灾探测系统性能的关键因素。本研究采用米氏散射理论来分析火灾探测中的光散射比，考察折射率和散射角对气溶胶颗粒的影响，以提高火灾探测技术。研究结果表明，散射效率随折射率和尺寸参数而变化，而消光效率与这些因素密切相关。此外，该研究还强调了散射角度组合对光散射比的显着影响，强调多波长检测技术在准确识别烟雾颗粒和降低误报率方面的潜在优势。

data.title: Observation of photonic asymmetric topological corner modes driven by periodically staggered onsite edge potentials
data.author: Hongyi Li, Chunmei Ouyang, Shiyu Liu, Yuting Yang, Jiajun Ma, Liyuan Liu, Quan Xu, Xueqian Zhang, Jianqiang Gu, Zhen Tian, Yanfeng Li, Jiaguang Han, Weili Zhang
data.summary: Controlling topological modes in photonic systems remains a fundamental challenge, as conventional approaches rely on global lattice modifications and lack topological phase engineering of the induced non-trivial states. Here, we reveal that staggered onsite edge potential (SOEP) modulation breaks mirror symmetry in folded edge states, inducing edge-confined Wannier function deviations and thus driving edge bands into distinct topological phases. The emergence of resulting higher-order localized modes is further confirmed. Notably, the hosted corner modes are SOEP-selective, depending on the deviation direction of the Wannier function. Using spoof surface plasmon polariton photonic crystals, we experimentally confirm two SOEP-driven evolution regimes: symmetric evolution enabling corner-mode pumping between adjacent corners and asymmetric evolution restricting corner modes to negative potentials. These results demonstrate spatial control over corner states, linking edge potential engineering to higher-order topology. Our study paves the way for manipulating the band structure and modeling topological phases of photonic states.
data.title_cn: 周期性交错现场边缘电势驱动的光子不对称拓扑角模式的观察
data.abstract_cn: 控制光子系统中的拓扑模式仍然是一个基本挑战，因为传统方法依赖于全局晶格修改并且缺乏诱导的非平凡状态的拓扑相工程。在这里，我们揭示了交错现场边缘势（SOEP）调制打破了折叠边缘态的镜像对称性，引起边缘限制的万尼尔函数偏差，从而驱动边缘带进入不同的拓扑相。由此产生的高阶局域模式的出现得到进一步证实。值得注意的是，托管角点模式是 SOEP 选择性的，具体取决于 Wannier 函数的偏差方向。使用欺骗表面等离子体极化子光子晶体，我们通过实验证实了两种 SOEP 驱动的演化机制：对称演化实现了相邻角之间的角模式泵浦，非对称演化将角模式限制为负电势。这些结果证明了对角状态的空间控制，将边缘势工程与高阶拓扑联系起来。我们的研究为操纵能带结构和模拟光子态的拓扑相铺平了道路。

data.title: Iterative virtual Moiré reconstruction: simultaneous recovery for topological charge and phase from a single-frame aberrated interferogram
data.author: Bo Long, Ning Sun, Ling Wei, Rui Yang, Junling Chen, Rong Yan, Lei Mu, Xiaoyue Hu, Lei Zhang
data.summary: Traditional vortex beam parameter determination methods are all designed for aberration-free vortex beams. In the case of aberrations and turbulence, they tend to struggle in mutual restraint between phase recovery and topological charge (TC) detection. Most recent methods depend on complex interferometric setups and precise phase singularity localization. An iterative virtual Moiré reconstruction (IVMR) technique is proposed based on the blind conformal mapping, achieving simultaneous demodulation of TC and phase from a single-frame aberrated interferogram, not needing precise phase singularity positioning. Experimental validation reveals an unprecedented dual-parameter characterization capability, demonstrating robustness across general aberration (root mean square ≤3 λ ) with an accuracy of 0.1 and Kolmogorov-type turbulence (atmospheric turbulence strength D / r 0 =12.5) with an accuracy of 0.15 for both integer and fractional topological charges. The simultaneous phase recovery accuracy achieves 3% and 10% root mean square error under general aberrations and turbulence, respectively. This approach demonstrates remarkably robust performance coupled with system simplicity, enabling efficient and accurate parameter quantification of vortex beams in real-world applications.
data.title_cn: 迭代虚拟莫尔条纹重建：从单帧像差干涉图中同时恢复拓扑电荷和相位
data.abstract_cn: 传统的涡旋光束参数确定方法都是针对无像差涡旋光束而设计的。在像差和湍流的情况下，它们往往会在相位恢复和拓扑电荷（TC）检测之间相互制约。最近的方法依赖于复杂的干涉装置和精确的相位奇点定位。提出了一种基于盲共形映射的迭代虚拟莫尔重构(IVMR)技术，实现了单帧像差干涉图TC和相位的同时解调，不需要精确的相位奇点定位。实验验证揭示了前所未有的双参数表征能力，证明了整数和分数拓扑电荷在一般像差（均方根≤3 λ）和柯尔莫哥洛夫型湍流（大气湍流强度 D / r 0 = 12.5）方面的鲁棒性，精度为 0.1，精度为 0.15。在一般像差和湍流情况下，同步相位恢复精度分别达到 3% 和 10% 均方根误差。这种方法展示了非常强大的性能以及系统的简单性，从而能够在实际应用中对涡旋光束进行高效、准确的参数量化。

data.title: High-power, thermally accessible dissipative Kerr soliton generation
data.author: Andreas Jacobsen, Yanjing Zhao, Yang Liu, Chaochao Ye, Yi Zheng, Camiel Op de Beeck, José Carreira, Michael Geiselmann, Minhao Pu
data.summary: Kerr frequency combs, or microcombs, are revolutionizing fields such as precision metrology, optical clocks, and astronomical spectrometer calibration. However, conventional dissipative Kerr soliton (DKS) microcombs often suffer from limited conversion efficiency and low output power, and achieving deterministic single-soliton generation remains a challenge due to limited thermal accessibility arising from the intricate interplay of Kerr and thermal effects. In this work, we present an optimized microresonator design combined with a robust pumping scheme to enhance the thermal accessibility of single-soliton states for deterministic generation. By operating a silicon nitride microresonator with tailored dispersion in the over-coupled regime, we demonstrate a thermally accessible pathway to single solitons with high conversion efficiency (approaching 30%), and high output power (up to 50 mW). Through a pump forward-tuning process with power ramping, followed by backward tuning, we achieve deterministic single-soliton generation across 80 consecutive trials via automated laser tuning, eliminating the need for complex thermal compensation or rapid tuning schemes. Our work provides a straightforward and robust solution for generating high-power solitons, advancing the practicality and accessibility of microcombs for real-world applications.
data.title_cn: 高功率、热可达耗散克尔孤子发生
data.abstract_cn: 克尔频率梳或微梳正在给精密计量、光学时钟和天文光谱仪校准等领域带来革命性的变化。然而，传统的耗散克尔孤子（DKS）微梳经常受到转换效率有限和输出功率低的困扰，并且由于克尔和热效应的复杂相互作用而导致热可达性有限，实现确定性单孤子生成仍然是一个挑战。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种优化的微谐振器设计与强大的泵浦方案相结合，以增强单孤子态的热可达性，从而实现确定性生成。通过在过耦合状态下操作具有定制色散的氮化硅微谐振器，我们展示了一种具有高转换效率（接近 30%）和高输出功率（高达 50 mW）的单孤子的热可达路径。通过功率斜坡前向调谐过程，然后向后调谐，我们通过自动激光调谐在 80 次连续试验中实现了确定性的单孤子生成，从而无需复杂的热补偿或快速调谐方案。我们的工作为产生高功率孤子提供了一种简单而强大的解决方案，提高了微梳在实际应用中的实用性和可访问性。

data.title: Universal spectral purification of ultrahigh- Q microresonators for ideal soliton microcombs
data.author: Xin Zhou, Jincheng Li, Min Wang, Yuechen Lei, Yinke Cheng, Ze Wang, Zhongshan Zhang, Zhilin Li, Hao Zhang, Zhisong Xiao, Qi-Fan Yang, Bei-Bei Li
data.summary: Soliton microcombs offer a compact means to generate equally spaced spectral lines via a delicate balance of Kerr nonlinearity and anomalous dispersion in nonlinear microresonators. However, the simultaneous excitation of multiple transverse mode families can disrupt soliton formation and degrade spectral uniformity. Here, we demonstrate universal spectral purification of microresonators with ultrahigh intrinsic Q factors exceeding 10 8 . An aluminum ring is deposited onto a silica microdisk to eliminate high-order transverse modes selectively by introducing additional losses. The resulting soliton microcombs exhibit an ideal sech 2 spectral envelope and enable continuous tuning of the soliton repetition frequency over a 300 kHz range without compromising phase noise performance. Our approach can be universally applied to integrated photonic platforms to reduce transverse modes crowding in high- Q resonators, facilitating the generation of broadband classical and quantum light with ideal performance.
data.title_cn: 用于理想孤子微梳的超高 Q 微谐振器的通用光谱纯化
data.abstract_cn: 孤子微梳提供了一种紧凑的方法，通过非线性微谐振器中克尔非线性和反常色散的微妙平衡来生成等间隔的谱线。然而，多个横模族的同时激发会破坏孤子的形成并降低光谱均匀性。在这里，我们展示了具有超过 10 8 的超高本征 Q 因子的微谐振器的通用光谱净化。将铝环沉积在二氧化硅微盘上，通过引入额外损耗来选择性地消除高阶横模。由此产生的孤子微梳表现出理想的 sech 2 频谱包络，并能够在 300 kHz 范围内连续调谐孤子重复频率，而不会影响相位噪声性能。我们的方法可以普遍应用于集成光子平台，以减少高Q谐振器中的横模拥挤，促进产生具有理想性能的宽带经典光和量子光。

data.title: Dynamic-range-extended line-field interferometric profiling with high-speed in-fiber optical delay control
data.author: Jaeheung Kim, Gyeong Hun Kim, Sang Min Park, Eun Seo Choi, Seung Seok Lee, Kyung Won Kim, Hyung-Hoi Kim, Chang-Seok Kim, Hwidon Lee
data.summary: A high-speed dynamic-range-extended white light interferometry (HS-DRE-WLI) system is developed for fast, high-resolution 3D surface profiling across varying reflectance levels. The system combines high-speed fiber-stretcher-based optical path difference modulation with an asymmetric line-illumination technique to enhance imaging speed and dynamic range. Chromatic and polarization-induced distortions are minimized through dispersion compensation using optimized fiber lengths and a Faraday rotator, achieving 14.2-μm axial resolution. Validated on diverse samples, the system captures fine and large-scale features with high fidelity, demonstrating strong potential for industrial and biomedical applications requiring accurate, robust surface measurements.
data.title_cn: 具有高速光纤内光学延迟控制的动态范围扩展线场干涉分析
data.abstract_cn: 开发了高速动态范围扩展白光干涉测量 (HS-DRE-WLI) 系统，用于在不同的反射率水平上进行快速、高分辨率的 3D 表面分析。该系统将基于高速光纤拉伸器的光程差调制与非对称线照明技术相结合，以提高成像速度和动态范围。使用优化的光纤长度和法拉第旋转器进行色散补偿，最大限度地减少色度和偏振引起的畸变，实现 14.2μm 的轴向分辨率。该系统经过不同样品的验证，能够以高保真度捕获精细和大规模的特征，展现出在需要精确、稳健的表面测量的工业和生物医学应用中的巨大潜力。

data.title: Demonstration and performance evaluation of reconfigurable multiband microwave filters using a programmable photonic integrated circuit
data.author: Ashitosh Velamuri, Kumar Piyush, Yash Raj, Arnab Goswami, Anandha Padmanabhan, Nitin Ghodgaonkar, Dinanath Soni, Janakiraman Viraraghavan, Bijoy Krishna Das
data.summary: A programmable silicon photonic multiband microwave filter with tunable bandwidths has been demonstrated. The filter has been successfully used to set up a radio-over-fiber link operating in the X-band as a proof of concept. For this purpose, we have investigated the programmable photonic integrated circuit comprising 14 tunable balanced Mach–Zehnder interferometers designed into a square mesh architecture and fabricated using CMOS-compatible silicon photonic technology. The photonic chip was electrically packaged for its reconfigurable operations using an external 16-channel programmable power supply by tuning the thermo-optic phase shifters integrated into both the arms of Mach–Zehnder interferometers. The operating temperature of the packaged chip is stabilized within ±0.002°C using a PID controller to avoid any interference of ambient temperature fluctuations. The mesh architecture is programmed into three different microring resonators (MRRs) operating independently in all-pass configurations for three free spectral ranges (23.25 GHz, 11.75 GHz, and 8.75 GHz, respectively). The multiband microwave photonic filter characteristics have been experimentally obtained using a fiber-coupled off-chip laser source (operating at λ ∼1550 nm ), a modulator (bandwidth ∼40 GHz ), and a photodetector (bandwidth ∼50 GHz ). Thus, we have demonstrated microwave filters with two, three, and four bands within the modulator bandwidth used in the experiments. Among these, the two-band filter realized for the X- and Ka-bands was thoroughly investigated in the experiments to understand the MRR coupling condition ( Q -factor) effect on the realized filter bandwidth and its tuning range, link gain, and rejection. The bandwidth of both the filter bands was tuned over the extensive range of 1.6–8.1 GHz by controlling the MRR Q -factor and the resonance spacing from the carrier. At the same time, the bandwidth tuning range of the three-band filter realized for the C-, Ku-, and Ka-band (2–6 GHz) and the four-band filter realized for the C-, Ku-, K-, and Ka-band (3–5 GHz) in our experiments was limited by the finesse of the ring resonator. Finally, the microwave filter response at the X-band is used for evaluating a radio-over-fiber receiver link as a proof of concept for its potential 5G/6G applications. With an optimized set of operating parameters of the programmable microwave filter, we could achieve a bit error rate as low as ∼10 −20 for a fiber-optic link length of 400 m (at 100 Mbps).
data.title_cn: 使用可编程光子集成电路的可重构多频带微波滤波器的演示和性能评估
data.abstract_cn: 已经展示了具有可调带宽的可编程硅光子多频带微波滤波器。作为概念验证，该滤波器已成功用于建立在 X 频段运行的光纤无线电链路。为此，我们研究了可编程光子集成电路，该电路由 14 个可调谐平衡马赫-曾德干涉仪组成，设计成方形网格架构，并使用 CMOS 兼容的硅光子技术制造。通过调整集成到马赫-曾德干涉仪两个臂中的热光移相器，使用外部 16 通道可编程电源对光子芯片进行了电气封装，以实现其可重新配置操作。采用PID控制器将封装芯片的工作温度稳定在±0.002℃以内，避免环境温度波动的干扰。该网状架构被编程到三个不同的微环谐振器 (MRR) 中，这些微环谐振器在三个自由光谱范围（分别为 23.25 GHz、11.75 GHz 和 8.75 GHz）的全通配置中独立运行。使用光纤耦合片外激光源（工作波长为 λ ~1550 nm）、调制器（带宽 ~40 GHz）和光电探测器（带宽 ~50 GHz）通过实验获得了多波段微波光子滤波器特性。因此，我们在实验中使用的调制器带宽内演示了具有两个、三个和四个频带的微波滤波器。其中，在实验中对 X 和 Ka 频段实现的双频段滤波器进行了深入研究，以了解 MRR 耦合条件（Q 因子）对实现的滤波器带宽及其调谐范围、链路增益和抑制的影响。通过控制 MRR Q 因子和与载波的谐振间距，可以在 1.6–8.1 GHz 的广泛范围内调谐两个滤波器频段的带宽。同时，在我们的实验中，为C、Ku和Ka频段（2-6 GHz）实现的三频段滤波器以及为C、Ku、K和Ka频段（3-5 GHz）实现的四频段滤波器的带宽调谐范围受到环形谐振器精度的限制。最后，X 频段的微波滤波器响应用于评估光纤无线电接收器链路，作为其潜在 5G/6G 应用的概念证明。通过可编程微波滤波器的一组优化操作参数，我们可以在 400 m 的光纤链路长度（100 Mbps 时）实现低至 ∼10 -20 的误码率。

data.title: Optical chirality of vortex structured light in a temporal medium
data.author: Yiyu Shi, Zhiwei Cui, Mingkai Deng, Junting He, Chencheng Ran, Mingjian Cheng, Xinxing Zhou
data.summary: The optical chirality of vortex structured light has attracted more and more attention in recent years due to its fascinating properties and wide potential applications. Such an issue is typically studied in a spatial medium. This work is devoted to the study of the optical chirality of vortex structured light in the temporal medium with time-varying permittivity. A full vector theoretical model is developed to describe the optical chirality of Laguerre-Gaussian (LG) vortex light beams that undergo the temporal reflection and transmission. A concept called the temporal equivalent of the photonic spin Hall effect (PSHE) is proposed to reveal the physical mechanism of controlled optical chirality of the vortex structured light in a temporal medium. It is revealed that, in the temporal medium, the distribution of the local chirality density of the LG vortex light beams is asymmetric, whereas the corresponding vortex dichroism signal is circularly symmetric. Notably, both the local chirality density and the vortex dichroism signal of the LG vortex light beams are significantly enhanced in the temporal medium. Moreover, the optical chirality of the vortex structured light can be well controlled by the anisotropic permittivity tensor of the temporal medium and the spatial incident angle. This study may provide useful insights into the interactions of vortex structured light with a temporal medium and find potential applications in the fields of chiral recognition, detection, and manipulation.
data.title_cn: 时间介质中涡旋结构光的光学手性
data.abstract_cn: 近年来，涡旋结构光的光学手性因其迷人的性质和广泛的潜在应用而受到越来越多的关注。通常在空间介质中研究此类问题。这项工作致力于研究介电常数随时间变化的时间介质中涡旋结构光的光学手性。开发了全矢量理论模型来描述经历时间反射和透射的拉盖尔高斯（LG）涡旋光束的光学手性。提出了一种称为光子自旋霍尔效应时间等效（PSHE）的概念，以揭示时间介质中涡旋结构光受控光学手性的物理机制。结果表明，在时间介质中，LG涡旋光束的局部手性密度分布是不对称的，而相应的涡旋二色性信号是圆对称的。值得注意的是，LG 涡旋光束的局部手性密度和涡旋二色性信号在时间介质中均显着增强。此外，涡旋结构光的光学手性可以通过时间介质的各向异性介电常数张量和空间入射角来很好地控制。这项研究可以为涡旋结构光与时间介质的相互作用提供有用的见解，并在手性识别、检测和操纵领域找到潜在的应用。

data.title: Optical losses in SiN x and SiO x N y coatings deposited by plasma-enhanced chemical vapor deposition for gravitational wave detectors
data.author: Kirstin Saunders, Tobias Herffurth, Simon Bublitz, Christian Mühlig, Anne-Sophie Munser, Elena Herguedas, Andrés Redondo-Cubero, Des Gibson, Caspar Clark, Carlos García Nuñez, Sven Schröder
data.summary: Gravitational wave detectors (GWDs) rely heavily on low mechanical and optical loss mirror coatings to detect cosmic events happening in the universe. This work discusses optical losses through light absorption and scattering mechanisms in silicon nitride (SiN x ) and silicon oxynitride (SiO x N y ) thin films deposited by the plasma-enhanced chemical vapor deposition technique. We report an efficient and repeatable procedure to tune the refractive index of both SiN x and SiO x N y thin films, while preserving a low optical absorption and scattering in the range of ppm. Finally, we demonstrate the design, fabrication, and characterization of an SiN x /SiO x N y multi-layer stack composed of 20 layers with a total thickness of 3.9 µm, achieving a reflectance above 99% (and a low absorbance of 0.259%) in the near-infrared region, which is a promising step toward meeting the optical requirements of the third generation of GWDs.
data.title_cn: 用于引力波探测器的等离子增强化学气相沉积沉积的 SiN x 和 SiO x N y 涂层中的光学损耗
data.abstract_cn: 引力波探测器 (GWD) 严重依赖低机械和光学损耗镜面涂层来探测宇宙中发生的宇宙事件。这项工作讨论了通过等离子体增强化学气相沉积技术沉积的氮化硅 (SiN x ) 和氮氧化硅 (SiO x N y ) 薄膜中光吸收和散射机制造成的光学损失。我们报告了一种有效且可重复的程序来调整 SiN x 和 SiO x N y 薄膜的折射率，同时保持 ppm 范围内的低光学吸收和散射。最后，我们展示了由 20 层组成、总厚度为 3.9 µm 的 SiN x /SiO x N y 多层堆叠的设计、制造和表征，在近红外区域实现了 99% 以上的反射率（以及 0.259% 的低吸光度），这是满足第三代 GWD 光学要求的有希望的一步。

data.title: Monochromatic Cherenkov diffraction radiation from continuous coupling of an electron beam to a thin dielectric slab waveguide
data.author: Andrzej Szczepkowicz, Po-Wei Kuo, Yen-Chieh Huang
data.summary: A scheme for the generation of monochromatic Cherenkov radiation in a thin dielectric layer is proposed. The electrons travel in a vacuum parallel to a dielectric, exciting a single synchronous electromagnetic waveguide mode. This way of obtaining monochromatic light coupled to free electrons may constitute a new, to the best of our knowledge, platform for quantum optics experiments with free electrons. The proposed scheme is studied quantitatively (radiation power and radiation efficiency) for near-infrared radiation in silicon induced by a 100 keV electron beam, using time-domain and frequency-domain numerical simulations, with material absorption and dispersion taken into account. This method of radiation generation can be scaled from ultraviolet to terahertz radiation by changing the thickness of the dielectric layer and choosing a material with low loss at the desired wavelength. A comparison with conventional Cherenkov radiation and Cherenkov diffraction radiation is also presented.
data.title_cn: 电子束连续耦合到薄介质板波导产生的单色切伦科夫衍射辐射
data.abstract_cn: 提出了一种在薄介电层中产生单色切伦科夫辐射的方案。电子在真空中平行于电介质传播，激发单一同步电磁波导模式。据我们所知，这种获得与自由电子耦合的单色光的方法可能构成一个新的自由电子量子光学实验平台。该方案采用时域和频域数值模拟，并考虑材料吸收和色散，对 100 keV 电子束在硅中引起的近红外辐射进行定量研究（辐射功率和辐射效率）。通过改变介电层的厚度并选择在所需波长下具有低损耗的材料，这种辐射产生方法可以从紫外线扩展到太赫兹辐射。还提供了与传统切伦科夫辐射和切伦科夫衍射辐射的比较。

data.title: Generation and control of structured digital holographic moiré patterns using position sensing detection
data.author: I. B. Glória, G. N. de Oliveira, P. A. M. dos Santos
data.summary: This paper provides a detailed description of the generation and control of structured moiré patterns produced by digital holography. We will present a detailed description of the simple optical procedures and instrumental operations that facilitate the generation of these patterns with convenient geometries using a segmented optical detector PSD (position sensing detector) as an optical element, basically for the control of spatial frequencies, systematically monitoring the incidence of one of the illumination beams in the holographic process. Some of the applications that have already been demonstrated using these procedures include profilometry and numerical representation, while others, such as structured illumination microscopy (SIM), are still under development.
data.title_cn: 使用位置传感检测生成和控制结构化数字全息莫尔图案
data.abstract_cn: 本文详细描述了数字全息术产生的结构化莫尔图案的生成和控制。我们将详细描述简单的光学程序和仪器操作，使用分段光学探测器 PSD（位置传感探测器）作为光学元件，促进以方便的几何形状生成这些图案，主要用于控制空间频率，系统地监控全息过程中其中一束照明光束的入射。已经使用这些程序演示的一些应用包括轮廓测量和数值表示，而其他应用，例如结构照明显微镜（SIM），仍在开发中。

data.title: Polarization-multiplexed disorder-encoded metasurface for multi-channel optical encryption
data.author: Zilei Liu, Jiaqi Zhao, Wanjun Wang, Fan Bu, Wenfu Zhang, Siqi Li
data.summary: In recent years, the use of speckle patterns has gained increasing attention in the context of optical encryption. Conventional scattering media (CSM), due to their fixed functionality, are mostly limited to single-channel encryption, which restricts further improvements in system security. Metasurfaces, as two-dimensional devices capable of flexibly manipulating optical parameters, provide an ideal platform for achieving multiplexing functionality. Building on this foundation, we propose a polarization-multiplexed disorder-encoded metasurface (DEM) for multi-channel optical encryption. This DEM enables dual encryption through quick response (QR) code cascading and provides six encryption channels to the system. The encryption capability of the DEM-based system has been verified through security attack analysis. The proposed DEM effectively expands the number of channels and enhances the data capacity of the encryption system, thereby significantly improving security and attack resilience, demonstrating promising potential for practical applications.
data.title_cn: 用于多通道光学加密的偏振复用无序编码超表面
data.abstract_cn: 近年来，散斑图案的使用在光学加密领域受到越来越多的关注。传统的散射介质（CSM）由于其功能固定，大多局限于单通道加密，限制了系统安全性的进一步提高。超表面作为能够灵活操纵光学参数的二维器件，为实现复用功能提供了理想的平台。在此基础上，我们提出了一种用于多通道光学加密的偏振复用无序编码超表面（DEM）。该 DEM 通过快速响应 (QR) 代码级联实现双重加密，并为系统提供六个加密通道。通过安全攻击分析，验证了基于DEM的系统的加密能力。所提出的DEM有效地扩展了加密系统的通道数量并增强了加密系统的数据容量，从而显着提高了安全性和攻击弹性，展示了实际应用的广阔潜力。

data.title: Accelerated gradient restarted FISTA-TV algorithm for 3D terahertz transmission tomography
data.author: Cong Liu, Wei Chen, Haiqing Liu, Nu Zhang, Zhiyong Zou, Yu Xu, Jiaxing Xie, Anlan Huang, Huanhuan Tian, Xiang Ma
data.summary: Terahertz computed tomography (THz-CT) is a non-destructive technique for characterizing the external and internal structures of complex samples. In this research, a 2.5 THz continuous-wave THz-CT system integrating a quantum cascade laser and a high-speed focal plane array detector was developed. To enhance reconstruction quality under sparse projection conditions, we proposed a fast iterative shrinkage-thresholding algorithm with total variation regularization (FISTA-TV). Comparative experiments demonstrated that FISTA-TV outperformed conventional methods by effectively suppressing noise and streak artifacts while preserving edge sharpness and internal structures. This superiority was quantitatively verified by metrics, including Laplacian variance, mean gradient magnitude, and entropy, which indicated enhanced edge sharpness and reduced noise. These results demonstrate the feasibility of FISTA-TV for high-quality THz-CT imaging under limited-angle conditions and its potential in non-destructive inspection of polymeric components and pharmaceutical preparations.
data.title_cn: 用于 3D 太赫兹传输层析成像的加速梯度重启 FISTA-TV 算法
data.abstract_cn: 太赫兹计算机断层扫描（THz-CT）是一种无损技术，用于表征复杂样品的外部和内部结构。本研究开发了集成量子级联激光器和高速焦平面阵列探测器的2.5 THz连续波太赫兹-CT系统。为了提高稀疏投影条件下的重建质量，我们提出了一种带有全变差正则化的快速迭代收缩阈值算法（FISTA-TV）。对比实验表明，FISTA-TV 能够有效抑制噪声和条纹伪影，同时保留边缘清晰度和内部结构，从而优于传统方法。这种优越性通过拉普拉斯方差、平均梯度幅值和熵等指标进行了定量验证，这些指标表明边缘锐度增强，噪声降低。这些结果证明了 FISTA-TV 在有限角度条件下进行高质量 THz-CT 成像的可行性及其在聚合物成分和药物制剂无损检测中的潜力。

data.title: Benchtop implementation of branch-point-tolerant adaptive optics
data.author: Matthew Kalensky, Matthias T. Banet, Timothy J. Bukowski, Evan M. Bates, Milo W. Hyde, Mark F. Spencer
data.summary: We use a benchtop atmospheric turbulence simulator (ATS) and the adaptive-optics (AO) system to experimentally evaluate AO performance using a Shack–Hartmann wavefront sensor (SHWFS) and a digital-holographic wavefront sensor (DHWFS). Consistent with past results, we show that while the SHWFS yields performance improvement relative to no AO compensation, the SHWFS struggles in strong scintillation conditions. However, when we control our AO system using the least-squares component of our DHWFS measurements, we notice a substantial improvement in performance relative to the results we obtain with the SHWFS. We also leverage our DHWFS measurements to implement a post-processing congruence operation algorithm, referred to as the least-squares principal value (LSPV). We show that the LSPV-based results yield substantial AO performance improvements in strong scintillation conditions compared to only using the least-squares component of our DHWFS measurements. LSPV enables partial compensation of the hidden-phase component—a requirement to achieve better AO performance when scintillation is strong. These findings will be of interest to researchers exploring AO performance in deep turbulence and those who are interested in branch-point-tolerant AO approaches.
data.title_cn: 耐分支点自适应光学器件的台式实现
data.abstract_cn: 我们使用台式大气湍流模拟器 (ATS) 和自适应光学 (AO) 系统，通过 Shack-Hartmann 波前传感器 (SHWFS) 和数字全息波前传感器 (DHWFS) 来实验评估 AO 性能。与过去的结果一致，我们表明，虽然 SHWFS 相对于无 AO 补偿而言性能有所提高，但 SHWFS 在强闪烁条件下表现不佳。然而，当我们使用 DHWFS 测量的最小二乘分量控制 AO 系统时，我们注意到相对于使用 SHWFS 获得的结果，性能有了显着提高。我们还利用 DHWFS 测量来实施后处理同余运算算法，称为最小二乘主值 (LSPV)。我们表明，与仅使用 DHWFS 测量的最小二乘分量相比，基于 LSPV 的结果在强闪烁条件下可显着提高 AO 性能。 LSPV 能够对隐藏相位分量进行部分补偿，这是在闪烁较强时实现更好的 AO 性能的要求。这些发现将引起探索深度湍流中 AO 性能的研究人员以及那些对分支点容忍 AO 方法感兴趣的人的兴趣。

data.title: Joint equalization–demodulation using deep neural networks with embedded signal-dependent noise variance for SPAD-based UWOC systems
data.author: Sheng Xie, Dan Li, Dong Yan, Liying Chen, Renhai Feng, Zhenhua Han, Yuanxiang Chen, Shuang Wang, Jun Li
data.summary: In underwater wireless optical communication (UWOC) systems, using single-photon avalanche diodes (SPAD) as a detector can improve the detection sensitivity and thus improve the transmission distance. However, the signal detection for SPAD-based systems is greatly challenged by the complex optical channel characteristics and SPAD nonlinear distortion. In order to mitigate the nonlinear distortion caused by SPAD detectors, signal-dependent noise (SDN), and the effect of underwater channel attenuation on the transmitted signal in UWOC systems, this paper proposes a signal detection scheme using deep neural networks with embedded SDN variance (DNN–SDN). This scheme performs joint equalization and demodulation of the received signal, avoiding information loss and error propagation between these two processes, thereby achieving more accurate signal recovery. In this work, we first characterize the statistical noise model for the SPAD array and establish a nonlinear relationship between the number of detected photons and the transmitted signal power. The SDN variance is integrated as an input feature during network training. Performance is quantified via a joint loss function with parameters optimized through a systematic ablation study. Finally, the performance of the proposed signal detection scheme is also compared with other schemes in different waters. Simulation results demonstrate that the scheme can effectively mitigate the effects of SPAD-induced nonlinear distortion and SDN on the signal, and the proposed method extends the transmission distance by 20%–40%.
data.title_cn: 针对基于 SPAD 的 UWOC 系统，使用具有嵌入式信号相关噪声方差的深度神经网络进行联合均衡解调
data.abstract_cn: 在水下无线光通信（UWOC）系统中，使用单光子雪崩二极管（SPAD）作为探测器可以提高探测灵敏度，从而提高传输距离。然而，复杂的光通道特性和SPAD非线性失真给基于SPAD的系统的信号检测带来了巨大的挑战。为了减轻UWOC系统中SPAD探测器、信号相关噪声(SDN)引起的非线性失真以及水下信道衰减对传输信号的影响，本文提出了一种使用嵌入SDN方差的深度神经网络(DNN-SDN)的信号检测方案。该方案对接收信号进行联合均衡和解调，避免了这两个过程之间的信息丢失和错误传播，从而实现更准确的信号恢复。在这项工作中，我们首先表征 SPAD 阵列的统计噪声模型，并在检测到的光子数量与传输信号功率之间建立非线性关系。 SDN 方差在网络训练期间被集成为输入特征。通过联合损失函数来量化性能，并通过系统消融研究优化参数。最后，还将所提出的信号检测方案的性能与不同水域中的其他方案进行了比较。仿真结果表明，该方案可以有效减轻SPAD引起的非线性失真和SDN对信号的影响，并且该方法将传输距离延长了20%~40%。

data.title: Time-domain Raman optical activity spectroscopy
data.author: Kotaro Hiramatsu, Hikaru Kuramochi, Satoshi Takeuchi, Tahei Tahara
data.summary: Vibrational chiroptical spectroscopy is a valuable tool for investigating the three-dimensional structure of various biomolecules, such as proteins and nucleic acids, in the solution phase. Since the functions of these biomolecules are closely related to their dynamic behavior, the extension of vibrational chiroptical spectroscopy to time-resolved measurements is a promising approach for elucidating the mechanisms responsible for biological functions. However, the implementation of vibrational chiroptical spectroscopy with an ultrashort pulsed laser source—a crucial step toward time-resolved chiroptical spectroscopy—presents significant technical challenges due to its inherently low signal intensity and the difficulty of precise polarization control. Here, we report a sensitive and effective method to measure vibrational Raman optical activity (ROA) spectra using sub-10-fs pulses, which we call time-domain Raman optical activity (TD-ROA) spectroscopy. Specifically, ROA spectra were obtained by measuring a time-dependent change in circular birefringence accompanied by coherent nuclear wavepacket motion. We performed proof-of-principle TD-ROA measurements with (+)- and (−)- β -pinene in the spectral range from 400 to 1200cm −1 , which shows the capability of the method to discriminate enantiomers. Our approach paves the way for tracking chiral nuclear motion that is correlated to the activation of various biomolecular functions.
data.title_cn: 时域拉曼旋光光谱
data.abstract_cn: 振动手性光谱是研究溶液相中各种生物分子（例如蛋白质和核酸）的三维结构的重要工具。由于这些生物分子的功能与其动态行为密切相关，因此将振动手性光谱扩展到时间分辨测量是阐明生物功能机制的一种有前途的方法。然而，利用超短脉冲激光源实现振动手性光谱——时间分辨手性光谱的关键一步——由于其固有的低信号强度和精确偏振控制的难度，带来了重大的技术挑战。在这里，我们报告了一种使用亚 10-fs 脉冲测量振动拉曼旋光 (ROA) 光谱的灵敏且有效的方法，我们将其称为时域拉曼旋光 (TD-ROA) 光谱。具体来说，ROA 光谱是通过测量伴随相干核波包运动的圆形双折射随时间的变化而获得的。我们在 400 至 1200cm -1 的光谱范围内对 (+)- 和 (−)- β-蒎烯进行了原理验证 TD-ROA 测量，这显示了该方法区分对映体的能力。我们的方法为跟踪与各种生物分子功能激活相关的手性核运动铺平了道路。

data.title: Direct fiber-coupled soliton microcomb system with enhanced stability and reproducibility via high numerical-aperture polarization-maintaining single-mode fibers and temperature control
data.author: Miezel Talara, Yu Tokizane, Kodai Yamaji, Yudai Matsumura, Yoshihiro Makimoto, Kenji Nishimoto, Masayuki Higaki, Naoya Kuse, Takeshi Yasui
data.summary: We propose a relatively simple and robust system architecture for soliton microcomb generation, based on two key techniques: direct fiber coupling using high numerical-aperture polarization-maintaining single-mode fibers (high-NA PMFs) and active temperature control of the microresonator. These complementary strategies address two major challenges in microcomb implementation: environmental sensitivity and resonance instability. Building on prior work using single-mode fiber (SMF)-based direct coupling, which demonstrated device miniaturization and partial suppression of thermal drift in total fiber-to-fiber insertion loss, our PMF-based approach offers enhanced thermal stability and significantly greater robustness to environmental disturbances such as temperature fluctuations and vibration. In our system, the need for precision alignment using microscopes or multi-axis stages is alleviated, enabling a less complex optical setup and stable long-term operation. The direct coupling scheme achieved a total fiber-to-fiber insertion loss of 2.39 dB and maintained stable soliton operation for over 24 hours under external perturbations. In parallel, active temperature control of the microresonator was quantitatively evaluated, reducing the wavelength variation of the pump and auxiliary lasers by 79% and 97%, respectively. This stability enables reproducible soliton generation even in thermally dynamic environments. Comparative experiments with SMF-based direct coupling and lensed-SMF-based free-space coupling systems confirmed the superior performance of the PMF-based design in terms of coupling stability, soliton lifetime, and immunity to environmental noise. The architecture developed in this study lays a strong foundation for future integration into compact modules, with ongoing efforts aimed at reducing the reliance on laboratory-scale laser systems and optical components.
data.title_cn: 直接光纤耦合孤子微梳系统通过高数值孔径保偏单模光纤和温度控制增强稳定性和再现性
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种相对简单且鲁棒的孤子微梳生成系统架构，基于两项关键技术：使用高数值孔径保偏单模光纤（高NA PMF）的直接光纤耦合和微谐振器的主动温度控制。这些互补策略解决了微梳实施中的两个主要挑战：环境敏感性和共振不稳定性。我们基于 PMF 的方法基于使用基于单模光纤 (SMF) 的直接耦合的先前工作，该工作证明了设备小型化和对总光纤到光纤插入损耗中热漂移的部分抑制，从而提供了增强的热稳定性以及对温度波动和振动等环境干扰的显着增强的鲁棒性。在我们的系统中，减少了使用显微镜或多轴平台进行精确对准的需求，从而实现了不太复杂的光学设置和稳定的长期运行。直接耦合方案实现了 2.39 dB 的总光纤到光纤插入损耗，并在外部扰动下保持稳定的孤子运行超过 24 小时。同时，对微谐振器的主动温度控制进行了定量评估，将泵浦激光器和辅助激光器的波长变化分别减少了 79% 和 97%。即使在热动态环境中，这种稳定性也能实现可重复的孤子生成。基于 SMF 的直接耦合系统和基于透镜 SMF 的自由空间耦合系统的比较实验证实了基于 PMF 的设计在耦合稳定性、孤子寿命和抗环境噪声方面的优越性能。本研究开发的架构为未来集成到紧凑型模块中奠定了坚实的基础，并不断努力减少对实验室规模激光系统和光学组件的依赖。

data.title: Plasma-like-like oscillation and its mechanism
data.author: Tiefu Li, Jinwei Chen, Cunqian Feng, Jie Yang, Yuxiang Jia, Xinmin Fu, Chang Ding, Yajuan Han, Zhihui Zhang, Song Zhao, Zhaotang Liu, Jiafu Wang
data.summary: In 1996, Pendry proposed plasma-like oscillation (PLO) in the long-metallic-strip (LMS) array. With the ability of permittivity reduction, it is effective for negative refractive index and electromagnetic (EM) transparency, thereby promoting the development of metamaterials. In this manuscript, we discover a novel magnetic response in the LMS array, which is excited at high frequencies with TE polarization incident at large angles (≥60°). With similar currents to PLO, the magnetic response has EM characteristics similar to those of PLO, where the most typical is the permittivity reduction. Thus, it is called plasma-like-like oscillation (PLLO) here. The discovery is well verified by the monitored induced currents, the magnetic field, the spectrum comparison, and the extracted EM parameters. The prototypes are designed, fabricated, and measured, where the measured results are basically consistent with the simulated ones. With a similar permittivity reduction to PLO, PLLO would provide new ideas for left-handed materials and EM windows.
data.title_cn: 类等离子体振荡及其机制
data.abstract_cn: 1996年，Pendry提出了长金属条（LMS）阵列中的类等离子体振荡（PLO）。具有降低介电常数的能力，可有效实现负折射率和电磁（EM）透明性，从而促进超材料的发展。在这份手稿中，我们在 LMS 阵列中发现了一种新颖的磁响应，该响应在高频率下通过大角度（≥60°）的 TE 极化入射而被激发。在与 PLO 类似的电流下，磁响应具有与 PLO 类似的电磁特性，其中最典型的是介电常数降低。因此，这里将其称为类等离子体振荡（PLLO）。监测的感应电流、磁场、频谱比较和提取的电磁参数很好地验证了这一发现。样机经过设计、制作和测量，测量结果与仿真结果基本一致。通过与 PLO 类似的介电常数降低，PLLO 将为左手材料和电磁窗口提供新的想法。

data.title: Ultra-high-density integrated spatial division multiplexer
data.author: Hui-Ming Wang, Ying-Yu Fang, Yi-Lan Liu, Ka-Di Zhu, Hao Tang, Xian-Min Jin
data.summary: Twisted light with orbital angular momentum (OAM) introduces an innovative dimension in modern optics, providing a valuable resource for advancing both classical and quantum information technologies. The utilization of OAM and multi-core multiplexing in advanced optical fiber communication systems has been demonstrated as the pivotal solution to the escalating demand for information transmission in contemporary society. However, creating a large-scale and stable device for spatially separated cores supporting OAM modes is more challenging compared to established technologies for spectrum and polarization, which have mature devices. To address this challenge, we propose and fabricate a double-layer doughnut waveguide supporting three OAM modes under 1550 nm, using femtosecond laser direct writing technology. Based on that, we design the 37-core integrated space-division multiplexing device with uniform performance by depth-related power compensation. Our platform represents a breakthrough by overcoming the current technological barriers in on-chip multi-mode support and large-scale uniformity. This advancement enables a theoretical increase over a hundred fold in single-fiber information capacity, positioning it well ahead of existing integrated solutions. Designed for next-generation communication systems, it optimizes integrated space-division multiplexing, setting new benchmarks for efficiency and scalability in optical networks and facilitating unprecedented advancements in communication technologies.
data.title_cn: 超高密度集成空分复用器
data.abstract_cn: 具有轨道角动量（OAM）的扭曲光引入了现代光学的创新维度，为推进经典和量子信息技术提供了宝贵的资源。先进光纤通信系统中 OAM 和多芯复用的利用已被证明是满足当代社会不断增长的信息传输需求的关键解决方案。然而，与拥有成熟器件的现有频谱和偏振技术相比，为支持 OAM 模式的空间分离核心创建大规模且稳定的器件更具挑战性。为了应对这一挑战，我们利用飞秒激光直写技术提出并制造了一种支持 1550 nm 以下三种 OAM 模式的双层环形波导。在此基础上，我们通过深度相关功率补偿设计了性能统一的37核集成空分复用器件。我们的平台突破了当前片上多模式支持和大规模统一性方面的技术障碍。这一进步理论上使单光纤信息容量增加了一百倍以上，远远领先于现有的集成解决方案。它专为下一代通信系统而设计，优化了集成空分复用，为光网络的效率和可扩展性树立了新基准，并促进了通信技术的前所未有的进步。

data.title: Continuous-variable quantum key distribution over 50.4 km fiber using an integrated silicon photonic transmitter and receiver
data.author: Shuaishuai Liu, Yanxiang Jia, Yuqi Shi, Yizhuo Hou, Pu Wang, Yu Zhang, Shiwei Yang, Zhenguo Lu, Xuyang Wang, Yongmin Li
data.summary: Quantum key distribution (QKD) is the fastest-growing and relatively mature technology in the field of quantum information, enabling information-theoretically secure key distribution between two remote users. Although QKD based on off-the-shelf telecom components has been validated in both laboratory and field tests, its high cost and large volume remain major obstacles to large-scale deployment. Photonic integration, featured by its compact size and low cost, offers an effective approach to addressing the above challenges faced by QKD. Here, we implement a high-performance, integrated local local oscillator continuous-variable (CV) QKD system based on an integrated silicon photonic transmitter and receiver. By employing a high-speed silicon photonic integrated in-phase and quadrature modulator, a low-noise and high-bandwidth silicon photonic integrated heterodyne detector, and digital signal processing, our CV-QKD system achieves a symbol rate of up to 1.5625 GBaud. Furthermore, the system achieves asymptotic secret key rates of 31.05 and 5.05 Mbps over 25.8 and 50.4 km standard single-mode fiber, respectively, using 8-phase-shift keying discrete modulation. Our integrated CV-QKD system with a high symbol rate and long transmission distance paves the way for the quantum secure communication network in metropolitan areas.
data.title_cn: 使用集成硅光子发射器和接收器在 50.4 km 光纤上进行连续可变量子密钥分发
data.abstract_cn: 量子密钥分发（QKD）是量子信息领域发展最快且相对成熟的技术，能够在两个远程用户之间实现信息理论上安全的密钥分发。尽管基于现成电信组件的 QKD 已在实验室和现场测试中得到验证，但其高成本和大体积仍然是大规模部署的主要障碍。光子集成以其紧凑的尺寸和低成本的特点，为解决QKD面临的上述挑战提供了有效的方法。在这里，我们实现了一个基于集成硅光子发射器和接收器的高性能、集成本地本地振荡器连续可变 (CV) QKD 系统。通过采用高速硅光子集成同相和正交调制器、低噪声和高带宽硅光子集成外差探测器以及数字信号处理，我们的CV-QKD系统实现了高达1.5625 GBaud的符号率。此外，该系统使用 8 相移键控离散调制，在 25.8 公里和 50.4 公里标准单模光纤上分别实现了 31.05 和 5.05 Mbps 的渐近密钥速率。我们的集成CV-QKD系统具有高符号率和长传输距离，为城域量子安全通信网络铺平了道路。

data.title: Centimeter-scale achromatic supercritical lens
data.author: Zeda Lin, Yiyin Zheng, Xu Hu, Jing Li, Sicong Wang, Yaoyu Cao, Xiangping Li, Fei Qin
data.summary: A supercritical lens (SCL) can achieve far-field sub-diffraction-limited focusing by elaborately manipulating the interference effect in the focal region, which makes it strongly dependent on the wavelength of the illuminating light. In addition to the strong chromatic aberrations it suffers, the micrometer-scale clear aperture of reported SCL represents another compelling challenge that excludes their practical imaging applications demand. In this work, we proposed and experimentally demonstrated an achromatic supercritical lens (ASCL) with a centimeter-scale clear aperture. The ASCL was designed by a two-step optimization algorithm and constructed in a multilevel phase configuration which consists of 1251 concentric polymer rings with 52 phase levels. By utilizing the grayscale laser lithography technique, we successfully fabricated an ASCL with a diameter of 10 mm. Such a centimeter-scale ASCL showcases a distinguished performance with full visible working bandwidth covering from 400 nm to 700 nm and simultaneous achromatic sub-diffraction-limited focusing of 0.88 times of the Airy spot. The demonstrations of white light microscopic imaging further validate our design and show decent performance. Our work paves the way for practical applications of SCL in high-density optical data storage, super-resolving optical telescope, and high-precision optical trapping.
data.title_cn: 厘米级消色差超临界透镜
data.abstract_cn: 超临界透镜（SCL）可以通过精心操纵焦点区域的干涉效应来实现远场亚衍射限制聚焦，这使得它强烈依赖于照明光的波长。除了所遭受的强烈色差之外，报道的 SCL 的微米级通光孔径代表了另一个令人瞩目的挑战，排除了其实际成像应用的需求。在这项工作中，我们提出并通过实验演示了一种具有厘米级通光孔径的消色差超临界透镜（ASCL）。 ASCL 采用两步优化算法设计，并采用多级相配置构建，该配置由 1251 个同心聚合物环和 52 个相级组成。利用灰度激光光刻技术，我们成功制作了直径为10毫米的ASCL。这种厘米级的ASCL展现出卓越的性能，其全可见光工作带宽覆盖400 nm至700 nm，同时消色差亚衍射极限聚焦为艾里斑的0.88倍。白光显微成像的演示进一步验证了我们的设计并显示出良好的性能。我们的工作为SCL在高密度光学数据存储、超分辨光学望远镜和高精度光捕获方面的实际应用铺平了道路。

data.title: Non-invasive 3D imaging of hidden objects based on a short-wave infrared BIC metasurface
data.author: Qiming Liao, Xiaoli Jing, Jidong Xue, Ning Li, Yuxuan Yang, Rui You, Yongtian Wang, Zhaoxian Su, Lingling Huang
data.summary: Point-cloud-projection-based stereo vision technology is widely applied in 3D reconstruction, robotic vision, and virtual reality. A metasurface, known for its exceptional light-field manipulation capabilities and compact integration, offers a promising approach to reducing system size while enhancing functionality. In this work, we propose and implement a short-wave infrared 3D structured light detection system based on a metasurface supporting a bound state in the continuum (BIC). The designed BIC metasurface exhibits wavelength selectivity, generating a point cloud projection array exclusively under 1350 nm laser illumination, effectively minimizing interference from environmental light and enabling penetration through certain packaging materials opaque to visible light. Using this system, we successfully demonstrate 3D detection and reconstruction of concealed objects, such as lenses and workpieces, within opaque packaging. Our design provides a non-contact, penetrating 3D reconstruction approach for industrial inspection, offering potential applications in non-destructive quality control.
data.title_cn: 基于短波红外BIC超表面的隐藏物体非侵入3D成像
data.abstract_cn: 基于点云投影的立体视觉技术广泛应用于3D重建、机器人视觉、虚拟现实等领域。超表面以其卓越的光场操纵能力和紧凑的集成而闻名，它提供了一种有前途的方法来减小系统尺寸，同时增强功能。在这项工作中，我们提出并实现了一种基于支持连续体束缚态（BIC）的超表面的短波红外3D结构光检测系统。设计的BIC超表面具有波长选择性，仅在1350 nm激光照射下生成点云投影阵列，有效地最大限度地减少环境光的干扰，并能够穿透某些对可见光不透明的包装材料。使用该系统，我们成功演示了不透明包装内隐藏物体（例如镜头和工件）的 3D 检测和重建。我们的设计为工业检测提供了一种非接触式、穿透式 3D 重建方法，为无损质量控制提供了潜在的应用。

data.title: Computational immunity-belt reconstruction restores far-field images through bent step-index fibers
data.author: Zhicheng Ye, Jing Xu, Shuang Wang, Fei Yu, Chunlei Yu, Yang Du
data.summary: Multimode fibers (MMFs) are increasingly pursued for ultrathin and lensless endoscopic imaging, but their extreme susceptibility to bend-induced mode scrambling has so far impeded practical deployment. We uncover a hitherto overlooked bend resilience in step-index multimode fibers and convert it into a proximal strategy for flexible imaging. Under fiber bending curvature the far-field image degrades from the center outward, yet a peripheral annulus conveyed by higher-order modes remains largely unperturbed across bend angles approaching 90°. Exploiting this “immunity belt,” we devise a three-stage reconstruction pipeline that isolates bend tolerant spatial frequencies in the Fourier domain, transplants them into the corrupted core via feature-guided Poisson fusion, and removes residual noise with physics informed dehazing. Systematic tests on 15 cm to 2 m fibers yield a mean matching score gain of 38% over 250 sequential bend states, restoring features in both 3D figurines and high-contrast test gratings. A dual-fiber probe integrated in a needle further resolves centimeter-scale anatomy in a gastric phantom and underscores the method’s clinical relevance and feasibility for minimally invasive diagnostic applications. This work highlights the potential of computational reconstruction to significantly enhance the robustness and practical applicability of multimode fiber imaging in biomedical and industrial contexts.
data.title_cn: 计算免疫带重建通过弯曲阶跃折射率光纤恢复远场图像
data.abstract_cn: 多模光纤（MMF）越来越多地用于超薄和无透镜内窥镜成像，但它们对弯曲引起的模式扰乱的极度敏感性迄今为止阻碍了实际部署。我们发现了阶跃折射率多模光纤中迄今为止被忽视的弯曲弹性，并将其转化为灵活成像的近端策略。在光纤弯曲曲率下，远场图像从中心向外退化，但由高阶模式传送的外围环面在接近 90° 的弯曲角上仍基本不受干扰。利用这个“免疫带”，我们设计了一个三级重建管道，可以隔离傅里叶域中的耐弯曲空间频率，通过特征引导的泊松融合将它们移植到损坏的核心中，并通过物理通知的去雾去除残余噪声。对 15 cm 至 2 m 光纤进行的系统测试在 250 个连续弯曲状态下的平均匹配得分增益提高了 38%，从而恢复了 3D 雕像和高对比度测试光栅中的特征。集成在针中的双光纤探针进一步解析了胃体模中的厘米级解剖结构，并强调了该方法的临床相关性和微创诊断应用的可行性。这项工作凸显了计算重建在显着增强生物医学和工业环境中多模光纤成像的鲁棒性和实际适用性方面的潜力。

data.title: Diamond-neural-network magnetic sensors for ultrafast circuit fault detection and identification
data.author: Wei Gao, Jinyu Tai, Zhibin Wang, Shuchen Song, Xin Li, Huanfei Wen, Zhonghao Li, Zongmin Ma, Yunbo Shi, Hao Guo, Jun Tang, Jun Liu
data.summary: As fundamental components of consumer electronics, medical devices, and aerospace precision instruments, circuit modules require fault detection analysis to ensure operational stability and safety, which remains a critical challenge. Conventional contact-based electrical signal detection methods for printed circuit board (PCB) fault analysis often induce contact damage and suffer from slow detection and analysis speeds due to massive redundant data transmission and processing. Here, we propose a diamond-neural-network quantum magnetic sensor that enables non-contact circuit fault analysis by detecting far-field weak magnetic signals from PCBs. The sensor comprises a diamond array where each diamond functions as a nitrogen-vacancy (NV) center quantum magnetic sensor with tunable responsivity regulated by positive and negative voltage follower units. This diamond array inherently constitutes an artificial neural network (ANN), capable of simultaneous magnetic signal detection and real-time processing with ultra-low latency. Through training the sensor for fault classification, we achieve a response time superior to 137.1 ns.
data.title_cn: 用于超快电路故障检测和识别的金刚石神经网络磁传感器
data.abstract_cn: 作为消费电子、医疗设备和航空航天精密仪器的基本组件，电路模块需要故障检测分析以确保运行稳定性和安全性，这仍然是一个严峻的挑战。传统的用于印刷电路板（PCB）故障分析的基于接触的电信号检测方法经常会导致接触损坏，并且由于大量冗余数据传输和处理而导致检测和分析速度缓慢。在这里，我们提出了一种金刚石神经网络量子磁传感器，通过检测 PCB 的远场弱磁信号来实现非接触式电路故障分析。该传感器由金刚石阵列组成，其中每个金刚石都充当氮空位 (NV) 中心量子磁传感器，具有由正负电压跟随器单元调节的可调响应度。该钻石阵列本质上构成了一个人工神经网络（ANN），能够同时进行磁信号检测和超低延迟的实时处理。通过训练传感器进行故障分类，我们实现了优于 137.1 ns 的响应时间。
