data.title: Sample integrated laser for optical thickness measurement using single-shot interferometry
data.author: Preangka Roy, Bao Dinh Thai, Yume Hashimoto, Satoe Murazawa, Satoshi Kanai, Tatsutoshi Shioda
data.summary: We present a method for measuring the optical thickness of a high-finesse Fabry–Perot etalon using single-shot interferometry. By integrating the sample etalon into the laser cavity, a new light source, to our knowledge, is demonstrated that improves the sensitivity limitation of the rear-surface reflection signal. Comparative results with the conventional single-shot approach are also discussed. The light source achieved a sweep time of 49 µs and a tuning range of ∼1.65THz. The experimental results were obtained using a customized etalon with an approximate optical thickness of 730 µm, and the average optical thickness was measured as (7.0±0.1)×10 2 µm.
data.title_cn: 使用单次干涉测量进行光学厚度测量的集成激光器示例
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种使用单次干涉测量高精度法布里-珀罗标准具光学厚度的方法。据我们所知，通过将样品标准具集成到激光腔中，证明了一种新光源可以改善后表面反射信号的灵敏度限制。还讨论了与传统单次方法的比较结果。该光源的扫描时间为 49 µs，调谐范围为 ∼1.65THz。实验结果是使用光学厚度约为730μm的定制标准具获得的，测得平均光学厚度为(7.0±0.1)×10 2 μm。

data.title: Real-time laser detection method for edge position of objects with nanometer level accuracy
data.author: Yusheng Zhai, Rongxin Wu, Ruiliang Zhang, Hongjun Yang, Peng Yang, Sen Li, Zhifeng Zhang
data.summary: This study proposes an object edge position detection method with optical drift compensation based on the defect spot working mode of a position-sensitive detector (PSD). The proposed method utilizes the output characteristics of PSD in the defect spot working mode, the asymmetry of the defect spot, and the size transformation characteristics during the focused beam projection process to obtain ultra-high sensitivity gain for measuring object displacement and light deflection angle. The proposed system measures the beam angle drift while detecting the edge position of the object through a co path compensation optical path structure, thereby achieving real-time compensation of light drift and improving the accuracy of edge detection. To verify the feasibility and effectiveness of the method, calibration experiments and object edge position detection experiments were conducted using piezoelectric transducers (PZT). Experimental results show that, under the system setting parameters, the sensitivity of the proposed edge position detection system reaches 0.9 nm, and the standard deviation of multiple detections is 5 nm. Compared with edge detection methods based on image recognition and other methods, the proposed method achieves nanometer level detection accuracy while also having the advantages of a simple system and high real-time performance, and can be used for precision positioning, measurement, and other applications.
data.title_cn: 纳米级精度物体边缘位置实时激光检测方法
data.abstract_cn: 本研究提出了一种基于位置敏感探测器（PSD）缺陷光斑工作模式的光学漂移补偿的物体边缘位置检测方法。该方法利用缺陷光斑工作模式下PSD的输出特性、缺陷光斑的不对称性以及聚焦光束投影过程中的尺寸变换特性，获得测量物体位移和光偏转角的超高灵敏度增益。该系统通过共程补偿光路结构在检测物体边缘位置的同时测量光束角漂移，从而实现光漂移的实时补偿，提高边缘检测的精度。为了验证该方法的可行性和有效性，利用压电换能器（PZT）进行了标定实验和物体边缘位置检测实验。实验结果表明，在系统设置参数下，所提出的边缘位置检测系统的灵敏度达到0.9 nm，多次检测的标准偏差为5 nm。与基于图像识别的边缘检测方法等方法相比，该方法在实现纳米级检测精度的同时，还具有系统简单、实时性高的优点，可用于精密定位、测量等应用。

data.title: Functionalized PVP nanofibers achieved using electrospinning as flexible SERS substrates for multiple explosives sensing
data.author: Sampath Kumar Satani, Rini Jose, Moram Sree Satya Bharati, Venugopal Rao Soma
data.summary: In this study, metal (Ag/Au) nanoparticles-embedded polymer-based [polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP)] nanofibers were fabricated via the in situ reduction of metallic precursors (AgNO 3 /HAuCl 4 ) in PVP before electrospinning. The presence of metal nanoparticles was confirmed through surface plasmon resonance peaks observed in the ultraviolet–visible absorption spectra. Several analytical techniques were utilized to characterize the electrospun nanofibers. X-ray diffraction confirmed the crystalline structure and the presence of metallic nanoparticles. Field emission scanning electron microscopy revealed the surface morphology and depicted a variation in nanofiber diameter, ranging from 100 to 300 nm, depending on the concentration of metal precursors (5, 10, and 50 mM). Transmission electron microscopy images confirmed the spherical shape of the nanoparticles, with sizes ranging from 10 to 50 nm across all samples. Among the three solvents (distilled water, DMF, and ethanol) used, the nanofibers obtained with distilled water were devoid of any microbeads on the nanofibers. The smooth nanofibers achieved with different-sized Ag/Au NPs were then utilized as flexible SERS (surface-enhanced Raman scattering)-based sensors for detecting methylene blue molecules. Interestingly, the PVP–Ag nanofiber obtained at a 10 µM concentration of the silver/gold salt demonstrated the highest enhancement. The PVP–Ag nanofiber was further used for the fingerprint detection of explosive molecules such as picric acid, ammonium nitrate, TNT, and HMX at low concentrations (weight equivalent of 500 µg) via a simple swabbing method.
data.title_cn: 使用静电纺丝作为柔性 SERS 基底实现多种爆炸物传感的功能化 PVP 纳米纤维
data.abstract_cn: In this study, metal (Ag/Au) nanoparticles-embedded polymer-based [polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP)] nanofibers were fabricated via the in situ reduction of metallic precursors (AgNO 3 /HAuCl 4 ) in PVP before electrospinning.通过紫外-可见吸收光谱中观察到的表面等离子体共振峰证实了金属纳米颗粒的存在。采用多种分析技术来表征电纺纳米纤维。 X 射线衍射证实了晶体结构和金属纳米颗粒的存在。 Field emission scanning electron microscopy revealed the surface morphology and depicted a variation in nanofiber diameter, ranging from 100 to 300 nm, depending on the concentration of metal precursors (5, 10, and 50 mM). Transmission electron microscopy images confirmed the spherical shape of the nanoparticles, with sizes ranging from 10 to 50 nm across all samples.在使用的三种溶剂（蒸馏水、DMF和乙醇）中，用蒸馏水获得的纳米纤维在纳米纤维上没有任何微珠。然后，利用不同尺寸的Ag/Au NP 获得的光滑纳米纤维被用作基于柔性SERS（表面增强拉曼散射）的传感器，用于检测亚甲基蓝分子。有趣的是，在银/金盐浓度为 10 µM 时获得的 PVP-Ag 纳米纤维表现出最高的增强效果。 The PVP–Ag nanofiber was further used for the fingerprint detection of explosive molecules such as picric acid, ammonium nitrate, TNT, and HMX at low concentrations (weight equivalent of 500 µg) via a simple swabbing method.

data.title: Sixteen shades of blue; the use of a digital camera as a cyanometer
data.author: John Hardwick
data.summary: During his ascent of Mont Blanc in 1787, de Saussure used a cyanometer comprising sixteen shades of blue painted on cards to quantify the color of the sky. Simultaneous measurements gave a whiter shade of 7 at Geneva but a dark blue of 1–2 from the summit. We explore the use of a digital camera as a cyanometer. It was hoped to see the variation with altitude during a short ski holiday, but this was overambitious. However, results show that, for clear skies, the percentage of blue varies little, and the perception of blueness is primarily determined by the brightness.
data.title_cn: 十六种蓝色；使用数码相机作为氰度计
data.abstract_cn: 1787 年，索绪尔在攀登勃朗峰期间，使用了由十六种蓝色画在卡片上的氰度计来量化天空的颜色。同时测量得出，日内瓦的颜色较白，为 7，但山顶的颜色为深蓝色，颜色为 1-2。我们探索使用数码相机作为氰度计。人们希望在短暂的滑雪假期中看到海拔随海拔的变化，但这是过于雄心勃勃的。然而，结果表明，对于晴朗的天空，蓝色的百分比变化很小，蓝色的感知主要由亮度决定。

data.title: Digitally directed beams for three-dimensional surface reconstruction using a dynamical filter
data.author: Hiroshi Ohno
data.summary: A three-dimensional (3D) reconstruction method is proposed that utilizes an imaging system featuring digitally directed illumination beams, generated by a dynamical filter projected through an optical projector equipped with a digital micromirror device (DMD). This projector can digitally change the dynamical filter, thereby altering the directions of the illumination beams. The surface normal of the 3D object can therefore be obtained based on the law of regular reflection for each differently directed beam, and the surface shape can be reconstructed using an inverse matrix method. This method is experimentally validated using a cone with an apex height of 37 µm.
data.title_cn: 使用动态滤波器进行三维表面重建的数字定向光束
data.abstract_cn: 提出了一种三维 (3D) 重建方法，该方法利用具有数字定向照明光束的成像系统，该成像系统由通过配备数字微镜器件 (DMD) 的光学投影仪投影的动态滤波器生成。该投影仪可以数字方式改变动态滤波器，从而改变照明光束的方向。因此，可以根据每个不同方向光束的正反射定律获得3D物体的表面法线，并且可以使用逆矩阵方法来重建表面形状。该方法使用顶点高度为 37 µm 的圆锥体进行了实验验证。

data.title: Integrated modeling–database framework for automatic synthesis of initial real-lens zoom systems
data.author: Lan Lan, Dewen Cheng, Yongtian Wang, Tong Yang
data.summary: This paper presents an automated framework for early stage design of mechanically compensated zoom systems. The method integrates three stages: (1) thin-lens modeling, in which Gaussian modeling with particle swarm optimization generates feasible four-group thin-lens layouts; (2) thin-lens refinement, which enforces practical optical and mechanical constraints including F-number, half field-of-view (FOV), minimum spacing, and smooth zoom trajectories; and (3) real-lens substitution and quick optimization, where each thin-lens group is matched, scaled, and replaced using a database-driven strategy based on focal power, F-number, and ray-angle similarity with principal-plane alignment. A large-scale robustness evaluation across varied zoom ratios, half-FOV angles, and length-scaling factors shows 76% end-to-end success. Representative 3×, 20×, and 50× examples further demonstrate that the workflow reliably produces compact and manufacturable zoom configurations with smooth motion and balanced imaging performance. Overall, the framework provides higher efficiency, stable numerical behavior, and greater structural diversity than manual design, offering a practical foundation for data-driven zoom-lens development and seamless integration into optical-design environments.
data.title_cn: 用于自动合成初始真实镜头变焦系统的集成建模数据库框架
data.abstract_cn: 本文提出了一个用于机械补偿变焦系统早期设计的自动化框架。该方法集成了三个阶段：（1）薄透镜建模，其中采用粒子群优化的高斯建模生成可行的四组薄透镜布局； (2) 薄透镜细化，强制执行实际光学和机械约束，包括 F 数、半视场 (FOV)、最小间距和平滑变焦轨迹； (3) 真实透镜替换和快速优化，其中使用基于焦度、F 数和主平面对准的光线角度相似性的数据库驱动策略来匹配、缩放和替换每个薄透镜组。针对不同变焦比、半 FOV 角度和长度缩放因子的大规模鲁棒性评估显示，端到端成功率为 76%。代表性的 3 倍、20 倍和 50 倍示例进一步证明，该工作流程能够可靠地生成紧凑且可制造的变焦配置，并具有平滑的运动和平衡的成像性能。总体而言，该框架比手动设计提供更高的效率、稳定的数值行为和更大的结构多样性，为数据驱动的变焦镜头开发和无缝集成到光学设计环境中提供了实用的基础。

data.title: Time-resolved ballistic imaging of a transient diesel spray
data.author: Lokesh Mopuri, Viljam Grahn, David Sedarsky, Jari Hyvönen
data.summary: Pilot injections play a crucial role in enhancing thermal efficiency and reducing NO x emissions in large-scale dual-fuel (DF) combustion engines. These injection strategies are characterized by extremely short dwell times and compact spray events, which are highly sensitive to the transient dynamics of the injector. The near-nozzle region is particularly important, as it governs spray initiation, primary breakup, and fuel–air mixing. Spray behavior in this region is strongly influenced by injection pressure, primarily due to the needle’s opening and closing dynamics. However, conventional imaging techniques are inadequate for capturing spray development and the dense liquid core within a few millimeters of the nozzle, owing to limitations in temporal resolution. To overcome this limitation, ballistic imaging was employed under ambient conditions to visualize spray evolution within 10 mm of the nozzle at injection pressures of 1700 and 2100 bar. Ballistic imaging is an optical technique that uses an ultrafast shutter (1.5–2 ps) to capture high-resolution images of dense sprays by filtering out multiple scattered light. The results show the temporal evolution of the spray liquid core morphology and highlight the influence of injection pressure on spray characteristics; particularly, the spray cone angles increase at lower injection pressures due to reduced needle lift and lower spray momentum.
data.title_cn: 瞬态柴油喷雾的时间分辨弹道成像
data.abstract_cn: 引燃喷射在提高大型双燃料 (DF) 内燃机的热效率和减少氮氧化物排放方面发挥着至关重要的作用。这些喷射策略的特点是停留时间极短和喷雾事件紧凑，对喷射器的瞬态动态高度敏感。近喷嘴区域尤其重要，因为它控制着喷雾引发、初级破碎和燃料-空气混合。该区域的喷雾行为受到喷射压力的强烈影响，这主要是由于针阀的打开和关闭动力学造成的。然而，由于时间分辨率的限制，传统的成像技术不足以捕获喷雾的发展和喷嘴几毫米内的致密液体核心。为了克服这一限制，在环境条件下采用弹道成像来可视化在 1700 和 2100 bar 喷射压力下喷嘴 10 mm 内的喷雾演变。弹道成像是一种光学技术，它使用超快快门 (1.5–2 ps) 通过滤除多重散射光来捕获密集喷雾的高分辨率图像。结果显示了喷雾液体核心形态的时间演变，并强调了喷射压力对喷雾特性的影响；特别是，由于针升程减小和喷雾动量降低，喷雾锥角在较低喷射压力下增加。

data.title: Development of a vibration mode propagation method to perform wave-optics simulation of beamline vibration
data.author: Han Xu, Xiao Li, Ming Li, Zhe Ren, Yi Zhang, Peng Liu, Yuhui Dong, Liang Zhou
data.summary: Fourth-generation synchrotron radiation (SR) sources offer dramatically enhanced coherence, pushing the requirements for beamline stability to new extremes, particularly in spatial resolution for imaging, temporal resolution for dynamic studies, and X-ray nanoprobes. Therefore, the beamline must possess high stability while effectively propagating coherent photons during optical design. For fourth-generation SR sources with significantly enhanced coherence, wave-optics simulations must be incorporated into optical design processes. Here, we present the development of a vibration mode propagation (VMP) method for beamline vibration simulation. By utilizing vibration modes instead of wavefront vibrations and propagating them through the method developed in this work, the VMP method enables computational speeds up to 40 times faster than the brute-force method in actual beamline models of fourth-generation SR sources, and high-efficiency, fully wave-optics simulation of vibration is achieved. Furthermore, by integrating the VMP method with coherent mode decomposition, we extend its application to partially coherent SR beams, enabling a comprehensive analysis of vibration decoherence, position vibration, and the vibration impact of experimental sampling frequency.
data.title_cn: 开发振动模式传播方法来进行光束线振动的波光学模拟
data.abstract_cn: 第四代同步加速器辐射 (SR) 源显着增强了相干性，将光束线稳定性的要求推向了新的极限，特别是在成像的空间分辨率、动态研究的时间分辨率和 X 射线纳米探针方面。因此，在光学设计中，光束线必须具有高稳定性，同时有效地传播相干光子。对于相干性显着增强的第四代 SR 光源，波动光学模拟必须纳入光学设计过程中。在这里，我们介绍了用于光束线振动模拟的振动模式传播（VMP）方法的开发。通过利用振动模式代替波前振动并通过本文开发的方法传播它们，VMP方法的计算速度比第四代SR源的实际光束线模型中的强力方法快40倍，并且实现了高效、全波光学的振动模拟。此外，通过将VMP方法与相干模式分解相结合，我们将其应用扩展到部分相干SR光束，从而能够全面分析振动退相干、位置振动以及实验采样频率的振动影响。

data.title: Molten pool dynamic behavior simulation in vertical ultrasonic vibration laser welding of 7075 aluminum alloy
data.author: YouYu Wang, YanFeng Gao, DongLin Tao, PengXu Wang, FeiYu Zhao, Hua Zhang
data.summary: Ultrasonic vibration laser welding is an emerging welding technology that can effectively suppress the formation of weld porosity in aluminum alloys. However, the effect of ultrasonic vibration on the dynamic behavior of the molten pool is unclear. In this study, the molten pool dynamic behavior during vertical ultrasonic vibration laser beam welding of 7075 aluminum alloy was simulated. The results show that in non-vibration welding, positive pressure appears in the front of keyhole, which makes the keyhole form a wasp-waist-like structure and easily break into small parts. In vibration welding, positive pressure appears at the bottom of keyhole, and the average value of positive pressure decreases and then increases when the vibration frequency of the laser beam focus increases from 20 to 50 kHz. This pressure distribution makes the keyhole more stable and inhibits the formation of pores. However, too high vibration frequency of the laser beam focus may have a negative effect on the keyhole formation. The results of the study help to understand the mechanism of the formation of porosity during the ultrasonic vibration laser beam welding process.
data.title_cn: 7075铝合金立式超声振动激光焊接熔池动态行为模拟
data.abstract_cn: 超声波振动激光焊接是一种新兴的焊接技术，可以有效抑制铝合金焊缝气孔的形成。然而，超声振动对熔池动态行为的影响尚不清楚。在这项研究中，模拟了7075铝合金垂直超声振动激光束焊接过程中的熔池动态行为。结果表明，无振动焊接时，匙孔前方出现正压力，使匙孔形成黄蜂腰状结构，容易破碎成小零件。振动焊接时，匙孔底部出现正压力，当激光束焦点的振动频率从20 kHz增加到50 kHz时，正压力平均值先减小后增大。这种压力分布使锁孔更加稳定并抑制孔隙的形成。然而，激光束焦点的振动频率过高可能会对小孔形成产生负面影响。研究结果有助于理解超声振动激光束焊接过程中气孔形成的机理。

data.title: Reflective FSM microscan MWIR image super-resolution with TV–AG joint regularization
data.author: Jingwen Miao, Guoliang Tang, Wenli Wu, Shouzheng Zhu, Shuaishuai Chen, Wencong Wang, Tongxu Zhang, Guan Lian, Qiyin Cui, Chunlai Li, Jianyu Wang
data.summary: Infrared imaging plays a fundamental role in commercial aerospace applications, providing reliable sensing under challenging conditions such as nighttime or cloudy weather. The spatial resolution of infrared images, however, remains constrained by payload size, power consumption, and detector performance. In this study, we developed and realized a high-resolution mid-wave infrared imaging system based on a reflective microscan mechanism with a fast-steering mirror for precise sub-pixel displacements, integrated with a multi-frame super-resolution reconstruction method. An explicit degradation and downsampling model incorporating sub-pixel shifts is formulated and solved via a joint total variation (TV)–alternating gradient (AG) regularization strategy, where TV suppresses high-frequency noise and AG enhances directional weak edges characteristic of infrared targets. By integrating these strategies, the reconstruction simultaneously reduces noise, preserves weak directional edges, and mitigates the impact of sub-pixel motion errors. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed approach enhances spatial resolution and edge fidelity, highlighting its practical value for compact commercial aerospace infrared payloads.
data.title_cn: 具有 TV-AG 联合正则化的反射式 FSM 微扫描 MWIR 图像超分辨率
data.abstract_cn: 红外成像在商业航空航天应用中发挥着基础作用，可在夜间或多云天气等挑战性条件下提供可靠的传感。然而，红外图像的空间分辨率仍然受到有效载荷大小、功耗和探测器性能的限制。在这项研究中，我们开发并实现了一种基于反射微扫描机制的高分辨率中波红外成像系统，该系统具有用于精确亚像素位移的快速转向镜，并与多帧超分辨率重建方法集成。通过联合全变分（TV）-交替梯度（AG）正则化策略，制定并解决了包含子像素移位的显式退化和下采样模型，其中TV抑制高频噪声，AG增强红外目标的方向性弱边缘特征。通过集成这些策略，重建可以同时减少噪声、保留弱方向边缘并减轻亚像素运动误差的影响。实验结果表明，所提出的方法提高了空间分辨率和边缘保真度，突出了其对于紧凑型商业航空航天红外有效载荷的实用价值。

data.title: Accurate small-sample prediction of ultra-fast laser cutting quality for quartz pendulous via WGAN-augmented ANN
data.author: Weifeng Ma, Ruishi Wang, Xiangtao Yu, Feng Tian, Mandun Niu, Lirong Qiu, Kejun Shang, Jiliang Yang
data.summary: The quartz pendulous, serving as the core component of the quartz flexible accelerometer, requires controlled fabrication to enhance accelerometer performance and enable effective error compensation. However, achieving rapid and controlled machining quality presents considerable challenges due to the complex interactions between laser parameters during ultra-fast laser processing. While artificial neural network (ANN) offers potential for nonlinear optimization, they typically demand large datasets to ensure prediction accuracy. To overcome the limitation imposed by the need for extensive sample data, an orthogonal experimental design was adopted to obtain 16 original datasets. An approach using Wasserstein generative adversarial networks (WGANs)-augmented ANN was applied, where high-fidelity synthetic data generated by the WGAN augmented the dataset. Training the ANN on this augmented data enabled the precise establishment of relationships between process parameters and key cutting quality metrics—taper angle and surface roughness. On the training set and the test set, the taper angle R 2 increased by 10.25% and 5.85%, respectively. The roughness R 2 shows a significant gain, increasing by 209.32% on the training set and by 38.80% on the test set. Rigorous validation with what we believe are five novel process parameter sets demonstrated robust generalization, yielding average relative errors of 3.682% for taper angle and 1.655% for roughness against experimental measurements. These results confirm the method’s efficacy for accurate quality prediction using minimal data, enabling accelerated process optimization and precision control for ultra-fast laser machining.
data.title_cn: 通过 WGAN 增强的 ANN 准确小样本预测石英摆的超快激光切割质量
data.abstract_cn: 石英摆作为石英柔性加速度计的核心部件，需要控制制造以提高加速度计的性能并实现有效的误差补偿。然而，由于超快激光加工过程中激光参数之间复杂的相互作用，实现快速且受控的加工质量面临着相当大的挑战。虽然人工神经网络 (ANN) 提供了非线性优化的潜力，但它们通常需要大型数据集来确保预测准确性。为了克服需要大量样本数据所带来的限制，采用正交实验设计获得了16个原始数据集。应用了一种使用 Wasserstein 生成对抗网络 (WGAN) 增强 ANN 的方法，其中 WGAN 生成的高保真合成数据增强了数据集。利用这些增强数据训练人工神经网络，能够精确建立工艺参数和关键切割质量指标（锥角和表面粗糙度）之间的关系。在训练集和测试集上，锥角R 2 分别增加了10.25%和5.85%。粗糙度R 2 显示出显着的增益，在训练集上增加了209.32%，在测试集上增加了38.80%。我们认为五种新颖的工艺参数集经过严格验证，证明了稳健的概括性，相对于实验测量，锥角的平均相对误差为 3.682%，粗糙度的平均相对误差为 1.655%。这些结果证实了该方法能够使用最少的数据进行准确的质量预测，从而实现超快激光加工的加速过程优化和精确控制。

data.title: Adaptive phase aberration correction in off-axis digital holographic microscopy using distance-field-weighted Zernike fitting
data.author: Xinlei Lu, Chenhao Ma, Ping Gong, Hongteng Lu, Lixia Shao, Siying Qin
data.summary: This paper proposes a numerical method based on distance-field weighting and Zernike fitting for aberration correction in digital holographic microscopy (DHM) systems. The core method involves generating an adaptive weighting scheme from a distance field to guide Zernike polynomial fitting. This approach preserves the intrinsic sample phase in object regions, ensures smooth background transition, and achieves precise aberration correction while mitigating bias from sample phase contamination. Experiments conducted on a USAF 1951 resolution target, plastic microspheres, and live yeast cells demonstrate that, compared to direct Zernike polynomial fitting, the proposed method achieves more accurate phase reconstruction of the measured objects with reduced errors.
data.title_cn: 使用距离场加权 Zernike 拟合对离轴数字全息显微镜进行自适应相位像差校正
data.abstract_cn: 本文提出了一种基于距离场加权和泽尼克拟合的数值方法，用于数字全息显微镜（DHM）系统中的像差校正。核心方法涉及从距离场生成自适应加权方案以指导泽尼克多项式拟合。这种方法保留了物体区域中的固有样品相，确保平滑的背景过渡，并实现精确的像差校正，同时减轻样品相污染造成的偏差。在 USAF 1951 分辨率目标、塑料微球和活酵母细胞上进行的实验表明，与直接 Zernike 多项式拟合相比，所提出的方法可以实现更准确的被测物体相位重建，同时减少误差。

data.title: Directional consistency of dark-field illumination for defect images
data.author: Shaowen Wang, Lan Wu, Jianfeng Zheng, Shiwei Guo, Shiling Wang, Dong Liu
data.summary: Scratch defects in dark-field imaging exhibit directional characteristics, with variations in incident light angles causing significant differences in images. This poses a challenge for the detection of randomly oriented scratches, as the illumination method directly impacts the missed detection and detection repeatability. The study establishes a dark-field imaging model, which is based on the finite-difference time-domain method. By varying illumination directions and superimposing uni-directional incoherent illumination imaging data, the dark-field images of scratches under both line-scan and annular light sources are obtained. The relationships between imaging intensities and imaging widths of scratches with incident angles are analyzed, which can quantify the directional consistency. Simulation results reveal that increasing the number of illumination beams effectively reduces fluctuations in both imaging intensity and imaging width, thereby improving the dark-field imaging consistency. Notably, annular light sources with odd-numbered beams offer an advantage in imaging consistency over the even-numbered configurations. The trend of the experimental results using dark-field systems is in accord with the simulations. A comparative analysis of defect detection between line-scan and annular light sources confirms that the annular source has superior performance in defect detectability.
data.title_cn: 缺陷图像暗场照明的方向一致性
data.abstract_cn: 暗场成像中的划痕缺陷表现出方向性特征，入射光角度的变化会导致图像的显着差异。这对随机定向划痕的检测提出了挑战，因为照明方法直接影响漏检和检测重复性。研究建立了基于时域有限差分法的暗场成像模型。通过改变照明方向并叠加单向非相干照明成像数据，获得线扫描和环形光源下划痕的暗场图像。分析划痕成像强度和成像宽度与入射角的关系，可以量化方向一致性。仿真结果表明，增加照明光束数量可以有效降低成像强度和成像宽度的波动，从而提高暗场成像的一致性。值得注意的是，具有奇数光束的环形光源比偶数配置在成像一致性方面具有优势。使用暗场系统的实验结果的趋势与模拟一致。对线扫描光源和环形光源缺陷检测的对比分析证实，环形光源在缺陷检测能力方面具有优越的性能。

data.title: Multiscale measurement for infrared suppression ratio of SPFs-integrated EUV collectors by a weighted harmonic mean integral
data.author: Hao Jin, Yuejing Qi, Jing Ma, Wei Qi, Bokai Su, Xin Zhou, Ziang Zhao, Tianwei Xu
data.summary: Infrared (IR) suppression is essential for extreme ultraviolet (EUV) lithography systems. This study establishes a method for predicting the global infrared suppression ratio (IRSR) of EUV collectors from local IRSR values, based on a weighted harmonic mean integral framework. To enable reliable local IRSR measurement, the challenge of spectral leakage inherent in finite-spot illumination on large-period gratings is analyzed and overcome by identifying optimal illumination conditions that balance spatial resolution and signal integrity. A dedicated optical system is implemented to execute this localized measurement strategy. The proposed method enables detailed assessment of IRSR performance and uniformity across the collector surface, offering practical insights for manufacturing tolerance specification and optimization of the collector-SPFs collaborative design.
data.title_cn: 通过加权调和平均积分对集成 SPF 的 EUV 收集器的红外抑制比进行多尺度测量
data.abstract_cn: 红外 (IR) 抑制对于极紫外 (EUV) 光刻系统至关重要。本研究建立了一种基于加权调和平均积分框架，根据局部 IRSR 值预测 EUV 收集器的全局红外抑制比 (IRSR) 的方法。为了实现可靠的局部 IRSR 测量，通过确定平衡空间分辨率和信号完整性的最佳照明条件来分析和克服大周期光栅上有限点照明固有的光谱泄漏挑战。采用专用光学系统来执行这种局部测量策略。所提出的方法能够详细评估集热器表面的 IRSR 性能和均匀性，为制造公差规范和集热器-SPF 协作设计的优化提供实用见解。

data.title: Comparative analysis of diode-pumped 3-μm Er:YLF lasers at cryogenic and room temperatures
data.author: Nikolay Ter-Gabrielyan, Viktor Fromzel, Mark Dubinskii
data.summary: The performances of the diode-pumped CW and free running pulsed (Q-CW) 3-μm Er:YLF lasers, operating at room and cryogenic temperatures (RT and LNT), were compared theoretically and experimentally. It is shown that cryogenic cooling considerably enhances laser output power and efficiency in both modes of operation. On the other hand, our prediction for a Q-switched mode is that cryogenic performance can be so severely limited by amplified spontaneous emission (for some gain element designs) that the RT Q-switching may result in substantially higher pulse energies, albeit at lower efficiency.
data.title_cn: 低温和室温下二极管泵浦 3 μm Er:YLF 激光器的比较分析
data.abstract_cn: 对在室温和低温（RT 和 LNT）下工作的二极管泵浦 CW 和自由运行脉冲 (Q-CW) 3 μm Er:YLF 激光器的性能进行了理论和实验比较。结果表明，低温冷却在两种操作模式下都显着提高了激光输出功率和效率。另一方面，我们对 Q 开关模式的预测是，低温性能可能会受到放大自发发射（对于某些增益元件设计）的严重限制，以至于 RT Q 开关可能会导致更高的脉冲能量，尽管效率较低。

data.title: Supercontinuum generation in 1-decanol
data.author: Nathan G. Drouillard, Jacob A. Stephen, Chathurangani Jayalath Arachchige, Jeet Shannigrahi, T. J. Hammond
data.summary: Although solids have been recently used in ultrafast experiments for spectral broadening due to their relatively high nonlinearity, their sensitivity to damage limits their long-term stability. Liquids are a possible alternative to solids as a nonlinear medium because of their comparable nonlinearity and resistance to permanent damage. We generate a supercontinuum in 1-decanol that spans from approximately 450 nm to 950 nm. We measure the nonlinear index of refraction of 1-decanol and find a significant n 4 contribution. This contribution leads to a nonlinearity comparable to CS 2 (a frequent reference for nonlinear optics) in high-intensity regimes while being significantly less volatile and toxic. We find this supercontinuum spectrum to be stable for at least 30 minutes.
data.title_cn: 1-癸醇中的超连续谱产生
data.abstract_cn: 尽管固体最近由于其相对较高的非线性而被用于超快光谱展宽实验，但它们对损伤的敏感性限制了它们的长期稳定性。液体作为非线性介质可能替代固体，因为它们具有相当的非线性和抗永久损坏的能力。我们在 1-癸醇中生成了一个跨度约为 450 nm 至 950 nm 的超连续谱。我们测量了 1-癸醇的非线性折射率并发现了显着的 n 4 贡献。这种贡献导致在高强度条件下产生与 CS 2（非线性光学的常见参考）相当的非线性，同时挥发性和毒性显着降低。我们发现这个超连续谱至少可以稳定 30 分钟。

data.title: Multi-mode vector vortex beams generation enabled by a rotatable D 2 NN
data.author: Huijun Hu, Gongyuan Wang, Le Wang, Shengmei Zhao
data.summary: In this work, we introduce a rotatable diffractive deep neural network (R-D 2 NN) architecture that enables the generation of multi-mode vector vortex beams (VVBs) through controlled rotation of its diffractive layers. This reconfigurable design allows a single physical device to transform an input Gaussian beam into diverse VVB outputs without the need for retraining. The system simultaneously produces orthogonally polarized optical fields carrying distinct orbital angular momentum (OAM) modes, which are coherently superposed to form target VVBs. The vectorial nature and topological charges of the generated beams are verified via Stokes parameter measurements. Numerical simulations demonstrate the generation of up to 16-mode VVBs with a mode purity exceeding 99% using five diffractive layers. Furthermore, we experimentally realize a proof-of-concept two-layer system using a single spatial light modulator (SLM) with two specific architectures, achieving an average mode purity of 85%. The proposed architecture provides a training-free, single-element solution for high-fidelity dynamic VVBs generation, promising for applications in advanced optical communications and sensing.
data.title_cn: 由可旋转 D 2 神经网络实现的多模矢量涡旋光束生成
data.abstract_cn: 在这项工作中，我们引入了一种可旋转衍射深度神经网络（R-D 2 NN）架构，该架构能够通过其衍射层的受控旋转来生成多模矢量涡旋光束（VVB）。这种可重新配置的设计允许单个物理设备将输入高斯光束转换为不同的 VVB 输出，而无需重新训练。该系统同时产生携带不同轨道角动量（OAM）模式的正交偏振光场，这些光场相干叠加形成目标VVB。所生成光束的矢量性质和拓扑电荷通过斯托克斯参数测量进行验证。数值模拟表明，使用五个衍射层可生成多达 16 模 VVB，其模式纯度超过 99%。此外，我们使用具有两种特定架构的单个空间光调制器 (SLM) 实验性地实现了概念验证的两层系统，实现了 85% 的平均模式纯度。所提出的架构为高保真动态 VVB 生成提供了免训练的单元件解决方案，有望在先进光通信和传感领域得到应用。

data.title: Depth-of-field extension method for telecentric structured light based on dual-viewpoint stitching
data.author: Fanwei Jiao, Li Da, Xing Zhao
data.summary: Structured light technique is widely used in three-dimensional (3D) reconstruction and measurement with the advantages of high precision and efficiency. However, traditional telecentric structured light systems are limited by optical configurations and depth-of-field (DOF) constraints, making it difficult to achieve large-scale height reconstruction. To address this challenge, this paper proposes a dual-viewpoint stitching method to extend the DOF of the telecentric system. First, the two camera viewpoints are vertically shifted using a displacement stage while maintaining a common focal region to capture images and point clouds at different height positions. Then, we propose a pre-calibrated point cloud stitching method leveraging the geometric consistency of telecentric lenses, which determines and optimizes the stitching matrix for point clouds within the common focal region of the dual viewpoints using standard components. This pre-calibrated method effectively eliminates the need for object feature point clouds and multiple registrations. Finally, the point clouds obtained at different height positions are stitched together using the stitching matrix, thereby achieving dual-viewpoint stitching and extending the DOF range. Experiments demonstrate that the DOF is extended to 1.7 times the original range, with relative errors of repeated measurements within 0.12%. The proposed method extends the DOF range while preserving high measurement precision and significantly improving stitching efficiency, showing excellent engineering applicability.
data.title_cn: 基于双视点拼接的远心结构光景深扩展方法
data.abstract_cn: 结构光技术具有高精度、高效率的优点，广泛应用于三维（3D）重建和测量。然而，传统的远心结构光系统受到光学配置和景深（DOF）的限制，难以实现大规模高度重建。为了应对这一挑战，本文提出了一种双视点拼接方法来扩展远心系统的自由度。首先，使用位移台垂直移动两个相机视点，同时保持公共焦点区域以捕获不同高度位置的图像和点云。然后，我们提出了一种利用远心镜头的几何一致性的预校准点云拼接方法，该方法使用标准组件确定和优化双视点公共焦点区域内的点云拼接矩阵。这种预校准方法有效地消除了对物体特征点云和多次配准的需要。最后，利用拼接矩阵将不同高度位置获得的点云拼接在一起，从而实现双视点拼接，扩展自由度范围。实验表明，自由度扩大到原来范围的1.7倍，重复测量相对误差在0.12%以内。该方法扩展了自由度范围，同时保持了较高的测量精度，并显着提高了拼接效率，表现出良好的工程适用性。

data.title: Is the orbital angular momentum spectrum of an optical vortex beam propagating in isotropic turbulence symmetrically distributed?
data.author: Yizhou Liu, Mulin Yu, Yakun Wang, Yonglei Liu, Yahong Chen, Dan Wu, Haiyun Wang, Fei Wang
data.summary: The propagation of optical vortex beams through atmospheric turbulence is pivotal for orbital-angular-momentum (OAM)-based free-space optical communications and remote sensing. It has long been known that owing to the turbulence-induced phase aberration, a propagating vortex beam results in modal scattering and distortions and its power will spread uniformly onto neighboring OAM modes. However, some studies reported a contradictory result that the scattering OAM modes take precedence over the side near the OAM mode with topological charge l = 0, resulting in the asymmetric distribution of the OAM spectrum. Here, we present a detailed theoretical analysis to explain the physical mechanism that leads to the above contradiction. We show that the asymmetry of the OAM spectrum of a vortex beam propagating in atmospheric turbulence is a universal phenomenon arising from the interaction between beam diffraction and turbulence, while neglecting the aforementioned interaction, the OAM spectrum becomes symmetrically distributed. We further carry out proof-of-principle experiments to demonstrate the validity of our theoretical analysis and find a good agreement between the experimental results and theoretical predictions. Our findings are of great help to the in-depth understanding of interactions of atmospheric turbulence and OAM beams.
data.title_cn: 在各向同性湍流中传播的光学涡旋光束的轨道角动量谱是否对称分布？
data.abstract_cn: 光学涡旋光束通过大气湍流的传播对于基于轨道角动量（OAM）的自由空间光通信和遥感至关重要。人们早就知道，由于湍流引起的相位畸变，传播的涡旋光束会导致模态散射和畸变，并且其功率将均匀地传播到相邻的 OAM 模式上。然而，一些研究报告了一个矛盾的结果，即散射OAM模式优先于拓扑电荷l = 0的OAM模式一侧，导致OAM谱的不对称分布。在这里，我们提出了详细的理论分析来解释导致上述矛盾的物理机制。我们发现，在大气湍流中传播的涡旋光束的 OAM 谱的不对称性是由光束衍射和湍流之间的相互作用引起的普遍现象，而忽略上述相互作用，OAM 谱变得对称分布。我们进一步进行了原理验证实验，以证明我们理论分析的有效性，并发现实验结果与理论预测之间具有良好的一致性。我们的研究结果对于深入理解大气湍流与OAM光束的相互作用有很大帮助。

data.title: L-Band widely tunable laser and high gain semiconductor optical amplifier based on heterogeneous integration of III-V on silicon
data.author: Guobiao Tang, Haibo Kuang, Yao Fu, Shiao Zhao, Yu Zhang, Jian Wang
data.summary: L-Band on-chip heterogeneous integration lasers and semiconductor optical amplifiers (SOA) are important silicon photonics components in many applications such as light detection and ranging (LiDAR) and optical communications in data center interconnects. In this work, we demonstrate an L-band widely tunable laser and a high gain SOA on a III-V/Si integration platform. The laser gives a tuning range of 43 nm with side-mode suppression ratio > 45 dB, and output power of 9.15 mW, while the SOA shows a small-signal gain of 21 dB and a saturation output power of 13 dBm. The SOA and laser share the same III-V epitaxial wafer structure and a common fabrication process, which benefits the high-density components integration and reduces costs greatly in many applications.
data.title_cn: 基于硅上III-V族异质集成的L波段宽可调谐激光器和高增益半导体光放大器
data.abstract_cn: L 波段片上异构集成激光器和半导体光放大器 (SOA) 是许多应用中重要的硅光子元件，例如光探测和测距 (LiDAR) 以及数据中心互连中的光通信。在这项工作中，我们在 III-V/Si 集成平台上演示了 L 波段宽可调激光器和高增益 SOA。该激光器的调谐范围为 43 nm，边模抑制比 > 45 dB，输出功率为 9.15 mW，而 SOA 的小信号增益为 21 dB，饱和输出功率为 13 dBm。 SOA和激光器共享相同的III-V族外延片结构和共同的制造工艺，这有利于高密度元件集成并在许多应用中大大降低成本。

data.title: Influence of mechanical resonances on the linearity of adiabatic frequency conversion in whispering gallery resonators
data.author: Alexander Mrokon, Till Wachweger, Dongsung Shin, Karsten Buse, Ingo Breunig
data.summary: Adiabatic frequency conversion enables fast and efficient tuning of laser light by coupling it into an optical resonator whose eigenfrequency is varied on a timescale shorter than its photon lifetime. In this regime, the optical frequency follows the cavity resonance, allowing frequency shifts of several hundred gigahertz within sub-microsecond time - independent of optical power and without phase-matching constraints. While a linear dependence of the cavity resonance on a control parameter (e.g., applied voltage) suggests that arbitrary temporal signals could be linearly transferred to optical frequency changes, we show that this assumption fails near mechanical resonances of the resonator. Using a millimeter-sized lithium niobate whispering gallery resonator with a pronounced mechanical mode at a center frequency of 10.5 MHz, we observe strong deviations from linearity even when higher harmonics of the control signal coincide with this resonance. The experimental results are in excellent agreement with theoretical predictions. They demonstrate that mechanical resonances impose intrinsic limits on the linearity of adiabatic frequency conversion and other frequency control schemes based on the variation of the eigenfrequency of an optical cavity.
data.title_cn: 机械谐振对回音壁谐振器绝热变频线性度的影响
data.abstract_cn: 绝热频率转换通过将激光耦合到光学谐振器中来实现激光的快速有效调谐，该光学谐振器的特征频率在比其光子寿命更短的时间尺度上变化。在这种情况下，光频率遵循腔谐振，允许在亚微秒时间内实现数百千兆赫的频移 - 与光功率无关，并且没有相位匹配限制。虽然腔谐振对控制参数（例如施加电压）的线性依赖性表明任意时间信号可以线性转移到光学频率变化，但我们表明这种假设在谐振器的机械谐振附近失败。使用中心频率为 10.5 MHz 且具有明显机械模式的毫米级铌酸锂回音壁谐振器，即使控制信号的高次谐波与该谐振一致，我们也观察到线性度的强烈偏差。实验结果与理论预测非常吻合。他们证明，机械共振对绝热频率转换和其他基于光学腔本征频率变化的频率控制方案的线性度施加了内在限制。

data.title: Compressed-sensing enabled forward-viewing M-mode OCT for large field of view imaging
data.author: Aidan M. Therien, Jonah A. Majumder, Manuel J. Jerome, Danyang Cheng, Christine P. Hendon
data.summary: We present a method for generating large field of view three-dimensional images with a forward-viewing M-mode optical coherence tomography (OCT) probe that combines electromagnetic tracking with a compressed-sensing iterative soft-thresholding algorithm (CS-ISTA). Phantom and ex-vivo porcine studies demonstrate accurate 3D reconstruction of undersampled volumes and high-contrast tissue sample attenuation maps that delineate pulmonary vein from atrial tissue through blood, with an 88% compression rate with respect to Nyquist. This approach delivers the speed and image quality needed to guide radio-frequency ablation and other catheter-based interventions.
data.title_cn: 用于大视场成像的压缩感知前视 M 模式 OCT
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种使用前视 M 模式光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 探头生成大视场三维图像的方法，该探头将电磁跟踪与压缩感知迭代软阈值算法 (CS-ISTA) 相结合。体模和离体猪研究证明了欠采样体积的精确 3D 重建和高对比度组织样本衰减图，描绘了从心房组织到血液的肺静脉，相对于奈奎斯特压缩率为 88%。这种方法提供了指导射频消融和其他基于导管的干预措施所需的速度和图像质量。

data.title: 3D focusing through scattered light using a binary hologram
data.author: Meigang Duan, Jing Wang, Xiaojin Yin, Naikui Ren, Jizhou Wu, Chenlong Zhang, Qifeng Zhang, Jie Ma
data.summary: Due to the support of scattering wavefront shaping technology, scattering medium (SM) have significant potential in large-capacity, high-fidelity and crosstalk-free three-dimensional (3D) holographic projections. Here, an accumulation of multiplication algorithm (AOMA) was proposed to calculate binary holograms, so that the intensity distribution of 3D space can be simultaneously modulated behind SM using a hologram. In particular, AOMA is free from the need for signal feedback. It is simple and efficient to generate binary holograms with multiplication and addition. Experiments demonstrate that the intensity of axial four planes can be controlled simultaneously with a binary hologram, and the proposed AOMA is able to achieve high-fidelity four-plane focusing in the different modulation elements. Moreover, a wide-angle holographic focusing on two planes is also presented with a binary hologram in the high-dimensional modulation elements. To explore the anti-noise ability of AOMA, we further demonstrate 3D focusing performance with high-dimensional binary holograms at different interference environment. These advancements are expected to be beneficial to generate holograms for 3D scattering-enabled holographic projections.
data.title_cn: 使用二元全息图通过散射光进行 3D 聚焦
data.abstract_cn: 由于散射波前整形技术的支持，散射介质（SM）在大容量、高保真和无串扰的三维（3D）全息投影方面具有巨大潜力。这里，提出了乘法累积算法（AOMA）来计算二元全息图，以便可以使用全息图在SM之后同时调制3D空间的强度分布。特别是，AOMA 不需要信号反馈。通过乘法和加法生成二元全息图既简单又高效。实验表明，可以用二元全息图同时控制轴向四个平面的强度，并且所提出的AOMA能够在不同的调制元件中实现高保真四平面聚焦。此外，在高维调制元件中还以二元全息图呈现聚焦在两个平面上的广角全息。为了探索 AOMA 的抗噪声能力，我们进一步展示了高维二值全息图在不同干扰环境下的 3D 聚焦性能。这些进步预计将有利于为支持 3D 散射的全息投影生成全息图。

data.title: Deep learning enabled inverse design of ultracompact silicon metadevices for mode conversion
data.author: Weifeng Jiang, Lin Zhang, Zhengguo Han, Zihan Xiang, Yatai Gao, Zhongmao Cai, B. M. Azizur Rahman
data.summary: Deep learning has shown great potential for enabling the rapid inverse-design of high-performance photonic devices. In this work, we develop a forward prediction and inverse design platform for silicon metadevices for mode conversion using deep neural networks (DNNs). The performances of twenty silicon-based mode converters are predicted by using this platform, with a prediction time of just 5 ms and a root mean square error (RMSE) of less than 0.018. Five silicon-based mode converters were inverse-designed using DNN, achieving an ultracompact dimension of only 4.08 µm × 1.68 µm and a design time of only 10 ms. Experimental results verified the performance of the inversely designed devices and compared them with their forward predictions. The measured insertion losses deviated from the desired and predicted values by less than 0.887 and 0.878 dB, respectively. The DNN-based forward prediction and inverse design approach enables the rapid development of highly integrated and high-performance silicon-based mode converters, providing key components for mode-division multiplexing systems.
data.title_cn: 深度学习实现了用于模式转换的超紧凑硅元器件的逆向设计
data.abstract_cn: 深度学习在实现高性能光子器件的快速逆向设计方面显示出了巨大的潜力。在这项工作中，我们开发了一个用于硅元设备的正向预测和逆向设计平台，用于使用深度神经网络（DNN）进行模式转换。利用该平台对20种硅基模式转换器的性能进行了预测，预测时间仅为5 ms，均方根误差(RMSE)小于0.018。使用DNN对五个硅基模式转换器进行逆向设计，实现了仅4.08 µm × 1.68 µm的超紧凑尺寸，设计时间仅为10 ms。实验结果验证了逆向设计器件的性能，并将其与正向预测进行了比较。测量的插入损耗与期望值和预测值的偏差分别小于 0.887 和 0.878 dB。基于DNN的正向预测和逆向设计方法能够快速开发高集成度、高性能的硅基模式转换器，为模分复用系统提供关键组件。

data.title: Calibration-free single-shot imaging of an axially moving object beyond the optical memory effect through a scattering medium
data.author: Liang Huang, Jiapeng Cai, Xiang Peng, Wenqi He
data.summary: Image degradation caused by light scattering makes it challenging to gather information about an object, especially when it extends beyond the region of the optical memory effect (OME), and even more so for a moving object rushing across a wide area. In the latter case, a speckle pattern is synthesized, which is usually regarded as a combination of a series of time-varying speckle patterns. Each of them is a convolution of the object’s ideal image and the point spread function (PSF) associated with a corresponding OME region. Specifically, suppose a small object moves axially over a relatively long distance under the illumination of a narrow-banded incoherent light. In this case, the imaging system is composed of a sequence of linear shift-invariant (LSI) systems. Theoretical analysis reveals that discarding the amplitude component of the dynamic system’s equivalent optical transfer function (E-OTF) enables calibration-free object retrieval while simultaneously reducing noise. This insight helps us to retrieve the shape of the rapidly moving object (though not its trajectory) from a synthesized speckle captured in a single shot. Note that we also further demonstrate the feasibility of retrieving an axially moving small object even under white light illumination.
data.title_cn: 通过散射介质对超出光学记忆效应的轴向移动物体进行免校准单次成像
data.abstract_cn: 光散射引起的图像质量下降使得收集物体信息变得困难，特别是当物体超出光学记忆效应 (OME) 区域时，对于冲过广阔区域的移动物体来说更是如此。在后一种情况下，合成散斑图案，通常将其视为一系列时变散斑图案的组合。它们中的每一个都是对象的理想图像和与相应 OME 区域相关的点扩散函数 (PSF) 的卷积。具体来说，假设一个小物体在窄带非相干光的照射下轴向移动相对较长的距离。在这种情况下，成像系统由一系列线性平移不变（LSI）系统组成。理论分析表明，丢弃动态系统等效光学传递函数（E-OTF）的幅度分量可以实现免校准目标检索，同时降低噪声。这种见解有助于我们从单次拍摄中捕获的合成散斑中检索快速移动物体的形状（尽管不是其轨迹）。请注意，我们还进一步证明了即使在白光照明下检索轴向移动的小物体的可行性。

data.title: Nonreciprocal quantum sensing via directional squeezing in two coupled microring resonators
data.author: Zhuang Xu, Chengdeng Gou, Guang-Ming Huang, Gao-Xiang Li
data.summary: We propose a scheme for nonreciprocal quantum rotation sensing in two coupled microring resonators, one of which rotates in a clockwise direction. Driving the rotating resonator in two directions induces the opposite Sagnac-Fizeau shifts. By pumping the other nonlinear resonator via classical field, directional squeezing is generated along the pump direction due to the phase-matching condition, which leads to an asymmetric detuning and chiral photon interaction between the two resonators. As a result, the estimation of the Sagnac-Fizeau shift is shown to be nonreciprocal, i.e., the estimation precision is dramatically enhanced for the forward-input case, where most of the accessible information is predominantly stored in the primary resonator, but not for the backward-input one. Further, we evaluate the performance of several Gaussian measurements and analyze how measurements of the second-order coherence g (2) (0) can extract quantum-enhanced information and improve measurement precision. The proposed scheme offers what we believe to be a new perspective for the design of a nonreciprocal quantum gyroscope.
data.title_cn: 通过两个耦合微环谐振器中的定向挤压进行非互易量子传感
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种在两个耦合微环谐振器中进行非互易量子旋转传感的方案，其中一个微环谐振器沿顺时针方向旋转。在两个方向上驱动旋转谐振器会引起相反的萨尼亚克-斐索位移。通过经典场泵浦另一个非线性谐振器，由于相位匹配条件，沿泵浦方向产生定向挤压，这导致两个谐振器之间的不对称失谐和手性光子相互作用。结果，萨格纳克-斐索位移的估计被证明是不可逆的，即，对于前向输入情况，估计精度显着提高，其中大多数可访问信息主要存储在主谐振器中，但对于后向输入情况则不然。此外，我们评估了几种高斯测量的性能，并分析了二阶相干性 g (2) (0) 的测量如何提取量子增强信息并提高测量精度。我们认为所提出的方案为非互易量子陀螺仪的设计提供了新的视角。

data.title: End-to-end snapshot metalens spectral imaging based on deep unfolding half-shuffle transformer network
data.author: Feng Huang, Yizhong Wu, Maijie Cao, Zhou Wu, Wen Tang, Jinping Li, Weijie Chang, Shengyao Xu
data.summary: End-to-end computational spectral imaging based on metalens, which enables compact spectral imaging systems by co-optimization of optical encoder and computational decoder, has attracted extensive attention. However, traditional end-to-end spectral imaging systems typically employ pure data-driven convolutional neural networks (CNN) that ignore physical priors of the imaging process and long-range dependencies, limiting high-precision spectral reconstruction. In this paper, we propose and experimentally demonstrate an end-to-end snapshot metalens spectral imaging based on a physics-driven deep unfolding half-shuffle Transformer network. By unfolding the iterative process of traditional optimization algorithms into a cascaded network structure, we not only integrate the advantages of adaptive feature learning neural network and physical model, but also introduce the physical priors of optical-encoder into the network to allow physically-consistent reconstruction process. Besides, a multi-head self-attention mechanism half-shuffle Transformer network is utilized to extract both local and global information. In this way, we achieve stronger generalization and higher reconstruction quality compared with traditional CNN-based reconstruction methods. We designed and fabricated the metalens, achieving high-fidelity spectral image reconstruction across 25 channels (430-670 nm) at a spatial resolution of 512 × 512 with an average peak signal-to-noise ratio (PSNR) of 42.87 dB, while preserving rich spatial details compared with state-of-the-art (SOTA) methods. Our proposed framework facilitates full interaction between the encoder and the decoder, boosting the power of joint optimization in end-to-end design, and paves a way for the design of miniaturized spectral imaging metalenes.
data.title_cn: 基于深度展开半洗牌变压器网络的端到端快照超透镜光谱成像
data.abstract_cn: 基于超透镜的端到端计算光谱成像，通过光学编码器和计算解码器的共同优化实现紧凑的光谱成像系统，引起了广泛的关注。然而，传统的端到端光谱成像系统通常采用纯数据驱动的卷积神经网络（CNN），忽略成像过程的物理先验和远程依赖性，限制了高精度光谱重建。在本文中，我们提出并实验演示了一种基于物理驱动的深度展开半洗牌 Transformer 网络的端到端快照超透镜光谱成像。通过将传统优化算法的迭代过程展开为级联网络结构，我们不仅集成了自适应特征学习神经网络和物理模型的优点，还将光学编码器的物理先验引入到网络中，以实现物理一致的重建过程。此外，利用多头自注意力机制半洗牌变压器网络来提取局部和全局信息。通过这种方式，与传统的基于 CNN 的重建方法相比，我们获得了更强的泛化能力和更高的重建质量。我们设计并制造了超透镜，以 512 × 512 的空间分辨率实现了 25 个通道 (430-670 nm) 的高保真光谱图像重建，平均峰值信噪比 (PSNR) 为 42.87 dB，同时与最先进的 (SOTA) 方法相比保留了丰富的空间细节。我们提出的框架促进了编码器和解码器之间的充分交互，增强了端到端设计中联合优化的能力，并为小型化光谱成像元烯的设计铺平了道路。

data.title: Experimental and numerical analysis of thermal lensing effects in Nd:YVO 4
data.author: Merle Schneewind, Phillip Booker, Sergii Iakushev, Stefan Spiekermann, Peter Wessels, Jörg Neumann, Dietmar Kracht
data.summary: The power dependent wavefront distortions in a Nd:YVO 4 laser amplifier were analyzed using a 976 nm probe beam. The experimental results were in excellent agreement with a numerical thermo-optical model based on split-step Fourier propagation. Although direct pumping at 878.6 nm was used, the quantum defect was identified as the dominant heat source (99 % of total heat) while energy transfer upconversion and fluorescence quenching have only a local contribution. As a result, the thermal lens reached 14 dpt dioptric power at 43 W output power (46 % efficiency). Apart from the defocus, astigmatism and spherical aberrations were identified as main components of the thermal lens.
data.title_cn: Nd:YVO 4 热透镜效应的实验和数值分析
data.abstract_cn: 使用 976 nm 探测光束分析 Nd:YVO 4 激光放大器中与功率相关的波前畸变。实验结果与基于分步傅里叶传播的数值热光模型非常吻合。尽管使用了 878.6 nm 的直接泵浦，但量子缺陷被认为是主要热源（占总热量的 99%），而能量转移上转换和荧光猝灭仅具有局部贡献。结果，热透镜在 43 W 输出功率（46% 效率）下达到了 14 dpt 屈光度。除了散焦之外，像散和球面像差也被认为是热透镜的主要组成部分。

data.title: Continuous distributed temperature monitoring of a long laser-cooled rare-earth-doped glass rod
data.author: M. Aïssaoui, T. Meyneng, A. Roberge, Y. Messaddeq, R. Kashyap
data.summary: This study presents the continuous measurement of the temperature distribution along a length of rod-shaped glass sample cooled by anti-Stokes fluorescence. The technique uses a random optical grating by ultraviolet or ultrafast laser exposure (ROGUE) written in standard SMF-28, interrogated by optical frequency-domain reflectometry (OFDR). Milli-Kelvin resolution with millimeter spatial resolution is demonstrated over 15 cm of sensing length. Comparisons with an FLIR camera and a point fiber Bragg grating sensor show improved performance for monitoring long lengths of laser-cooled samples, and show its potential as a valuable tool for monitoring the temperature distribution in radiation-balanced or high-power fiber/rod lasers and amplifiers.
data.title_cn: 长激光冷却稀土掺杂玻璃棒的连续分布式温度监测
data.abstract_cn: 本研究提出了沿反斯托克斯荧光冷却的棒状玻璃样品长度方向的温度分布的连续测量。该技术使用以标准 SMF-28 编写的紫外或超快激光曝光 (ROGUE) 随机光栅，并通过光学频域反射计 (OFDR) 进行询问。在 15 厘米的传感长度上展示了毫开尔文分辨率和毫米空间分辨率。与 FLIR 相机和点光纤布拉格光栅传感器的比较表明，其在监测长长度激光冷却样品方面的性能得到了改善，并显示出其作为监测辐射平衡或高功率光纤/棒激光器和放大器中温度分布的有价值工具的潜力。

data.title: Spatio-temporal microfluidic reconstruction via compressive dark-field digital holography
data.author: Zhou Ge, Chuchu Rong, Jingyuan Zhu, Famin Wang, Wenjing Zhou, Yingjie Yu
data.summary: Digital holography is a powerful technique for the four-dimensional (4D) spatio-temporal reconstruction of microparticles in microfluidic systems, which is crucial for applications in fluid dynamics and biology. However, the accuracy of conventional in-line holography is often hindered by significant background noise and artifacts. To overcome these limitations, we propose what is believed to be a novel compressive dark-field digital holography (CD-DH) method. This approach integrates a dark-field operation to enhance the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) by suppressing background interference, and leverages compressed sensing (CS) with a total variation (TV) regularization constraint to computationally eliminate the twin image problem, enabling high-precision 4D reconstruction from a sequence of consecutively recorded holograms. We systematically validated the performance of our method through simulations and experiments. In simulations, CD-DH reduced the mean absolute error (MAE) and root mean square error (RMSE) of particle localization by approximately 67.9% and 67.5%, respectively, compared to the conventional back-propagation (BP) algorithm. Experimentally, when analyzing polystyrene microspheres in a uniform flow, our method achieved a velocity measurement error of 2%, a stark improvement over the error from the BP method. Furthermore, in a non-uniform flow within a Y-shaped microfluidic chip, our technique effectively removed background artifacts and accurately reconstructed particle trajectories and velocity fields that align well with Poiseuille flow theory. These results demonstrate that CD-DH is a robust and precise tool, providing powerful technical support for the quantitative visualization of complex micro-scale flow phenomena.
data.title_cn: 通过压缩暗场数字全息术进行时空微流体重建
data.abstract_cn: 数字全息术是一种强大的技术，可用于微流体系统中微粒的四维 (4D) 时空重建，这对于流体动力学和生物学的应用至关重要。然而，传统的同轴全息术的准确性常常受到显着的背景噪声和伪影的阻碍。为了克服这些限制，我们提出了一种被认为是新颖的压缩暗场数字全息（CD-DH）方法。该方法集成了暗场操作，通过抑制背景干扰来增强信噪比 (SNR)，并利用压缩感知 (CS) 和全变分 (TV) 正则化约束来通过计算消除孪生图像问题，从而能够从一系列连续记录的全息图进行高精度 4D 重建。我们通过模拟和实验系统地验证了我们方法的性能。在模拟中，与传统的反向传播（BP）算法相比，CD-DH 将粒子定位的平均绝对误差（MAE）和均方根误差（RMSE）分别降低了约 67.9% 和 67.5%。实验上，当分析均匀流动的聚苯乙烯微球时，我们的方法实现了 2% 的速度测量误差，比 BP 方法的误差有了明显的改善。此外，在 Y 形微流控芯片内的非均匀流动中，我们的技术有效地消除了背景伪影，并准确地重建了与泊肃叶流理论非常吻合的粒子轨迹和速度场。这些结果表明CD-DH是一种强大而精确的工具，为复杂微尺度流动现象的定量可视化提供了强大的技术支持。

data.title: Near-diffraction-limited, high-energy, electro-optically Q-switched Nd:YAG Innoslab laser based on a slab BBO Pockels cell
data.author: Jinxin Chen, Gang Cheng, Yajun Wu, Xi Chen, Xiaonan Zhao, Huihui Gao, Linhao Shang, Pan Liu, Yibin Fu, Guangqiang Fan, Tianshu Zhang, Xinhui Sun, Wenqing Liu
data.summary: For Pockels cells required by high-energy lasers, the current mainstream design adopts a square aperture. Pockels cells assembled with slab-shaped electro-optic crystals are a more suitable choice for Nd:YAG Innoslab hybrid cavities that directly output large single-pulse energies or for ring-cavity regenerative amplifiers with large cavity-mode size. This study constructs a Pockels cell using a single large slab-shaped BBO crystal, focusing on enhancing electric field uniformity within the crystal and reducing assembly stress, thereby achieving consistent optical field modulation across the entire aperture. The experiment first tested the extinction ratio, conoscopic interference pattern, and extracavity modulation characteristics of the electro-optic switch. The developed Pockels cell was then applied to a continuously pumped and pulsed-pumped Nd:YAG hybrid cavity laser. During continuous pumping, we attained an output power of 37.54 W, a repetition rate of 2 kHz, and a pulse width of 6.5 ns. During the pulsed pump, we also obtained an output energy of 21.3 mJ with a repetition rate of 100 Hz and a pulse width of 7.77 ns. Both of these results exhibited near-diffraction-limited beam output. Given the performance verification of the proposed packaging in our work, we expect this high-performance Pockels cell to provide support for the advancement of integrated optical laser systems and high-resolution metrology.
data.title_cn: 基于平板 BBO 普克尔斯盒的近衍射极限、高能、电光 Q 开关 Nd:YAG Innoslab 激光器
data.abstract_cn: 对于高能激光器所需的普克尔斯盒，目前主流设计采用方形孔径。由板状电光晶体组装而成的泡克尔斯盒更适合直接输出大单脉冲能量的 Nd:YAG Innoslab 混合腔或具有大腔模尺寸的环腔再生放大器。本研究利用单个大板状BBO晶体构建了普克尔斯盒，重点是增强晶体内的电场均匀性并减少组装应力，从而实现整个孔径上一致的光场调制。实验首先测试了电光开关的消光比、锥光干涉图样和外腔调制特性。然后将开发的普克尔斯盒应用于连续泵浦和脉冲泵浦 Nd:YAG 混合腔激光器。在连续泵浦过程中，我们获得了 37.54 W 的输出功率、2 kHz 的重复频率和 6.5 ns 的脉冲宽度。在脉冲泵浦期间，我们还获得了 21.3 mJ 的输出能量，重复率为 100 Hz，脉冲宽度为 7.77 ns。这两个结果都表现出接近衍射极限的光束输出。鉴于我们工作中所提出的封装的性能验证，我们期望这种高性能普克尔斯盒能够为集成光学激光系统和高分辨率计量学的进步提供支持。

data.title: Conical second-harmonic generation via cooperation of Bragg diffraction and birefringent phase matching
data.author: Dan Wei, Yuntao Mo, Zikun Chen, Yadong Wei, Xinyu Liu, Jinghua Sun, Dunzhao Wei
data.summary: The generation of conical beams is a significant nonlinear phenomenon that arises from noncollinear phase-matching configuration. However, previous studies have primarily concentrated on the generation of such beams within crystals with modulated second-order nonlinear coefficients. In this work, we experimentally observed even-order conical second-harmonic generation (SHG) within a single lithium niobate crystal with the spatial refractive index modulated by femtosecond laser writing (FLW). These conical SHG were attributed to the cooperation of linear Bragg diffraction and birefringent phase matching (BPM), facilitated by the scattering of fundamental waves within the nonlinear photonic crystal. Furthermore, overlapping of adjacent even-order conical rings could be used to enhance the SHG at odd-order diffraction, attributed to the noncollinear BPM scheme. Lastly, we verified the positively correlation between the power of conical SHG and the corresponding fundamental diffraction by altering the FLW energy. Our results unveil a new method to generate multiple short-wavelength conical beams, which serve as an effective tool for light scattering studies.
data.title_cn: 通过布拉格衍射和双折射相位匹配的配合产生锥形二次谐波
data.abstract_cn: 锥形光束的产生是一种由非共线相位匹配配置引起的显着非线性现象。然而，之前的研究主要集中在具有调制二阶非线性系数的晶体内生成此类光束。在这项工作中，我们通过实验观察了单个铌酸锂晶体内的偶次锥形二次谐波产生（SHG），其空间折射率由飞秒激光写入（FLW）调制。这些圆锥形二次谐波归因于线性布拉格衍射和双折射相位匹配（BPM）的配合，这是由非线性光子晶体内基波的散射所促进的。此外，由于非共线 BPM 方案，相邻偶数阶锥形环的重叠可用于增强奇数阶衍射时的倍频。最后，我们通过改变FLW能量验证了锥形SHG的功率与相应的基本衍射之间的正相关性。我们的研究结果揭示了一种产生多个短波长锥形光束的新方法，可作为光散射研究的有效工具。

data.title: Widely tunable narrow-linewidth mode-locked fiber laser via inter-cavity field interference
data.author: Zhihui Yang, Yuan Tang, Ruiming Wang, Yulong Tang
data.summary: A widely and continuously tunable narrow-linewidth mode-locked fiber laser is reported with a record pulse-duration tuning range from 342 ps to 4.02 ns. This is realized through mode-locking a fiber laser intra-cavity coupled to a high-Q aluminum-nitride microresonator. By controlling inter-cavity fields interference, the microresonator acts as an active filter, allowing the spectral linewidth of the fiber laser to be tunable from 1.34 GHz to 122 MHz. The compressed laser linewidth of 122 MHz is three times narrower than the microresonator’s 370-MHz intrinsic resonance bandwidth. This kind of mode-locked fiber lasers with large and continuous tuning ranges in both linewidth and pulse duration not only provide a new mechanism for linewidth narrowing but also have application potentials in various areas like LiDAR, spectroscopy, and quantum optics.
data.title_cn: 通过腔间场干涉的宽可调窄线宽锁模光纤激光器
data.abstract_cn: 据报道，一种广泛且连续可调谐的窄线宽锁模光纤激光器具有创纪录的脉冲持续时间调谐范围，从 342 ps 到 4.02 ns。这是通过耦合到高 Q 值氮化铝微谐振器的腔内光纤激光器锁模来实现的。通过控制腔间场干扰，微谐振器充当有源滤波器，允许光纤激光器的光谱线宽在 1.34 GHz 至 122 MHz 之间可调。 122 MHz 的压缩激光线宽比微谐振器 370 MHz 固有谐振带宽窄三倍。这种线宽和脉冲持续时间都具有大且连续调谐范围的锁模光纤激光器不仅为线宽窄化提供了新的机制，而且在激光雷达、光谱学和量子光学等多个领域具有应用潜力。

data.title: Demonstration of D-band photonic-assisted terahertz IQ-Mixer wireless communication employing LS-MRC technology with over 2 dB gain
data.author: Ye Zhou, Jianjun Yu, Jiali Chen, Qinyi Zhang, Xin Lu, Hansong Ma, Sicong Xu, Yifan Chen, Hanyu Zhang, Zhongxiao Pei, Zhihang Ou, Yubin Zhang, Xin Shi, Kaihui Wang, Wen Zhou
data.summary: As the demand for higher data throughput continues to grow, next-generation wireless communication systems are expected to deliver per-link data rates in the range of tens to hundreds of gigabits per second. Photon-assisted generation of terahertz (THz) signals can support larger modulation bandwidths in future ultrahigh-speed wireless communication systems. Orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDM) has emerged as a promising candidate for future THz communication systems owing to its capability to combat frequency-selective fading and suppress inter-symbol interference (ISI). The least-squares (LS) method is widely used for channel estimation due to its simplicity and low computational complexity. However, it is highly sensitive to noise and interference, resulting in limited estimation accuracy. In this work, we proposed an LS maximum ratio combining (MRC) scheme that combines the SNRs of I- and Q-branch pilot-based channel estimations using the MRC technique to enhance the accuracy of channel estimation and equalization. We experimentally demonstrate 16-GBaud QPSK wireless transmission over 4.6 km at 137.5 GHz using a photon-assisted terahertz IQ-mixer communication system. By employing LS-MRC, we achieve more than 2 dB gain, significantly improving link performance. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first experimental demonstration of high-gain performance achieved through the use of I/Q mixer and LS-MRC techniques in a D-band terahertz communication system.
data.title_cn: 演示采用增益超过 2 dB 的 LS-MRC 技术的 D 波段光子辅助太赫兹 IQ-Mixer 无线通信
data.abstract_cn: 随着对更高数据吞吐量的需求不断增长，下一代无线通信系统预计将提供每秒数十至数百吉比特的每链路数据速率。光子辅助生成太赫兹（THz）信号可以支持未来超高速无线通信系统中更大的调制带宽。正交频分复用（OFDM）因其对抗频率选择性衰落和抑制符号间干扰（ISI）的能力而成为未来太赫兹通信系统的有希望的候选者。最小二乘法（LS）由于其简单性和计算复杂度低而被广泛用于信道估计。然而，它对噪声和干扰高度敏感，导致估计精度有限。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种LS最大比组合（MRC）方案，该方案使用MRC技术组合I分支和Q分支基于导频的信道估计的SNR，以提高信道估计和均衡的准确性。我们使用光子辅助太赫兹 IQ 混频器通信系统，通过实验演示了 137.5 GHz 下 4.6 公里范围内的 16 GBaud QPSK 无线传输。通过采用 LS-MRC，我们实现了超过 2 dB 的增益，显着提高了链路性能。据我们所知，这是通过在 D 波段太赫兹通信系统中使用 I/Q 混频器和 LS-MRC 技术实现高增益性能的首次实验演示。

data.title: Suppressing optical crosstalk in microLED arrays for AR displays: a simulation and design study
data.author: Shuming Zhang, Jiahao Kang, Chengzhe Chai, Pengfei Li, Liang Zhang, Shulin Chen, Runan Zhang, Fan Gong, Lei Zhao, Shuang Wang, Chaohao Wang, Ze Yuan
data.summary: MicroLED displays designed for augmented reality (AR) demand high light extraction efficiency (LEE), strong emission directionality, and minimal optical crosstalk to ensure superior image quality. In this work, we develop a comprehensive finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) simulation framework to investigate crosstalk suppression via device architecture modifications. We introduce the collimation efficiency (CE) as a key metric for AR systems. A thinned n-GaN layer with a reflective cup eliminates primary crosstalk from sidewalls and waveguiding. A subsequent thick microlens layer further boosts the primary pixel’s CE to 15.57%. This optimized architecture reduces the effective crosstalk to 0.77%, providing an effective design strategy for AR displays.
data.title_cn: 抑制 AR 显示器 microLED 阵列中的光学串扰：模拟和设计研究
data.abstract_cn: 专为增强现实 (AR) 设计的 MicroLED 显示器需要高光提取效率 (LEE)、强发射方向性和最小的光学串扰，以确保卓越的图像质量。在这项工作中，我们开发了一个全面的时域有限差分 (FDTD) 仿真框架，以研究通过设备架构修改来抑制串扰。我们引入准直效率（CE）作为 AR 系统的关键指标。带有反射杯的薄 n-GaN 层消除了来自侧壁和波导的主要串扰。随后的厚微透镜层进一步将主像素的 CE 提高到 15.57%。这种优化的架构将有效串扰降低至0.77%，为AR显示提供了有效的设计策略。

data.title: Exceptional-point-enhanced rotation sensing with improved robustness and real-frequency splitting
data.author: Lingyu Li, Ying Wang, Liu Yang, Jingtong Geng, Zhan Liu, Shunlin Liu, Yonggang Zhang
data.summary: Optical gyroscopes measure angular velocity based on the Sagnac effect. However, the resonance frequency splitting induced by this effect is proportional to the physical size of the device, which poses constraints on the integration of the system. In non-Hermitian systems, exceptional points (EPs) exhibit extreme sensitivity to small perturbations, offering great potential for the development of high-sensitivity sensors. This study proposes a non-Hermitian gyroscope design that is easy to implement and offers high degrees of freedom. In this scheme, frequency splitting can be tuned by adjusting the phase shift, while the introduction of gain enhances the magnitude of frequency splitting without inducing lasing. This mechanism offers critical support for achieving ultra-precise rotational sensing. Theoretical analysis indicates that, compared to the classical Sagnac effect, the frequency splitting enhancement can exceed seven orders of magnitude at a rotation rate of 0.01°/h.
data.title_cn: 具有改进的鲁棒性和实频分裂的特点增强旋转传感
data.abstract_cn: 光学陀螺仪根据萨尼亚克效应测量角速度。然而，这种效应引起的谐振频率分裂与器件的物理尺寸成正比，这对系统的集成造成了限制。在非厄米系统中，异常点（EP）对小扰动表现出极高的敏感性，为高灵敏度传感器的开发提供了巨大的潜力。这项研究提出了一种易于实现并提供高自由度的非厄米陀螺仪设计。在该方案中，可以通过调整相移来调谐分频，同时增益的引入增强了分频的幅度而不引起激光。该机制为实现超精确旋转传感提供了关键支持。理论分析表明，与经典萨尼亚克效应相比，在0.01°/h的旋转速率下，分频增强可超过7个数量级。

data.title: Lightweight scale-enhanced neural network-based optimized detection for bandwidth-limited IM/DD systems
data.author: Fei Xie, Hao Zhou, Yingjie Jiang, Hengying Xu, Chenglin Bai, Yaojun Qiao
data.summary: In this Letter, we propose a lightweight and efficient optimized detection scheme based on a lightweight scale-enhanced neural network (LSE-NN) for receiver digital signal processing (DSP) in bandwidth-limited intensity modulation and direct detection (IM/DD) transmission systems. The proposed LSE-NN-based scheme comprises three main components: input preprocessing via 2-tap scale-enhanced low-pass filtering, an NN-based lookup table (NN-LUT), and a neural network-based log-maximum à posteriori (MAP) decoder with a fixed number of surviving states (NN-MAP). The scheme is implemented in a 122-Gbps optical IM/DD system employing 4-level pulse amplitude modulation (PAM-4) over a 2-km transmission distance, with a 10-dB bandwidth of 15 GHz. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed LSE-NN-MAP scheme improves receiver sensitivity by 2.4 dB while reducing computational complexity by more than 98.44% compared to conventional optimized detection, achieving the 7% forward error correction (FEC) threshold. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first demonstration of a lightweight and efficient neural network architecture employed for optimized detection in IM/DD systems.
data.title_cn: 针对带宽有限的 IM/DD 系统的基于轻量级增强神经网络的优化检测
data.abstract_cn: 在这封信中，我们提出了一种基于轻量级规模增强神经网络（LSE-NN）的轻量级高效优化检测方案，用于带宽有限强度调制和直接检测（IM/DD）传输系统中的接收器数字信号处理（DSP）。所提出的基于 LSE-NN 的方案包括三个主要组件：通过 2 阶尺度增强低通滤波进行输入预处理、基于 NN 的查找表 (NN-LUT) 以及具有固定数量的生存状态 (NN-MAP) 的基于神经网络的对数最大后验 (MAP) 解码器。该方案在 122 Gbps 光学 IM/DD 系统中实现，该系统采用 4 级脉冲幅度调制 (PAM-4)，传输距离为 2 公里，带宽为 15 GHz 的 10 dB。实验结果表明，与传统的优化检测相比，所提出的LSE-NN-MAP方案将接收灵敏度提高了2.4 dB，同时计算复杂度降低了98.44%以上，实现了7%的前向纠错（FEC）阈值。据我们所知，这是用于 IM/DD 系统优化检测的轻量级高效神经网络架构的首次演示。

data.title: Orbital mode structure of random vectorial light beams
data.author: Jyrki Laatikainen, Olga Korotkova
data.summary: A characterization of a structured, stationary light beam having any distributions of polarization and orbital angular momentum states is proposed via the second-order correlation of its polarization-orbitalization tensor recently introduced for treating harmonic, vectorial light beams. We show that the tensor correlation can be decomposed into pure and completely mixed states in its polarization projection and into pure, partially mixed, and completely mixed states in its orbitalization projection. We also illustrate the behavior of the polarization and orbitalization metrics, derived from these correlations, by numerical examples.
data.title_cn: 随机矢量光束的轨道模式结构
data.abstract_cn: 通过最近引入用于处理谐波矢量光束的偏振轨道化张量的二阶相关性，提出了具有任意偏振和轨道角动量状态分布的结构化静止光束的表征。我们证明张量相关性在其偏振投影中可以分解为纯态和完全混合态，在其轨道化投影中可以分解为纯态、部分混合态和完全混合态。我们还通过数值示例说明了从这些相关性导出的偏振和轨道化度量的行为。

data.title: Efficient neural network equalization via automatic grouping-enabled non-uniform quantization for 120-Gb/s PAM-8 DML-based IM/DD links
data.author: Cancan Chen, Zhaopeng Xu, Qi Wu, Tonghui Ji, Honglin Ji, Zhongliang Sun, Linsheng Fan, Junpeng Liang, Jianwei Tang, Jinlong Wei, Yuan Jiang, Zhixue He, Weisheng Hu
data.summary: An automatic grouping-enabled non-uniform quantization (AGNQ) approach is proposed for efficient neural network (NN) equalization in a 120 Gb/s 10 km directly modulated laser (DML)-based PAM-8 intensity-modulation/direct-detection (IM/DD) system. Compared with traditional uniform quantized feedforward neural network (UQ-FNN) and the additive power-of-two quantized FNN (APoT-FNN) approaches, AGNQ-FNN achieves comparable bit error rate (BER) performance below the 7% hard-decision forward error correction (HD-FEC) threshold using only 4-bit weight and bias quantization, whereas UQ-FNN and APoT-FNN require 10-bit and 8-bit quantization, respectively. Furthermore, when approaching the BER performance of an un-quantized FNN baseline, AGNQ-FNN reduces weight and bias memory usage by 47.9% and 35.5% compared with UQ-FNN and APoT-FNN, respectively. These results highlight the potential of AGNQ-FNN as a hardware-friendly equalizer for high-speed short-reach optical communication systems.
data.title_cn: 通过自动分组非均匀量化实现基于 120 Gb/s PAM-8 DML 的 IM/DD 链路的高效神经网络均衡
data.abstract_cn: 提出了一种支持自动分组的非均匀量化 (AGNQ) 方法，用于在基于 120 Gb/s 10 km 直接调制激光 (DML) 的 PAM-8 强度调制/直接检测 (IM/DD) 系统中实现高效神经网络 (NN) 均衡。与传统的均匀量化前馈神经网络 (UQ-FNN) 和加性二次幂量化 FNN (APoT-FNN) 方法相比，AGNQ-FNN 仅使用 4 位权重和偏置量化即可实现低于 7% 硬决策前向纠错 (HD-FEC) 阈值的可比误码率 (BER) 性能，而 UQ-FNN 和 APoT-FNN 需要 10 位和 8 位量化，分别。此外，当接近未量化 FNN 基线的 BER 性能时，AGNQ-FNN 与 UQ-FNN 和 APoT-FNN 相比，权重和偏差内存使用量分别减少了 47.9% 和 35.5%。这些结果凸显了 AGNQ-FNN 作为高速短距离光通信系统的硬件友好型均衡器的潜力。

data.title: High-gain U-band discrete Raman amplifier for multi-band optical transmission systems
data.author: Dini Pratiwi, Daniele Orsuti, Mingming Tan, Ben. J. Puttnam, Ruben S. Luis, Aleksandr Donodin, Ian Phillips, Luca Palmieri, Hideaki Furukawa, Wladek Forysiak
data.summary: We experimentally demonstrate a set of U-band discrete Raman amplifiers using backward incoherent pumping in 1 km HNLF, achieving up to 22.3 dB net gain, and 4.2–5.8 dB NF. Three different types of Raman gain fiber have been investigated, including 1 km HNLF, 0.51 km HNLDSF, 8 km and 7.6 km IDF. Using HNLF achieved the highest gain and the lowest NF, while using 8 km IDF yielded up to 16.2 dB net gain and a minimum of 6.3 dB NF due to its low Raman gain coefficient and higher fiber loss. Using 0.51 km HNLDSF gave up to 21 dB net gain, but at a cost of over 8.1 dB noise figure. These amplifiers were incorporated in a C + L + U-band coherent transmission system using 516 × 24.5GBd DP-64/256QAM channels over 50 km SSMF. We achieved a maximum decoded data rate of 123.5Tb/s across C + L + U bands, with 25.6Tb/s specifically in the U-band (1625–1650 nm).
data.title_cn: 用于多波段光传输系统的高增益 U 波段分立拉曼放大器
data.abstract_cn: 我们通过实验演示了一组在 1 km HNLF 中使用后向非相干泵浦的 U 波段离散拉曼放大器，实现了高达 22.3 dB 的净增益和 4.2–5.8 dB NF。研究了三种不同类型的拉曼增益光纤，包括 1 km HNLF、0.51 km HNLDSF、8 km 和 7.6 km IDF。使用 HNLF 实现了最高的增益和最低的噪声系数，而使用 8 km IDF 则由于拉曼增益系数较低和光纤损耗较高，可产生高达 16.2 dB 的净增益和最小 6.3 dB 的噪声系数。使用 0.51 km HNLDSF 可获得高达 21 dB 的净增益，但代价是超过 8.1 dB 的噪声系数。这些放大器被纳入使用 516 × 24.5GBd DP-64/256QAM 通道、超过 50 km SSMF 的 C + L + U 波段相干传输系统。我们在 C + L + U 频段上实现了 123.5Tb/s 的最大解码数据速率，特别是在 U 频段 (1625–1650 nm) 中达到了 25.6Tb/s。

data.title: Pinhole-free point-diffraction dynamic phase imaging using focused white-light Sagnac interferometry
data.author: Ana Karen Reyes, Jose Escamilla Angeles, Noel-Ivan Toto-Arellano
data.summary: In this research, we present a convergent-beam white-light Sagnac interferometer that produces point-diffraction-like interference without a pinhole, achieving single-shot quantitative phase imaging (QPI). A sample placed at the focal plane asymmetrically modifies the counter-propagating beams, intrinsically generating a quasi-spherical reference and a sample-modulated wave. This configuration recreates the behavior of point-diffraction interferometry while preserving common-path stability, broadband compatibility, and high throughput. A Michelson-type replicator produces single-shot capture of four spatially separated interferograms with controlled 2π/3 phase shifts, captured by a color CMOS sensor; statistical analysis confirmed the green channel as the most reliable. The system successfully retrieves static and dynamic phase distributions in thin films, alcohol evaporation, and candle flames, demonstrating a robust platform for single-shot, high-sensitivity QPI of transparent samples.
data.title_cn: 使用聚焦白光萨格纳克干涉测量法进行无针孔点衍射动态相位成像
data.abstract_cn: 在这项研究中，我们提出了一种会聚光束白光萨格纳克干涉仪，它可以产生无针孔的点衍射式干涉，从而实现单次定量相位成像（QPI）。放置在焦平面上的样本不对称地修改反向传播的光束，本质上生成准球形参考和样本调制波。这种配置重现了点衍射干涉测量的行为，同时保留了公共路径稳定性、宽带兼容性和高吞吐量。迈克尔逊型复制器可单次捕获四个空间分离的干涉图，这些干涉图具有受控的 2π/3 相移，由彩色 CMOS 传感器捕获；统计分析证实绿色通道是最可靠的。该系统成功地检索了薄膜、酒精蒸发和蜡烛火焰中的静态和动态相分布，展示了用于透明样品的单次、高灵敏度 QPI 的强大平台。

data.title: Soliton self-frequency shift in hollow-core fiber for bright femtosecond radiation tunable across the short-wavelength infrared
data.author: Markus Lippl, Martin Butryn, Nicolas Y. Joly, Francesco Tani
data.summary: We report a fiber-based source of femtosecond radiation that is spectrally tunable in the short-wavelength infrared region, delivering average powers at the multi-watt level. The system utilizes self-soliton frequency shifting in a hydrogen-filled hollow-core fiber, producing pulse trains at 1.1 MHz with integrated relative intensity noise below 0.3% and a polarization extinction ratio of 30 dB. This source constitutes an efficient and valid fiber-based alternative to optical parametric amplifiers for a variety of applications, including THz generation, multiphoton imaging, and high-harmonic generation.
data.title_cn: 空心光纤中的孤子自频移可在短波长红外范围内调谐明亮的飞秒辐射
data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了一种基于光纤的飞秒辐射源，该辐射源可在短波长红外区域进行光谱调谐，提供数瓦级别的平均功率。该系统利用充氢空心光纤中的自孤子频移，产生 1.1 MHz 的脉冲序列，集成相对强度噪声低于 0.3%，偏振消光比为 30 dB。该光源构成了光学参量放大器的高效且有效的基于光纤的替代方案，适用于各种应用，包括太赫兹生成、多光子成像和高次谐波生成。

data.title: Tailoring phase domains and properties of transparent Y 2 O 3 –MgO composites via powder morphology design
data.author: Xincheng Cai, Zhenyu Zhang, Junjing Duan, Zhangyi Huang, Lexing Liang, Mao Deng, Linxuan Han, Xu Huang, Jianqi Qi, Tiecheng Lu
data.summary: While spherical powders are typically favored for enhanced sintering activity, highly transparent Y 2 O 3 –MgO ceramics have recently been fabricated using rod-like powders. The underlying mechanisms by which powder morphology influences the final microstructure and properties remain unclear. This study reveals that spherical powders yield spherical-phase domains and high mid-wave infrared transmittance (~84% at 3 μm). In contrast, rod-like powders promote elongated phase domains and a higher long-wave infrared transmittance (~82% at 8 μm) with a broader transmission window. Both composites exceed 85% (~6 μm) transmittance (theoretical maximum ~86%). Optical tailoring is attributed to the interplay of Mie scattering, carbon contamination, intrinsic phonon absorption mechanisms, and pinning effect. Composites from rod-like powders also exhibit finer grains and higher hardness (11.3 GPa vs. 10.2 GPa), consistent with the Hall–Petch relationship. This work demonstrates that powder morphology design enables concurrent optimization of performance in transparent materials, offering a general strategy for advanced ceramic engineering.
data.title_cn: 通过粉末形貌设计调整透明 Y 2 O 3 -MgO 复合材料的相域和性能
data.abstract_cn: 虽然球形粉末通常有利于增强烧结活性，但最近已经使用棒状粉末制造了高度透明的 Y 2 O 3 -MgO 陶瓷。粉末形态影响最终微观结构和性能的潜在机制仍不清楚。这项研究表明，球形粉末产生球形相域和高中波红外透射率（3 μm 时约为 84%）。相比之下，棒状粉末可延长相域，并具有更高的长波红外透射率（8 μm 处约 82%）以及更宽的透射窗。两种复合材料的透射率均超过 85% (~6 μm)（理论最大值~86%）。光学剪裁归因于米氏散射、碳污染、固有声子吸收机制和钉扎效应的相互作用。由棒状粉末制成的复合材料还表现出更细的晶粒和更高的硬度（11.3 GPa 与 10.2 GPa），与 Hall-Petch 关系一致。这项工作表明，粉末形态设计能够同时优化透明材料的性能，为先进陶瓷工程提供了总体策略。

data.title: Sub-Doppler spectroscopy of the strontium intercombination line in a microfabricated vapor cell
data.author: Yang Li, John Kitching, Matthew T. Hummon
data.summary: We report a 100 kHz linewidth for the 1 S 0 to 3 P 1 intercombination line of 88 Sr atoms at 689 nm in a microfabricated (9×14×4.4) mm 3 vapor cell. This puts an upper bound on the residual gas pressure in the vapor cell of 10 mTorr. The microfabricated Sr vapor cell offers an inexpensive and scalable way to lock lasers in state-of-the-art cold-atom-based atomic clocks and quantum computing experiments. It also paves the way for compact and precise optical frequency references based on alkaline earth vapor cells.
data.title_cn: 微型蒸汽室中锶复合线的亚多普勒光谱
data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了在微制造的(9×14×4.4) mm 3 蒸气室中88个Sr原子在689 nm处的1 S 0 到3 P 1 互结合线的100 kHz线宽。这使得蒸汽室中的残余气体压力上限为 10 mTorr。微制造的锶蒸气室提供了一种廉价且可扩展的方法，可以在最先进的基于冷原子的原子钟和量子计算实验中锁定激光器。它还为基于碱土蒸气电池的紧凑且精确的光学频率基准铺平了道路。

data.title: An in-band pumped wavelength-tunable high-power narrow-linewidth Er/Yb co-doped fiber amplifier
data.author: Guanzhong Li, Yuexuan Cai, Guohao Fu, Weilong Yu, Pei Li, Dan Li, Qirong Xiao, Ping Yan
data.summary: We report a narrow-linewidth Er/Yb co-doped fiber (EYDF) amplifier tunable from 1570 to 1610 nm with an output power exceeding 330 W and a 3 dB linewidth below 150 pm. It is the highest, to the best of our knowledge, output power for the 1.5 μm-band tunable fiber lasers to date. The maximum output power reached 450 W with the optical efficiency of 35.3% when operating at 1570 nm. The main amplifier was in-band pumped by 1535 nm fiber lasers to avoid 1 μm-band amplified spontaneous emission (ASE). A piece of EYDF was inserted before the main amplifier to filter out the 1.5 μm-band ASE that originated from the pre-amplifiers, which permitted a powerful amplification for all tunable wavelengths without ASE damage. We demonstrated a robust approach for achieving high-power, tunable, narrow-linewidth 1.5 μm-band fiber lasers with high ASE suppression ratios.
data.title_cn: 带内泵浦波长可调高功率窄线宽铒/镱共掺光纤放大器
data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了一种窄线宽铒/镱共掺光纤 (EYDF) 放大器，可在 1570 至 1610 nm 范围内调谐，输出功率超过 330 W，线宽低于 150 pm 3 dB。据我们所知，这是迄今为止 1.5 μm 波段可调谐光纤激光器的最高输出功率。工作波长为1570 nm时，最大输出功率达到450 W，光效率为35.3%。主放大器由 1535 nm 光纤激光器带内泵浦，以避免 1 μm 带放大自发发射 (ASE)。在主放大器之前插入一块 EYDF，以滤除来自前置放大器的 1.5 μm 波段 ASE，从而可以对所有可调谐波长进行强大的放大，而不会损坏 ASE。我们展示了一种稳健的方法，可实现具有高 ASE 抑制比的高功率、可调谐、窄线宽 1.5 μm 波段光纤激光器。

data.title: Polarization-grating-filled Fabry–Perot resonators for optical imprinting of liquid crystals
data.author: Takuto Nakade, Hiroyuki Yoshida
data.summary: Patterned alignment of liquid crystals has been studied actively in recent years to control the behavior of light by the Pancharatnam–Berry phase. While the photoalignment technique easily allows directed alignment by linearly polarized light irradiation, single-exposure methods to achieve patterned alignment are limited. In this article, we propose the utilization of a Fabry–Perot resonator containing a patterned, uniaxially anisotropic medium as a wavelength-selective, polarization filter that duplicates the pattern in the resonator. We experimentally demonstrate single-exposure photoalignment of pattern period 3.5 µm and numerically show that pattern periods as small as 2 µm are feasible using an inexpensive LED light source. The proposed structure thus has application potential as photoalignment exposure masks.
data.title_cn: 用于液晶光学压印的偏振光栅填充法布里-珀罗谐振器
data.abstract_cn: 近年来，人们对液晶的图案化排列进行了积极的研究，以通过 Pancharatnam-Berry 相控制光的行为。虽然光对准技术很容易通过线偏振光照射实现定向对准，但实现图案对准的单次曝光方法受到限制。在本文中，我们建议利用包含图案化单轴各向异性介质的法布里-珀罗谐振器作为波长选择性偏振滤光片，以复制谐振器中的图案。我们通过实验证明了图案周期为 3.5 µm 的单次曝光光对准，并通过数值表明，使用廉价的 LED 光源，小至 2 µm 的图案周期是可行的。因此，所提出的结构具有作为光对准曝光掩模的应用潜力。

data.title: High-temperature behavior of femtosecond FBGs in molten-core glass optical fibers
data.author: Lachlan Anderson, Shreyas J. Kashyap, Maxime Cavillon, Thomas W. Hawkins, Martin Ams, Michael Withford, John Ballato, Matthieu Lancry
data.summary: We demonstrate the thermal stability of femtosecond laser-inscribed fiber Bragg gratings (FBGs) in all-glass fibers fabricated via the molten-core method (MCM), using aluminosilicate, alumino-zirconate, and YAG-based core compositions. These novel fibers exhibit sustained FBG reflection up to 1200°C, which is an improvement of 100°C over standard SMF-28. Thermal degradation of void FBGS in molten-core fiber was analyzed via the Variable Reaction Pathways (VAREPA) framework, yielding activation energy distributions through a master curve formalism. These results highlight the potential of Al 2 O 3 —rich fibers for high-temperature sensing. This work provides a foundation for the development of robust fiber-based sensors for use in aerospace, nuclear, and industrial high-temperature environments.
data.title_cn: 熔芯玻璃光纤中飞秒光纤光栅的高温行为
data.abstract_cn: 我们展示了通过熔芯法 (MCM) 使用硅铝酸盐、铝锆酸盐和 YAG 基芯成分制造的全玻璃光纤中的飞秒激光刻录光纤布拉格光栅 (FBG) 的热稳定性。这些新型光纤在高达 1200°C 的温度下表现出持续的 FBG 反射，比标准 SMF-28 提高了 100°C。通过可变反应路径 (VAREPA) 框架分析了熔芯光纤中空洞 FBGS 的热降解，通过主曲线形式产生活化能分布。这些结果凸显了富含 Al 2 O 3 的纤维用于高温传感的潜力。这项工作为开发用于航空航天、核能和工业高温环境的坚固的光纤传感器奠定了基础。

data.title: Active fiber-loop method for improved performance assessment of Brillouin OTDR systems
data.author: Tim Jungbluth, Jesper B. Christensen, Christian Buntebarth, Thibault North
data.summary: We report on what we belive to be a new fiber-optical measurement artifact used to assess the performance of Brillouin optical time-domain reflectometry (BOTDR) devices. In our proposed configuration, a fast optical switch is employed to significantly reduce the round-trip loss of a fiber loop probed by the BOTDR interrogator. Through a series of experiments, we demonstrate that our modified fiber artifact enables detailed characterization of BOTDR devices, allowing simultaneous assessment of distance-dependent spatial resolution, distance-dependent measurement biases, and system configuration anomalies. Our approach, which can be readily extended to other distributed optical fiber sensing modalities, provides a practical method for validating and benchmarking device performance.
data.title_cn: 用于改进布里渊 OTDR 系统性能评估的有源光纤环路方法
