data.abstract_cn: 我们报告了一种新的光纤测量工件，用于评估布里渊光时域反射计 (BOTDR) 设备的性能。在我们提出的配置中，采用快速光开关来显着降低 BOTDR 询问器探测的光纤环路的往返损耗。通过一系列实验，我们证明了我们改进的光纤工件可以对 BOTDR 设备进行详细表征，从而可以同时评估距离相关的空间分辨率、距离相关的测量偏差和系统配置异常。我们的方法可以很容易地扩展到其他分布式光纤传感模式，为验证和基准测试设备性能提供了一种实用的方法。

data.title: High-efficiency terahertz beam scanning based on topologically optimized freestanding metasurfaces
data.author: Qifan Ding, Jieyang Tang, Jierong Cheng, Shengjiang Chang
data.summary: Dynamic beam scanning is an indispensable technique in the terahertz band, as the terahertz radiation is highly directive to accommodate the path attenuation. Bi-layer passive metasurfaces offer a promising way to tune the beam direction through in-plane relative twisting. However, the energy efficiency is limited due to the doubled insertion loss from two metasurfaces, and the efficiency is unstable during scanning due to the diffraction sensitivity to the metasurface orientation. Here, we propose a pair of metasurfaces to address the efficiency issue through topological optimization and removal of the substrate for better impedance matching. The freeform and freestanding metasurfaces are rotated to generate various moiré patterns and scan the beam within ±55° field of view without apparent sidelobes. The average energy efficiency is 57% with efficiency fluctuation within 13%. The proposed metasurfaces hold broad application prospects in next-generation wireless communication technologies.
data.title_cn: 基于拓扑优化独立式超表面的高效太赫兹光束扫描
data.abstract_cn: 动态光束扫描是太赫兹频段不可或缺的技术，因为太赫兹辐射具有高度的定向性以适应路径衰减。双层无源超表面提供了一种通过面内相对扭曲来调整光束方向的有前途的方法。然而，由于两个超表面的双倍插入损耗，能量效率受到限制，并且由于对超表面方向的衍射敏感性，扫描过程中效率不稳定。在这里，我们提出了一对超表面，通过拓扑优化和去除基板以获得更好的阻抗匹配来解决效率问题。自由形式和独立式超表面旋转以生成各种莫尔图案，并在 ±55° 视场内扫描光束，没有明显的旁瓣。平均能源效率为57%，效率波动在13%以内。所提出的超表面在下一代无线通信技术中具有广阔的应用前景。

data.title: Backscattered Stokes vector angular pattern of individual particles in water
data.author: Weida Xu, Jiawei Li, Yan Chen, Baohui Han, Junwu Tang, Ran Liao, Hui Ma
data.summary: Individual particles’ large-range angular distribution, including scattering angles near 180° of polarized light backscattering, is vital for the bio-optical model of ocean color remote sensing and Lidar. However, its simultaneous acquisition is still challenging. Backscattered Stokes vector angular pattern (BSAP) of individual particles in water is acquired by a conceptual setup with the confocal optical system, covering 112° to 179.5° scattering angles θ s with 0.068° angular resolution and 180° maximal range of azimuthal angles φ s . Microspheres with different sizes and materials are used to calibrate BSAP, together with Mie theory simulations. BSAPs of four kinds of microalgae are measured to characterize their physical properties in detail, on which the impacts of their size, shape, and orientation are explained by the discrete dipole approximation (DDA) simulation.
data.title_cn: 水中单个颗粒的反向散射斯托克斯矢量角模式
data.abstract_cn: 单个粒子的大范围角分布，包括接近 180° 的偏振光反向散射的散射角，对于海洋颜色遥感和激光雷达的生物光学模型至关重要。然而，其同时收购仍然具有挑战性。水中单个颗粒的反向散射斯托克斯矢量角图案 (BSAP) 通过共焦光学系统的概念设置获得，覆盖 112° 至 179.5° 散射角 θ s ，角分辨率为 0.068° ，方位角 φ s 最大范围为 180° 。使用不同尺寸和材料的微球来校准 BSAP，并结合米氏理论模拟。通过测量四种微藻的 BSAP，详细表征其物理特性，并通过离散偶极近似 (DDA) 模拟解释其尺寸、形状和方向对其的影响。

data.title: Pyramidal lens enables mesoscale structured illumination by surpassing the spatial bandwidth limit of spatial light modulators
data.author: Gang Wen, HongJin Li, HaoJie Wang, Qin Ke, JingQian Wang, Xi Zhu, Yin Chen, DaYong Jin, Shih-Chi Chen, Karl Zhanghao
data.summary: Structured illumination has emerged as a pivotal technique in biomedical imaging and machine vision, driving breakthroughs in optical sectioning, super-resolution microscopy, phase imaging, and 3D surface profiling. These applications rely on precise light patterns projected onto samples to extract high-resolution information, where spatial light modulators (SLMs) are widely used for their high speed, precision, and flexibility. However, the limited pixel count of SLMs constrains the spatial bandwidth product (SBP) of structured illumination, creating a tradeoff between the field-of-view (FoV) and spatial resolution. To address this limitation, we develop a mesoscale structured illumination technique that integrates a custom-designed pyramidal lens with an SLM; this technique achieves an unprecedented SBP enhancement of over 100-fold. We demonstrate the generation of mesoscale structured illumination fields containing more than 5000 stripes with a 6-step phase shift using only a 1024-pixel SLM. Leveraging this approach, we further develop a multicolor super-resolution structured illumination microscopy PyramidalSIM, which delivers a reconstructed FoV of 4K pixels and doubled spatial resolution yet utilizes only 609 SLM pixels. Our approach effectively surpasses the intrinsic SBP limitation of SLMs, paving the way for applications such as high-throughput super-resolution imaging and large-scale surface metrology.
data.title_cn: 金字塔形透镜超越空间光调制器的空间带宽限制，实现中尺度结构照明
data.abstract_cn: 结构照明已成为生物医学成像和机器视觉领域的关键技术，推动了光学切片、超分辨率显微镜、相位成像和 3D 表面分析方面的突破。这些应用依赖于投射到样本上的精确光图案来提取高分辨率信息，其中空间光调制器 (SLM) 因其高速、精确和灵活性而被广泛使用。然而，SLM 的有限像素数限制了结构照明的空间带宽积 (SBP)，从而在视场 (FoV) 和空间分辨率之间进行权衡。为了解决这个限制，我们开发了一种中尺度结构照明技术，将定制设计的金字塔透镜与 SLM 集成在一起；该技术史无前例地将 SBP 提高了 100 倍以上。我们演示了仅使用 1024 像素 SLM 生成包含 5000 多个条纹和 6 步相移的中尺度结构化照明场。利用这种方法，我们进一步开发了多色超分辨率结构照明显微镜 PyramidalSIM，它提供了 4K 像素的重建 FoV 和双倍的空间分辨率，但仅利用 609 个 SLM 像素。我们的方法有效地超越了 SLM 固有的 SBP 限制，为高通量超分辨率成像和大规模表面计量等应用铺平了道路。

data.title: All-optical controlled multichannel nonlinear holography for switchable beam shaping in an atomic vapor
data.author: Churong Pan, Huangjie Li, Xuzhe Zhang, Yanzhe Liu, Lianglong Wu, Hao Pang, Haixia Chen, Dong Wei, Hong Gao, Fuli Li
data.summary: Nonlinear holography is a powerful technique for shaping beams at new optical frequencies. Selectively reconstructing target wavefront information from multichannel nonlinear holography is challenging due to the critical phase-matching condition. Herein, we propose a scheme for all-optical controlled multichannel nonlinear holography using four-wave mixing (FWM) in Rb vapor. A dispersion-controlled wavevector was dynamically tuned to achieve a full phase-matching condition for efficient target wavefront reconstruction. We adjusted the frequency and intensity of the control beam to selectively reconstruct annular vortex arrays in the FWM signal. Four switchable holographic channels were established for beam shaping via experimental parameter optimization. Our study demonstrates that the atomic system is ideal for studying nonlinear control of structured light and aids in constructing all-optical multichannel devices for classical and quantum information processing.
data.title_cn: 用于原子蒸气中可切换光束整形的全光控制多通道非线性全息术
data.abstract_cn: 非线性全息术是一种以新的光学频率对光束进行整形的强大技术。由于关键的相位匹配条件，从多通道非线性全息术中有选择地重建目标波前信息具有挑战性。在此，我们提出了一种在铷蒸气中使用四波混频（FWM）的全光控制多通道非线性全息术方案。色散控制的波矢量被动态调谐以实现有效目标波前重建的完全相位匹配条件。我们调整控制光束的频率和强度，以选择性地重建 FWM 信号中的环形涡旋阵列。通过实验参数优化，建立了四个可切换的全息通道用于光束整形。我们的研究表明，原子系统非常适合研究结构光的非线性控制，并有助于构建用于经典和量子信息处理的全光学多通道设备。

data.title: Calibration-free and precise programming of large-scale ring resonator circuits
data.author: Shaojie Liu, Tengji Xu, Benshan Wang, Dongliang Wang, Qiarong Xiao, Li Fan, Chaoran Huang
data.summary: Photonic integrated circuits (PICs) based on microring resonators (MRRs) have shown great promise for optical signal processing and photonic computing. However, programming large-scale MRR circuits with high precision remains a key challenge, as existing approaches require extensive calibration that scales poorly and is sensitive to system imperfections. This work introduces a calibration-free programming method called chip-in-the-loop optimization (ChiL), offering high scalability, precision, efficiency, and robustness. ChiL reduces the calibration complexity for an N -device system from O ( k N ) to O (1). It achieves high programming precision of over 9-bit with a high speed of approximately 10 iterations, even in the presence of fabrication variations, thermal crosstalk, and temperature drift. To show advantages of our method across diverse applications, we experimentally demonstrate a photonic solver for computing matrix eigenvalues and eigenvectors with errors on the order of 10 −4 , and a photonic neural network with accuracy and a confusion matrix identical to those of a digital computer. ChiL offers a practical approach for programming large-scale PICs. It bridges the gap between analog photonic and digital electronic computing in terms of both scale and precision.
data.title_cn: 大规模环形谐振器电路的免校准和精确编程
data.abstract_cn: 基于微环谐振器（MRR）的光子集成电路（PIC）在光信号处理和光子计算方面显示出了巨大的前景。然而，以高精度对大规模 MRR 电路进行编程仍然是一个关键挑战，因为现有方法需要广泛的校准，其扩展性较差并且对系统缺陷敏感。这项工作引入了一种称为芯片在环优化 (ChiL) 的免校准编程方法，提供高可扩展性、精度、效率和鲁棒性。 ChiL 将 N 设备系统的校准复杂度从 O ( k N ) 降低到 O (1)。即使存在制造变化、热串扰和温度漂移，它也能实现超过 9 位的高编程精度和约 10 次迭代的高速。为了展示我们的方法在不同应用中的优势，我们通过实验演示了一个用于计算误差在 10 -4 量级的矩阵特征值和特征向量的光子求解器，以及一个具有与数字计算机相同的精度和混淆矩阵的光子神经网络。 ChiL 提供了一种对大规模 PIC 进行编程的实用方法。它在规模和精度方面弥合了模拟光子计算和数字电子计算之间的差距。

data.title: All-optical noise quenching of an integrated frequency comb
data.author: Grégory Moille, Pradyoth Shandilya, Jordan Stone, Curtis Menyuk, Kartik Srinivasan
data.summary: Integrated frequency combs promise transformation of lab-based metrology into disruptive real-world applications, particularly with octave-spanning microcombs enabling self-referenced optical synthesis and clock implementations. However, the integrated resonators that support microcombs suffer from thermal fluctuations, limiting microcomb use outside laboratories due to the need for bulky feedback systems. Kerr-induced synchronization (KIS) offers a solution by eliminating this electronic servo control through all-optical locking. Here, we show how KIS profoundly alters the noise characteristics of soliton microcombs and enables a small device footprint to be compatible with low-noise operation. The phase locking between the dissipative Kerr soliton (DKS) and the injected reference reduces the tooth-to-tooth pump noise propagation—enabling easier carrier-envelope offset stabilization and uniform spectral performance—while also damping the impact of intracavity fluctuations on the DKS, such as thermo-refractive noise (TRN). Our theoretical and experimental results show that KIS modifies the comb noise elastic-tape model, maintaining comb tooth linewidths comparable to the pump lasers’, unlike single-pumped systems where linewidths increase by orders of magnitude from the comb center to its edges. Additionally, KIS quenches intrinsic noise sources at the soliton decay rate, regardless of laser coherence or microring thermo-refractive correlations. Using these findings, we demonstrate an octave-spanning microcomb operating below TRN limits, using both free-running lasers and lasers correlated via comb self-referencing, with performance limited only by laser frequency noise.
data.title_cn: 集成频率梳的全光噪声抑制
data.abstract_cn: 集成频率梳有望将基于实验室的计量转变为颠覆性的现实应用，特别是通过倍频程微梳实现自参考光学合成和时钟实现。然而，支持微梳的集成谐振器会受到热波动的影响，由于需要庞大的反馈系统，限制了微梳在实验室之外的使用。克尔诱导同步 (KIS) 提供了一种解决方案，通过全光锁定消除这种电子伺服控制。在这里，我们展示了 KIS 如何深刻改变孤子微梳的噪声特性，并使小器件占用空间与低噪声操作兼容。耗散克尔孤子 (DKS) 和注入参考之间的锁相减少了齿间泵浦噪声传播，从而实现更容易的载流子包络偏移稳定和均匀的频谱性能，同时还抑制了腔内波动对 DKS 的影响，例如热折射噪声 (TRN)。我们的理论和实验结果表明，KIS 修改了梳状噪声弹性带模型，保持了与泵浦激光器相当的梳齿线宽，这与线宽从梳状中心到边缘按数量级增加的单泵浦系统不同。此外，无论激光相干性或微环热折射相关性如何，KIS 都会以孤子衰减率淬灭固有噪声源。利用这些发现，我们展示了一种在 TRN 限制以下运行的倍频程微梳，使用自由运行的激光器和通过梳自参考相关的激光器，其性能仅受激光频率噪声的限制。

data.title: Multiscale characterization of myelin distribution with polarized THG microscopy
data.author: Josephine Morizet, Nicolas Olivier, Marie-Stephane Aigrot, Pierre Mahou, Elodie Martin, Anne Desmazieres, Bruno Stankoff, Chiara Stringari, Emmanuel Beaurepaire
data.summary: Myelin is essential for axonal conduction and metabolic support. To better understand its role in health and disease, it is necessary to establish accurate methods for in situ mapping of myelin at scales ranging from submicrometer to centimeters. Third-harmonic generation (THG) microscopy has recently been proposed as an efficient label-free method to visualize myelin in thick and living tissue. However, the contrast mechanism of THG from myelinated axons is complex and poorly described, which has limited the development of THG as a quantitative probe of myelin distribution. Here, we present a systematic characterization and modeling of polarization-resolved THG (pTHG) signals from individual axons as a function of their diameter and myelin thickness, and we show that pTHG can be used to derive myelin scores in several biological systems. First, we confirm the sensitivity and specificity of the THG contrast for myelinated axons in mouse brain tissue and its ability to detect isolated micrometer-sized axons oriented both in-plane and out-of-plane. We then present a detailed characterization of the pTHG contrast of small and large axons in live zebrafish larvae at different developmental stages, and we demonstrate that pTHG detects early axon development in vivo . We show that classical models of coherent multiphoton microscopy fail to reproduce pTHG profiles of axons because they neglect myelin-induced optical aberrations, and we establish a numerical strategy based on finite-difference time-domain calculations that can accurately relate pTHG signal profiles to axonal diameter and myelin thickness. Finally, we illustrate the relevance of pTHG microscopy for characterizing myelin distribution at different scales in fixed mouse and human brain tissue.
data.title_cn: 使用偏光 THG 显微镜对髓磷脂分布进行多尺度表征
data.abstract_cn: 髓磷脂对于轴突传导和代谢支持至关重要。为了更好地了解其在健康和疾病中的作用，有必要建立准确的方法，在亚微米到厘米的尺度上对髓磷脂进行原位绘图。三次谐波发生（THG）显微镜最近被提议作为一种有效的无标记方法来可视化厚组织和活组织中的髓磷脂。然而，有髓鞘轴突的 THG 对比机制复杂且描述较少，这限制了 THG 作为髓鞘分布定量探针的发展。在这里，我们提出了来自单个轴突的偏振分辨 THG (pTHG) 信号作为其直径和髓磷脂厚度的函数的系统表征和建模，并且我们表明 pTHG 可用于在多个生物系统中推导髓磷脂评分。首先，我们确认了 THG 对比对小鼠脑组织中有髓鞘轴突的敏感性和特异性，以及其检测面内和面外孤立的微米大小轴突的能力。然后，我们详细描述了活体斑马鱼幼虫在不同发育阶段的小轴突和大轴突的 pTHG 对比，并证明 pTHG 可以检测体内的早期轴突发育。我们证明相干多光子显微镜的经典模型无法重现轴突的 pTHG 轮廓，因为它们忽略了髓磷脂引起的光学像差，并且我们建立了基于有限差分时域计算的数值策略，可以准确地将 pTHG 信号轮廓与轴突直径和髓磷脂厚度联系起来。最后，我们说明了 pTHG 显微镜在表征固定小鼠和人脑组织中不同尺度的髓磷脂分布方面的相关性。

data.title: Hardware-efficient photonic tensor core: accelerating deep neural networks with structured compression
data.author: Shupeng Ning, Hanqing Zhu, Chenghao Feng, Jiaqi Gu, David Z. Pan, Ray T. Chen
data.summary: The rapid growth in computing demands, particularly driven by artificial intelligence applications, has begun to exceed the capabilities of traditional electronic hardware. Optical computing offers a promising alternative due to its parallelism, high computational speed, and low power consumption. However, existing photonic integrated circuits are constrained by large footprints, costly electro-optical interfaces, and complex control mechanisms, limiting the practical scalability of optical neural networks (ONNs). To address these limitations, we introduce a block-circulant photonic tensor core for a structure-compressed optical neural network (StrC-ONN) architecture. The structured compression technique substantially reduces both model complexity and hardware resources without sacrificing the versatility of neural networks, and achieves accuracy comparable to uncompressed models. Additionally, we propose a hardware-aware training framework to compensate for on-chip nonidealities to improve model robustness and accuracy. Experimental validation through image processing and classification tasks demonstrates that our StrC-ONN achieves a reduction in trainable parameters of up to 74.91%, while still maintaining competitive accuracy levels. Performance analyses further indicate that this hardware–software co-design approach is expected to yield a 3.56× improvement in power efficiency. By reducing both hardware requirements and control complexity across multiple dimensions, this work explores a pathway toward practical and scalable ONNs, highlighting a promising route to address future computational efficiency challenges.
data.title_cn: 硬件高效的光子张量核心：通过结构化压缩加速深度神经网络
data.abstract_cn: 计算需求的快速增长，特别是在人工智能应用的推动下，已经开始超出传统电子硬件的能力。光计算因其并行性、高计算速度和低功耗而提供了一种有前途的替代方案。然而，现有的光子集成电路受到大占地面积、昂贵的电光接口和复杂控制机制的限制，限制了光神经网络（ONN）的实际可扩展性。为了解决这些限制，我们引入了用于结构压缩光学神经网络（StrC-ONN）架构的块循环光子张量核心。结构化压缩技术在不牺牲神经网络的多功能性的情况下大大降低了模型复杂性和硬件资源，并且实现了与未压缩模型相当的精度。此外，我们提出了一个硬件感知训练框架来补偿片上非理想性，以提高模型的稳健性和准确性。通过图像处理和分类任务进行的实验验证表明，我们的 StrC-ONN 可将可训练参数减少高达 74.91%，同时仍然保持有竞争力的准确度水平。性能分析进一步表明，这种硬件-软件协同设计方法预计可将功效提高 3.56 倍。通过降低多个维度的硬件要求和控制复杂性，这项工作探索了一条通往实用且可扩展的 ONN 的途径，突出了解决未来计算效率挑战的一条有希望的途径。

data.title: Field-conjugate adaptive optics enables extended field-of-view microendoscopy for deep brain imaging
data.author: Qingdi Wang, Rui Liu, Byung Kook Lim
data.summary: Multiphoton microendoscopy using gradient-index (GRIN) lenses enables in vivo imaging of neuronal activity in deep brain regions of mammals. However, the intrinsic spatially varying aberrations and restricted etendue of GRIN lenses severely limit the field of view (FOV). While several methods have been developed to extend the FOV, such as pupil adaptive optics (AO) correction and optical lens designs, they either compromise imaging speed or lack adaptability across different GRIN lens types. Here, we introduce a field-conjugate adaptive optics (FCAO) approach, which positions the wavefront modulator near a plane conjugate to the imaging field, thereby allowing spatially varying aberration correction across the FOV. We demonstrate that FCAO significantly expands the usable FOV for various types of GRIN lenses, effectively restoring image quality in peripheral FOV regions and improving in vivo imaging of deep-brain neural structures without compromising imaging speed. Additionally, we incorporate FCAO and pupil AO modes within a single microscope system, enabling a unified platform for correcting both pupil and field-dependent aberrations.
data.title_cn: 场共轭自适应光学器件能够扩展视场显微内窥镜进行深部脑成像
data.abstract_cn: 使用梯度折射率（GRIN）透镜的多光子显微内窥镜能够对哺乳动物大脑深部区域的神经元活动进行体内成像。然而，GRIN 透镜固有的空间变化像差和受限的集光率严重限制了视场 (FOV)。虽然已经开发了多种方法来扩展视场，例如瞳孔自适应光学 (AO) 校正和光学镜头设计，但它们要么会影响成像速度，要么缺乏对不同 GRIN 镜头类型的适应性。在这里，我们引入了场共轭自适应光学（FCAO）方法，该方法将波前调制器放置在成像场的平面共轭附近，从而允许在视场上进行空间变化的像差校正。我们证明FCAO显着扩展了各种类型GRIN镜头的可用视场，有效恢复周边视场区域的图像质量，并在不影响成像速度的情况下改善深部脑神经结构的体内成像。此外，我们将 FCAO 和光瞳 AO 模式整合到单个显微镜系统中，从而提供一个统一的平台来校正光瞳和视场相关的像差。

data.title: Volumetric cloud display
data.author: Kota Kumagai, Keisuke Numazawa, Yoshio Hayasaki
data.summary: Displays based on light-scattering points are promising for realizing color volumetric images in real-world spaces. However, it remains challenging to generate refreshable scattering points directly for volumetric image rendering. In this study, we propose a volumetric display system using clouds formed via femtosecond-laser-induced condensation. These clouds are locally generated by focusing a femtosecond laser into an ethanol-supersaturated vapor within a cloud chamber. Our “volumetric cloud display,” which synchronously scans both femtosecond and RGB lasers to generate and illuminate clouds, successfully demonstrated color and refreshable volumetric image rendering. Furthermore, we observed unique cloud shapes extending perpendicular to the laser propagation axis using a high-speed camera system. Our approach provides a perspective toward realizing displays that allow images to coexist with humans in the real world.
data.title_cn: 体积云显示
data.abstract_cn: 基于光散射点的显示器有望在现实空间中实现彩色体积图像。然而，直接生成用于体积图像渲染的可刷新散射点仍然具有挑战性。在这项研究中，我们提出了一种利用飞秒激光诱导凝结形成的云的体积显示系统。这些云是通过将飞秒激光聚焦到云室内的乙醇过饱和蒸气中而局部生成的。我们的“体积云显示器”可同步扫描飞秒和 RGB 激光器以生成并照亮云，成功演示了彩色和可刷新的体积图像渲染。此外，我们使用高速摄像系统观察到垂直于激光传播轴延伸的独特云形状。我们的方法为实现允许图像与现实世界中的人类共存的显示器提供了一个视角。

data.title: Nonlinear flying focus pulses for ultrafast 3D nonlinear microscopy
data.author: Tigran Mansuryan, Nicholas Bagley, Remy Boulesteix, Yago Arosa, Katarzyna Krupa, Benjamin Wetzel, Bruno P. Chaves, Stefan Wabnitz, Vincent Couderc, Alejandro Aceves, Alessandro Tonello
data.summary: Ultrafast 3D nonlinear multiphoton imaging holds great promise for the visualization of complex biological structures. However, its practical implementation remains constrained, primarily due to the limited longitudinal scanning speed achievable with tightly focused laser pulses within the sample. In this work, we propose a 3D nonlinear imaging concept that harnesses a spatiotemporal Kerr self-focusing process for depth-resolved imaging without mechanical scanning. We exploit Townes solitons to generate ultrafast nonlinear flying focus pulses that are well-suited for nonlinear fluorescence imaging. A key feature of this approach is the power-dependent longitudinal displacement of the self-focusing point within the sample. This displacement, combined with the power-limiting effects from conical-wave emissions at multiple wavelengths, enables precise control and calibration of the beam’s focal position in three dimensions. Consequently, by implementing a temporal pulse encoding, either by splitting and delaying an initial pump pulse or by introducing an inter-pulse amplitude modulation, we can induce multiple self-focusing events at different time bins. This allows us to probe multiple axial planes in a single laser shot. As a result, a full 3D image can be reconstructed from a single 2D transverse scan, significantly accelerating imaging speed. Additionally, the stable nonlinear propagation of these filaments leads to collinear supercontinuum generation in the form of self-guided light beams. Overall, our method presents a pathway for ultrafast, high-resolution 3D nonlinear imaging.
data.title_cn: 用于超快 3D 非线性显微镜的非线性飞焦脉冲
data.abstract_cn: 超快 3D 非线性多光子成像为复杂生物结构的可视化带来了巨大希望。然而，其实际实施仍然受到限制，主要是由于样品内紧密聚焦的激光脉冲可实现的纵向扫描速度有限。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种 3D 非线性成像概念，利用时空克尔自聚焦过程进行深度分辨成像，无需机械扫描。我们利用汤斯孤子产生超快非线性飞焦脉冲，非常适合非线性荧光成像。这种方法的一个关键特征是样品内自聚焦点的与功率相关的纵向位移。这种位移与多波长锥波发射的功率限制效应相结合，可以在三个维度上精确控制和校准光束的焦点位置。因此，通过实现时间脉冲编码，或者通过分割和延迟初始泵浦脉冲，或者通过引入脉冲间幅度调制，我们可以在不同的时间段引起多个自聚焦事件。这使我们能够在一次激光照射中探测多个轴向平面。因此，可以从单个 2D 横向扫描重建完整的 3D 图像，从而显着加快成像速度。此外，这些细丝的稳定非线性传播导致以自导光束的形式产生共线超连续谱。总的来说，我们的方法为超快、高分辨率 3D 非线性成像提供了一条途径。

data.title: Inverse-designed metasurfaces for multifunctional spatial frequency filtering
data.author: Phillippe Pearson, Gregory Roberts, Andrei Faraon
data.summary: With the rapid rise in demand for edge computing, there is a need for low-power, compact approaches to information processing. Optical metasurfaces have emerged as a powerful platform for implementing convolution operations in the analog domain that would traditionally be done digitally. However, there has been limited work exploring the full extent to which metasurfaces can be designed to filter the spatial frequency content of incident fields. We experimentally demonstrate inverse-designed metasurfaces that perform spatial frequency filtering by precisely controlling their angular, polarization, and spectral scattering characteristics. To demonstrate the flexibility of our design approach, we show that distinct transfer functions can be implemented for orthogonal polarizations, leading to directional edge detection and blurring. Furthermore, we design metasurfaces with polarization-independent and spectrally multiplexed transfer functions. Multifunctional metasurfaces that encode several filtering functions have the potential to enable new applications in robotics, metrology, and sensing, particularly in resource-constrained scenarios.
data.title_cn: 用于多功能空间频率滤波的逆向设计超表面
data.abstract_cn: 随着边缘计算需求的快速增长，需要低功耗、紧凑的信息处理方法。光学超表面已成为在模拟域中实现传统上以数字方式完成的卷积运算的强大平台。然而，探索超表面设计以过滤入射场的空间频率内容的全面程度的工作还很有限。我们通过实验证明了逆向设计的超表面，通过精确控制其角度、偏振和光谱散射特性来执行空间频率滤波。为了证明我们设计方法的灵活性，我们展示了可以针对正交偏振实现不同的传递函数，从而实现定向边缘检测和模糊。此外，我们设计了具有偏振无关和光谱复用传递函数的超表面。编码多种过滤功能的多功能超表面有潜力在机器人、计量和传感领域实现新的应用，特别是在资源有限的场景中。

data.title: Quantitative nonlinear optical polarimetry with high spatial resolution
data.author: Albert Suceava, Sankalpa Hazra, Jadupati Nag, John Hayden, Safdar Imam, Zhiwen Liu, Abishek Iyer, Mercouri G. Kanatzidis, Susan Trolier-McKinstry, Jon-Paul Maria, Venkatraman Gopalan
data.summary: Nonlinear optical microscopy such as in the optical second-harmonic generation (SHG) modality has become a popular tool today for probing materials in the physical and biological sciences. While imaging and spectroscopy are widely used in the microscopy mode, nonlinear polarimetry, which can shed light on materials’ symmetry and microstructure, is relatively underdeveloped. This is partly because quantitative analytical modeling of the optical SHG response for anisotropic crystals and films largely assumes low-numerical aperture (NA) focusing of light, where the plane-wave approximation is sufficient. Tight focusing provides unique benefits in revealing out-of-plane polarization responses, which cannot be detected by near-plane-wave illumination at normal incidence. Here, we outline a method for quantitatively analyzing SHG polarimetry measurements obtained under high-NA focusing within a microscope geometry. Experiments and simulations of a variety of standard samples, from single crystals to thin films, are in good agreement, including measured and simulated spatial SHG maps of ferroelectric domains. A solution to the inverse problem is demonstrated, where the spatial distribution of an SHG tensor with unknown tensor coefficient magnitudes is determined by experimentally measured polarimetry. The ability to extract the out-of-plane component of the nonlinear polarization in normal incidence is demonstrated, which can be valuable for high-resolution polarimetry of 2D materials, thin films, heterostructures, and uniaxial crystals with a strong out-of-plane response.
data.title_cn: 高空间分辨率的定量非线性光学偏振测定
data.abstract_cn: 非线性光学显微镜，例如光学二次谐波发生 (SHG) 模式，已成为当今物理和生物科学中探测材料的流行工具。虽然成像和光谱学广泛应用于显微镜模式，但可以揭示材料对称性和微观结构的非线性偏振测量技术相对不发达。部分原因是各向异性晶体和薄膜的光学 SHG 响应的定量分析模型很大程度上假设光的低数值孔径 (NA) 聚焦，其中平面波近似就足够了。紧密聚焦在揭示面外偏振响应方面提供了独特的优势，而法向入射的近平面波照明无法检测到面外偏振响应。在这里，我们概述了一种定量分析在显微镜几何结构内高数值孔径聚焦下获得的二次谐波偏振测量的方法。从单晶到薄膜的各种标准样品的实验和模拟都非常一致，包括测量和模拟的铁电域空间 SHG 图。演示了反问题的解决方案，其中具有未知张量系数幅度的 SHG 张量的空间分布由实验测量的偏振法确定。证明了提取法线入射时非线性偏振的面外分量的能力，这对于具有强面外响应的二维材料、薄膜、异质结构和单轴晶体的高分辨率偏振测量非常有价值。

data.title: Biointegrated microlasers: technologies, applications, and emerging developments
data.author: Catriona A. Thomson, Anna Popczyk, Marcel Schubert, Malte C. Gather
data.summary: Laser light is one of the greatest and most versatile technologies ever invented. Recent developments in the miniaturization of lasers have opened up the possibility of directly interfacing living biological cells with microscopic lasers. The significantly greater brightness and spectral finesse of such biointegrated microlasers, relative to the fluorescent markers commonly used in biomedical research, have enabled numerous applications centered around cellular barcoding and biochemical and biophysical sensing. It further enables measurements in deeper tissue and with greater distinguishability. Here, we review the current state of this quickly growing field, starting with a brief recapitulation of its origins. We describe the prevalent cavity strategies and material systems used, the procedures for ensuring efficient biointegration of lasers, and the instrumentation developed for rapid analysis of light generated by biointegrated lasers, which requires high-resolution hyperspectral imaging. We discuss how the characteristics of biointegrated microlasers are highly applicable to research requiring multiplexed optical barcoding and sensing of cellular dynamics deep in highly scattering tissue. Finally, we share our vision for the future of this nascent field of biophotonics, list the most important challenges that will need to be addressed, and summarize emerging strategies in related areas that may be of particular benefit to the field of biointegrated microlasers.
data.title_cn: 生物集成微型激光器：技术、应用和新兴发展
data.abstract_cn: 激光是有史以来发明的最伟大、最通用的技术之一。激光器小型化的最新发展开辟了将活生物细胞与微型激光器直接连接的可能性。相对于生物医学研究中常用的荧光标记物，此类生物集成微型激光器的亮度和光谱精度显着提高，从而实现了以细胞条形码以及生化和生物物理传感为中心的众多应用。它还可以在更深的组织中进行测量，并且具有更大的可区分性。在这里，我们回顾这个快速发展的领域的现状，首先简要回顾一下它的起源。我们描述了流行的腔策略和使用的材料系统、确保激光有效生物集成的程序以及为快速分析生物集成激光器产生的光而开发的仪器，这需要高分辨率高光谱成像。我们讨论生物集成微型激光器的特性如何高度适用于需要多路光学条形码和高散射组织深处细胞动力学传感的研究。最后，我们分享了对生物光子学这个新兴领域的未来的愿景，列出了需要解决的最重要的挑战，并总结了相关领域的新兴策略，这些策略可能对生物集成微型激光器领域特别有利。

data.title: 3D quantum ghost imaging microscope
data.author: Audrey Eshun, Dominique Davenport, Brandon Demory, Shervin Kiannejad, Paul Mos, Yang Lin, Tiziana Bond, Michael C. Rushford, Erin E. Nuccio, Ty J. Samo, Peter K. Weber, Claudio Bruschini, Edoardo Charbon, Ted A. Laurence
data.summary: Quantum ghost imaging uses quantum-entangled photons to generate a two-dimensional image with only a bucket detector at the sample. Here we expand on this approach to generate a three-dimensional image without scanning. A quantum-entangled light source directly links information between a pair of 2D sensors, one of which captures a standard image from one perspective and a second sensor which captures a ghost image from a perpendicular perspective. By correlating the spatial information from the two detectors for each photon pair, we obtain three dimensions of spatial information ( x , y , and z ) for each scattered photon. We demonstrate that this system can study microscopic environments by imaging scattering from metallic nanoparticle clusters. This approach has the potential to greatly reduce the flux of light required to obtain a 3D image of a biological sample and thereby extend the number of images that can be obtained before photodamaging the sample.
data.title_cn: 3D量子鬼成像显微镜
data.abstract_cn: 量子鬼成像使用量子纠缠光子生成二维图像，仅在样品处有一个桶探测器。在这里，我们扩展了这种无需扫描即可生成三维图像的方法。量子纠缠光源直接连接一对二维传感器之间的信息，其中一个传感器从一个角度捕获标准图像，第二个传感器从垂直角度捕获重影图像。通过关联每个光子对的两个探测器的空间信息，我们获得每个散射光子的三个维度的空间信息（x、y 和 z）。我们证明该系统可以通过对金属纳米粒子簇的散射进行成像来研究微观环境。这种方法有可能大大减少获得生物样本 3D 图像所需的光通量，从而增加在光损伤样本之前可以获得的图像数量。

data.title: Automating experimental optics with sample-efficient machine learning methods
data.author: Arindam Saha, Baramee Charoensombutamon, Thibault Michel, V. Vijendran, Lachlan Walker, Akira Furusawa, Syed M. Assad, Ben C. Buchler, Ping Koy Lam, Aaron D. Tranter
data.summary: As free-space optical systems grow in scale and complexity, troubleshooting becomes increasingly time-consuming and, in the case of remote installations, perhaps impractical. An example of a task that is often laborious is the alignment of a high-finesse optical resonator, which is highly sensitive to the mode of the input beam. In this work, we demonstrate how machine learning can be used to achieve autonomous mode-matching of a free-space optical resonator with minimal supervision. Our approach leverages sample-efficient algorithms to reduce data requirements while maintaining a simple architecture for easy deployment. The reinforcement learning scheme that we have developed shows that automation is feasible even in systems prone to drift in experimental parameters, as may well be the case in real-world applications.
data.title_cn: 利用样本高效的机器学习方法实现实验光学自动化
data.abstract_cn: 随着自由空间光学系统规模和复杂性的增长，故障排除变得越来越耗时，并且在远程安装的情况下可能不切实际。经常费力的任务的一个例子是高精度光学谐振器的对准，它对输入光束的模式高度敏感。在这项工作中，我们演示了如何使用机器学习在最少的监督下实现自由空间光学谐振器的自主模式匹配。我们的方法利用样本高效算法来减少数据需求，同时保持简单的架构以便于部署。我们开发的强化学习方案表明，即使在实验参数容易漂移的系统中，自动化也是可行的，就像现实世界应用中的情况一样。

data.title: Unlocking freeform optics design for extended light sources
data.author: Haotian Sun, Yuqin Chen, Zijun Zhang, Xianliang Zheng, Yuejia Xu, Jun She, Rengmao Wu
data.summary: Developing compact and high-performance freeform optics for extended light sources requires discarding the point-source assumption by precisely incorporating both spatial and angular source dimensions. However, this remains a highly challenging and inadequately resolved problem. Here, we propose a direct method to thoroughly address this problem. A mathematical model of freeform optics design for extended sources is established, and the freeform optics are derived from the numerical solution of the model. This method is applicable to both a single extended source and an extended-source array. Moreover, it is valid in both on-axis and off-axis designs. Several examples are given to validate this method via both simulation and experimental tests.
data.title_cn: 解锁扩展光源的自由曲面光学设计
data.abstract_cn: 为扩展光源开发紧凑且高性能的自由曲面光学器件需要通过精确合并空间和角度源尺寸来放弃点源假设。然而，这仍然是一个极具挑战性且未得到充分解决的问题。在这里，我们提出了一种直接的方法来彻底解决这个问题。建立了扩展光源自由曲面光学设计的数学模型，并根据模型的数值解推导了自由曲面光学。该方法适用于单个扩展源和扩展源阵列。此外，它在同轴和离轴设计中都有效。给出了几个例子，通过模拟和实验测试来验证该方法。

data.title: Imaging a chain of strongly correlated Rydberg excitations enabled by Förster-resonance-enhanced interaction
data.author: Jinjin Du, Thibault Vogt, Ningxuan Zheng, Wenhui Li
data.summary: Rydberg atoms are currently a very fast-advancing quantum platform. For many interesting and demanding applications, including quantum computation, fast detection of a Rydberg excitation or a Rydberg qubit for information readout would be one of the most desirable developments. We demonstrate single-shot and in situ absorption imaging of individual Rydberg excitations. This level of resolution is achieved using an electromagnetically induced transparency scheme involving a Rydberg energy level that is highly sensitive to the presence of Rydberg atoms due to Förster-resonance-enhanced dipole couplings. Spectroscopic measurements illustrate the existence of the Förster resonance and underscore the state-selectivity of the technique. With an imaging exposure time as short as 3 µs, we successfully resolve linear chains of Rydberg excitations in a one-dimensional configuration. The extracted second-order correlation shows strong anti-bunching due to excitation blockade, and a Fourier analysis reveals the long-range order in the chains of Rydberg excitations. This imaging technique, with minimal destruction, will be of great interest for leveraging ensemble-encoded qubits in quantum computation and quantum simulation applications.
data.title_cn: 通过福斯特共振增强相互作用对一系列强相关的里德伯激发进行成像
data.abstract_cn: 里德伯原子目前是一个发展非常快的量子平台。对于许多有趣且要求高的应用，包括量子计算，快速检测里德伯激发或用于信息读出的里德伯量子位将是最理想的发展之一。我们演示了单个里德堡激发的单次和原位吸收成像。这种分辨率水平是通过电磁感应透明方案实现的，该方案涉及里德伯能级，由于福斯特共振增强偶极子耦合，该方案对里德伯原子的存在高度敏感。光谱测量说明了福斯特共振的存在，并强调了该技术的状态选择性。通过短至 3 µs 的成像曝光时间，我们成功解析了一维配置中的里德伯激发的线性链。提取的二阶相关性显示出由于激励封锁而产生的强反聚束，并且傅立叶分析揭示了里德伯激励链中的长程顺序。这种破坏最小的成像技术对于在量子计算和量子模拟应用中利用集成编码量子位将产生极大的兴趣。

data.title: Sub-hertz-linewidth hybrid-integrated laser for isolator-free silicon photonics
data.author: Bozhang Dong, Warren Jin, Artem Prokoshin, Weng W. Chow, Yating Wan, John E. Bowers
data.summary: This work presents a hybrid-integrated external-cavity laser with a 0.45 Hz Lorentzian linewidth and exceptional feedback tolerance of up to −8.1dB, enabling isolator-free photonic integrated circuits. Unlike current high-Q locking configurations, our approach leverages a broadband external cavity, effectively mitigating thermorefractive noise and mode-hopping while ensuring stable operation. Through a detailed analysis of noise suppression in low-Q locking configurations, we demonstrate that extending the external cavity to increase the effective photon lifetime achieves noise suppression comparable to high-Q locking. This relaxes the stringent Q-factor requirements for self-injection locking, enabling chip-scale lasers with coherence surpassing bulky fiber lasers while maintaining compatibility with broadband external cavities. The demonstrated ultra-high coherence and strong feedback insensitivity make this laser an ideal candidate for large-scale heterogeneous photonic integration, with transformative applications in optical and quantum computing, precision sensing, and metrology.
data.title_cn: 用于无隔离器硅光子学的亚赫兹线宽混合集成激光器
data.abstract_cn: 这项工作提出了一种混合集成外腔激光器，具有 0.45 Hz 洛伦兹线宽和高达 −8.1dB 的出色反馈容差，从而实现无隔离器光子集成电路。与当前的高 Q 锁定配置不同，我们的方法利用宽带外腔，有效减轻热折射噪声和跳模，同时确保稳定运行。通过对低 Q 锁定配置中噪声抑制的详细分析，我们证明了扩展外腔以增加有效光子寿命可实现与高 Q 锁定相当的噪声抑制。这放宽了自注入锁定的严格品质因数要求，使芯片级激光器的相干性超过了笨重的光纤激光器，同时保持了与宽带外腔的兼容性。所展示的超高相干性和强反馈不敏感性使该激光器成为大规模异构光子集成的理想候选者，在光学和量子计算、精密传感和计量领域具有革命性的应用。

data.title: Purcell-enhanced, directional light–matter interaction in a waveguide-coupled nanocavity
data.author: Nicholas J. Martin, Dominic Hallett, Mateusz Duda, Luke Hallacy, Elena Callus, Luke Brunswick, René Dost, Edmund Clarke, Pallavi K. Patil, Pieter Kok, Maurice S. Skolnick, Luke R. Wilson
data.summary: We demonstrate electrically tunable, spin-dependent, directional coupling of single photons by embedding quantum dots (QDs) in a waveguide-coupled nanocavity. The directional behavior arises from direction-dependent interference between two cavity modes when coupled to the device waveguides. The small-mode-volume cavity enables simultaneous Purcell enhancement (10.8±0.7) and peak directional contrast (88±1%), exceeding current state-of-the-art waveguide-only systems. We also present a scattering matrix model for the transmission through this structure, alongside a quantum trajectory-based model for predicting the system’s directionality, which we use to explain the observed asymmetry in directional contrast seen in QD devices. Furthermore, the nanocavity enables wide-range electrical tuning of the emitter’s directional contrast. We present results showing precise tuning of a QD emission line from a directional contrast of 2%–96%. In combination, these characteristics make this cavity–waveguide approach promising for use as a building block in directional nanophotonic circuits.
data.title_cn: 波导耦合纳米腔中的珀塞尔增强定向光与物质相互作用
data.abstract_cn: 我们通过在波导耦合纳米腔中嵌入量子点（QD）来演示单光子的电可调、自旋相关、定向耦合。当耦合到器件波导时，两个腔模之间的方向相关干扰会产生方向行为。小模式体积腔可同时实现 Purcell 增强 (10.8±0.7) 和峰值方向对比度 (88±1%)，超过了当前最先进的纯波导系统。我们还提出了一个用于通过该结构传输的散射矩阵模型，以及一个用于预测系统方向性的基于量子轨迹的模型，我们用它来解释在量子点设备中观察到的方向对比度的不对称性。此外，纳米腔可以对发射器的方向对比度进行大范围的电调谐。我们提出的结果显示，QD 发射线的方向对比度为 2%–96% 进行了精确调谐。综合起来，这些特性使得这种腔波导方法有望用作定向纳米光子电路的构建块。

data.title: High-resolution long-range swept-source OCT for volumetric imaging and metrology up to 200 m
data.author: Jingjiang Xu, Yaping Shi, Shaozhen Song, Ruikang K. Wang
data.summary: We demonstrate a long-range swept-source optical coherence tomography (SS-OCT) capable of high-resolution volumetric imaging up to 200 m ranging distance. By utilizing an advanced akinetic all-semiconductor swept laser operating at 1550 nm with a 50 kHz sweep rate and an ultra-narrow instantaneous linewidth (<0.6MHz), the system achieves a theoretical coherence length exceeding 200 m. By optimizing spectral bandwidth (∼0.09nm) and digitizer sampling (800 MS/s), we experimentally realize imaging ranges up to 53 m with an axial resolution of approximately 1.2 cm. A robust data acquisition and processing pipeline, featuring point cloud compression, geometric correction, and noise suppression, enables compact and portable operation. The versatility of the system is showcased across diverse scenarios, including remote imaging of human subjects, dynamic events, vehicles, and architectural structures. These capabilities position long-range OCT as a compelling alternative to conventional ranging technologies, providing high-resolution volumetric imaging with micron-level precision and immunity to ambient lighting for applications in metrology, robotics, human–machine interfaces, and environmental sensing.
data.title_cn: 高分辨率长距离扫频 OCT，适用于体积成像和计量，最远可达 200 m
data.abstract_cn: 我们展示了一种长距离扫频光学相干断层扫描 (SS-OCT)，能够在长达 200 m 的测距范围内进行高分辨率体积成像。该系统利用先进的动能全半导体扫频激光器，工作波长为1550 nm，扫描速率为50 kHz，具有超窄瞬时线宽（<0.6 MHz），理论相干长度超过200 m。通过优化光谱带宽（∼0.09nm）和数字化仪采样（800 MS/s），我们通过实验实现了高达 53 m 的成像范围，轴向分辨率约为 1.2 cm。强大的数据采集和处理管道具有点云压缩、几何校正和噪声抑制功能，可实现紧凑和便携式操作。该系统的多功能性在不同场景中得到体现，包括人体、动态事件、车辆和建筑结构的远程成像。这些功能使远程 OCT 成为传统测距技术的引人注目的替代方案，为计量、机器人、人机界面和环境传感应用提供微米级精度的高分辨率体积成像，并且不受环境照明的影响。

data.title: Clinical translation of photoacoustic imaging using exogenous molecular contrast agents [Invited]
data.author: Jingyi Miao, Mingze Luo, Alankar Kotwal, Eric Hall, Donghyeon Oh, Pablo A. Valdes, Lei S. Li
data.summary: Photoacoustic imaging (PAI) combines optical contrast with acoustic detection to enable high-resolution, molecular imaging at clinically relevant depths. This review outlines the current status and future potential of contrast-enhanced PAI in human applications. We begin by discussing regulatory considerations surrounding both imaging devices and exogenous contrast agents, highlighting safety concerns, lack of standardized validation protocols, and barriers to the approval of novel agents. To accelerate clinical adoption, many studies have focused on repurposing FDA-approved agents such as indocyanine green, methylene blue, and clofazimine, which offer favorable optical properties and known safety profiles. We then review clinical applications of contrast-enhanced PAI across organ systems. In lymphatic imaging, PAI enables noninvasive visualization of lymphatic vessels and sentinel lymph nodes. Prostate imaging benefits from improved tumor delineation, and vascular applications leverage PAI to assess oxygen saturation and vascular remodeling. In gastrointestinal and hepatic imaging, PAI supports functional assessment and lesion detection with enhanced contrast. Emerging applications in neuro-oncology demonstrate the potential of PAI for intraoperative guidance and brain tumor imaging. Compared to fluorescence imaging, PAI provides deeper penetration and quantifiable contrast. Studies using both approved and investigational agents, including gold nanorods and targeted dye conjugates, highlight advances in imaging tumor margins. Progress in transcranial PAI and molecular probe design continues to broaden its capabilities. Together, these developments underscore the expanding clinical utility of contrast-enhanced PAI for real-time, functional, and molecular imaging.
data.title_cn: 外源性分子造影剂光声成像的临床转化[邀请]
data.abstract_cn: 光声成像 (PAI) 将光学对比与声学检测相结合，可在临床相关深度实现高分辨率分子成像。这篇综述概述了对比增强 PAI 在人类应用中的现状和未来潜力。我们首先讨论围绕成像设备和外源性造影剂的监管考虑因素，强调安全问题、缺乏标准化验证方案以及批准新型药物的障碍。为了加速临床应用，许多研究都集中在重新利用 FDA 批准的药物，例如吲哚菁绿、亚甲蓝和氯法齐明，这些药物具有良好的光学特性和已知的安全性。然后我们回顾了对比增强 PAI 跨器官系统的临床应用。在淋巴成像中，PAI 能够实现淋巴管和前哨淋巴结的无创可视化。前列腺成像受益于肿瘤轮廓的改善，血管应用利用 PAI 来评估氧饱和度和血管重塑。在胃肠道和肝脏成像中，PAI 支持通过增强对比度进行功能评估和病变检测。神经肿瘤学中的新兴应用证明了 PAI 在术中指导和脑肿瘤成像方面的潜力。与荧光成像相比，PAI 提供更深的穿透力和可量化的对比度。使用已批准和正在研究的药物（包括金纳米棒和靶向染料缀合物）的研究突显了肿瘤边缘成像的进展。经颅 PAI 和分子探针设计的进展不断扩大其能力。总之，这些进展凸显了对比增强 PAI 在实时、功能和分子成像方面的临床应用不断扩大。

data.title: Laparoscopic near-infrared hyperspectral imaging system for identifying living porcine nerves and unexposed arteries
data.author: Toshihiro Takamatsu, Seiya Hayashi, Nariaki Okamoto, Shintaro Arakaki, Abián Guedes Hernández, Nobuyoshi Takeshita, Hiro Hasegawa, Hideo Yokota, Kohei Soga, Gustavo Marrero Callico, Hiroshi Takemura
data.summary: Surgical resection remains a key curative option for cancer, with minimally invasive approaches increasingly adopted. To enhance intraoperative visualization, we developed a laparoscopic near-infrared hyperspectral imaging (NIR-HSI) system comprising a custom laparoscope, supercontinuum light source, and acousto-optic tunable filter. Ex vivo NIR-HSI of porcine arteries, mesentery, and nerves revealed distinct spectral signatures from 1000–1402 nm. Pixel-based classification via neural networks achieved >99% accuracy, sensitivity, and specificity in most cases. In vivo imaging of a living pig enabled identification of exposed nerves (88.4% accuracy, 68.7% recall) and unexposed arteries (83.2% accuracy, 60.2% recall). These results demonstrate that laparoscopic NIR-HSI can differentiate tissues with similar coloration and detect structures embedded beneath the surface, offering potential for safer minimally invasive surgeries.
data.title_cn: 用于识别活体猪神经和未暴露动脉的腹腔镜近红外高光谱成像系统
data.abstract_cn: 手术切除仍然是癌症的关键治疗选择，微创方法越来越多地被采用。为了增强术中可视化，我们开发了腹腔镜近红外高光谱成像 (NIR-HSI) 系统，包括定制腹腔镜、超连续谱光源和声光可调滤波器。猪动脉、肠系膜和神经的离体 NIR-HSI 显示了 1000-1402 nm 的独特光谱特征。在大多数情况下，通过神经网络进行的基于像素的分类可实现 >99% 的准确度、灵敏度和特异性。对活猪进行体内成像，能够识别暴露的神经（准确率 88.4%，召回率 68.7%）和未暴露的动脉（准确率 83.2%，召回率 60.2%）。这些结果表明，腹腔镜 NIR-HSI 可以区分具有相似颜色的组织并检测嵌入表面下方的结构，为更安全的微创手术提供了潜力。

data.title: Volumetric ultrasound and photoacoustic imaging of inflammatory arthritis in human finger joints via robotic arm powered arc scans
data.author: Kyoungmo Koo, Xiaorui Peng, Guangshen Ma, Nada Abdulaziz, David Mills, Aaron Dentinger, Girish Gandikota, Mark Draelos, Xueding Wang
data.summary: Ultrasound (US) imaging is a standard clinical tool for assessment of soft tissue inflammation, particularly for imaging the peripheral joints of the hands and feet, which are usually the first to be affected by rheumatoid arthritis. Robotic US has recently gained attention as a means of delivering repeatable and operator-independent imaging. Previously developed robotic US for 3D volumetric imaging of human finger joints relies on the linear scan of the target joint to collect a series of 2D B-mode US images. Although effective in many contexts and simple in control and image reconstruction, the linear scan is suboptimal for imaging cylindrical tissue structures such as human fingers, often exhibiting degraded image quality in peripheral regions due to poor angular alignment with the tissue surface. To address this limitation, we developed a robotic US system incorporating an arc-shaped scanning trajectory designed to maintain a consistently perpendicular orientation to the curved surface of the finger throughout the scan. In an experiment on a spherical phantom, arc scan yielded improved boundary sharpness and image contrast compared to linear scan. In a clinical study involving both a healthy volunteer and an arthritis patient, the arc scan produced better B-mode US image quality in imaging finger joints compared to the linear scan, as reflected in more consistent representations of phalangeal and soft tissue structures along different radial directions. Functional Doppler US and photoacoustic (PA) imaging of finger joints were also conducted. Arc scan and linear scan achieved comparable detection of vascular signals. These findings demonstrate that arc scan facilitated by the robotic arm can achieve improved B-mode US imaging of tissue anatomy in human finger joints while preserving the functional imaging capability of Doppler US and PA imaging.
data.title_cn: 通过机械臂驱动的弧形扫描对人体指关节炎症性关节炎进行体积超声和光声成像
data.abstract_cn: 超声 (US) 成像是评估软组织炎症的标准临床工具，特别是对手脚周围关节进行成像，这些关节通常最先受到类风湿性关节炎的影响。 Robotic US 最近作为一种提供可重复且独立于操作员的成像的手段而受到关注。先前开发的用于人类手指关节 3D 体积成像的机器人 US 依靠目标关节的线性扫描来收集一系列 2D B 模式 US 图像。虽然线性扫描在许多情况下有效并且控制和图像重建简单，但对于对圆柱形组织结构（例如人类手指）进行成像来说并不是最佳的，由于与组织表面的角度对准不良，通常在外围区域表现出图像质量下降。为了解决这一限制，我们开发了一种机器人 US 系统，该系统采用弧形扫描轨迹，旨在在整个扫描过程中保持与手指曲面的一致垂直方向。在球形模型的实验中，与线性扫描相比，弧形扫描提高了边界清晰度和图像对比度。在一项涉及健康志愿者和关节炎患者的临床研究中，与线性扫描相比，弧形扫描在手指关节成像中产生了更好的 B 型超声图像质量，这反映在沿着不同径向方向的指骨和软组织结构的更一致的表示。还进行了手指关节的功能性多普勒超声和光声（PA）成像。弧形扫描和线性扫描实现了可比的血管信号检测。这些发现表明，机械臂促进的弧形扫描可以实现改进的人体指关节组织解剖学 B 型超声成像，同时保留多普勒超声和 PA 成像的功能成像能力。

data.title: On the physiological processes underlying optoretinography [Invited]
data.author: Huakun Li, Yueming Zhuo, Vimal Prabhu Pandiyan, Mohammad Asif Zaman, Tong Ling, Ramkumar Sabesan, Daniel Palanker
data.summary: Optoretinography (ORG) is a label-free imaging of the light-evoked changes in the retina associated with alterations in the cell shape and refractive indices. Its most precise version, the phase-resolved optical coherence tomography (pOCT), exhibited sensitivity of about 10 nm in vivo , limited by the signal-to-noise ratio and accuracy of the tissue registration. While it is yet insufficient for the detection of single action potentials, which are about 1 nm in amplitude, it enables monitoring slower and larger deformations in other retinal layers. In response to a single flash delivered to the dark-adapted retina, photoreceptor outer segments (OS) exhibit rapid (millisecond-scale) contraction, reaching tens of nm in cones and hundreds of nm in rods. This effect can be explained by changes in the membrane tension due to hyperpolarization of the OS discs–that is, the intradiscal space becoming more negatively charged–during the early receptor potential induced by opsins isomerization. In cones, such contraction is followed by a slower elongation by hundreds of nm during hundreds of ms. The proposed underlying mechanisms include osmotic influx of water, swelling of the cone opsin and disc membranes, and conformational changes in phosphodiesterase (PDE6) during phototransduction. ORG also reveals slow deformations in the subretinal space (SRS) and retinal pigment epithelium (RPE), likely induced by light-evoked ionic and osmotic shifts, as well as in the inner plexiform layer (IPL) and ganglion cell layer (GCL). ORG has a high potential as a non-invasive, label-free, and objective assay of retinal health, co-registered with structural images in the same OCT machine. To realize its promise in basic science and clinical assessment of diseases and therapies, its underlying mechanisms need to be delineated. This review summarizes current understanding of the physiological mechanisms behind the ORG.
data.title_cn: 论视视网膜成像的生理过程 [特邀]
data.abstract_cn: 视视网膜成像 (ORG) 是一种无标记成像，可对视网膜中与细胞形状和折射率变化相关的光诱发变化进行成像。其最精确的版本是相位分辨光学相干断层扫描 (pOCT)，在体内表现出约 10 nm 的灵敏度，但受到信噪比和组织配准精度的限制。虽然它还不足以检测振幅约为 1 nm 的单一动作电位，但它可以监测其他视网膜层中较慢和较大的变形。响应于传递到暗适应视​​网膜的单次闪光，光感受器外节（OS）表现出快速（毫秒级）收缩，视锥细胞达到数十纳米，视杆细胞达到数百纳米。这种效应可以通过在视蛋白异构化诱导的早期受体电位期间由于 OS 盘超极化（即盘内空间变得更加负电荷）而导致的膜张力变化来解释。在视锥细胞中，这种收缩之后是在数百毫秒内缓慢伸长数百纳米。所提出的潜在机制包括水的渗透流入、视锥细胞视蛋白和椎间盘膜的膨胀以及光转导过程中磷酸二酯酶（PDE6）的构象变化。 ORG 还揭示了视网膜下腔 (SRS) 和视网膜色素上皮 (RPE) 的缓慢变形，可能是由光诱发的离子和渗透压变化引起的，以及内丛状层 (IPL) 和神经节细胞层 (GCL) 的缓慢变形。 ORG 作为一种非侵入性、无标记、客观的视网膜健康检测方法具有很高的潜力，可以在同一台 OCT 机器中与结构图像共同配准。为了实现其在基础科学以及疾病和治疗的临床评估方面的承诺，需要描述其潜在机制。这篇综述总结了目前对 ORG 背后生理机制的理解。

data.title: Dynamic contrast in dual-beam optical coherence tomography imaging of human skin
data.author: Michael Pircher, Elisabeth Brunner, Ionela-Mariana Nagelreiter, Christopher Kremslehner, Wenting Hu, Bahar Golabi, Christian Freystätter, Florian Gruber
data.summary: Imaging of metabolic and cellular activity in living tissue is of high interest and represents a prerequisite for an understanding of environmentally induced tissue changes. In this work, we present a dual-beam optical coherence tomography (OCT) instrument that is used to investigate dynamic processes of human skin samples with two different transverse resolutions. The amplitude and the phase of the OCT signal in both channels are exploited to assess these processes. The temporal evolution of dynamic processes in living skin tissue is analyzed and used to provide increased image contrast. This allows for a clear separation between the stratum corneum, the living epidermis, and the dermis that is otherwise not visible in standard OCT images of the system. Thereby, better dynamic contrast was observed using the higher resolution images. The reproducibility of the method is tested, and the imaging results are compared with data from fixated skin samples (where no dynamics were found within the living epidermis) and histology.
data.title_cn: 人体皮肤双光束光学相干断层成像的动态对比度
data.abstract_cn: 活组织中代谢和细胞活动的成像引起了人们的高度兴趣，并且是了解环境引起的组织变化的先决条件。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种双光束光学相干断层扫描（OCT）仪器，用于研究具有两种不同横向分辨率的人体皮肤样本的动态过程。利用两个通道中 OCT 信号的幅度和相位来评估这些过程。分析活体皮肤组织动态过程的时间演变并用于提供增强的图像对比度。这使得角质层、活表皮和真皮之间能够清晰分离，而这在系统的标准 OCT 图像中是不可见的。因此，使用更高分辨率的图像观察到更好的动态对比度。测试了该方法的再现性，并将成像结果与固定皮肤样本（活体表皮内没有发现动态）和组织学的数据进行比较。

data.title: Fluorescence lifetime imaging to investigate propofol-induced metabolic alterations in MDA-MB-231 cells
data.author: Tabassum Ahmad Tasmi, Lakhvir Singh, Alex J Walsh
data.summary: The metabolic effects of anesthetic agents like propofol on cancer cells remain poorly understood despite the widespread use of anesthesia during cancer diagnosis and treatment. Fluorescence lifetime imaging microscopy (FLIM) was used to analyze propofol-induced metabolic changes in triple-negative breast cancer cells (MDA-MB-231) by monitoring endogenous NAD(P)H and FAD fluorescence lifetimes. FLIM of propofol-treated MDA-MB-231 cells revealed concentration-dependent shifts in metabolic states that were supported by Seahorse extracellular flux analysis. While the flux analysis provided population-averaged metabolic data, FLIM enabled high-resolution, dynamic mapping of metabolism in live cancer cells. Our study highlights FLIM as a label-free tool for investigating anesthetic-induced metabolic alterations in cells, offering insights into the potential metabolic mechanisms of propofol.
data.title_cn: 荧光寿命成像研究异丙酚诱导的 MDA-MB-231 细胞代谢变化
data.abstract_cn: 尽管在癌症诊断和治疗过程中广泛使用麻醉剂，但异丙酚等麻醉剂对癌细胞的代谢影响仍知之甚少。使用荧光寿命成像显微镜 (FLIM) 通过监测内源性 NAD(P)H 和 FAD 荧光寿命来分析三阴性乳腺癌细胞 (MDA-MB-231) 中异丙酚诱导的代谢变化。丙泊酚处理的 MDA-MB-231 细胞的 FLIM 显示了代谢状态的浓度依赖性变化，这一点得到了 Seahorse 细胞外通量分析的支持。虽然通量分析提供了群体平均代谢数据，但 FLIM 可以实现活癌细胞代谢的高分辨率、动态绘图。我们的研究强调 FLIM 作为一种无标记工具，用于研究麻醉诱导的细胞代谢改变，为异丙酚的潜在代谢机制提供见解。

data.title: Guide to dynamic OCT data analysis
data.author: Noah Heldt, Tual Monfort, Rion Morishita, Robert Schönherr, Olivier Thouvenin, Ibrahim Abd El-Sadek, Peter König, Gereon Hüttmann, Kate Grieve, Yoshiaki Yasuno
data.summary: Dynamic optical coherence tomography (DOCT) enhances conventional OCT by providing specific information related to flow dynamics, cell motility, and organelle metabolic activity. These biological phenomena can be detected with varying sensitivity depending on the OCT architecture parameters, including wavelength, numerical aperture, and implementation method (time domain or Fourier domain). Despite its potential, the field lacks standardization as various research groups have independently developed algorithms for specific applications. In this paper, we compare four widely used DOCT algorithms, each employing a distinct analytical approach: power spectral density moment analysis, frequency band visualization, logarithmic intensity variation evaluation, and motility-based analysis. These algorithms were originally optimized for different OCT technologies (full-field OCT, microscopic OCT, swept-source OCT, and spectral domain OCT), which vary in temporal and spatial resolution as well as susceptibility to motion artifacts. To conduct a fair evaluation, we perform comprehensive cross-wise comparisons using datasets acquired from each of these setups. Our findings reveal that each method exhibits unique advantages in specific imaging environments, thereby providing valuable guidance for algorithm selection based on particular application requirements.
data.title_cn: 动态 OCT 数据分析指南
data.abstract_cn: 动态光学相干断层扫描 (DOCT) 通过提供与血流动力学、细胞运动和细胞器代谢活动相关的特定信息来增强传统 OCT。这些生物现象可以根据 OCT 架构参数（包括波长、数值孔径和实现方法（时域或傅里叶域））以不同的灵敏度进行检测。尽管具有潜力，但该领域缺乏标准化，因为各个研究小组都针对特定应用独立开发了算法。在本文中，我们比较了四种广泛使用的 DOCT 算法，每种算法都采用不同的分析方法：功率谱密度矩分析、频带可视化、对数强度变化评估和基于运动性的分析。这些算法最初针对不同的 OCT 技术（全视场 OCT、显微 OCT、扫频 OCT 和谱域 OCT）进行优化，这些技术的时间和空间分辨率以及对运动伪影的敏感性各不相同。为了进行公平的评估，我们使用从每个设置获取的数据集进行全面的交叉比较。我们的研究结果表明，每种方法在特定的成像环境中都表现出独特的优势，从而为根据特定应用需求选择算法提供了宝贵的指导。

data.title: Phasor theory of fluorescence lifetime imaging utilized on a maximum range of frequencies for prostate tissue analysis
data.author: Ryan A. L. Schoop, Lotte M. de Roode, Alba Alfonso-García, Farzad Fereidouni, Lisanne L. de Boer, Laura Marcu, Theo J. M. Ruers
data.summary: Fluorescence lifetime imaging (FLIm) can detect macroscopic tumor tissue in various organs by measuring tissue autofluorescence, making it a compelling tool for surgical guidance. However, the fluorescence lifetime characteristics of tissue autofluorescence are complex due to the unpredictable microenvironment of the biomolecules in tissue, which complicates data interpretation. Nevertheless, the phasor analysis method is computationally fast and easily interpretable, making it appealing for clinical applications of FLIm. While many implementations of the phasor analysis operate only at a single frequency or a few harmonic frequencies, the phasor theory applied to pulse sampling FLIm as presented in this study leverages the maximum amount of frequency information, thereby extending the set of features available for tissue characterization. The clinical effectiveness of utilizing the maximum range of frequencies in phasor theory applied to pulse-sampling FLIm is demonstrated by investigating tumor detection in ex vivo tissue from 12 patients with prostate cancer. By accounting for the zonal anatomy of the prostate, it is shown that the degree of separability between healthy and tumor tissue is a function of frequency, and hence, the ability to access arbitrary frequency content can improve tumor detection in clinical guidance.
data.title_cn: 荧光寿命成像相量理论用于前列腺组织分析的最大频率范围
data.abstract_cn: 荧光寿命成像（FLIm）可以通过测量组织自发荧光来检测各种器官中的宏观肿瘤组织，使其成为手术指导的有力工具。然而，由于组织中生物分子的微环境不可预测，组织自发荧光的荧光寿命特征很复杂，这使得数据解释变得复杂。尽管如此，相量分析方法计算速度快且易于解释，使其对 FLIm 的临床应用很有吸引力。虽然相量分析的许多实现仅在单个频率或几个谐波频率下运行，但本研究中提出的应用于脉冲采样 FLIm 的相量理论利用了最大量的频率信息，从而扩展了可用于组织表征的特征集。通过研究 12 名前列腺癌患者的离体组织中的肿瘤检测，证明了将相量理论中的最大频率范围应用于脉冲采样 FLIm 的临床有效性。通过考虑前列腺的带状解剖结构，表明健康组织和肿瘤组织之间的可分离程度是频率的函数，因此，访问任意频率内容的能力可以改善临床指导中的肿瘤检测。

data.title: Seeing nonspectral colors with single wavelength stimulation in two-photon vision
data.author: Linus Emmerich, Pedro Gil, Silvestre Manzanera, Juan Tabernero, Pablo Artal, Christina Schwarz
data.summary: Pulsed near-infrared (NIR) lasers can be perceived as light of approximately half their wavelength due to the process of two-photon (2P) absorption. For high intensities of light, single-photon (1P) absorption can still be perceived beyond 700 nm, so that the overall color perception in this region is the result of a mix of 1P and 2P absorption. In this study, color matching experiments were performed with seven laser wavelengths between 730 and 920 nm to investigate the interaction between 1P and 2P absorption and the range of colors that can be created by changing the laser power and repetition frequency of a ns-pulsed laser. We recorded color matches in a range from pure red for shorter wavelengths across shades of purple up to pure blue colors for the longest wavelengths, showing that nonspectral (purple) colors can be created using only one stimulating wavelength in the NIR. Changes in hue could be observed between wavelengths of 850 nm and 920 nm when laser power or repetition frequency were modified, with the highest color shifts occurring between 880 nm and 900 nm.
data.title_cn: 在双光子视觉中通过单波长刺激看到非光谱颜色
data.abstract_cn: 由于双光子 (2P) 吸收过程，脉冲近红外 (NIR) 激光可以被感知为大约其波长一半的光。对于高强度光，单光子 (1P) 吸收在 700 nm 之外仍可被感知，因此该区域的整体颜色感知是 1P 和 2P 吸收混合的结果。在这项研究中，使用 730 至 920 nm 之间的七个激光波长进行了颜色匹配实验，以研究 1P 和 2P 吸收之间的相互作用以及通过改变 ns 脉冲激光的激光功率和重复频率可以产生的颜色范围。我们记录了一系列颜色匹配，从较短波长的纯红色到紫色色调的纯红色，到最长波长的纯蓝色，表明仅使用近红外中的一种刺激波长即可创建非光谱（紫色）颜色。当改变激光功率或重复频率时，可以在 850 nm 和 920 nm 波长之间观察到色调变化，其中最大的色移发生在 880 nm 和 900 nm 之间。

data.title: Transforming hyperspectral data into insight: the DREAM approach for pathology
data.author: Mason Hong, Daniel E. S. Koo, Jason Junge, Scott E. Fraser, Francesco Cutrale
data.summary: Quantitative pathology remains limited due to the need for chemical staining and subjective interpretation of tissue features. Autofluorescence imaging offers a label-free alternative; however, high-dimensional excitation-emission datasets pose challenges for visualization and reproducible analysis. Here, we present Dimensionality Reduction for Enhanced Autofluorescence Microscopy (DREAM), a method that condenses multi-excitation emission spectra into a compact, information-rich format using phasor-based tools. Applied to unstained esophageal tissue samples, DREAM enables high-contrast visualizations that distinguish key histological structures without the need for exogenous labeling. Quantitative assessments across multiple datasets show DREAM improves colorfulness, sharpness, and consistency over single-laser acquisitions, supporting its potential to advance objective, label-free diagnostics through enhanced spectral visualization.
data.title_cn: 将高光谱数据转化为洞察力：病理学的 DREAM 方法
data.abstract_cn: 由于需要化学染色和对组织特征的主观解释，定量病理学仍然受到限制。自发荧光成像提供了一种无标记的替代方案；然而，高维激发发射数据集对可视化和可重复分析提出了挑战。在这里，我们提出了增强型自发荧光显微镜降维（DREAM），这是一种使用基于相量的工具将多激发发射光谱压缩成紧凑、信息丰富的格式的方法。 DREAM 应用于未染色的食管组织样本，可实现高对比度可视化，无需外源标记即可区分关键组织学结构。跨多个数据集的定量评估表明，DREAM 比单激光采集提高了色彩度、清晰度和一致性，支持其通过增强的光谱可视化推进客观、无标记诊断的潜力。

data.title: Keratoconus diagnosis based on macro-micro corneal characteristics via optical coherence tomography
data.author: Changyong Chen, Fan Zhang, Yun Tang, Huidou Cao, Lingmei Chen, Shuhao Qian, Lu Yang, Jia Meng, Rushan Jiang, Chuncheng Wang, Shuangmu Zhuo, Zhihua Ding, Meixiao Shen, Zhangliang Li, Fangjun Bao, Yun-e Zhao, Zhiyi Liu
data.summary: Keratoconus is an ophthalmopathy characterized by a central thinning that commonly causes irregular astigmatism and high myopia. However, the diagnostic standards of keratoconus have not yet been well established clinically and mainly rely on macro characteristics measured through corneal topography. To describe the micro changes conveyed by collagen microstructures in the corneal stroma and provide a new insight for keratoconus, we developed a quantitative diagnostic method combining macro-micro information via in vivo optical coherence tomography (OCT). A comparison experiment was designed to confirm the feasibility of characterizing collagen organization using OCT. Macro variables, including heterogeneity in curvature and thickness of cornea, and micro variables of collagen fiber alignment, were calculated and weighted to define the keratoconus potential index (KPI) as a quantitative measure for diagnosing keratoconus and mapping disease risks of 104 participants, which showed excellent diagnostic power (with an area under the curve of 0.991) in keratoconus detection.
data.title_cn: 基于光学相干断层扫描宏观微观角膜特征的圆锥角膜诊断
data.abstract_cn: 圆锥角膜是一种以中央变薄为特征的眼病，通常会导致不规则散光和高度近视。然而，临床上圆锥角膜的诊断标准尚未建立，主要依靠角膜地形图测量的宏观特征。为了描述角膜基质中胶原微结构所传达的微观变化，并为圆锥角膜提供新的见解，我们开发了一种通过体内光学相干断层扫描（OCT）结合宏观和微观信息的定量诊断方法。设计了一项比较实验来证实使用 OCT 表征胶原蛋白组织的可行性。通过计算和加权宏观变量，包括角膜曲率和厚度的异质性，以及胶原纤维排列的微观变量，定义圆锥角膜电位指数（KPI），作为诊断圆锥角膜和绘制 104 名参与者疾病风险的定量指标，在圆锥角膜检测中表现出出色的诊断能力（曲线下面积为 0.991）。

data.title: Nonlinear optical microscopy with an obscuration-free, freeform reflective objective
data.author: Yryx Y. Luna Palacios, Tuyet N. A. Hoang, Salile Khandani, Stephan Clark, Aaron Bauer, Jannick P. Rolland, Eric O. Potma, Adam M. Hanninen
data.summary: Nonlinear optical (NLO) imaging platforms traditionally rely on refractive microscope objectives, which suffer from chromatic aberrations and temporal dispersion of pulsed excitation light. These issues degrade spatial imaging properties and signal brightness. Furthermore, the limited transmission range of refractive materials restricts NLO imaging, especially for applications requiring short- to mid-wave infrared excitation. While reflective microscope objectives offer an achromatic solution and broader transmission range (from visible to mid-infrared), conventional Schwarzschild designs have a central obscuration, which limits transmission throughput, imparts diffraction effects into the images, and, more generally, hinders the adoption of reflective optics in NLO microscopy. We overcome these obscuration-based limitations by developing a reflective microscope objective using freeform mirrors in a non-coaxial geometry. This obscuration-free design boasts a 0.65 numerical aperture (NA), near diffraction-limited imaging performance, and offers significantly improved transmission with wider fields-of-view. We demonstrate its utility by integrating it into a standard laser-scanning microscope and performing NLO microscopy across a wide range of excitation wavelengths. Our freeform microscope objective outperforms standard reflective designs, providing an achromatic, dispersion-free alternative to refractive lenses for NLO imaging.
data.title_cn: 具有无遮挡、自由形状反射物镜的非线性光学显微镜
data.abstract_cn: 非线性光学 (NLO) 成像平台传统上依赖于折射显微镜物镜，该物镜会受到脉冲激发光的色差和时间色散的影响。这些问题会降低空间成像特性和信号亮度。此外，折射材料有限的传输范围限制了非线性光学成像，特别是对于需要短波到中波红外激发的应用。虽然反射显微镜物镜提供消色差解决方案和更广泛的传输范围（从可见光到中红外），但传统的史瓦西设计具有中心遮光，这限制了传输吞吐量，给图像带来衍射效应，更普遍的是，阻碍了反射光学在非线性光学显微镜中的采用。我们通过使用非同轴几何形状的自由曲面镜开发反射显微镜物镜，克服了这些基于遮挡的限制。这种无遮挡设计拥有 0.65 的数值孔径 (NA)、接近衍射极限的成像性能，并提供显着改善的传输和更宽的视场。我们通过将其集成到标准激光扫描显微镜中并在广泛的激发波长范围内执行非线性光学显微镜来展示其实用性。我们的自由曲面显微镜物镜的性能优于标准反射设计，为非线性光学成像的折射透镜提供了消色差、无色散的替代方案。

data.title: Visualization of dose parameters and efficacy prediction in vascular-targeted photodynamic therapy based on a hyperspectral imaging system
data.author: Rongrui Zhang, Jing Wang, Shasha Wang, Jing Liu, Yawen Wang, Junduo Liu, Jing Lv, Jingrui Zhao, Lei Fu, Qiangzhou Rong, Weihui Zeng, Cuiping Yao
data.summary: Vascular-targeted photodynamic therapy (V-PDT) is a promising treatment for benign vascular proliferative disorders. However, its efficacy largely depends on clinicians’ experience due to the lack of reliable methods for efficacy prediction. To provide an objective prediction approach, a hyperspectral imaging (HSI) system was developed to achieve real-time, non-invasive visualization of V-PDT dose parameters, including photosensitizer distribution, oxygen concentration, and vasoconstriction. Based on these measurements, we proposed a photodynamic therapy efficacy prediction index (PEPI)—a new metric that integrates the dynamic changes of both photosensitizer and oxygen throughout the treatment process, thereby providing critical insights for optimizing treatment protocols. Experimental results obtained in vivo using a dorsal skinfold window model demonstrate that the system accurately detects V-PDT dose parameters, and the proposed efficacy prediction parameters exhibit a strong positive correlation with treatment outcomes. This work highlights the potential of hyperspectral imaging to advance V-PDT toward more precise, individualized, and effective clinical applications, paving the way for its broader adoption in the field of precision medicine.
data.title_cn: 基于高光谱成像系统的血管靶向光动力治疗剂量参数可视化和疗效预测
data.abstract_cn: 血管靶向光动力疗法（V-PDT）是良性血管增殖性疾病的一种有前景的治疗方法。然而，由于缺乏可靠的疗效预测方法，其疗效在很大程度上取决于临床医生的经验。为了提供客观的预测方法，开发了高光谱成像（HSI）系统来实现 V-PDT 剂量参数的实时、无创可视化，包括光敏剂分布、氧气浓度和血管收缩。基于这些测量，我们提出了光动力治疗疗效预测指数（PEPI）——一种新的指标，整合了整个治疗过程中光敏剂和氧气的动态变化，从而为优化治疗方案提供了重要的见解。使用背侧皮褶窗模型获得的体内实验结果表明，该系统可以准确检测V-PDT剂量参数，并且所提出的疗效预测参数与治疗结果表现出很强的正相关性。这项工作凸显了高光谱成像推动 V-PDT 走向更精确、个性化和有效的临床应用的潜力，为其在精准医疗领域的更广泛应用铺平了道路。

data.title: Optical finger phantom with realistic optical properties
data.author: Markus Wagner, Christian Blum, Alwin Kienle, Florian Foschum
data.summary: Existing optical phantoms often do not represent realistic optical and geometrical properties. This study aimed to fabricate a homogeneous silicone finger phantom that closely mimics the reflectance and transmittance characteristics of a human finger by precisely adjusting the absorption and reduced scattering coefficients in the visible wavelength range. The absorption and reduced scattering coefficients of a human finger were determined using a custom inverse model tailored for an integrating sphere system designed for cylindrical media illuminated along the barrel. To reproduce the retrieved optical properties in silicone, a reference database was created by characterizing the absorption spectra of 15 pigments dispersed in a silicone matrix. An automated fitting algorithm identified five suitable absorbing pigments, and their required concentrations were calculated to match the target absorption spectrum. The reduced scattering coefficient was independently controlled by varying the concentration of zirconium dioxide particles. An alginate mould was used to capture the finger geometry, ensuring anatomical accuracy of the phantom. The fabricated silicone finger phantom closely matched the human finger in both transmittance and reflectance, as well as in its anatomical shape. The Δ E 2000 value between the reflectance spectra of the human and silicone fingers was found to be 0.85. Under transmittance-mode illumination, light propagation within the silicone phantom agreed well with that of a human finger, both in visual appearance and in spatial light distribution. A method was developed to fabricate silicone finger phantoms with accurately matched optical and anatomical properties.
data.title_cn: 具有真实光学特性的光学手指模型
data.abstract_cn: 现有的光学模型通常不能代表真实的光学和几何特性。本研究旨在通过精确调整可见光波长范围内的吸收和降低散射系数来制造均匀的硅胶手指模型，该模型密切模仿人类手指的反射率和透射率特性。使用专为积分球系统定制的定制逆模型来确定人手指的吸收和减少散射系数，该积分球系统专为沿筒照明的圆柱形介质而设计。为了再现检索到的有机硅光学特性，通过表征分散在有机硅基质中的 15 种颜料的吸收光谱来创建参考数据库。自动拟合算法确定了五种合适的吸收颜料，并计算了它们所需的浓度以匹配目标吸收光谱。通过改变二氧化锆颗粒的浓度独立地控制降低的散射系数。使用藻酸盐模具来捕获手指的几何形状，确保模型的解剖学准确性。制作的硅胶手指模型在透射率和反射率以及解剖形状方面与人类手指非常匹配。人类手指和硅胶手指的反射光谱之间的 Δ E 2000 值为 0.85。在透射模式照明下，硅胶模型内的光传播在视觉外观和空间光分布上都与人类手指的传播非常吻合。开发了一种方法来制造具有精确匹配的光学和解剖特性的硅胶手指模型。

data.title: OCTA-ReVA + AV : an open-source toolbox for retinal artery–vein segmentation and analysis in OCT angiography
data.author: Masrur A. Sadhin, Albert K. Dadzie, Mansour Abtahi, Behrouz Ebrahimi, Amit H. Sadhin, Taeyoon Son, Michael J. Heiferman, Jennifer I. Lim, Xincheng Yao
data.summary: Optical coherence tomography angiography (OCTA) is a pivotal imaging modality for non-invasive visualization of the retinal microvasculature, but current clinical OCTA systems lack the capability to segment and quantify vascular features separately for arteries and veins. This study introduces OCTA-ReVA + AV , an open-source, fully automated toolbox that integrates deep learning-based artery–vein (AV) segmentation and vessel-specific quantitative analysis of OCTA images. OCTA-ReVA + AV computes a comprehensive set of vascular metrics including blood vessel density (BVD), vessel skeleton density (VSD), vessel perimeter index (VPI), blood vessel caliber (BVC), blood vessel tortuosity (BVT), vessel complexity index (VCI), perfusion intensity density (PID), vessel area flux (VAF), and normalized blood flow index (NBFI) independently for arteries and veins. These features are extracted within a user-friendly graphical interface and demonstrate high repeatability and segmentation consistency. By separately quantifying arterial and venous alterations, OCTA-ReVA + AV fills a critical gap in OCTA analytics, enhancing detection and monitoring of retinal vascular diseases.
data.title_cn: OCTA-ReVA + AV：用于 OCT 血管造影中视网膜动静脉分割和分析的开源工具箱
data.abstract_cn: 光学相干断层扫描血管造影 (OCTA) 是视网膜微血管无创可视化的关键成像方式，但目前的临床 OCTA 系统缺乏分别分割和量化动脉和静脉血管特征的能力。本研究介绍了 OCTA-ReVA + AV，这是一个开源、全自动的工具箱，集成了基于深度学习的动静脉 (AV) 分割和 OCTA 图像的血管特异性定量分析。 OCTA-ReVA + AV 可独立计算动脉和静脉的一组全面的血管指标，包括血管密度 (BVD)、血管骨架密度 (VSD)、血管周长指数 (VPI)、血管口径 (BVC)、血管迂曲度 (BVT)、血管复杂性指数 (VCI)、灌注强度密度 (PID)、血管面积通量 (VAF) 和标准化血流指数 (NBFI)。这些特征是在用户友好的图形界面中提取的，并表现出高重复性和分段一致性。通过分别量化动脉和静脉的变化，OCTA-ReVA + AV 填补了 OCTA 分析的关键空白，增强了视网膜血管疾病的检测和监测。

data.title: Portable in vivo confocal ophthalmoscope for non-contact imaging of the cornea and anterior segment of the eye
data.author: Kenneth Marcelino, Momoka Sugimura, Carmella Ocaya, Kian Sadat, Rafael Romero, Yongjun Kim, Michael Gnesda, Kayma Konecny, Kyungjo Kim, Thomas M. Lietman, Milind Rajadhyaksha, Jaya D. Chidambaram, Dongkyun Kang
data.summary: We present a novel portable in vivo confocal ophthalmoscope (PICO) designed to enable non-contact imaging of the cornea and anterior segment of the eye. PICO uses a broadband light source and diffraction gratings to acquire two-dimensional confocal images without any beam scanning mechanisms. A dry objective lens with a long working distance was used to image the external eye without making physical contact with the cornea or ocular surface. Lateral resolution of 2.2-2.7 μm and axial resolution of 8.1 μm were achieved with PICO when imaging ex vivo animal corneas, and provided reliable signal levels when images were acquired at high speeds of 100-135 frames/sec. The resulting images enable clear visualization of characteristic cellular morphological details of the cornea, including epithelial cells, corneal nerve fibers, stromal keratocytes, and endothelial cells. These preliminary results from high-speed PICO imaging of animal corneas merit further evaluation of the prototype device for in vivo human corneal imaging.
data.title_cn: 便携式活体共焦检眼镜，用于角膜和眼前节的非接触式成像
data.abstract_cn: 我们推出了一种新型便携式体内共焦检眼镜（PICO），旨在实现角膜和眼前节的非接触式成像。 PICO 使用宽带光源和衍射光栅来获取二维共焦图像，无需任何光束扫描机制。使用具有长工作距离的干式物镜对外眼进行成像，而无需与角膜或眼表面进行物理接触。在对离体动物角膜进行成像时，PICO 可实现 2.2-2.7 μm 的横向分辨率和 8.1 μm 的轴向分辨率，并在以 100-135 帧/秒的高速采集图像时提供可靠的信号水平。所得图像能够清晰地显示角膜的特征性细胞形态细节，包括上皮细胞、角膜神经纤维、基质角膜细胞和内皮细胞。这些来自动物角膜高速 PICO 成像的初步结果值得对人体角膜体内成像原型设备进行进一步评估。

data.title: In-situ non-invasive detection of cellular reactive oxygen species by integrating Raman spectrum and bidirectional gated recurrent unit models
data.author: Chuhan Zhang, Shengde Liu, Jianhui Wan, Weina Zhang, Liyun Zhong, Xiaoxu Lu
data.summary: Cellular reactive oxygen species (ROS), a key parameter involved in cell metabolism, signaling, and apoptosis, whose detection is necessary to achieve in a variety of biological processes. However, current ROS detection methods, including fluorescence, colorimetry, and electrochemical methods, are difficult to achieve in-situ non-invasive detection due to their reliance on invasive probes or destructive sampling. In this study, we propose an in-situ non-invasive ROS detection integrating the Raman spectrum and a bidirectional gated recurrent unit (Bi-GRU) deep learning model during HepG2 cell apoptosis. The Bi-GRU model leverages bidirectional gating mechanisms to capture long-term dependencies in Raman spectra while incorporating both forward and backward spectral information for enhanced feature extraction. After training with spectral data of HepG2 cells in various apoptotic states, the R 2 (coefficient of determination) of the Bi-GRU model reaches 0.8511, which outperforms that of traditional methods such as KNN (0.2607), PLS (0.4720), and RNN (0.7724). In the present study, we not only realized the in-situ and non-invasive cellular ROS detection but also expanded the application of artificial intelligence in the field of cellular medicine. Importantly, this will provide a new research idea for further understanding the physiological state of cells and the mechanism of drug action.
data.title_cn: 通过集成拉曼光谱和双向门控循环单元模型对细胞活性氧进行原位无创检测
data.abstract_cn: 细胞活性氧（ROS）是参与细胞代谢、信号传导和细胞凋亡的关键参数，其检测对于多种生物过程中实现是必要的。然而，目前的ROS检测方法，包括荧光法、比色法、电化学法等，由于依赖侵入式探针或破坏性采样，难以实现原位无创检测。在本研究中，我们提出了一种在 HepG2 细胞凋亡过程中集成拉曼光谱和双向门控循环单元（Bi-GRU）深度学习模型的原位非侵入性 ROS 检测。 Bi-GRU 模型利用双向门控机制来捕获拉曼光谱的长期依赖性，同时结合前向和后向光谱信息以增强特征提取。使用不同凋亡状态的HepG2细胞的光谱数据进行训练后，Bi-GRU模型的R 2 （决定系数）达到0.8511，优于KNN（0.2607）、PLS（0.4720）和RNN（0.7724）等传统方法。在本研究中，我们不仅实现了原位、无创的细胞ROS检测，而且拓展了人工智能在细胞医学领域的应用。重要的是，这将为进一步了解细胞的生理状态和药物作用机制提供新的研究思路。

data.title: Fourier ptychographic enhancement of iterative pathways: autonomous 3D momentum coordination in hybrid ML-PIE architectures
data.author: Yiwen Chen, Yuncheng Wang, Jingze Zheng, Hongnian Liu, Jianan Li, Tingfa Xu
data.summary: While data-driven deep learning has empirically advanced ptychographic reconstruction, its inherent limitations—a lack of theoretical interpretability and limited adaptability—remain unresolved. Emerging hybrid architectures integrate physics-based ptychographic iterative engines (PIE) with machine-learning (ML) optimization to preserve interpretability while achieving superior gradient-search performance. Our previous work introduced momentum-accelerated co-optimization (using first- and second-order methods) for single-iteration PIE updates, which simplified hyperparameter configuration in ML-enhanced modules. However, PIE’s inherent process of two-dimensional fixed-point adjustment creates a paradox between optimization and stability: achieving high performance requires compensatory hyperparameters to balance transient performance and long-term convergence. This dilemma leads to a fundamental conflict between momentum-driven adaptability and iterative equilibrium, posing a challenge for developing universally stable hybrid architectures. To address these limitations, we have revisited the optimization direction selection in conventional PIE workflows by analyzing Fourier ptychographic microscopy (FPM). We introduce a three-dimensional (3D) autonomous iterative path design framework in which the reconstruction stage is treated as a third spatial dimension. This transforms the conventional challenge of 2D fixed-point tuning into a systematic parameter space planning problem. Extensive tests demonstrate that our proposed method, Adam-DPIE (Dynamic PIE with Adaptive Moment Estimation integration), overcomes three key constraints in current designs: the large number of hyperparameters, hyperparameter sensitivity, and the trade-off between optimization and stability. Remarkably, Adam-DPIE achieves this with only a single hyperparameter while maintaining backward compatibility. This approach provides both methodological insights into PIE research and practical solutions enabling high-performance biomedical imaging systems.
data.title_cn: 迭代路径的傅里叶叠层增强：混合 ML-PIE 架构中的自主 3D 动量协调
data.abstract_cn: 虽然数据驱动的深度学习在经验上推进了叠图重建，但其固有的局限性——缺乏理论可解释性和有限的适应性——仍未得到解决。新兴的混合架构将基于物理的叠印迭代引擎 (PIE) 与机器学习 (ML) 优化相集成，以保持可解释性，同时实现卓越的梯度搜索性能。我们之前的工作引入了用于单次迭代 PIE 更新的动量加速协同优化（使用一阶和二阶方法），这简化了 ML 增强模块中的超参数配置。然而，PIE 固有的二维定点调整过程造成了优化与稳定性之间的悖论：实现高性能需要补偿性超参数来平衡瞬态性能和长期收敛。这种困境导致了动量驱动的适应性和迭代平衡之间的根本冲突，对开发普遍稳定的混合架构提出了挑战。为了解决这些限制，我们通过分析傅里叶叠层显微镜 (FPM) 重新审视了传统 PIE 工作流程中的优化方向选择。我们引入了三维（3D）自主迭代路径设计框架，其中重建阶段被视为第三个空间维度。这将 2D 定点调整的传统挑战转化为系统参数空间规划问题。大量测试表明，我们提出的方法 Adam-DPIE（具有自适应矩估计集成的动态 PIE）克服了当前设计中的三个关键限制：大量超参数、超参数敏感性以及优化与稳定性之间的权衡。值得注意的是，Adam-DPIE 仅使用单个超参数即可实现这一目标，同时保持向后兼容性。这种方法提供了对 PIE 研究的方法论见解和实现高性能生物医学成像系统的实用解决方案。

data.title: Light-sheet microscopy: a tutorial
data.author: Omar E. Olarte, Jordi Andilla, Emilio J. Gualda, Pablo Loza-Alvarez
data.summary: This paper is intended to give a comprehensive review of light-sheet (LS) microscopy from an optics perspective. As such, emphasis is placed on the advantages that LS microscope configurations present, given the degree of freedom gained by uncoupling the excitation and detection arms. The new imaging properties are first highlighted in terms of optical parameters and how these have enabled several biomedical applications. Then, the basics are presented for understanding how a LS microscope works. This is followed by a presentation of a tutorial for LS microscope designs, each working at different resolutions and for different applications. Then, based on a numerical Fourier analysis and given the multiple possibilities for generating the LS in the microscope (using Gaussian, Bessel, and Airy beams in the linear and nonlinear regimes), a systematic comparison of their optical performance is presented. Finally, based on advances in optics and photonics, the novel optical implementations possible in a LS microscope are highlighted.
data.title_cn: 光片显微镜：教程
data.abstract_cn: 本文旨在从光学角度对光片（LS）显微镜进行全面回顾。因此，考虑到通过解耦激发臂和检测臂获得的自由度，重点强调 LS 显微镜配置所具有的优势。新的成像特性首先在光学参数以及这些特性如何实现多种生物医学应用方面得到强调。然后，介绍了解 LS 显微镜工作原理的基础知识。接下来是 LS 显微镜设计教程的演示，每种显微镜在不同的分辨率下工作并针对不同的应用。然后，基于数值傅立叶分析，并给出在显微镜中生成 LS 的多种可能性（在线性和非线性状态下使用高斯光束、贝塞尔光束和艾里光束），对它们的光学性能进行系统比较。最后，基于光学和光子学的进步，重点介绍了 LS 显微镜中可能的新颖光学实现。

data.title: Recent advances in high-contrast metastructures, metasurfaces, and photonic crystals
data.author: Pengfei Qiao, Weijian Yang, Connie J. Chang-Hasnain
data.summary: In the recent decade, the research field using arrays of high-index-contrast near-wavelength dieletric structures on flat surfaces, known as high-contrast metastructures (HCMs) or metasurfaces, has emerged and expanded rapidly. Although the HCMs and metasurfaces share great similarities in physical structures with photonic crystals (PhCs), i.e. periodic nanostructures, many differences exist in their design, analysis, operation conditions, and applications. In this paper, we provide a generalized theoretical understanding of the two subjects and show their intrinsic connections. We further discuss the simulation and design approaches, categorized by their functionalities and applications. The similarity and differences between HCMs, metasurfaces and PhCs are also discussed. New findings are presented regarding the physical connection between the PhC band structures and the 1D and 2D HCM scattering spectra under transverse and longitudinal tilt incidence. Novel designs using HCMs as holograms, spatial light modulators, and surface plasmonic couplers are discussed. Recent advances on HCMs, metasurfaces and PhCs are reviewed and compared for applications such as broadband mirrors, waveguides, couplers, resonators, and reconfigurable optics.
data.title_cn: 高对比度超结构、超表面和光子晶体的最新进展
