data.abstract_cn: 近十年来，在平面上使用高折射率对比度近波长介电结构阵列（称为高对比度超结构（HCM）或超表面）的研究领域已经出现并迅速扩展。尽管HCM和超表面与光子晶体（PhC）（即周期性纳米结构）在物理结构上有很大相似之处，但它们在设计、分析、操作条件和应用方面存在许多差异。在本文中，我们提供了对这两个主题的广义理论理解并展示了它们的内在联系。我们进一步讨论模拟和设计方法，按其功能和应用进行分类。还讨论了 HCM、超表面和 PhC 之间的相似性和差异。提出了关于横向和纵向倾斜入射下 PhC 能带结构与 1D 和 2D HCM 散射光谱之间的物理联系的新发现。讨论了使用 HCM 作为全息图、空间光调制器和表面等离子体耦合器的新颖设计。回顾并比较了 HCM、超表面和 PhC 的最新进展，并比较了宽带反射镜、波导、耦合器、谐振器和可重构光学器件等应用。

data.title: Low-operating-energy directly modulated lasers for short-distance optical interconnects
data.author: Shinji Matsuo, Takaaki Kakitsuka
data.summary: We review recent developments in directly modulated lasers (DMLs) with low operating energy for datacom and computercom applications. Key issues are their operating energy and the cost for employing them in these applications. To decrease the operating energy, it is important to reduce the active volume of the laser while maintaining the cavity Q-factor or photon lifetime in the cavity. Therefore, how to achieve high-reflectivity mirrors has been the main challenge in reducing the operating energy. In terms of the required output power from the lasers, the required input power into the photodetector and the transmission distance determine the lower limit of laser active volume. Therefore, the operating energy and output power are in a trade-off relationship. In designing the lasers, the cavity volume, quantum well number, and optical confinement factor are critical parameters. For reducing the cost, it is important to fabricate a large-scale photonic integrated circuit (PIC) comprising DMLs, an optical multiplexer, and monitor photodetectors because the lower assembly cost reduces the overall cost. In this context, silicon (Si) photonics technology plays a key role in fabricating large-scale PICs with low cost, and heterogeneous integration of DMLs and Si photonics devices has attracted much attention. We will describe fabrication technologies for heterogeneous integration and experimental results for DMLs on a Si substrate.
data.title_cn: 用于短距离光学互连的低工作能量直接调制激光器
data.abstract_cn: 我们回顾了用于数据通信和计算机通信应用的低运行能量直接调制激光器 (DML) 的最新发展。关键问题是它们的运行能量以及在这些应用中使用它们的成本。为了降低工作能量，重要的是减少激光器的有效体积，同时保持腔内的 Q 因子或光子寿命。因此，如何实现高反射率的反射镜一直是降低运行能耗的主要挑战。就激光器所需的输出功率而言，光电探测器所需的输入功率和传输距离决定了激光器有效体积的下限。因此，运行能量和输出功率呈权衡关系。在设计激光器时，腔体积、量子阱数和光学限制因子是关键参数。为了降低成本，制造包括DML、光复用器和监控光电探测器的大规模光子集成电路（PIC）非常重要，因为较低的组装成本可以降低总体成本。在此背景下，硅（Si）光子技术在低成本制造大规模PIC中发挥着关键作用，DML和硅光子器件的异构集成备受关注。我们将描述 Si 衬底上 DML 的异构集成制造技术和实验结果。

data.title: Optics technology for large-aperture space telescopes: from fabrication to final acceptance tests
data.author: Isaac Trumper, Pascal Hallibert, Jonathan W. Arenberg, Hideyo Kunieda, Olivier Guyon, H. Philip Stahl, Dae Wook Kim
data.summary: This review paper addresses topics of fabrication, testing, alignment, and as-built performance of reflective space optics for the next generation of telescopes across the x-ray to far-infrared spectrum. The technology presented in the manuscript represents the most promising methods to enable a next level of astronomical observation capabilities for space-based telescopes as motivated by the science community. While the technology to produce the proposed telescopes does not exist in its final form, the optics industry is making steady and impressive progress toward these goals across all disciplines. We hope that through sharing these developments in context of the science objectives, further connections and improvements are enabled to push the envelope of the technology.
data.title_cn: 大口径太空望远镜的光学技术：从制造到最终验收测试
data.abstract_cn: 这篇综述论文讨论了下一代 X 射线到远红外光谱望远镜的反射空间光学器件的制造、测试、对准和竣工性能等主题。手稿中提出的技术代表了最有前途的方法，可以在科学界的推动下，使天基望远镜的天文观测能力达到新的水平。虽然生产所提出的望远镜的技术尚未以最终形式存在，但光学行业在所有学科中都在朝着这些目标取得了稳定而令人印象深刻的进展。我们希望通过在科学目标的背景下分享这些进展，能够实现进一步的联系和改进，以推动技术的发展。

data.title: Quantum plasmonics: new opportunity in fundamental and applied photonics
data.author: Da Xu, Xiao Xiong, Lin Wu, Xi-Feng Ren, Ching Eng Png, Guang-Can Guo, Qihuang Gong, Yun-Feng Xiao
data.summary: Surface plasmons allow electromagnetic fields to be confined to subwavelength scale, well beyond the classical optical diffraction limit. With continuous reduction of optical mode volume into the deep subwavelength scale, a new era of quantum plasmonics opens up that investigates the quantum behavior of surface plasmons and their interactions with matter. This emerging and exciting field creates many new opportunities in advancing the boundaries of fundamental science and applied quantum technology. This review covers recent breakthroughs from three unique and important perspectives: the fundamental quantum properties of plasmon-polaritons, plasmon-polaritons interacting with quantum emitters, and plasmon-polaritons stepping into quantum technology. A clear development map of quantum plasmonics is also established for the reader.
data.title_cn: 量子等离子体：基础和应用光子学的新机遇
data.abstract_cn: 表面等离子体激元允许将电磁场限制在亚波长范围内，远远超出经典光学衍射极限。随着光学模式体积不断减小到深亚波长尺度，量子等离子体激元的新时代开启了，该时代研究表面等离子体激元的量子行为及其与物质的相互作用。这个新兴且令人兴奋的领域为推进基础科学和应用量子技术的边界创造了许多新的机会。这篇综述从三个独特而重要的角度涵盖了最新的突破：等离激元极化子的基本量子特性、等离激元极化子与量子发射器相互作用以及等离激元极化子进入量子技术。还为读者建立了清晰的量子等离子体学发展图谱。

data.title: Subwavelength interference of light on structured surfaces
data.author: Xiangang Luo, DinPing Tsai, Min Gu, Minghui Hong
data.summary: This paper presents a review of the subwavelength interference effects of light in structured surfaces. Starting from the anomalous interference in simple structures such as double nanoslits, thin films, and catenary apertures, the theories and applications of light–matter interaction in layered, periodic, and aperiodic subwavelength structures are discussed. Two basic platforms, i.e., Young’s double slits and the Fabry–Perot cavity, are used as prototypes for the investigation of the complex interference of surface waves. It is shown that these novel phenomena could dramatically reduce the characteristic lengths of functional devices and increase the resolution of optical imaging. By engineering the dispersion of surface waves, broadband responses beyond traditional limits in both temporal and spatial regimes have been demonstrated. As a final remark, the current challenges and future trends of subwavelength interference engineering are addressed.
data.title_cn: 光在结构化表面上的亚波长干涉
data.abstract_cn: 本文综述了结构表面中光的亚波长干涉效应。从双纳米缝、薄膜、悬链线孔径等简单结构中的反常干涉出发，讨论了层状、周期性和非周期性亚波长结构中光与物质相互作用的理论和应用。两个基本平台，即杨氏双缝和法布里-珀罗腔，被用作研究表面波复杂干涉的原型。研究表明，这些新颖的现象可以极大地减少功能器件的特征长度并提高光学成像的分辨率。通过设计表面波的色散，已经证明了在时间和空间范围内超出传统限制的宽带响应。最后，讨论了亚波长干扰工程当前的挑战和未来趋势。

data.title: Toward real-time terahertz imaging
data.author: Hichem Guerboukha, Kathirvel Nallappan, Maksim Skorobogatiy
data.summary: Terahertz (THz) science and technology have greatly progressed over the past two decades to a point where the THz region of the electromagnetic spectrum is now a mature research area with many fundamental and practical applications. Furthermore, THz imaging is positioned to play a key role in many industrial applications, as THz technology is steadily shifting from university-grade instrumentation to commercial systems. In this context, the objective of this review is to discuss recent advances in THz imaging with an emphasis on the modalities that could enable real-time high-resolution imaging. To this end, we first discuss several key imaging modalities developed over the years: THz transmission, reflection, and conductivity imaging; THz pulsed imaging; THz computed tomography; and THz near-field imaging. Then, we discuss several enabling technologies for real-time THz imaging within the time-domain spectroscopy paradigm: fast optical delay lines, photoconductive antenna arrays, and electro-optic sampling with cameras. Next, we discuss the advances in THz cameras, particularly THz thermal cameras and THz field-effect transistor cameras. Finally, we overview the most recent techniques that enable fast THz imaging with single-pixel detectors: mechanical beam-steering, compressive sensing, spectral encoding, and fast Fourier optics. We believe that this critical and comprehensive review of enabling hardware, instrumentation, algorithms, and potential applications in real-time high-resolution THz imaging can serve a diverse community of fundamental and applied scientists.
data.title_cn: 迈向实时太赫兹成像
data.abstract_cn: 太赫兹（THz）科学和技术在过去二十年中取得了巨大进步，电磁频谱的太赫兹区域现已成为一个成熟的研究领域，具有许多基础和实际应用。此外，随着太赫兹技术正在从大学级仪器稳步转向商业系统，太赫兹成像将在许多工业应用中发挥关键作用。在这种背景下，本次综述的目的是讨论太赫兹成像的最新进展，重点是可以实现实时高分辨率成像的模式。为此，我们首先讨论多年来开发的几种关键成像模式：太赫兹透射、反射和电导成像；太赫兹脉冲成像；太赫兹计算机断层扫描；和太赫兹近场成像。然后，我们讨论了时域光谱范例中实时太赫兹成像的几种支持技术：快速光学延迟线、光电导天线阵列和相机电光采样。接下来，我们讨论太赫兹相机的进展，特别是太赫兹热成像相机和太赫兹场效应晶体管相机。最后，我们概述了使用单像素探测器实现快速太赫兹成像的最新技术：机械光束转向、压缩传感、光谱编码和快速傅里叶光学。我们相信，对实时高分辨率太赫兹成像中的硬件、仪器、算法和潜在应用的批判性和全面的审查可以为基础和应用科学家的多元化社区服务。

data.title: Recent advances in self-interference incoherent digital holography
data.author: Joseph Rosen, A. Vijayakumar, Manoj Kumar, Mani Ratnam Rai, Roy Kelner, Yuval Kashter, Angika Bulbul, Saswata Mukherjee
data.summary: Self-interference holography is a common technique to record holograms of incoherently illuminated scenes. In this review, we survey the main milestones in the topic of self-interference incoherent digital holography from two main points of view. First, we review the prime architectures of optical hologram recorders over more than 50 years. Second, we discuss some of the key applications of these recorders in the field of imaging in general, and for 3D super-resolution imaging, fluorescence microscopy, partial aperture imaging, seeing through a scattering medium, and spectral imaging in particular. We summarize this overview with a general perspective on this research topic and its prospective directions.
data.title_cn: 自干涉非相干数字全息术的最新进展
data.abstract_cn: 自干涉全息术是记录不相干照明场景的全息图的常用技术。在这篇综述中，我们从两个主要观点审视了自干扰非相干数字全息主题的主要里程碑。首先，我们回顾了 50 多年来光学全息记录仪的主要架构。其次，我们讨论这些记录仪在一般成像领域的一些关键应用，特别是 3D 超分辨率成像、荧光显微镜、部分孔径成像、透过散射介质观察和光谱成像。我们总结了这一概述，并对本研究主题及其前瞻性方向进行了总体展望。

data.title: Concepts in quantum state tomography and classical implementation with intense light: a tutorial
data.author: Ermes Toninelli, Bienvenu Ndagano, Adam Vallés, Bereneice Sephton, Isaac Nape, Antonio Ambrosio, Federico Capasso, Miles J. Padgett, Andrew Forbes
data.summary: A tomographic measurement is a ubiquitous tool for estimating the properties of quantum states, and its application is known as quantum state tomography (QST). The process involves manipulating single photons in a sequence of projective measurements, often to construct a density matrix from which other information can be inferred, and is as laborious as it is complex. Here we unravel the steps of a QST and outline how it may be demonstrated in a fast and simple manner with intense (classical) light. We use scalar beams in a time reversal approach to simulate the outcome of a QST and exploit non-separability in classical vector beams as a means to treat the latter as a “classically entangled” state for illustrating QSTs directly. We provide a complete do-it-yourself resource for the practical implementation of this approach, complete with tutorial video, which we hope will facilitate the introduction of this core quantum tool into teaching and research laboratories alike. Our work highlights the value of using intense classical light as a means to study quantum systems and in the process provides a tutorial on the fundamentals of QSTs.
data.title_cn: 量子态断层扫描的概念和强光的经典实现：教程
data.abstract_cn: 断层扫描测量是一种普遍存在的用于估计量子态特性的工具，其应用被称为量子态断层扫描（QST）。该过程涉及在一系列投影测量中操纵单个光子，通常是为了构建一个密度矩阵，从中可以推断出其他信息，并且既费力又复杂。在这里，我们阐明了 QST 的步骤，并概述了如何使用强（经典）光以快速而简单的方式进行演示。我们在时间反转方法中使用标量束来模拟 QST 的结果，并利用经典矢量束中的不可分离性作为将后者视为“经典纠缠”状态的手段，以直接说明 QST。我们为这种方法的实际实施提供了完整的DIY资源，并配有教程视频，我们希望这将有助于将这一核心量子工具引入教学和研究实验室等。我们的工作强调了使用强经典光作为研究量子系统的手段的价值，并在此过程中提供了有关 QST 基础知识的教程。

data.title: Enhanced killing of ocular melanoma cells by combining femtosecond laser light with laser-ablated CuO nanoparticles
data.author: Safaa Taha, Ibrahim Subhi Mukhlif, Ahmed O. El-Gendy, Mansour Hassan, Michael R. Hamblin, Tarek Mohamed
data.summary: Skin cancer is the leading type of cancer worldwide, divided into two main categories: melanoma and non-melanoma skin cancer. In addition to cutaneous melanoma, ocular melanoma affects the eye and urgently requires innovative therapeutic approaches. Nanoparticles (NPs) have emerged as promising tools in medicine due to their advantages, including the ability to overcome the limitations of conventional chemotherapy. This study investigated the combined effects of femtosecond laser irradiation plus copper oxide nanoparticles (CuO NPs) on A375 melanoma cells. The CuO NPs were synthesized by laser ablation of a high-purity copper target in distilled water using a 532 nm Nd:YAG laser. The CuO NPs were characterized using UV-Vis spectroscopy, transmission electron microscopy (TEM), and inductively coupled plasma (ICP) analysis. A375 ocular melanoma cells were subsequently treated with CuO NPs and exposed to femtosecond laser irradiation (420 nm). The in vitro cytotoxicity using the MTT assay showed that both femtosecond laser and the combination of CuO NPs and femtosecond laser irradiation have good activity in reducing cell viability compared to CuO nanoparticles. These findings highlight the potential of combining CuO NPs with femtosecond laser irradiation as a possible therapeutic strategy for ocular malignant melanoma.
data.title_cn: 通过将飞秒激光与激光烧蚀的 CuO 纳米颗粒相结合，增强对眼部黑色素瘤细胞的杀伤
data.abstract_cn: 皮肤癌是全世界主要的癌症类型，分为两大类：黑色素瘤和非黑色素瘤皮肤癌。除了皮肤黑色素瘤外，眼部黑色素瘤也会影响眼睛，迫切需要创新的治疗方法。纳米颗粒（NP）因其优点而成为医学领域有前途的工具，包括能够克服传统化疗的局限性。本研究研究了飞秒激光照射加上氧化铜纳米颗粒 (CuO NP) 对 A375 黑色素瘤细胞的综合影响。 CuO 纳米颗粒是通过使用 532 nm Nd:YAG 激光在蒸馏水中激光烧蚀高纯度铜靶来合成的。使用紫外-可见光谱、透射电子显微镜 (TEM) 和电感耦合等离子体 (ICP) 分析对 CuO 纳米颗粒进行表征。随后用 CuO NP 处理 A375 眼部黑色素瘤细胞，并暴露于飞秒激光照射（420 nm）。 MTT 测定的体外细胞毒性表明，与 CuO 纳米颗粒相比，飞秒激光以及 CuO 纳米颗粒和飞秒激光照射的组合在降低细胞活力方面具有良好的活性。这些发现强调了将 CuO 纳米颗粒与飞秒激光照射相结合作为眼部恶性黑色素瘤的可能治疗策略的潜力。

data.title: Complex refractive index sensing based on multiple Fano resonance all-dielectric metasurfaces
data.author: Qilin Ma, Maosheng Yang, Guofu Xu, Jiaosheng Li, Gang Zhang, Min Kong, Haoming Bao
data.summary: This study presents a polarization-insensitive all-dielectric metasurface composed of C4 symmetric “□”-shaped silicon units to generate four distinct Fano resonance modes for efficient complex refractive index sensing. The environmental complex refractive index ( N = n -i k ) can be accurately determined by the peak positions and Q factors of the Fano resonances. Specifically, all Fano peaks exhibit linear responses as n varies, with one mode having the highest sensitivity at 260.82 nm/RIU. On the other hand, three of the modes show linear Q- k relationships, of which the highest sensitivity for k reaches 19712.2 RIU -1 . Furthermore, three-dimensional mappings of the peak and Q values vary with n and k values, and are established to measure the complex refractive index of the environment. By simultaneously determining the n and k of the complex refractive index, this method enables precise fingerprint identification of environments.
data.title_cn: 基于多个 Fano 共振全电介质超表面的复杂折射率传感
data.abstract_cn: 这项研究提出了一种由 C4 对称“□”形硅单元组成的偏振不敏感全电介质超表面，可产生四种不同的法诺共振模式，以实现高效的复杂折射率传感。环境复折射率 ( N = n -i k ) 可以通过法诺共振的峰值位置和 Q 因子精确确定。具体来说，所有 Fano 峰都随着 n 的变化而呈现线性响应，其中一种模式在 260.82 nm/RIU 处具有最高灵敏度。另一方面，其中三种模式表现出线性Q-k关系，其中k的最高灵敏度达到19712.2 RIU -1 。此外，峰值和Q值的三维映射随着n和k值的变化而变化，并被建立来测量环境的复折射率。通过同时确定复折射率的n和k，该方法可以实现环境的精确指纹识别。

data.title: Broadband milliwatt-level pulse train beyond 6 µm from a femtosecond Yb oscillator
data.author: Guglielmo Vesco, Luca Moretti, Gianmarco Della Chiesa, Marco Marangoni, Davide Gatti
data.summary: The spectral broadening properties of a standard SM980 fiber, combined with the large phase-matching bandwidth of a 1-mm-thick LGS crystal, provide a simple and robust platform for generating broadband milliwatt-level pulse trains spanning 6 to 10 µm from a conventional Yb oscillator operating at a repetition rate of 80 MHz. This source is an effective solution for a wide range of vibrational spectroscopy experiments in the fingerprint region, both in the time and frequency domains.
data.title_cn: 来自飞秒 Yb 振荡器的超过 6 µm 的宽带毫瓦级脉冲序列
data.abstract_cn: 标准 SM980 光纤的光谱展宽特性与 1 毫米厚 LGS 晶体的大相位匹配带宽相结合，提供了一个简单而强大的平台，用于从以 80 MHz 重复率运行的传统 Yb 振荡器生成跨度 6 至 10 µm 的宽带毫瓦级脉冲序列。该源是指纹区域（时域和频域）各种振动光谱实验的有效解决方案。

data.title: Holographic laser processing with axial beam shaping optimized in optical system
data.author: Nami Kuroo, Fumiya Ishita, Yoshio Hayasaki
data.summary: A variable beam shaping in the optical axial direction is effective for next-generation laser cutting and drilling with high throughput and functionality. The axial beam shaping is implemented with a computer-generated hologram (CGH) displayed on a spatial light modulator (SLM). The CGH is precisely optimized in the optical system of the laser processing machine to compensate for unknown imperfections such as aberrations and slight misalignment of the optical system, spatial and temporal properties of the SLM, and changes in the optical system due to environmental changes. The key optical implementation for the axial beam shaping is the superposition of a lens term to the CGH in the in-system optimization. This implementation method called the lens-superposition method, eliminates the mechanical movement of an optical component and an imager and, as a result, frees the optical system from the difficulty of space calibration. We demonstrate the computer simulations and the optical experiments of various axial beam shaping. Furthermore, we present the parallel femtosecond laser processing with three-dimensional arranged focusing generated by the CGH optimized in the laser processing machine.
data.title_cn: 光学系统中优化轴向光束整形的全息激光加工
data.abstract_cn: 光轴方向上的可变光束整形对于具有高吞吐量和功能性的下一代激光切割和钻孔非常有效。轴向光束整形是通过空间光调制器（SLM）上显示的计算机生成的全息图（CGH）来实现的。 CGH在激光加工机的光学系统中进行了精确优化，以补偿未知的缺陷，例如光学系统的像差和轻微未对准、SLM的空间和时间特性以及由于环境变化而导致的光学系统的变化。轴向光束整形的关键光学实现是在系统内优化中将透镜项叠加到 CGH。这种实现方法称为透镜叠加法，消除了光学元件和成像器的机械运动，从而使光学系统摆脱了空间校准的困难。我们演示了各种轴向光束整形的计算机模拟和光学实验。此外，我们还展示了由激光加工机中优化的 CGH 产生的具有三维排列聚焦的并行飞秒激光加工。

data.title: Silicon-based all-optical photonic crystal neuromorphic synapses using Ge 2 Sb 2 Te 5
data.author: Amir Hossein Abdollahi Nohoji, Parviz Keshavarzi, Mohammad Danaie
data.summary: This study investigates the design and implementation of all-optical synapse structures using photonic crystal configurations with a triangular lattice of circular holes to enhance efficiency and reduce the footprint of artificial synapses. The proposed structure uses phase change materials (PCM), especially Ge 2 Sb 2 Te 5 (GST), to tune the transmitted wavelength precisely. Three-dimensional numerical simulations using the finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) and finite-element-method (FEM) indicate that these structures provide high-performance waveguide intersections with minimal cross-talk. Embedding two GST-PCM rods in this structure enables a high contrast in resonance wavelength transition between amorphous and fully crystalline states. By optimizing the radius of the GST-PCM rods, the highest contrast at the resonant transmission wavelength is achieved, allowing dynamic control of the transmission rate through changes in the crystallinity of the GST-PCM rods. The crystallinity is adjusted by varying the power and duration of laser radiation, demonstrating the high controllability of these structures. The proposed novel photonic crystal synapse structure combined with GST-PCM significantly reduces the energy consumption and dimensions of the optical synapse, which are crucial for developing artificial neural network devices, all-optical processors, and neuromorphic systems.
data.title_cn: 使用Ge 2 Sb 2 Te 5 的硅基全光光子晶体神经形态突触
data.abstract_cn: 本研究研究了使用具有圆孔三角晶格的光子晶体配置的全光学突触结构的设计和实现，以提高效率并减少人工突触的占地面积。所提出的结构使用相变材料（PCM），特别是Ge 2 Sb 2 Te 5 (GST)，来精确调谐透射波长。使用时域有限差分 (FDTD) 和有限元方法 (FEM) 进行的三维数值模拟表明，这些结构提供了具有最小串扰的高性能波导交叉点。在该结构中嵌入两个 GST-PCM 棒可以实现非晶态和全晶态之间共振波长过渡的高对比度。通过优化 GST-PCM 棒的半径，可以在谐振传输波长处实现最高对比度，从而可以通过改变 GST-PCM 棒的结晶度来动态控制传输速率。通过改变激光辐射的功率和持续时间来调节结晶度，证明了这些结构的高度可控性。所提出的新型光子晶体突触结构与GST-PCM相结合，显着降低了光学突触的能耗和尺寸，这对于开发人工神经网络设备、全光处理器和神经形态系统至关重要。

data.title: Optical–mechanical model for analyzing spherical concentrators using an integral method
data.author: Dongxu Wang, Guanheng Fan, Guangda Chen, Yiqun Zhang, Yang Yang
data.summary: Existing research methods for addressing significant errors in the lightweight structural design of space concentrator reflectors of concentration systems involve directly incorporating the error into the reflected ray vector for analysis or developing a model to determine the error for software analysis. However, these methods result in low analysis and optimization efficiencies. In this study, an approach for analyzing spherical concentrators was developed using an integral method. The integral formula was validated, and the effects of different factors on different concentration ratios were analyzed. Then, the error integral formula is given, and the relationship between the structural mesh and the optical mesh is analyzed. Then the deformation information of the structural mesh is added to the optical mesh by the difference method, and finally, the structural error is realized to be directly added to the integral formula for analysis. For systematic errors, the structural calculations are performed using the finite element method, which allows the deformation of the structure to be calculated by applying loads to the model. The calculated displacement results are then imported into the integral model to calculate the light distribution results. For random errors, the errors can be added directly to the integral model for calculation. At last, experimental validation was conducted to verify the accuracy of the proposed approach.
data.title_cn: 使用积分法分析球形聚光器的光机模型
data.abstract_cn: 现有的解决聚光系统空间聚光反射器轻质结构设计中重大误差的研究方法包括直接将误差纳入反射光线矢量中进行分析或开发模型来确定误差以供软件分析。然而，这些方法导致分析和优化效率较低。在本研究中，开发了一种使用积分方法分析球形聚光器的方法。对积分公式进行了验证，并分析了不同因素对不同浓度比的影响。然后给出了误差积分公式，分析了结构网格与光学网格之间的关系。然后通过差分法将结构网格的变形信息添加到光学网格中，最终实现结构误差直接添加到积分公式中进行分析。对于系统误差，结构计算采用有限元方法进行，该方法允许通过向模型施加载荷来计算结构的变形。然后将计算出的位移结果导入积分模型中，计算出配光结果。对于随机误差，可以直接将误差添加到积分模型中进行计算。最后进行实验验证，验证所提方法的准确性。

data.title: Dynamic wavelength selection of 1, 1.5, and 1.9 µ m via gas switching in hollow-core fiber
data.author: James Drake, Timothy Bate, Joseph Wahlen, Shree R. Thapa, Eric Turner, Andre Van Rynbach, Jose Enrique Antonio-Lopez, Rodrigo Amezcua-Correa, Darren D. Hudson
data.summary: We generate 1.5 µ m and 1.9 µ m light through stimulated Raman scattering by coupling a 1 µ m laser to a single-mode broadband antiresonant hollow core fiber filled with methane or hydrogen. Maximum quantum conversion efficiencies of 91% for 1.5 µ m and 38% for 1.9 µ m are demonstrated for 120 psi of methane in a 10-m fiber and 400 psi of hydrogen in a 1-m fiber. The dynamics of gas pressurization in hollow-core fiber are investigated for two different fiber lengths and filling architectures. A gas switching cycle is completed in 40 minutes in a 1-m fiber filled from both ends. The setup functions as an efficient high peak-power source that can be switched between three major rare-earth laser emission bands of ytterbium (1 µ m), erbium (1.5 µ m), and thulium (1.9 µ m).
data.title_cn: 通过空心光纤中的气体切换动态选择 1、1.5 和 1.9 µm 波长
data.abstract_cn: 我们将 1 µm 激光器耦合到填充甲烷或氢气的单模宽带反谐振空心光纤，通过受激拉曼散射产生 1.5 µm 和 1.9 µm 光。对于 10 米光纤中的 120 psi 甲烷和 1 米光纤中的 400 psi 氢气，1.5 µ m 的最大量子转换效率为 91%，1.9 µ m 的最大量子转换效率为 38%。研究了两种不同纤维长度和填充结构的空心纤维中气体加压的动力学。在从两端填充的 1 米光纤中，40 分钟即可完成一个气体切换循环。该装置充当高效的高峰值功率源，可以在镱 (1 µ m)、铒 (1.5 µ m) 和铥 (1.9 µ m) 三个主要稀土激光发射波段之间切换。

data.title: Photodegradation in porous, fast-response pressure-sensitive paint under varying pressures
data.author: Nathan S. Strasser, David D. Murakami, E. Lara Lash, Jennifer G. Colborn, Lawrence A. Hand, Christopher S. Combs
data.summary: Lifetime-based and ratiometric-intensity techniques are two methods for measuring surface pressure on wind tunnel models using porous, fast-response pressure-sensitive paint (fast-PSP). This paper characterizes how photodegradation under varying oxygen partial pressures affects the intensity signal, lifetime ratio, and calibration accuracy of a platinum (II) meso-tetra(pentafluorophenyl)porphine (PtTFPP)-based fast-PSP. A temperature- and pressure-controlled test chamber was used to expose fast-PSP coupons to excitation light at different oxygen partial pressures (P O2 ). In the experiments, the luminescent intensity and the lifetime ratio decayed at rates that increased with pressure by 0.23% and 0.30% per minute per kPa of P O2 , respectively. Calibration curves were observed to become increasingly nonlinear with higher photodegradation pressures. These trends are consistent with the effects of photodecomposition and photo-oxidation. Based on these findings, the authors propose best practices to reduce errors and improve measurement reliability, including pairing fast-PSP measurements with reference transducers for continuous calibration, reapplying and inspecting coatings in regions with steep pressure gradients, and defining acceptable uncertainty thresholds for a given experiment.
data.title_cn: 多孔、快速响应压敏涂料在不同压力下的光降解
data.abstract_cn: 基于寿命和比率强度技术是使用多孔、快速响应压敏涂料 (fast-PSP) 测量风洞模型表面压力的两种方法。本文描述了不同氧分压下的光降解如何影响基于铂 (II) 内消旋四（五氟苯基）卟啉 (PtTFPP) 的快速 PSP 的强度信号、寿命比和校准精度。使用温度和压力控制的测试室将快速 PSP 试样暴露在不同氧分压 (PO2) 的激发光下。在实验中，发光强度和寿命比分别以每分钟每kPa P O2 压力增加0.23%和0.30%的速率衰减。观察到随着光降解压力的升高，校准曲线变得越来越非线性。这些趋势与光分解和光氧化的影响一致。基于这些发现，作者提出了减少误差和提高测量可靠性的最佳实践，包括将快速 PSP 测量与参考传感器配对以进行连续校准、在压力梯度陡峭的区域重新涂覆和检查涂层，以及为给定实验定义可接受的不确定性阈值。

data.title: Phase-shifted differential Fourier transform for high-resolution reconstruction in digital holography
data.author: Zhiyu Yin, Wenhao Li, Zhaowu Liu, Xu Liang, Danyi Chen, Xinyu Wang, Wei Wang
data.summary: The bandwidth utilization of off-axis digital holography is constrained due to the effect of the 0-order spectrum on the +1-order spectrum, resulting in reduced phase reconstruction resolution. Therefore, this paper proposes a phase-shift differential Fourier transform algorithm for high-resolution reconstruction in digital holography. First, the new hologram with phase-shift components is obtained using spatial carrier phase-shift technology. By performing a differential operation on the new hologram and the original hologram, a differential hologram without 0-order spectrum is generated. Then, using two-dimensional Fourier transform and digital bandpass filtering techniques, the +1-order spectrum information is extracted from the differential hologram. Finally, the amplitude and phase reconstruction results of the object are obtained through complex amplitude division algorithms. Compared with existing off-axis digital holography reconstruction algorithms, the proposed algorithm demonstrates superior suppression of the 0-order spectrum, which improves the resolution of the reconstructed amplitude and phase images. Both numerical simulations and experiments are presented to validate the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm.
data.title_cn: 用于数字全息高分辨率重建的相移差分傅里叶变换
data.abstract_cn: 由于0阶谱对+1阶谱的影响，离轴数字全息术的带宽利用率受到限制，导致相位重建分辨率降低。因此，本文提出了一种用于数字全息高分辨率重建的相移差分傅里叶变换算法。首先，利用空间载波相移技术获得具有相移分量的新型全息图。通过对新全息图和原始全息图进行差分运算，生成没有0阶光谱的差分全息图。然后，利用二维傅里叶变换和数字带通滤波技术，从差分全息图中提取+1阶光谱信息。最后通过复杂的幅值分割算法得到物体的幅值和相位重构结果。与现有的离轴数字全息重建算法相比，该算法表现出对0阶谱的优越抑制，提高了重建幅度和相位图像的分辨率。数值模拟和实验都验证了所提出算法的有效性。

data.title: Silicon nitride arrayed waveguide grating de-multiplexer for high-throughput optical satellite links
data.author: Nicola Bergamasco, Giulio Terrasanta, Marcin Wojciech Ziarko, Juraj Poliak
data.summary: Dense wavelength division multiplexing (DWDM) technology is essential to achieve high throughput data links in optical space communications. Yet, the bandwidth allocation suggested for satellite optical links differs from that of terrestrial networks, for it explicitly separates and regulates the uplink and downlink wavelengths. Moreover, the requirements of cost, size, weight, and power (C-SWaP) a satellite is subjected to significantly differ from that of a terrestrial node. This distinction can justify the design of a dedicated de-multiplexer in place of commercial off-the-shelf solutions, which, taking advantage of photonic integrated circuits (PICs) technology, is optimized for the requirements of bandwidth and space payloads. In this work, we propose an arrayed-waveguide grating (AWG) design that can operate simultaneously, on the same device, as multiplexer and de-multiplexer with the suggested bandwidth allocation. The AWG is polarization-insensitive, targeting a silicon nitride platform to achieve small footprint and low losses. As an example application, we simulated and studied the transmission of an AWG with two (1×8) 100 GHz channels using a semi-analytical numerical method. The effects of radiation and fabrication tolerances were also considered. The results show that the design is a promising step towards the development of PIC-based de-multiplexers for satellite optical links.
data.title_cn: 用于高通量光学卫星链路的氮化硅阵列波导光栅解复用器
data.abstract_cn: 密集波分复用（DWDM）技术对于在光空间通信中实现高吞吐量数据链路至关重要。然而，卫星光链路建议的带宽分配与地面网络的带宽分配不同，因为它明确分离和调节上行链路和下行链路波长。此外，卫星对成本、尺寸、重量和功率（C-SWaP）的要求与地面节点的要求显着不同。这种区别可以证明设计专用解复用器来代替商业现成解决方案是合理的，该解复用器利用光子集成电路（PIC）技术，针对带宽和空间有效负载的要求进行了优化。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种阵列波导光栅（AWG）设计，它可以在同一设备上同时运行，作为复用器和解复用器，并具有建议的带宽分配。 AWG 对偏振不敏感，以氮化硅平台为目标，以实现小占地面积和低损耗。作为示例应用，我们使用半解析数值方法模拟和研究了具有两个 (1×8) 100 GHz 通道的 AWG 的传输。还考虑了辐射和制造公差的影响。结果表明，该设计是朝着开发用于卫星光链路的基于 PIC 的解复用器迈出的有希望的一步。

data.title: Effect of the V/III ratio on the superlattice quality of strain-balanced GaInAs/AlInAs in quantum cascade lasers
data.author: Yz Han, Li-dan Lu, Q Feng, Lian-qing Zhu
data.summary: The epitaxial growth of strain-balanced ternary alloys as the active layer of quantum cascade lasers (QCLs) often employs an As-rich method. This approach relies more on the researchers’ experience rather than quantitative numerical expressions. In this paper, we report a quantitative relationship between the V/III ratio and As content. We have prepared strain-balanced Ga 0.34 In 0.66 As/Al 0.68 In 0.32 As/InP superlattice structures under conditions of low V/III ratio and As beam flux. The lattice quality was analyzed using characterization techniques such as X-ray diffraction (XRD), atomic force microscopy (AFM), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), photoluminescence (PL) spectroscopy, and transmission electron microscopy (TEM). The results indicate that when V/III GaInAs is 20 (V/III AlInAs = 18.1), it exhibits better surface morphology and high-quality lattice structure. These findings provide reliable parameters for the quantitative control of As flux during the epitaxial growth of active regions and offer valuable guidance for the growth of complex QCL structures.
data.title_cn: 量子级联激光器中V/III比对应变平衡GaInAs/AlInAs超晶格质量的影响
data.abstract_cn: 作为量子级联激光器（QCL）有源层的应变平衡三元合金的外延生长通常采用富砷方法。这种方法更多地依赖于研究人员的经验而不是定量的数值表达。在本文中，我们报告了 V/III 比与 As 含量之间的定量关系。我们在低V/III比和As束通量的条件下制备了应变平衡的Ga 0.34 In 0.66 As/Al 0.68 In 0.32 As/InP超晶格结构。使用 X 射线衍射 (XRD)、原子力显微镜 (AFM)、扫描电子显微镜 (SEM)、光致发光 (PL) 光谱和透射电子显微镜 (TEM) 等表征技术分析晶格质量。结果表明，当V/III GaInAs为20（V/III AlInAs=18.1）时，表现出更好的表面形貌和高质量的晶格结构。这些发现为有源区外延生长过程中As通量的定量控制提供了可靠的参数，并为复杂QCL结构的生长提供了有价值的指导。

data.title: Demonstration of an all-optical 2-bit digital-to-analog converter based on photonic crystal waveguides
data.author: Asghar Askarian, Fariborz Parandin
data.summary: In this article, what we believe to be a new all-optical 2-bit digital-to-analog converter (AODAC) is proposed based on the principle of beam interference in a photonic crystal structure. It is numerically investigated and analyzed by the finite difference time domain (FDTD) method. The proposed AODAC will be realized with eleven optical waveguides and eleven point defects in a square lattice of silicon dielectric rods surrounded in air. The proposed AODAC converts the discrete optical digital signals in the input ports into optical analog signals in the output port. Unlike previous structures, the main advantage of this converter is that input powers as low as 0.5, 1, and 1.5 mW are sufficient for its operation, since no nonlinear rods are included. In addition, its maximum absolute error percentage and maximum insertion loss are obtained as 4.05% and -11.67 dB, respectively.
data.title_cn: 基于光子晶体波导的全光 2 位数模转换器演示
data.abstract_cn: 在本文中，我们基于光子晶体结构中的光束干涉原理提出了一种新型全光 2 位数模转换器 (AODAC)。采用时域有限差分(FDTD)方法对其进行数值研究和分析。所提出的 AODAC 将通过空气中包围的硅介质棒的方形晶格中的 11 个光波导和 11 个点缺陷来实现。所提出的 AODAC 将输入端口中的离散光数字信号转换为输出端口中的光模拟信号。与以前的结构不同，该转换器的主要优点是低至 0.5、1 和 1.5 mW 的输入功率足以满足其运行，因为不包含非线性杆。此外，其最大绝对误差百分比和最大插入损耗分别为4.05%和-11.67 dB。

data.title: Tunable microwave photonic mixer based on cascaded QCSE electro-absorption modulators for efficient frequency conversion
data.author: Hadi Khosravinezhad, Heidar Keshavarz, Mojtaba Mansorinezhad
data.summary: This study proposes and analyzes what we believe to be a novel integrated microwave photonic mixer consisting of two cascaded quantum confined stark effect (QCSE) electro-absorption modulators (EAMs). A detailed mathematical model is developed to capture the nonlinear characteristics of the system, enabling efficient frequency mixing. The accuracy of the model is validated using Lumerical simulation data. The system's performance can be adjusted through bias voltage and RF input parameters, providing significant flexibility for various signal processing applications. The results demonstrate that the proposed mixer can achieve both up- and down-conversion of RF signals, and can also be configured as a frequency doubler. This work advances microwave photonics by offering a compact, tunable, and efficient frequency mixing solution, with promising applications in next-generation photonic communication and radar systems.
data.title_cn: 基于级联 QCSE 电吸收调制器的可调谐微波光子混频器，可实现高效频率转换
data.abstract_cn: 这项研究提出并分析了我们认为是一种新型集成微波光子混频器，该混频器由两个级联量子限制斯塔克效应（QCSE）电吸收调制器（EAM）组成。开发了详细的数学模型来捕获系统的非线性特性，从而实现高效的混频。使用 Lumerical 仿真数据验证模型的准确性。该系统的性能可以通过偏置电压和射频输入参数进行调整，为各种信号处理应用提供极大的灵活性。结果表明，所提出的混频器可以实现射频信号的上变频和下变频，并且还可以配置为倍频器。这项工作通过提供紧凑、可调谐和高效的混频解决方案来推进微波光子学，在下一代光子通信和雷达系统中具有广阔的应用前景。

data.title: Design and fabrication of a four-channel CWDM cooled DFB-LD module with OSFP electrical interface for CPO external laser sources
data.author: Wahyu Hidayat, Po-Han Chen, Chun-Liang Yang, Jian-Yi Yeh, Chien-Po Chao, Jau-Ji Jou
data.summary: To mitigate severe thermal challenges within co-packaged optics (CPO) modules and prevent adverse effects on electrical or silicon photonic chip performance, the optical transmitter can effectively utilize an external laser source (ELS). This article presents the design, fabrication, and testing methodology of a four-channel coarse wavelength division multiplexing (CWDM) cooled distributed feedback laser diode (DFB-LD) module explicitly developed for CPO ELS applications. We selected AlGaInAs multiple quantum well (MQW) DFB-LDs with nominal wavelengths of 1265 nm, 1285 nm, 1305 nm, and 1325 nm to meet the requirements of O-band CWDM systems. Thermoelectric coolers (TECs) and thermistors are integrated into the module to achieve precise temperature control and stable monitoring of the DFB-LDs’ operating temperature, which is crucial for maintaining laser performance. To optimize fiber coupling efficiency, lenses are placed at the LD output facet, and optical isolators are incorporated to prevent back-reflections from the fiber from negatively impacting the DFB-LD chips. The electrical interface of this module complies with the Octal Small Form-factor Pluggable (OSFP) specification, a design choice aimed at facilitating commercialization and simplifying system integration. At a 200 mA bias current, the coupled output power of each channel through a standard single-mode fiber (SMF) exceeds 30 mW, with a coupling efficiency of approximately 50%, demonstrating the module’s potential as an external light source in CPO systems. This paper elaborates on the key steps from design considerations to practical manufacturing, assembly, and performance verification, aiming to provide valuable practical guidance for engineers and researchers in related fields.
data.title_cn: 用于 CPO 外部激光源的具有 OSFP 电气接口的四通道 CWDM 冷却 DFB-LD 模块的设计和制造
data.abstract_cn: 为了缓解共封装光学 (CPO) 模块内严峻的热挑战并防止对电气或硅光子芯片性能产生不利影响，光发射器可以有效地利用外部激光源 (ELS)。本文介绍了专为 CPO ELS 应用开发的四通道粗波分复用 (CWDM) 冷却分布式反馈激光二极管 (DFB-LD) 模块的设计、制造和测试方法。我们选择了标称波长为 1265 nm、1285 nm、1305 nm 和 1325 nm 的 AlGaInAs 多量子阱 (MQW) DFB-LD，以满足 O 波段 CWDM 系统的要求。模块中集成了热电冷却器 (TEC) 和热敏电阻，以实现精确的温度控制和对 DFB-LD 工作温度的稳定监控，这对于维持激光器性能至关重要。为了优化光纤耦合效率，将透镜放置在 LD 输出端面，并结合光隔离器以防止光纤背向反射对 DFB-LD 芯片产生负面影响。该模块的电气接口符合八进制小型可插拔 (OSFP) 规范，这是一种旨在促进商业化和简化系统集成的设计选择。在 200 mA 偏置电流下，每个通道通过标准单模光纤 (SMF) 的耦合输出功率超过 30 mW，耦合效率约为 50%，展示了该模块作为 CPO 系统外部光源的潜力。本文详细阐述了从设计考虑到实际制造、装配和性能验证的关键步骤，旨在为相关领域的工程师和研究人员提供有价值的实践指导。

data.title: Temporal compression of Yb-doped laser pulses in cascaded gas-filled hollow fibers
data.author: Yan Li, Joseph J. Broughton, John W. G. Tisch
data.summary: Femtosecond laser technology has been pivotal across scientific applications, including chemical reaction dynamics and strong-field physics, as well as in areas such as precision micromachining, eye surgery, and advanced materials processing. Ultrashort near-infrared (NIR) pulses, particularly those lasting only a few optical cycles, have enabled high harmonic generation (HHG), attosecond pulse generation, and time-resolved spectroscopy. Traditional Ti:Sapphire chirped pulse amplification (CPA) systems achieve sub-5 fs pulses through hollow-core fiber (HCF) compression of pulses initially around 20−50 fs in duration. However, newer compact laser sources, such as Yb-doped and other high-repetition-rate lasers, are known for their reliability and compactness but typically produce longer pulses (≥ 150 fs), making compression more challenging. This paper presents detailed simulations of pulse compression for a 1030 nm, 280 fs Yb laser using a cascaded fiber approach. The simulations, performed with the open-source Luna.jl package, compare a single 2-m HCF with a cascaded system of two 1-m HCFs. The results demonstrate that the cascaded fiber system achieves 3.3 times shorter pulses and 2.3 times higher peak powers. A novel cascaded configuration is proposed and simulated, in which a single fiber is double-passed using polarization switching.
data.title_cn: 级联充气中空光纤中掺镱激光脉冲的时间压缩
data.abstract_cn: 飞秒激光技术在化学反应动力学和强场物理等科学应用以及精密微加工、眼科手术和先进材料加工等领域发挥着关键作用。超短近红外 (NIR) 脉冲，特别是仅持续几个光学周期的脉冲，已实现高谐波生成 (HHG)、阿秒脉冲生成和时间分辨光谱。传统的钛蓝宝石啁啾脉冲放大 (CPA) 系统通过空心光纤 (HCF) 压缩最初持续时间约为 20−50 fs 的脉冲，实现低于 5 fs 的脉冲。然而，新型紧凑型激光源，例如掺镱激光器和其他高重复率激光器，以其可靠性和紧凑性而闻名，但通常会产生更长的脉冲（≥ 150 fs），使压缩更具挑战性。本文介绍了使用级联光纤方法对 1030 nm、280 fs Yb 激光器进行脉冲压缩的详细模拟。使用开源 Luna.jl 软件包执行的模拟将单个 2 米 HCF 与两个 1 米 HCF 的级联系统进行了比较。结果表明，级联光纤系统的脉冲缩短了 3.3 倍，峰值功率提高了 2.3 倍。提出并模拟了一种新颖的级联配置，其中使用偏振切换对单根光纤进行双通。

data.title: High-power exclusively type 1 sum-frequency generation of 257-nm radiation in LBO crystals
data.author: Christian Schmittner, Christoph Röcker, André Loescher, Florian Bienert, Alexandre Dobroc, Denis Balitski, Dominique Lupinski, Thomas Graf, Marwan Abdou Ahmed
data.summary: We present a frequency conversion setup using three type I phase-matched LBO crystals for the generation of high-power deep ultraviolet (DUV) radiation by frequency conversion of pulsed infrared laser radiation. The presented approach allows more independent control of the three individual conversion processes compared to LBO-based approaches presented to date. An average output power of 33 W at a wavelength of 257 nm was demonstrated. The duration of the DUV pulses was 3.4 ps, the pulse repetition rate was 400 kHz, and the beam propagation factor was measured to be M 2 = 1.99 at the highest power.
data.title_cn: 在 LBO 晶体中产生 257 nm 辐射的高功率专有 1 型和频
data.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种使用三种 I 型相位匹配 LBO 晶体的频率转换装置，通过脉冲红外激光辐射的频率转换来生成高功率深紫外 (DUV) 辐射。与迄今为止提出的基于杠杆收购的方法相比，所提出的方法允许对三个单独的转换过程进行更独立的控制。 257 nm 波长下的平均输出功率为 33 W。 DUV脉冲的持续时间为3.4 ps，脉冲重复率为400 kHz，并且在最高功率下测得光束传播因子为M 2 = 1.99。

data.title: Two-dimensional light beam shape characterization using interferometric closure amplitudes
data.author:
Nithyanandan Thyagarajan, Bojan Nikolic, Christopher
			L. Carilli, Laura Torino, Ubaldo Iriso
data.summary: We introduce a technique using closure amplitudes, inspired by radio interferometry, to determine, with high angular resolution, the two-dimensional profile of a light beam using an interferogram from a non-redundantly masked aperture. Previous techniques required multiple interferograms or accurate estimates of the non-uniform illuminations across the aperture. In contrast, our method, using closure amplitudes, avoids the need to estimate the aperture illuminations while determining the two-dimensional beam shape from a single interferogram. The invariance of closure amplitudes to even time-varying aperture illuminations makes it suitable for longer averaging intervals, with the potential to reduce data rates and computational overheads. By using data from the ALBA synchrotron light source to validate the method and its results against existing methods, this paper represents, to our knowledge, the first real-world application of closure amplitudes to directly determine the light beam’s profile using optical interferometry in the high angular resolution regime.
data.title_cn: 使用干涉闭合振幅进行二维光束形状表征
data.abstract_cn: 受无线电干涉测量法的启发，我们引入了一种使用闭合幅度的技术，利用来自非冗余掩模孔径的干涉图以高角分辨率确定光束的二维轮廓。以前的技术需要多个干涉图或准确估计孔径上的不均匀照明。相比之下，我们的方法使用闭合幅度，避免了在从单个干涉图确定二维光束形状时估计孔径照明的需要。即使随时间变化的孔径照明，闭合幅度的不变性使其适用于较长的平均间隔，并有可能降低数据速率和计算开销。通过使用来自 ALBA 同步加速器光源的数据来验证该方法及其结果与现有方法的比较，据我们所知，本文首次在现实世界中应用闭合振幅，以在高角分辨率范围内使用光学干涉测量法直接确定光束轮廓。

data.title: Optical spatiotemporal Fourier synthesis: tutorial
data.author: Murat Yessenov, Ayman F. Abouraddy
data.summary: Fourier synthesis is one of the foundations of physical optics. Spatial Fourier optics is a basis for understanding optical imaging, microscopy, and holography. In conventional Fourier optics, the complex spatial field distribution in the Fourier plane constitutes the spatial spectrum of the field to be realized in physical space. Analogously, in temporal Fourier optics, the complex temporal spectrum can be manipulated for ultrafast pulse-shaping. We present here a tutorial on the emerging field of spatiotemporal Fourier optics whereby the spatial and temporal spectra are manipulated jointly to produce spatiotemporally structured optical fields that display unique propagation characteristics. In this tutorial, we focus on a subset of the overall class of nonseparable spatiotemporally structured fields, namely cylindrically symmetric fields in which each radial spatial frequency is associated with a single wavelength. This subset of fields comprises propagation-invariant wave packets that travel rigidly in linear media at a tunable group velocity and includes space–time wave packets and other closely related structured fields. We describe a spatiotemporal Fourier synthesis system capable of preparing arbitrary optical fields belonging to this subclass.
data.title_cn: 光学时空傅立叶合成：教程
data.abstract_cn: 傅里叶合成是物理光学的基础之一。空间傅立叶光学是理解光学成像、显微镜和全息术的基础。在传统的傅里叶光学中，傅里叶平面上复杂的空间场分布构成了物理空间中要实现的场的空间谱。类似地，在时间傅里叶光学中，可以操纵复杂的时间光谱以实现超快脉冲整形。我们在这里介绍一个关于时空傅里叶光学新兴领域的教程，通过联合操纵空间和时间光谱来产生显示独特传播特性的时空结构光场。在本教程中，我们重点关注不可分离时空结构场的整个类别的一个子集，即圆柱对称场，其中每个径向空间频率与单个波长相关联。该场子集包括传播不变的波包，它们以可调的群速度在线性介质中刚性传播，并且包括时空波包和其他密切相关的结构化场。我们描述了一种时空傅立叶合成系统，能够制备属于该子类的任意光场。

data.title: Borel summability of spectral nonparaxial perturbative series
data.author: Riccardo Borghi
data.summary: Fifty years after its introduction, the perturbative approach conceived by Lax et al. [ Phys. Rev. A 11 , 1365 ( 1975 ) 10.1103/PhysRevA.11.1365 ] to solve Maxwell’s equations remains widely used, despite its inherent divergence in the physical space. Through a vectorial analysis of the LLM algorithm carried out within the spatial frequency domain, it is here shown how each single term of the asymptotic expansion of a free-space propagated coherent light field represents the outcome of a suitable linear filter fed by the boundary field. In this way, since the Fourier transform operator naturally uncouples the roles of the boundary condition and of the propagation process, the decoding mechanism of the LLM scheme can be clearly unveiled. To this end, our main task is the exploration of the convergence features of the so-called spectral series . This is the spectral counterpart of the asymptotic series representation (in the physical space) provided by the LLM algorithm. Through a delicate asymptotic analysis, it is proved that the spectral series is uniformly convergent, within the homogeneous portion of the angular spectrum, to the Fourier transform of the coherent free-space propagator. On employing Borel summation together with analytical continuation, such a fundamental connection is then extended to the remaining evanescent part of the spectrum. In this way, it is rigorously proven that (i) exact free-space solutions of Maxwell’s equations are completely encoded within their paraxial approximations and (ii) the Rayleigh–Sommerfeld coherent propagator is the generating function for all nonparaxial corrections iteratively obtained by the LLM algorithm, irrespective of the boundary condition.
data.title_cn: 谱非近轴微扰级数的Borel可求和性
data.abstract_cn: Lax 等人提出的微扰方法在提出 50 年后。 [ 物理。 Rev. A 11, 1365 (1975) 10.1103/PhysRevA.11.1365] 求解麦克斯韦方程组仍然被广泛使用，尽管它在物理空间中存在固有的分歧。通过在空间频域内进行的 LLM 算法的矢量分析，此处显示了自由空间传播的相干光场的渐近展开的每一项如何表示由边界场馈送的合适线性滤波器的结果。这样，由于傅里叶变换算子自然地解开了边界条件和传播过程的作用，因此可以清楚地揭示LLM方案的解码机制。为此，我们的主要任务是探索所谓谱级数的收敛特征。这是 LLM 算法提供的渐近级数表示（在物理空间中）的谱对应物。通过精细的渐近分析，证明了光谱级数在角谱的均匀部分内一致收敛于相干自由空间传播器的傅里叶变换。在将 Borel 求和与分析延拓结合使用时，这种基本联系被扩展到频谱的剩余倏逝部分。通过这种方式，可以严格证明 (i) 麦克斯韦方程组的精确自由空间解完全编码在其近轴近似内，并且 (ii) 瑞利-索末菲相干传播器是由 LLM 算法迭代获得的所有非近轴校正的生成函数，无论边界条件如何。

data.title: High-resolution dual-band triple-grating spectrometer for atmospheric CO 2 detection
data.author: Hongling Yuan, Zhiwei Feng, Guo Xia, Hui Zhang, Yongqing Wei, Shunlong Shu
data.summary: The detection of atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations typically occurs within the near-infrared spectral band. To achieve high-precision measurements, it is essential not only to maintain high spectral resolution but also to capture spectral information across multiple wavelength ranges. Therefore, we propose a novel, to our knowledge, optical design for a high-resolution dual-band triple-grating spectrometer (DTGS). The design strategy is centered on fully utilizing the grating through simultaneous ±1st-order diffraction, enabling high-resolution acquisition of dual-band spectral information while enhancing system integration. We performed theoretical derivations and simulation validations for the initial structure of the DTGS system. The simulation results indicate that the DTGS system achieves high-resolution detection (0.072–0.075 nm spectral resolution) in near-infrared dual-band CO 2 weak absorption spectra (1.556−1.576µm and 1.578−1.598µm) through a grating configuration of one 555 lines/mm and two 1100 lines/mm, overcoming the spectral resolution constraints of traditional optical systems in wide-band measurements.
data.title_cn: 用于大气CO 2 检测的高分辨率双波段三光栅光谱仪
data.abstract_cn: 大气二氧化碳浓度的检测通常发生在近红外光谱带内。为了实现高精度测量，不仅要保持高光谱分辨率，还要捕获多个波长范围的光谱信息。因此，据我们所知，我们提出了一种新颖的高分辨率双波段三光栅光谱仪（DTGS）光学设计。该设计策略的核心是通过同步±1阶衍射充分利用光栅，实现双波段光谱信息的高分辨率采集，同时增强系统集成度。我们对DTGS系统的初始结构进行了理论推导和仿真验证。仿真结果表明，DTGS系统通过1个555线/mm和2个1100线/mm的光栅配置，实现了近红外双波段CO 2 弱吸收光谱（1.556−1.576μm和1.578−1.598μm）的高分辨率检测（光谱分辨率为0.072~0.075 nm），克服了传统光学系统宽带光谱分辨率的限制。测量。

data.title: Intensity fluctuations of higher-order laser modes in jet engine exhaust turbulence
data.author: Yahya Baykal
data.summary: Intensity fluctuations quantified by the scintillation index are evaluated in jet engine exhaust turbulence when higher-order laser modes are used in optical wireless communication links. The jet engine exhaust turbulence power spectrum, modified by low-pass and high-pass filters, is employed. Intensity fluctuations are evaluated against the link length, structure constant, wave number (inverse of wavelength) (i.e., against turbulence strength), source size, and jet engine exhaust turbulence parameters. It is found that higher-order laser modes are better at mitigating the scintillations. Jet engine exhaust turbulence parameters are found to affect scintillations substantially.
data.title_cn: 喷气发动机排气湍流中高阶激光模式的强度波动
data.abstract_cn: 当在光学无线通信链路中使用高阶激光模式时，可以评估喷气发动机排气湍流中由闪烁指数量化的强度波动。采用通过低通和高通滤波器修改的喷气发动机排气湍流功率谱。根据链路长度、结构常数、波数（波长的倒数）（即针对湍流强度）、源尺寸和喷气发动机排气湍流参数来评估强度波动。研究发现，高阶激光模式能够更好地减轻闪烁。研究发现喷气发动机排气湍流参数对闪烁有显着影响。

data.title: YOLO-MPID: an improved YOLOv5 network for in situ detection of laser cladding melt pool states
data.author: Shirui Guo, Enbo Wang, Quanbin Du, Shuisheng Chen, Chuan Guo, Lujun Cui, Yinghao Cui, Xiaolei Li, Yongqian Chen, Yue Zhao, Bo Zheng
data.summary: High-speed laser cladding is a critical surface modification technique, where the melt pool state critically determines the quality of the cladding layer. To address the challenges of inaccurate monitoring and the lack of real-time feedback control during the cladding process, this study proposes an improved YOLOv5-based object detection model, named YOLO-MPID. The model incorporates the Squeeze-and-Excitation (SE) module and the Convolutional Block Attention Module (CBAM) to enhance the extraction of complex edge structures and semantic features in melt pool images. Ablation studies were conducted to evaluate the individual and combined effects of SE and CBAM on detection performance. Comparative experiments under varying laser power conditions demonstrated that YOLO-MPID achieves superior robustness and accuracy compared to the baseline YOLOv5 and other mainstream detection algorithms. Experimental results show that the proposed model achieves a mean Average Precision (mAP at 0.5) of 97.42% and a real-time inference speed of 121.71 FPS. Visual analysis further supports the quantitative findings. In summary, YOLO-MPID provides an effective solution for real-time melt pool state detection and quality control in practical industrial scenarios, offering robust technical support for advancements in image science and optical process control.
data.title_cn: YOLO-MPID：一种改进的 YOLOv5 网络，用于激光熔覆熔池状态的原位检测
data.abstract_cn: 高速激光熔覆是一项关键的表面改性技术，其中熔池状态关键决定熔覆层的质量。为了解决熔覆过程中监测不准确和缺乏实时反馈控制的挑战，本研究提出了一种改进的基于YOLOv5的目标检测模型，命名为YOLO-MPID。该模型结合了挤压和激励（SE）模块和卷积块注意力模块（CBAM），以增强熔池图像中复杂边缘结构和语义特征的提取。进行消融研究以评估 SE 和 CBAM 对检测性能的单独和组合影响。不同激光功率条件下的对比实验表明，与基线YOLOv5和其他主流检测算法相比，YOLO-MPID具有卓越的鲁棒性和准确性。实验结果表明，该模型的平均精度（mAP at 0.5）为97.42%，实时推理速度为121.71 FPS。视觉分析进一步支持了定量发现。综上所述，YOLO-MPID为实际工业场景中的实时熔池状态检测和质量控制提供了有效的解决方案，为图像科学和光学过程控制的进步提供了强有力的技术支持。

data.title: Efficient split-step modeling for imaging through atmospheric turbulence
data.author: Samuel T. Thurman, Zachary J. DeSantis
data.summary: We develop a prescription for constructing split-step models for computationally efficient numerical propagation of optical fields through distributed atmospheric phase screens in imaging geometries with both an aperture stop and a field stop. We use phase-space optics to show that our prescription yields efficient spatial sampling values, efficient in the sense that they closely match the minimum space-bandwidth product requirements for sampling a generic speckled field that passes through both stops. We also compute the computational complexity for propagating fields through our split-step models using fast Fourier transform methods. Compared with a typical split-step model, our efficient prescription provides more than a 6× reduction in computational complexity with excellent fidelity.
data.title_cn: 通过大气湍流成像的高效分步建模
data.abstract_cn: 我们开发了一种方法，用于构建分步模型，以便通过具有孔径光阑和视场光阑的成像几何结构中的分布式大气相位屏幕来计算有效的光场数值传播。我们使用相空间光学来表明我们的处方产生了有效的空间采样值，高效是指它们紧密匹配对穿过两个光阑的通用斑点场进行采样的最小空间带宽乘积要求。我们还使用快速傅里叶变换方法通过分步模型计算传播场的计算复杂度。与典型的分步模型相比，我们的有效方案使计算复杂度降低了 6 倍以上，同时具有出色的保真度。

data.title: Spectroscopic analysis of volumetric OCT data for the automated measurement of scatterer size
data.author:
Erin
			C. O’Kane, Wan Wang, Robert
			E. Highland, David A. Miller, Adam Wax
data.summary: Spectroscopic optical coherence tomography enables an accurate estimation of scatterer size by computing the correlation distance (CD) function. For calibration and accuracy verification, polystyrene spheres are commonly used as size standards. However, anomalies have been observed when using the CD function to analyze spherical scatterers, which we link to multiple scattering. We have developed a robust, automated algorithm to calculate the size of hundreds of scatterers within a volumetric OCT image while accounting for the effects of multiple scattering. We measured 5.1, 7.7, and 11.3 µm polystyrene beads suspended in collagen hydrogel, agarose, and polydimethylsiloxane, which resulted in average diameters in agreement with the theoretical size to within ± λ /2, using this analysis approach. Accurately accounting for these multiple scattering effects is crucial for a robust calibration, and these measurements point the way toward analyzing the nuclear size of cells throughout a 3D tissue volume.
data.title_cn: 对体积 OCT 数据进行光谱分析，用于自动测量散射体尺寸
data.abstract_cn: 光谱光学相干断层扫描可以通过计算相关距离 (CD) 函数来准确估计散射体尺寸。对于校准和精度验证，聚苯乙烯球通常用作尺寸标准。然而，在使用 CD 函数分析球形散射体时观察到了异常现象，我们将其与多重散射联系起来。我们开发了一种强大的自动化算法来计算体积 OCT 图像中数百个散射体的大小，同时考虑多重散射的影响。我们使用这种分析方法测量了悬浮在胶原水凝胶、琼脂糖和聚二甲基硅氧烷中的 5.1、7.7 和 11.3 µm 聚苯乙烯珠，其平均直径与理论尺寸一致，在 ± λ /2 范围内。准确地考虑这些多重散射效应对于稳健的校准至关重要，这些测量为分析整个 3D 组织体积中细胞核的大小指明了方向。

data.title: Decoupling retardance, enpolarization, and depolarization properties from a Mueller matrix: discussion
data.author: José J. Gil
data.summary: The intrinsic connection between enpolarization and depolarization in linear polarimetric transformations becomes evident from the fact that, in general, the measured Mueller matrix—representing integral effects over temporal, spatial, and spectral domains—exhibits both behaviors in an inseparable manner. This entanglement prevents the unambiguous assignment of enpolarizing and depolarizing effects to distinct serial components of the Mueller matrix. In particular, the diattenuators arising in serial decompositions typically display polarizance or diattenuation properties that differ from those of the original system, and a similar situation occurs for the depolarizing component. As for the characterization of retardance, it requires the introduction of entrance and exit retarders, whose definition must rely on appropriate and physically meaningful conventions. This work discusses the problem of decomposing a general Mueller matrix into an equivalent serial system in which the enpolarizing–depolarizing and retarding properties are isolated in separate components. Based on the algebraic structure of Mueller matrices, the proposed solution enables the identification of a set of 16 parameters that independently characterize the system’s enpolarizing, depolarizing, and retarding features. The interpretation and physical significance of these parameters are analyzed and discussed.
data.title_cn: 从 Mueller 矩阵解耦延迟、极化和去极化特性：讨论
data.abstract_cn: 线性偏振变换中的极化和去极化之间的内在联系变得显而易见，因为一般来说，测量的穆勒矩阵（代表时域、空间和谱域的积分效应）以不可分割的方式表现出这两种行为。这种纠缠阻止了将极化和去极化效应明确分配给穆勒矩阵的不同串行分量。特别是，串行分解中产生的衰减器通常表现出与原始系统不同的偏振或衰减特性，并且对于去偏振分量也会发生类似的情况。至于延迟的表征，需要引入入口和出口延迟器，其定义必须依赖于适当且具有物理意义的约定。这项工作讨论了将一般穆勒矩阵分解为等效串行系统的问题，其中极化-去极化和延迟特性被隔离在单独的组件中。基于 Mueller 矩阵的代数结构，所提出的解决方案能够识别一组 16 个参数，这些参数独立地表征系统的去极化、去极化和延迟特征。对这些参数的解释和物理意义进行了分析和讨论。

data.title: Deep learning-based conjugate orbital angular momentum interferometry for in-plane displacement measurement
data.author: Qinyu Li, Zhanwu Xie, Yuanheng Shi, Wei Xia, Dongmei Guo
data.summary: A deep learning-based phase demodulation algorithm is proposed for measuring in-plane displacements in conjugate orbital angular momentum (OAM) interferometry. The phase demodulation hybrid neural network (PDHNN) is designed to directly demodulate petal-shaped interferograms in a single step. PDHNN employs a custom ResNet-transformer architecture with deformable convolutions and attention mechanisms to extract rotation-sensitive features from petal-shaped interferograms for robust phase demodulation. The algorithm has been validated using both simulated and experimental data. Experimental results show that the demodulation accuracy reaches 91.60% within an error margin of 1°, and within a 0.1° error range, the average displacement error is 0.13 nm, demonstrating high robustness and stability in noisy conditions.
data.title_cn: 基于深度学习的共轭轨道角动量干涉测量用于面内位移测量
data.abstract_cn: 提出了一种基于深度学习的相位解调算法，用于测量共轭轨道角动量（OAM）干涉测量中的面内位移。相位解调混合神经网络（PDHNN）旨在一步直接解调花瓣形干涉图。 PDHNN 采用具有可变形卷积和注意机制的定制 ResNet 变压器架构，从花瓣形干涉图中提取旋转敏感特征，以实现鲁棒的相位解调。该算法已使用模拟和实验数据进行了验证。实验结果表明，解调精度在1°误差范围内达到91.60%，在0.1°误差范围内，平均位移误差为0.13 nm，在噪声条件下具有较高的鲁棒性和稳定性。

data.title: Behavior of the observed time showing simultaneous events compared to the proper time of a scene seen through an oscillating refractive index medium
data.author: Alexis Matwyschuk
data.summary: After previously highlighting time dilation and time reversal according to the refractive index value of the crossed medium, the temporal behavior at the observer place is studied when this refractive index varies as a function of time. Assuming a sinusoidal variation, two modes of progression with a stage of switching between these two modes are differentiated. The mode alternating time dilation and time reversal corresponds to the temporal variation with an alternating progression. The mode slowing down the proper time in the first step and accelerating it without reversing it in the second step corresponds to the temporal variation with a positive progression. The vision of an observer looking through a medium with a variable refractive index reveals directional variations of time and the simultaneity of several events in the scene. The determination of the number of simultaneous events as a function of observed time also indicates if the events are oriented to the future or to the past. Each orientation shows an acceleration zone, a deceleration zone, and a constant zone. These zones are determined by the value of the derivative of the observed time. The frozen time placed on the line of intersection between the future and the past corresponds to the derivative equal to zero. At that moment, the vision of an infinite number of events appears during a dot in observed time. This vision reveals a temporal singularity. The observed simultaneity can no longer be identified by an event number but by the duration of the proper time within the limits of frozen time. All the results obtained in this study were verified and validated, confirming the directional variations of the observed time and the simultaneity of events with the temporal singularity.
data.title_cn: 与通过振荡折射率介质看到的场景的正确时间相比，显示同时事件的观察时间的行为
data.abstract_cn: 在先前根据交叉介质的折射率值强调时间膨胀和时间反转之后，研究了当折射率随时间变化时观察者位置的时间行为。假设正弦变化，则两种进展模式以及这两种模式之间的切换阶段是有区别的。交替时间膨胀和时间反转模式对应于具有交替进行的时间变化。在第一步中减慢本征时间并在第二步中加速它而不反转它的模式对应于具有正向进展的时间变化。观察者通过具有可变折射率的介质观察的视觉揭示了时间的方向变化以及场景中多个事件的同时性。将同时事件的数量确定为观察时间的函数还表明事件是面向未来还是面向过去。每个方向显示一个加速区、一个减速区和一个恒定区。这些区域由观测时间的导数值确定。放置在未来和过去之间的交线上的冻结时间对应于等于零的导数。在那一刻，无数事件的景象出现在观察时间的一个点中。这一愿景揭示了时间奇点。观察到的同时性不再可以通过事件编号来识别，而是可以通过冻结时间限制内的适当时间的持续时间来识别。本研究获得的所有结果均经过验证和验证，证实了观测时间的方向变化以及事件与时间奇点的同时性。

data.title: Semi-analytic theory of high-efficiency multilayer dielectric gratings
data.author: Lifeng Li
data.summary: A semi-analytic theory of multilayer dielectric gratings (MLDGs) is presented. Analytic formulas for the –1st-order diffraction efficiency of an MLDG being 100% and greater than a preset value are given in terms of the scattering matrix elements of the top surface-relief grating (TG). The important role of the combined reflection phases is highlighted. The need to secure high reflectances of the multilayer stack at the two angles of incidence below the TG and the need to supply a sufficient number of aperiodic layers in the multilayer substrate for phase matching are emphasized. Three numerical examples of 100% efficient MLDGs, obtained without optimizing the TG, are presented, illustrating the accuracy and generality of the theory.
data.title_cn: 高效多层介质光栅的半解析理论
data.abstract_cn: 提出了多层介质光栅（MLDG）的半解析理论。根据顶部表面浮雕光栅（TG）的散射矩阵元素，给出了MLDG的–1阶衍射效率为100%且大于预设值的解析公式。强调了组合反射阶段的重要作用。强调需要确保多层堆叠在TG以下的两个入射角处具有高反射率，以及需要在多层基板中提供足够数量的非周期性层以进行相位匹配。给出了在未优化 TG 的情况下获得的 100% 有效 MLDG 的三个数值示例，说明了该理论的准确性和通用性。

data.title: Fringe visibility for pulsed digital holography with large optical path differences
data.author: Samuel T. Thurman, Anthony C. Klee
data.summary: In interferometry and holography systems, the optical path difference (OPD) between the beams must be kept smaller than the source coherence length to obtain stable interference fringes. When the OPD is larger than the coherence length, the fringe phase drifts on time scales comparable to the source coherence time. This reduces fringe visibility and causes fringes to wash out completely for observation times longer than the coherence time. High fringe visibility measurements, however, can be obtained with pulsed sources (or very short detector integration times), if the pulse duration is shorter than the source coherence time, thereby limiting the amount of fringe phase drift over the pulse duration. We analyze cases where optical pulses are carved from a continuous-wave laser source. We derive an expression for the squared magnitude of the fringe visibility for pulsed interference measurements and demonstrate that high visibility fringes can be obtained even when the OPD is much longer than the source coherence length. As a rule of thumb, the source coherence time should be at least 10 times greater than the pulse duration to obtain expected fringe visibilities greater than 95% when the source laser has a Lorentzian line shape. This result is important to the design of digital holography systems for long-range remote sensing applications, where it is difficult to implement a dynamic optical delay line for path length matching with non-cooperative objects.
data.title_cn: 具有大光程差的脉冲数字全息的条纹可见度
data.abstract_cn: 在干涉测量和全息系统中，光束之间的光程差（OPD）必须保持小于源相干长度以获得稳定的干涉条纹。当 OPD 大于相干长度时，条纹相位在与源相干时间相当的时间尺度上漂移。这会降低条纹可见度，并导致观测时间长于相干时间时条纹完全消失。然而，如果脉冲持续时间短于源相干时间，则可以使用脉冲源（或非常短的探测器积分时间）获得高条纹可见度测量，从而限制脉冲持续时间内的条纹相位漂移量。我们分析了从连续波激光源雕刻光脉冲的情况。我们推导出脉冲干涉测量的条纹可见度平方幅度的表达式，并证明即使 OPD 远长于源相干长度，也可以获得高可见度条纹。根据经验，当源激光具有洛伦兹线形状时，源相干时间应至少比脉冲持续时间长 10 倍，才能获得大于 95% 的预期条纹可见度。这一结果对于远程遥感应用的数字全息系统的设计很重要，在这些应用中很难实现与非合作物体的路径长度匹配的动态光学延迟线。

data.title: Backward canonical energy flow in the near field of three non-paraxial 2D beams
data.author: V. V. Kotlyar, A. A. Kovalev, A. G. Nalimov, A. M. Telegin
data.summary: In this paper, several 2D non-paraxial light fields near the initial plane (sinc beam, Gaussian beam, and Hankel beam) are considered. These TE-polarized beams are shown theoretically and numerically to have a reverse canonical energy flux in the initial plane. The negative value of the longitudinal projection of the canonical flux vector means that the longitudinal derivative of the phase is negative, and hence, the local wave vector is directed against the positive direction of the optical axis. The reverse flux occurs in the presence of evanescent waves. Although running along the initial plane, evanescent waves themselves do not transfer energy along the optical axis perpendicular to the initial plane; they participate in the formation of the reverse flux. Near the initial plane, the amplitude of the light field consists of a linear combination of amplitudes of the propagating and evanescent waves. Therefore, evanescent waves participate in the formation of the phase function of the complex amplitude of the entire field and affect the sign of the longitudinal phase derivative. For a sinc beam, the backflow occurs in the first intensity side lobes, where the standing evanescent wave has odd antinodes.
data.title_cn: 三非近轴二维光束近场中的后向正则能量流
data.abstract_cn: 本文考虑了初始平面附近的几个二维非近轴光场（正弦光束、高斯光束和汉克尔光束）。这些 TE 偏振光束在理论上和数值上都显示出在初始平面上具有反正则能量通量。正则通量矢量的纵向投影的负值意味着相位的纵向导数为负，因此，局部波矢量的方向与光轴的正方向相反。当存在倏逝波时会发生反向通量。尽管沿着初始平面传播，倏逝波本身并不沿着垂直于初始平面的光轴传递能量；它们参与反向通量的形成。在初始平面附近，光场的振幅由传播波和倏逝波的振幅的线性组合组成。因此，倏逝波参与整个场复振幅相位函数的形成，并影响纵相位导数的符号。对于正弦光束，回流发生在第一强度旁瓣，其中倏逝波驻波具有奇数波腹。

data.title: Generation of high-intensity 3D Gaussian-like spots via near-field diffraction from 2D orthogonally chirped structures
data.author: Mohammadreza Zarei, Saifollah Rasouli, Davud Hebri, Li-Gang Wang
data.summary: This study presents a class of two-dimensional (2D) spatial-frequency-modulated structures with transmittance d 1 =0.10mm, in which the periodicity can vary along both the d 2 =0.30mm- and n c =1-axes. Specifically, the structure exhibits spatial frequencies n av =3 and z =0 that sinusoidally alternate between two values along both directions, with the possibility of unequal modulation in the T ( x , y )- and x -axes. It is shown that y generally behaves as an almost periodic function, resulting in an impulsive spatial spectrum. However, we identify the conditions under which f x becomes periodic, and its spatial spectrum forms a lattice of impulses. When these periodicity conditions are met, we refer to the structure as a 2D spatially chirped periodic structure. These structures are characterized by four natural numbers, denoted as f y , x , y , and T ( x , y ), which represent the modulation in the T ( x , y )- and n c x -directions, respectively, and two real parameters, named frequency modulation strengths in both the n c y - and n av x -directions, denoted by n av y and x , respectively. As a special case, we define a 2D spatially chirped amplitude sinusoidal structure (SCASS), based on the transmission function of a conventional 2D amplitude sinusoidal grating, where the phase of the conventional grating is replaced by a desired chirped phase. The near-field diffraction from 2D SCASSs is studied using the angular (spatial) spectrum method. The Talbot distances for these gratings are determined and verified experimentally, showing that the intensity profiles at specific Talbot distances are highly dependent on the parameters y , x , y , k x , k y , and n c x . Furthermore, we formulated the near-field diffraction of a plane wave from 2D multiplicatively separable spatially chirped amplitude sinusoidal structures, considering the variability of spatial periods in both the n c y - and n av x -directions. In comparison with conventional 2D gratings, new, to our knowledge, and intriguing diffraction patterns are observed, such as sharp and smooth Gaussian-like intensity spots generated via the diffraction of the incident wave, with nearly diffraction-limited features but limited overall efficiency. These intensity spots depend on the characteristic parameters of the structure. By carefully manipulating the n av y parameters, we have the ability to generate maximum intensity peaks within these 2D SCASSs, which are 22 times the intensity of the incident light. Comparing these maximum intensity peaks to their 1D chirped counterparts reveals a significant difference. We demonstrated an interesting result that the high-intensity spots in the Talbot carpets of 1D chirped structures and 2D SCASSs appear at different propagation planes, while these spots are precisely located at the Talbot and half-Talbot planes in both the 1D and 2D binary gratings. An interesting additional result demonstrated that the depression of the intensity distribution along the propagation direction occurs around two closely spaced intensity maxima, both before and after the self-imaging region of the 1D and 2D binary gratings. In regard to the 1D chirped structures and 2D SCASSs, the intensity spots exhibit a Gaussian-like spot distribution in both the propagation and transverse directions, making these spatial points suitable for 3D trapping of particles in a 3D array without the need for external imaging systems.
data.title_cn: 通过 2D 正交啁啾结构的近场衍射生成高强度 3D 类高斯斑点
data.abstract_cn: 本研究提出了一类透射率 d 1 =0.10mm 的二维 (2D) 空间频率调制结构，其中周期性可以沿 d 2 =0.30mm 轴和 n c =1 轴变化。具体来说，该结构表现出空间频率 n av =3 和 z =0，它们沿两个方向在两个值之间正弦交替，并且可能在 T ( x , y ) 轴和 x 轴上进行不等调制。结果表明，y 通常表现为几乎周期性的函数，从而产生脉冲空间谱。然而，我们确定了 f x 变为周期性的条件，并且其空间谱形成脉冲晶格。当满足这些周期性条件时，我们将该结构称为二维空间啁啾周期性结构。这些结构的特征是四个自然数，分别表示为 f y 、 x 、 y 和 T ( x , y ) ，分别表示 T ( x , y ) 和 n c x 方向上的调制，以及两个实数参数，称为 n c y 和 n av x 方向上的频率调制强度，分别表示为 n av y 和 x 。作为一种特殊情况，我们基于传统二维幅度正弦光栅的传输函数定义了二维空间啁啾幅度正弦结构（SCASS），其中传统光栅的相位被所需的啁啾相位取代。使用角（空间）谱方法研究 2D SCASS 的近场衍射。这些光栅的塔尔博特距离是通过实验确定和验证的，表明特定塔尔博特距离处的强度分布高度依赖于参数 y 、 x 、 y 、 k x 、 k y 和 n c x 。此外，考虑到 n c y 和 n av x 方向上空间周期的可变性，我们公式化了来自二维可乘分离空间啁啾幅度正弦结构的平面波的近场衍射。与传统的二维光栅相比，据我们所知，观察到了新的、有趣的衍射图案，例如通过入射波的衍射产生的尖锐且光滑的类高斯强度点，具有几乎衍射极限的特征，但整体效率有限。这些强度点取决于结构的特征参数。通过仔细操纵 n av y 参数，我们能够在这些 2D SCASS 内生成最大强度峰值，这是入射光强度的 22 倍。将这些最大强度峰值与其一维啁啾对应峰值进行比较，揭示出显着差异。我们证明了一个有趣的结果，即一维啁啾结构和二维SCASS的塔尔博特地毯中的高强度点出现在不同的传播平面上，而这些点精确地位于一维和二维二元光栅中的塔尔博特和半塔尔博特平面上。一个有趣的附加结果表明，沿着传播方向的强度分布的下降发生在两个间隔很近的强度最大值周围，一维和二维二元光栅的自成像区域之前和之后。对于 1D 啁啾结构和 2D SCASS，强度点在传播方向和横向方向上均表现出类高斯点分布，使得这些空间点适合在 3D 阵列中对粒子进行 3D 捕获，而无需外部成像系统。

data.title: Goos–Hänchen and Imbert–Fedorov shifts for electromagnetic multi-Gaussian Schell-model beams
data.author: Miaomiao Tang, He Zhang, Yunzhe Yang, Shijie Dong, Yujie Zhou, Xinzhong Li
data.summary: We consider the Goos–Hänchen and Imbert–Fedorov shifts arising from the reflection and transmission of partially coherent, partially polarized beams. For the specific case of an electromagnetic multi-Gaussian Schell-model source, compact expressions are obtained for the spatial and angular versions of the beam shifts, and the influence of the coherence and polarization of such a beam on these shifts is then investigated. It is found that the angular part of these shifts can be significantly enhanced or suppressed by the correlation structure and coherence width of the incident beam. In addition, the state and degree of polarization are not crucial for GH shifts. Both GH effects can be observed even in the completely unpolarized case. However, the IF shifts are more affected by the presence of the unpolarized part of the source.
data.title_cn: 电磁多高斯 Schell 模型光束的 Goos-Hänchen 和 Imbert-Fedorov 位移
data.abstract_cn: 我们考虑由部分相干、部分偏振光束的反射和透射引起的古斯-汉兴位移和安伯特-费多罗夫位移。对于电磁多高斯谢尔模型源的具体情况，获得了光束偏移的空间和角度版本的紧凑表达式，然后研究了此类光束的相干性和偏振对这些偏移的影响。研究发现，这些偏移的角度部分可以通过入射光束的相关结构和相干宽度来显着增强或抑制。此外，偏振态和偏振度对于 GH 位移并不重要。即使在完全非极化的情况下也可以观察到两种 GH 效应。然而，中频偏移更容易受到源非极化部分的影响。

data.title: Mapping 2D spatial structured light information onto 1D temporal speckle sequences
data.author:
Purnesh
			Singh Badavath, Vijay Kumar
data.summary: Conventional structured light recognition methods rely on spatially resolved imaging. These systems often suffer from low frame rates, sensitivity to alignment, and high computational demands. Such limitations hinder their use in real-time and scalable applications. Here, we demonstrate a novel approach, to our knowledge, for structured light recognition by mapping two-dimensional spatial features onto one-dimensional temporal speckle sequences. This is achieved using a single-pixel detector that captures temporal fluctuations in speckle patterns produced by a rotating diffuser. We demonstrate that optimal mapping occurs when the detector size is equal to or greater than the average speckle grain size, ensuring effective mapping of spatiotemporal speckle dynamics. Utilizing this principle, we successfully recognize Laguerre–Gaussian, Hermite–Gaussian, and intensity-degenerate perfect vortex beams via a support vector machine classifier. The recognition model exhibits >99% accuracy and is robust to atmospheric turbulence, strict optical alignments, or symmetry-breaking optics. Furthermore, we demonstrate a proof-of-concept of the proposed method by establishing a free-space optical communication channel. Employing 16 orbital angular momentum superposition states utilizing a 4-bit binary amplitude switching scheme, we achieve a bit error rate of 0.001. This work presents a scalable, low-latency, and computationally efficient method for real-time structured light recognition, offering significant potential for next-generation optical communication and sensing systems.
data.title_cn: 将 2D 空间结构光信息映射到 1D 时间散斑序列
data.abstract_cn: 传统的结构光识别方法依赖于空间分辨成像。这些系统通常面临帧速率低、对齐敏感以及计算需求高的问题。这些限制阻碍了它们在实时和可扩展应用程序中的使用。在这里，据我们所知，我们展示了一种新颖的方法，通过将二维空间特征映射到一维时间散斑序列来进行结构光识别。这是通过使用单像素探测器来实现的，该探测器捕获旋转扩散器产生的散斑图案的时间波动。我们证明，当探测器尺寸等于或大于平均散斑颗粒尺寸时，就会出现最佳映射，从而确保时空散斑动力学的有效映射。利用这一原理，我们通过支持向量机分类器成功识别拉盖尔-高斯、厄米-高斯和强度简并完美涡旋光束。该识别模型的准确度>99%，并且对大气湍流、严格的光学对准或对称破坏光学器件具有鲁棒性。此外，我们通过建立自由空间光通信通道来演示所提出方法的概念验证。采用 16 个轨道角动量叠加态和 4 位二进制幅度切换方案，我们实现了 0.001 的误码率。这项工作提出了一种可扩展、低延迟且计算高效的实时结构光识别方法，为下一代光通信和传感系统提供了巨大的潜力。

data.title: Propagation characteristics of a focused perfect vortex beam array in slant-path non-Kolmogorov maritime atmospheric turbulence
data.author: Hong Yu, Bowen Yang, Hanyin Hu, Shuai Zhang, Zheqiang Zhong, Bin Zhang
data.summary: The propagation characteristics of high-energy lasers in slant-path non-Kolmogorov maritime atmospheric turbulence are complicated due to the competition between turbulence and thermal blooming effects. The exploration of laser beams with enhanced turbulence and thermal blooming resistance has emerged as a critical issue for high-energy laser engineering applications. Based on this, by means of a four-dimensional simulation model combining the turbulence and the thermal blooming, the propagation characteristics of a perfect vortex beam array in a slant-path non-Kolmogorov maritime atmosphere have been analyzed in detail. The influence of the parameters, such as the topological charges, widths of the annulus, beam widths, altitudes, and zenith angles, has been analyzed. In addition, the comparison of the propagation characteristics of the Gaussian beam array, vortex beam array, and perfect vortex beam array was carried out. Results indicate that, with appropriate selection of the parameters, the perfect vortex beam array exhibits better performance over the vortex beam array and the Gaussian beam array in suppressing the combined effects of atmospheric turbulence and thermal blooming. We hope these results may provide useful guidance for high-energy laser applications in slant-path non-Kolmogorov maritime atmospheric turbulence.
data.title_cn: 倾斜路径非柯尔莫哥洛夫海洋大气湍流中聚焦完美涡旋束阵列的传播特性
data.abstract_cn: 由于湍流和热晕效应之间的竞争，高能激光在斜路非柯尔莫哥洛夫海上大气湍流中的传播特性变得复杂。探索具有增强湍流和抗热晕性的激光束已成为高能激光工程应用的关键问题。在此基础上，通过湍流与热晕相结合的四维仿真模型，详细分析了斜路非柯尔莫哥洛夫海洋大气中完美涡旋束阵列的传播特性。分析了拓扑电荷、环面宽度、波束宽度、高度和天顶角等参数的影响。此外，还对高斯光束阵列、涡旋光束阵列和完美涡旋光束阵列的传播特性进行了比较。结果表明，通过适当选择参数，完美涡旋光束阵列在抑制大气湍流和热晕的综合影响方面表现出比涡旋光束阵列和高斯光束阵列更好的性能。我们希望这些结果可以为高能激光在倾斜路径非柯尔莫哥洛夫海上大气湍流中的应用提供有用的指导。

data.title: Evaluating the beam shape coefficients of a hollow vortex Gaussian beam by using the two-step indirect method based on the scalar translational addition theorem
data.author: Yiqian Tian, Yu Wang, Haoyu Jiang, Shiliang Zhong, Jianqi Shen
data.summary: The two-step indirect method for evaluating the beam shape coefficients (BSCs) of the electromagnetic field of a circular non-vortex Gaussian beam was recently proposed to simplify the analytical work in formulating the BSCs and to speed up the relevant numerical calculation. In this work, the indirect method is extended to a family of circular vortex beams carrying topological charges, which requires an additional recurrence for calculating the translation coefficients. Numerical results of the hollow vortex Gauss beam verify that the proposed method can avoid tedious analytical derivation and improve the efficiency of numerical calculation.
data.title_cn: 基于标量平移加定理的两步间接法评估空心涡旋高斯光束的束形系数
data.abstract_cn: 最近提出了评估圆形非涡流高斯光束电磁场的束形系数（BSC）的两步间接法，以简化BSC制定的分析工作并加快相关数值计算。在这项工作中，间接方法被扩展到一系列携带拓扑电荷的圆形涡旋光束，这需要额外的递归来计算平移系数。空心涡旋高斯梁的数值结果验证了该方法可以避免繁琐的解析推导，提高数值计算效率。

data.title: Chromatic optical coherence tomography for high-resolution deep tissue imaging
data.author: Seung Eon Lee, Hyeong Soo Nam, Ryeong Hyeon Kim, Hyun Jung Kim, Jae Yeon Seok, Jin Won Kim, Young-Jin Kim, Hongki Yoo
data.summary: Achieving clear and deep tissue imaging with optical coherence tomography (OCT) necessitates the simultaneous optimization of three critical factors: high resolution, extended depth of focus (DOF), and high signal-to-noise ratio (SNR). Conventional OCT systems often compromise one or more of these factors, due to inherent trade-offs in optical design and noise management. To address these limitations, we present a chromatic OCT system that simultaneously optimizes all three parameters. The system achieves an isotropic spatial resolution of 2 to 3 μm by leveraging a broad bandwidth light source and high-numerical-aperture optics with a pronounced chromatic focal shift, which enables up to a sevenfold DOF extension. Additionally, a novel noise-gating algorithm suppresses system-inherent noise, sidelobe artifacts, and multiple scattering effects, significantly enhancing the SNR. Comparative simulations and experiments demonstrate that the proposed chromatic OCT outperforms conventional high-resolution systems by maintaining superior resolution and SNR over an extended imaging range. These advancements establish chromatic OCT as a powerful tool for high-resolution, deep tissue imaging in biomedical applications, offering improved diagnostic capabilities.
data.title_cn: 用于高分辨率深层组织成像的彩色光学相干断层扫描
data.abstract_cn: 利用光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 实现清晰的深层组织成像需要同时优化三个关键因素：高分辨率、扩展焦深 (DOF) 和高信噪比 (SNR)。由于光学设计和噪声管理方面固有的权衡，传统 OCT 系统通常会损害其中一个或多个因素。为了解决这些限制，我们提出了一种可同时优化所有三个参数的彩色 OCT 系统。该系统利用宽带宽光源和具有明显色焦偏移的高数值孔径光学器件，实现了 2 至 3 μm 的各向同性空间分辨率，可实现高达七倍的自由度扩展。此外，一种新颖的噪声门控算法可以抑制系统固有的噪声、旁瓣伪影和多重散射效应，从而显着提高信噪比。比较模拟和实验表明，所提出的彩色 OCT 通过在扩展的成像范围内保持卓越的分辨率和信噪比，优于传统的高分辨率系统。这些进步使彩色 OCT 成为生物医学应用中高分辨率深层组织成像的强大工具，提供改进的诊断能力。

data.title: Dynamic manipulation of high-order Poincaré sphere polarization states via a transmissive space-time-coding metasurface
data.author: Genhao Wu, Liming Si, Lin Dong, Pengcheng Tang
data.summary: The state of polarization (SOP) on high-order Poincaré spheres (HOPSs), characterized by their distinctive phase profiles and polarization distributions, plays a crucial role in both classical and quantum optical applications. However, most existing metasurface-based implementations face inherent limitations: passive designs are restricted to represent a few predefined HOPS SOPs, while programmable versions typically constrain to 1-bit or 2-bit phase control resolution. In this paper, dynamic generation of HOPS beams with arbitrary SOP based on a transmissive space-time-coding metasurface is demonstrated. By combining 1-bit phase discretizations via PIN diodes with a time-coding strategy, the metasurface enables quasi-continuous complex-amplitude modulation for harmonic waves in both x - and y -polarizations. Based on near-field diffraction theory, arbitrary SOPs on any HOPS m , n can be precisely generated using a linearly polarized basis, which is independently controlled by FPGA reconfiguration. We experimentally demonstrate that polarization holography on HOPS 0,0 achieves high polarization purity >91.28 % , and vector vortex beams on HOPS 1,3 and HOPS −1,3 exhibit high orbital angular momentum mode purities >91.25 % . This methodology holds great potential for structured wavefront shaping, vortex generation, and high-capacity planar photonics.
data.title_cn: 通过透射时空编码超表面动态操纵高阶庞加莱球偏振态
data.abstract_cn: 高阶庞加莱球 (HOPS) 上的偏振态 (SOP) 以其独特的相位轮廓和偏振分布为特征，在经典光学和量子光学应用中都起着至关重要的作用。然而，大多数现有的基于超表面的实现都面临着固有的局限性：无源设计仅限于表示一些预定义的 HOPS SOP，而可编程版本通常限制为 1 位或 2 位相位控制分辨率。本文演示了基于透射时空编码超表面的任意 SOP 动态生成 HOPS 光束。通过将 PIN 二极管的 1 位相位离散化与时间编码策略相结合，超表面能够对 x 和 y 偏振的谐波进行准连续复振幅调制。基于近场衍射理论，可以使用线性偏振基础精确生成任意 HOPS m 、 n 上的任意 SOP，这由 FPGA 重新配置独立控制。我们通过实验证明，HOPS 0,0 上的偏振全息术实现了 >91.28% 的高偏振纯度，HOPS 1,3 和 HOPS -1,3 上的矢量涡旋光束表现出 >91.25% 的高轨道角动量模式纯度。这种方法在结构化波前整形、涡旋生成和高容量平面光子学方面具有巨大的潜力。

data.title: Moiré-type Pancharatnam–Berry phase element enabled tunable polarization-rotating Bessel beam
data.author: Yu Zou, Yanke Li, Jialong Yan, Hui Liu, Yuqi Zhang, Yi Zhang, Dandan Wen, Peng Li, Bingyan Wei, Jianlin Zhao, Sheng Liu
data.summary: Pancharatnam–Berry (PB) phase elements are widely used for optical field modulation due to their precise control over beam amplitude and phase.
