However, conventional PB elements are inherently static, with fixed modulation functions post-fabrication, limiting their adaptability in complex application scenarios. In this paper, we propose a moiré-type PB element comprising two specially designed PB elements. The proposed element attaches the two spin states with rotation-dependent PB phases while preserving the spin, thereby enabling dynamic rotation-tunability of the PB phase. As a functional validation, we experimentally demonstrate the dynamic control over the rotation rate of the polarization-rotating beam. The moiré-type PB element was designed using the checkerboard-phase encoding method and fabricated in liquid crystal via SD1-based micro-lithography. A back-propagation correction is introduced to eliminate the diffraction effects caused by the element gap. An adjustable rotation rate of ±240 deg /cm is achieved through ±160 deg angular offset. Owing to its compact structure with high integration and operation simplicity, the moiré-type PB element offers a novel dynamic modulation solution for structured light field generation, particle manipulation, and advanced laser processing.
data.title_cn: 莫尔型 Pancharatnam-Berry 相位元件启用可调谐偏振旋转贝塞尔光束
data.abstract_cn: Pancharatnam-Berry (PB) 相位元件因其对光束幅度和相位的精确控制而被广泛用于光场调制。然而，传统的PB元件本质上是静态的，在制造后具有固定的调制功能，限制了它们在复杂应用场景中的适应性。在本文中，我们提出了一种由两个专门设计的PB元件组成的莫尔型PB元件。所提出的元件将两个自旋态与旋转相关的 PB 相连接，同时保留自旋，从而实现 PB 相的动态旋转可调性。作为功​​能验证，我们通过实验演示了对偏振旋转光束旋转速率的动态控制。莫尔型PB元件采用棋盘相位编码方法设计，并通过基于SD1的微光刻在液晶中制造。引入反向传播校正来消除由元件间隙引起的衍射效应。通过±160度角偏移实现±240度/厘米的可调旋转速率。由于其结构紧凑、集成度高、操作简单，莫尔型PB元件为结构光场生成、粒子操纵和先进激光加工提供了一种新颖的动态调制解决方案。

data.title: Novel three-electrode Ge/Si balanced avalanche photodetector for FMCW LiDAR application
data.author: Huan Qu, Weipeng Wang, Baisong Chen, Xuetong Li, Yingzhi Li, Heming Hu, Jie Li, Ziming Wang, Zihao Zhi, Xiaobin Liu, Xueyan Li, Xiaolong Hu, Junfeng Song
data.summary: Due to the outstanding anti-interference capability against the ambient noise, LiDARs based on frequency-modulated continuous wave (FMCW) technology with high sensitivity and high signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) are essential to achieve ideal photodetection of weak light. To significantly improve the weak light detection performance of balanced photodetectors, this work first demonstrates a novel near-infrared germanium-on-silicon (Ge/Si) avalanche photodetector with a three-electrode balanced scheme. The single three-electrode avalanche photodetector exhibits a high responsivity of >200 A/W near breakdown voltage. The three-electrode balanced avalanche photodetector (3ele-BAPD) achieves a common-mode rejection ratio (CMRR) of 50 dB at an operating wavelength of 1550 nm. We have set up the FMCW coherent detection system. The minimum detectable power of −93 dBm can be achieved, corresponding to an SNR of 3.2 dB and a detection probability of 54%. In comparison, the performance exceeds that of the two-electrode balanced avalanche photodetector (2ele-BAPD), which exhibits a minimum detectable power of −85 dBm with a corresponding SNR of 3.1 dB and a detection probability of 51%. The superior weak light detection performance enables the 3ele-BAPD to accomplish 3D imaging based on the FMCW LiDAR scheme. Moreover, the 3ele-BAPD is also applied to velocity measurement for 4D sensing. The applications of LiDAR velocity measurement and imaging are verified.
data.title_cn: 用于 FMCW LiDAR 应用的新型三电极 Ge/Si 平衡雪崩光电探测器
data.abstract_cn: 由于具有出色的抗环境噪声干扰能力，基于调频连续波（FMCW）技术的高灵敏度和高信噪比（SNR）的激光雷达对于实现理想的弱光光电探测至关重要。为了显着提高平衡光电探测器的弱光探测性能，这项工作首先展示了一种具有三电极平衡方案的新型近红外硅基锗（Ge/Si）雪崩光电探测器。单三电极雪崩光电探测器在击穿电压附近表现出 >200 A/W 的高响应度。三电极平衡雪崩光电探测器 (3ele-BAPD) 在 1550 nm 的工作波长下实现了 50 dB 的共模抑制比 (CMRR)。我们建立了FMCW相干探测系统。可以实现-93 dBm的最小可检测功率，对应于3.2 dB的SNR和54%的检测概率。相比之下，其性能超过了双电极平衡雪崩光电探测器（2ele-BAPD），其最小可检测功率为-85 dBm，相应的信噪比为3.1 dB，检测概率为51%。优越的弱光探测性能使3ele-BAPD能够基于FMCW激光雷达方案完成3D成像。此外，3ele-BAPD还应用于4D传感的速度测量。验证了LiDAR测速和成像的应用。

data.title: Nonlinear spectral-temporal manipulation for chirp-free pulse synthesis at picosecond resolution
data.author: Dongning Liu, Youen Jiang, Xue Pan, Li Zhou, Xiaochao Wang, Xuechun Li, Jianqiang Zhu
data.summary: We present a novel, to our knowledge, optical arbitrary waveform generation (OAWG) technique, termed four-wave optical-waveguided chirp-free ultrafast shaping (FOCUS), which utilizes four-wave mixing (FWM)-based spectral transcription. FOCUS enables the generation of chirp-free pulse sequences with independently adjustable duration, intensity, interval, and central wavelength of sub-pulses. Experimental validation demonstrates that the system achieves a 2 ps temporal resolution and a 400 ps record length while maintaining <1 nm spectral bandwidth, >30 dB extinction ratio, ∼1 nJ pulse energy consumption, and 3.5 nm continuous wavelength tunability. Fundamental analysis reveals that three key parameters govern temporal resolution: spectral shaper resolution (the current limiting factor), pump bandwidth (potentially expandable to 30 nm), and engineered group delay dispersion (GDD). Recent advancements in chip-scale mode-locked lasers, dispersion-engineered waveguides, and nonlinear FWM modules position the FOCUS platform as a promising candidate for next-generation ultrafast photonic systems designed for simultaneous sub-picosecond temporal resolution and nanosecond-scale waveform programmability within compact integrated architectures.
data.title_cn: 皮秒分辨率无啁啾脉冲合成的非线性谱时操纵
data.abstract_cn: 据我们所知，我们提出了一种新颖的光学任意波形生成（OAWG）技术，称为四波光波导无啁啾超快整形（FOCUS），它利用基于四波混频（FWM）的光谱转录。 FOCUS 能够生成无啁啾的脉冲序列，其持续时间、强度、间隔和子脉冲的中心波长可独立调节。实验验证表明，该系统实现了 2 ps 时间分辨率和 400 ps 记录长度，同时保持 <1 nm 光谱带宽、>30 dB 消光比、∼1 nJ 脉冲能量消耗和 3.5 nm 连续波长可调性。基本分析表明，三个关键参数控制时间分辨率：光谱整形器分辨率（电流限制因素）、泵浦带宽（可能扩展到 30 nm）和工程群延迟色散 (GDD)。芯片级锁模激光器、色散工程波导和非线性 FWM 模块的最新进展使 FOCUS 平台成为下一代超快光子系统的有希望的候选者，该系统旨在在紧凑的集成架构中同时实现亚皮秒时间分辨率和纳秒级波形可编程性。

data.title: Chiral and antichiral edge states in gyromagnetic photonic crystals under magnetic and pseudomagnetic fields
data.author: Shiyu Liu, Yuting Yang, Liwei Shi, Enyuan Wang, Zhi Hong Hang
data.summary: Inhomogeneous uniaxial strain-induced lattice deformations result in the Dirac point shift, leading to a strong synthetic pseudomagnetic field. The chiral edge state in the Haldane model and the antichiral edge state in the modified Haldane model can be realized in gyromagnetic photonic crystals, immersed in external real magnetic fields. Here, the interplay of the real- and pseudo-magnetic fields is investigated based on the onsite magnetization modulation and the uniaxial strain within gyromagnetic photonic crystals, thereby resulting in photonic band deformations including the shift of the chiral edge states and the lift of the degenerate antichiral edge states. The experiment is further performed to observe the imbalanced transport of these edge states on two opposite sides. Our findings can help to deeply explore rich and significant physics of synthetic gauge fields, and facilitate designs of photonic functional devices, such as the proposed unidirectional multichannel waveguide.
data.title_cn: 磁场和赝磁场下旋磁光子晶体的手性和反手性边缘态
data.abstract_cn: 不均匀的单轴应变引起的晶格变形会导致狄拉克点移动，从而产生强大的合成赝磁场。 Haldane模型中的手性边缘态和修正Haldane模型中的反手性边缘态可以在浸入外部真实磁场的旋磁光子晶体中实现。在这里，基于现场磁化调制和旋磁光子晶体内的单轴应变，研究了真实磁场和赝磁场的相互作用，从而导致光子带变形，包括手性边缘态的移动和简并反手性边缘态的提升​​。进一步进行实验以观察这些边缘态在两侧的不平衡传输。我们的研究结果有助于深入探索合成规范场丰富而重要的物理现象，并促进光子功能器件的设计，例如所提出的单向多通道波导。

data.title: Scalable data-efficient real-time 4D imaging FMCW LiDAR with dual Mach–Zehnder interferometers
data.author: Yi Hao, Qingyang Zhu, Yaqi Han, Zihan Zang, Annan Xia, Connie Chang-Hasnain, H. Y. Fu
data.summary: Tunable micro-electro-mechanical-systems-based vertical-cavity surface-emitting lasers (MEMS-VCSELs) have emerged as promising candidates for frequency-modulated continuous-wave (FMCW) light detection and ranging (LiDAR) due to their compact size, energy efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and rapid wide tuning characteristics. However, the fast sweep rate and wide tuning range introduce challenges, such as having a high beat frequency, which place significant demands on the detector bandwidth and data acquisition sampling rate. To address these limitations, we propose a novel low-cost fiber-based Mach–Zehnder interferometer (MZI) approach. By enabling beat frequency down-shifting through adjustable fiber delay lengths, the system supports a high tuning rate of 146.88 GHz/μs for the tunable MEMS-VCSEL, representing a 7.36-fold improvement over the typical value. The incorporation of an interpolated modulation voltage effectively corrects nonlinear laser frequency sweep, while an additional MZI compensates for laser phase noise. Integrated with a transmission grating and a galvo mirror beam scanning structure, the proposed FMCW LiDAR system is able to achieve high-resolution 3D imaging with lateral and axial resolutions of 0.11 mm and 5.10 mm, respectively, at a target distance of 80 cm. The system further supports ultra-fast real-time 3D imaging, delivering a 2-kHz frame rate with 39×99 pixels per frame. Additionally, the system can further achieve 4D imaging with a maximum velocity error within 0.50 m/s and a standard deviation of 0.18 m/s. This work highlights a scalable and efficient solution for 4D FMCW LiDAR, where the modular beat frequency down-shifting architecture and enhanced data efficiency enable real-time imaging capabilities and facilitate integration into embedded platforms, with significant potential for applications in industrial automation, robotics, and, in the long term, augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) through future miniaturized implementations.
data.title_cn: 具有双马赫-曾德干涉仪的可扩展数据高效实时 4D 成像 FMCW LiDAR
data.abstract_cn: 基于可调谐微机电系统的垂直腔表面发射激光器 (MEMS-VCSEL) 因其紧凑的尺寸、能源效率、成本效益和快速宽调谐特性而成为调频连续波 (FMCW) 光探测和测距 (LiDAR) 的有前途的候选者。然而，快速扫描速率和宽调谐范围带来了挑战，例如高拍频，这对探测器带宽和数据采集采样率提出了很高的要求。为了解决这些限制，我们提出了一种新颖的基于光纤的低成本马赫-曾德干涉仪（MZI）方法。通过可调节光纤延迟长度实现拍频下移，该系统支持可调谐 MEMS-VCSEL 的 146.88 GHz/μs 高调谐率，比典型值提高了 7.36 倍。内插调制电压的结合有效地校正了非线性激光扫频，而附加的 MZI 则补偿了激光相位噪声。所提出的FMCW激光雷达系统集成了透射光栅和振镜光束扫描结构，能够在目标距离80厘米时实现横向和轴向分辨率分别为0.11毫米和5.10毫米的高分辨率3D成像。该系统还支持超快速实时 3D 成像，提供 2kHz 帧速率、每帧 39×99 像素。此外，该系统还可以实现最大速度误差在0.50 m/s以内、标准偏差为0.18 m/s的4D成像。这项工作重点介绍了 4D FMCW LiDAR 的可扩展且高效的解决方案，其中模块化拍频下移架构和增强的数据效率可实现实时成像功能并促进集成到嵌入式平台中，在工业自动化、机器人技术以及从长远来看，通过未来的小型化实施实现增强现实 (AR) 和虚拟现实 (VR) 方面具有巨大的应用潜力。

data.title: Strong coupling of excitons with transverse-electric-polarized polaritons for high-precision MoS 2 layer number sensing in Au/MoS 2 heterostructures
data.author: Leyang Li, Yunbao Zheng, Min Ouyang, Haihua Fan, Qiaofeng Dai, Haiying Liu, Lijun Wu, Sheng Lan
data.summary: Surface plasmon polaritons (SPPs) on metal surfaces excited by p-polarized light have long been a crucial method for achieving light–matter interactions due to their small mode-field volumes and strong optical localization properties. However, the significant losses generated in metals greatly limit the intensity of the SPPs and their potential application scenarios. In this paper, we leverage the high refractive index properties of two-dimensional (2D) transition metal dichalcogenides (TMDCs) to generate transverse-electric (TE) polarized waves excited by s-polarized light on the surface of gold nanofilms by accurately controlling the number of the TMDC layers and the spatial refractive index variations with the structure. Unlike the SPPs excited by p-polarized light, the TE surface waves on the surface of the gold film exhibit low loss and high quality factor ( Q factor). Moreover, the difference in refractive index causes the TE surface waves to be electromagnetically separated in space, lifting the electric field component in the excited TE surface waves from the surface of the metal film into the TMDCs, thereby minimizing the ohmic loss in the metal and enabling strong coupling between the TE surface waves and the two-exciton states (A-exciton and B-exciton) in the TMDCs. Experimental results demonstrated the strong coupling of TE waves with double excitons (A-exciton and B-exciton) in multilayer MoS 2 by exciting the Au / MoS 2 heterostructure using a Kretschmann–Raether configuration, showing ultrahigh Rabi splitting up to about 310 meV. Furthermore, the number of MoS 2 layers can be accurately determined by measuring the redshift of the Rabi splitting peak of the strong coupling spectra in the Au / MoS 2 heterostructure. Our findings open a new avenue for manipulating strong exciton–photon coupling in 2D materials and offer a novel approach for accurately characterizing the thickness of TMDCs.
data.title_cn: 激子与横向电极化极化子的强耦合用于 Au/MoS 2 异质结构中高精度 MoS 2 层数传感
data.abstract_cn: 由 p 偏振光激发的金属表面上的表面等离子体激元 (SPP) 长期以来一直是实现光与物质相互作用的关键方法，因为它们具有较小的模场体积和较强的光学局域化特性。然而，金属产生的巨大损失极大地限制了SPP的强度及其潜在的应用场景。在本文中，我们利用二维（2D）过渡金属二硫化物（TMDC）的高折射率特性，通过精确控制TMDC层数和空间折射率随结构的变化，在金纳米膜表面产生由s偏振光激发的横电（TE）偏振波。与 p 偏振光激发的 SPP 不同，金膜表面的 TE 表面波表现出低损耗和高品质因数（Q 因子）。此外，折射率的差异导致TE表面波在空间上电磁分离，将激发的TE表面波中的电场分量从金属膜表面提升到TMDC中，从而最大限度地减少金属中的欧姆损耗，并使TE表面波与TMDC中的双激子态（A激子和B激子）之间实现强耦合。实验结果表明，通过使用 Kretschmann-Raether 配置激发 Au / MoS 2 异质结构，TE 波与多层 MoS 2 中的双激子（A 激子和 B 激子）强耦合，显示出高达约 310 meV 的超高拉比分裂。此外，通过测量Au/MoS 2 异质结构中强耦合光谱的拉比分裂峰的红移，可以准确确定MoS 2 层的数量。我们的研究结果为操纵二维材料中的强激子-光子耦合开辟了一条新途径，并为准确表征 TMDC 的厚度提供了一种新方法。

data.title: Sub-Hz linewidth integrated photonic microwave generation based on a low-noise hybrid InP/Si 3 N 4 comb laser
data.author: Jiachen Li, Liuyan Han, Dong Wang, Minghua Chen, Dechao Zhang, Han Li
data.summary: Low-noise microwave generation is crucial for advanced applications such as 6G millimeter-wave communications, satellite communications, and synthetic aperture radar systems. Traditional microwave sources encounter challenges in meeting stringent performance requirements while maintaining low size, weight, and power consumption (SWaP) at ever-increasing high frequencies. Photonic microwave generation is a promising solution to overcome these limitations, particularly when implemented with chip-scale integration using a simple yet efficient architecture. Here, we propose a chip-scale integrated photonic microwave generator (IPMG) scheme that features a low-noise hybrid InP / Si 3 N 4 comb laser based on the self-injection locking mechanism, in conjunction with the optic-electro-optic feedback to further enhance the RF generation performance. The proof-of-concept IPMG prototype has demonstrated superior performance, highlighting an ultra-narrow RF intrinsic linewidth of 0.8 Hz, low single-sideband phase noises of −92.1 dBc/Hz at 10 kHz offset and −128.3 dBc/Hz at 1 MHz offset, and excellent frequency stability with only 16 kHz fluctuations over 5 min. This work marks a substantial advancement in the development of fully integrated photonic microwave generators by unifying good performance, architectural simplicity, and low SWaP.
data.title_cn: 基于低噪声混合 InP/Si 3 N 4 梳状激光器的亚赫兹线宽集成光子微波产生
data.abstract_cn: 低噪声微波产生对于 6G 毫米波通信、卫星通信和合成孔径雷达系统等先进应用至关重要。传统微波源在满足严格的性能要求，同时在不断增加的高频下保持较低的尺寸、重量和功耗 (SWaP) 方面遇到了挑战。光子微波产生是克服这些限制的一种有前途的解决方案，特别是当使用简单而高效的架构通过芯片级集成实现时。在这里，我们提出了一种芯片级集成光子微波发生器（IPMG）方案，该方案采用基于自注入锁定机制的低噪声混合InP / Si 3 N 4 梳状激光器，结合光电光反馈，进一步增强射频生成性能。概念验证 IPMG 原型展示了卓越的性能，突出了 0.8 Hz 的超窄 RF 固有线宽、10 kHz 偏移时为 -92.1 dBc/Hz 的低单边带相位噪声和 1 MHz 偏移时为 -128.3 dBc/Hz 的低单边带相位噪声，以及出色的频率稳定性，5 分钟内仅有 16 kHz 波动。这项工作通过统一良好的性能、架构简单性和低 SWaP，标志着全集成光子微波发生器的开发取得了重大进展。

data.title: High-resolution dual-polarization single-pixel imaging through dynamic and complex scattering media using random-frequency-encoded time sequences
data.author: Zian Wang, Tianshun Zhang, Yin Xiao, Zhigang Liu, Wen Chen
data.summary: Single-pixel imaging (SPI) through complex media remains challenging. In this paper, we report high-resolution common-path SPI with dual polarization using random-frequency-encoded time sequences in complex environments where the illumination and detection paths are severely distorted. By leveraging a common-path optical configuration with orthogonal polarization states, a series of dynamic scaling factors can be corrected. The designed random-frequency encoding scheme disperses scattering-induced noise into artifacts to be simply removed. It is demonstrated in optical experiments that the proposed method is feasible and effective to reconstruct high-resolution object images in complex environments. The proposed method does not require complex optical components and prior knowledge about scattering media, providing a robust solution for high-resolution optical imaging in complex scenarios where the illumination and detection paths are severely distorted at the same time.
data.title_cn: 使用随机频率编码时间序列通过动态和复杂散射介质进行高分辨率双偏振单像素成像
data.abstract_cn: 通过复杂介质的单像素成像（SPI）仍然具有挑战性。在本文中，我们报告了在照明和检测路径严重失真的复杂环境中使用随机频率编码时间序列的双偏振高分辨率共路径 SPI。通过利用具有正交偏振态的共路光学配置，可以校正一系列动态缩放因子。设计的随机频率编码方案将散射引起的噪声分散到伪影中，以便简单地去除。光学实验表明，该方法在复杂环境下重建高分辨率物体图像是可行和有效的。该方法不需要复杂的光学元件和有关散射介质的先验知识，为照明和检测路径同时严重扭曲的复杂场景下的高分辨率光学成像提供了稳健的解决方案。

data.title: Mode-modulated leaky-wave radiation with insertable circular polarization based on strong coupling between SSPPs and SLSPs
data.author: Meng Wang, Zhang Wen Cheng, Qian Yao, Hui Feng Ma
data.summary: Beam-frequency-scanning detection and point-to-point communication typically differ significantly in bandwidth and polarization characteristics, requiring two separate antennas in conventional designs. This paper proposes a method to integrate a dual-mode radiation of narrowband circular polarization (CP) into a broadband linearly polarized (LP) beam-scanning leaky-wave antenna (LWA) using a full spoof surface plasmon polariton (SSPP) system. First, a grooved SSPP unit and its complementary structure are used with periodic mode modulation to achieve continuous vertically polarized (V-pol) dual-beam scanning from backward to forward. By periodically embedding spoof localized surface plasmon (SLSP) units, strong coupling between SLSPs and SSPPs is enabled under resonant conditions. Then, CP radiation is generated due to the rotating electric-field vectors of SLSPs. Experiment and simulation results demonstrate continuous V-pol beam scanning from −30° to 22° across 4.25–6.75 GHz, including effective broadside radiation. Notably, at 5.4 GHz, the antenna radiates right-handed circularly polarized (RHCP) and left-handed circularly polarized (LHCP) waves in opposite broadside directions. Compared with existing technologies, the insertable CP radiation allows the antenna to enable two significantly different operating modes, which can be applied in combined beam-scanning detection and narrowband satellite emergency communication, greatly improving system integration.
data.title_cn: 基于 SSPP 和 SLSP 强耦合的可插入圆偏振模式调制漏波辐射
data.abstract_cn: 波束频率扫描检测和点对点通信通常在带宽和极化特性方面存在显着差异，因此在传统设计中需要两个单独的天线。本文提出了一种使用全欺骗表面等离子体激元（SSPP）系统将窄带圆极化（CP）双模辐射集成到宽带线性极化（LP）波束扫描漏波天线（LWA）中的方法。首先，采用沟槽SSPP单元及其互补结构与周期模式调制，实现从后到前的连续垂直偏振（V-pol）双光束扫描。通过定期嵌入欺骗局域表面等离子体 (SLSP) 单元，可以在谐振条件下实现 SLSP 和 SSPP 之间的强耦合。然后，由于 SLSP 的旋转电场矢量而产生 CP 辐射。实验和仿真结果表明，V-pol 光束可在 4.25–6.75 GHz 范围内从 -30° 到 22° 范围内进行连续扫描，包括有效的宽边辐射。值得注意的是，在 5.4 GHz 时，天线沿相反的宽边方向辐射右旋圆极化 (RHCP) 和左旋圆极化 (LHCP) 波。与现有技术相比，可插入的CP辐射使天线能够实现两种截然不同的工作模式，可应用于组合波束扫描检测和窄带卫星应急通信，大大提高了系统集成度。

data.title: Monolithic integration of a metalens collimator mosaic on the backside of a light-emitting diode
data.author: Yu-Min Chang, Teng-Li Shao, Po-Yang Chang, Yu-Chi Lee, Yu-Kuan Hsieh, Wen-Hsuan Hsieh, Tien-Chang Lu, Yao-Wei Huang, Chia-Yen Huang
data.summary: A GaN-based metalens collimator (MC) is designed to convert a light-emitting dipole to a plane wave. Finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) simulations show that this structure reduces the far-field divergence angle to below 10°, with the integrated intensity within a 10° escaping cone ( I 10 ) enhanced by more than 20 times. However, when random off-focus dipoles are taken into account, the overall enhancement declines significantly. We fabricated MC mosaic partitions of different widths on the backside of an LED epitaxy. Angle-resolved photoluminescence measurements showed that the I 10 of a 4-μm MC mosaic was 2.84 times higher than that of 8-μm mosaics, and 2-μm mosaics achieved 2.46 times enhancement. We attributed the significant impact of the mosaic dimension to a balance between the effective collimating area relative to the active region and the size-dependent collimating capability.
data.title_cn: 发光二极管背面的元透镜准直器镶嵌单片集成
data.abstract_cn: GaN基超透镜准直器（MC）旨在将发光偶极子转换为平面波。时域有限差分（FDTD）模拟表明，该结构将远场发散角降低至10°以下，10°逃逸锥（I 10 ）内的积分强度增强20倍以上。然而，当考虑随机离焦偶极子时，整体增强效果显着下降。我们在 LED 外延背面制作了不同宽度的 MC 马赛克分区。角度分辨光致发光测量表明，4μm MC镶嵌物的I 10 比8μm镶嵌物高2.84倍，2μm镶嵌物实现了2.46倍的增强。我们将镶嵌尺寸的显着影响归因于相对于有源区域的有效准直面积与尺寸相关的准直能力之间的平衡。

data.title: Optical encryption with full-color single-pixel imaging and a micron-hole array
data.author: Xiaogang Wang, Jixin Qiu, Zinan Huang, Kuihao Zhang, Xuan Yu, Shangying Zhou, Sheng Wang, Zhenyu Zhang, Mingli Sun, Bijun Xu
data.summary: Driven by the necessity to strengthen information security during data collection and storage, the strategic convergence of computational imaging techniques is swiftly emerging as a dominant trend in the field of optical encryption for data protection. This paper presents a two-layer security framework that combines full-color single-pixel imaging (SPI) with a micron-hole array. The micron-hole array is generated using a deep-learning algorithm and fabricated through lithography. The full-color Fourier SPI system, equipped with a single bucket detector, efficiently collects and encrypts image information. The illumination pattern sequence for SPI, derived from the optical diffraction image of the micron-hole array, imparts inherent physical security to the system. This study meticulously incorporates holographic encryption using a micron-hole array in the entire SPI encoding-decoding process, thus exploiting the complexity of algorithms and the physical non-clonability of components. Both numerical simulations and optical experiments confirm the stability of the framework in terms of encryption and security performance. This paves the way for new perspectives in anti-counterfeiting applications grounded in computational imaging and multi-dimensional optical cryptography, offering potential for practical advancements in the field.
data.title_cn: 具有全彩色单像素成像和微米孔阵列的光学加密
data.abstract_cn: 在加强数据收集和存储过程中信息安全的必要性的推动下，计算成像技术的战略融合正在迅速成为数据保护光学加密领域的主导趋势。本文提出了一种将全彩色单像素成像（SPI）与微米孔阵列相结合的两层安全框架。微米孔阵列是使用深度学习算法生成并通过光刻制造的。全彩傅里叶SPI系统，配备单桶探测器，有效收集和加密图像信息。 SPI 的照明图案序列源自微米孔阵列的光学衍射图像，为系统提供了固有的物理安全性。这项研究精心地将使用微米孔阵列的全息加密融入到整个 SPI 编码-解码过程中，从而利用了算法的复杂性和组件的物理不可克隆性。数值模拟和光学实验都证实了该框架在加密和安全性能方面的稳定性。这为基于计算成像和多维光学密码学的防伪应用的新视角铺平了道路，为该领域的实际进步提供了潜力。

data.title: Power-tunable rotational dynamics of asymmetric vortex dipoles for material characterization
data.author: Guo Liang, Ping Zhu, Xiangwei Chen
data.summary: This study investigates the orbital angular momentum (OAM) and propagation dynamics of asymmetric vortex dipoles. The asymmetric spatial distribution of vortices carrying opposite topological charges yields a net OAM, inducing rotational motion during both linear and nonlinear propagation. Under linear conditions, the angular velocity of rotation correlates directly with the degree of asymmetry; vortex cores positioned farther from the dipole center exhibit greater angular velocities than those nearer the center. Diffraction limits the net rotation angle to less than 90 degrees in linear propagation. In contrast, during nonlinear propagation, the rotational dynamics depend not only on the asymmetry but also critically on the optical power. Modulating the input power enables precise control over the rotation trajectory, angle, and angular velocity, presenting a viable approach for optical field manipulation. Furthermore, this work proposes a method to experimentally quantify the nonlocal response of nonlinear materials by measuring the rotation angle of asymmetric vortex dipoles.
data.title_cn: 用于材料表征的不对称涡旋偶极子的功率可调旋转动力学
data.abstract_cn: 本研究研究了不对称涡旋偶极子的轨道角动量（OAM）和传播动力学。携带相反拓扑电荷的涡流的不对称空间分布产生净 OAM，在线性和非线性传播过程中引起旋转运动。在线性条件下，旋转角速度与不对称程度直接相关；远离偶极子中心的涡核比靠近中心的涡核表现出更大的角速度。衍射将线性传播中的净旋转角限制为小于 90 度。相反，在非线性传播过程中，旋转动力学不仅取决于不对称性，而且很大程度上取决于光功率。调制输入功率可以精确控制旋转轨迹、角度和角速度，为光场操纵提供了一种可行的方法。此外，这项工作提出了一种通过测量不对称涡旋偶极子的旋转角来实验量化非线性材料的非局部响应的方法。

data.title: Blood flow analysis of retinal neovascularisations in a VLDLR mouse model using contrast-enhanced optical coherence tomography
data.author: Yash Patel, Bernhard Baumann, Conrad Merkle
data.summary: Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) is a major cause of global blindness that affects millions worldwide. Certain forms of AMD cause neovascularisations (NVs), which form retinal-choroidal anastomoses. This disrupts healthy haemodynamic patterns, and early detection and treatment are crucial for preserving vision. Here, we employ a custom-built optical coherence tomography (OCT) imaging system to investigate these NVs in a very low-density lipoprotein receptor (VLDLR) knockout mouse model. Mice were imaged before, during, and after contrast agent injection, aiming to enhance our understanding of the NV haemodynamics. Doppler signal analysis techniques were employed to calculate flow velocities within individual NVs. Flow rates pre- and post-injection were determined based on these velocity measurements. Particle tracking was performed on two NVs for a comparative analysis with the Doppler velocity measurements. Both methods of measuring flow velocities showed good agreement post-contrast injection. The analysis of post-injection flow rates from the NVs revealed diverse behaviours. Some NVs exhibited stable flow rates over time, while others showed signs of instability, with flow rates changing substantially or even changing flow direction at different time points. Additionally, it was observed at multiple time points that flow from certain NVs moved from the choroid to the retina at the same time that other NVs displayed flow in the opposite direction. These observations suggest complex interactions between choroidal and retinal vascular networks in diseases like AMD. Further characterisation using contrast-enhanced Doppler OCT may improve our understanding of neovascular haemodynamics.
data.title_cn: 使用对比增强光学相干断层扫描对 VLDLR 小鼠模型中视网膜新生血管的血流分析
data.abstract_cn: 年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AMD) 是全球失明的主要原因，影响着全世界数百万人。某些形式的 AMD 会导致新生血管形成 (NV)，从而形成视网膜脉络膜吻合。这会破坏健康的血液动力学模式，早期发现和治疗对于保护视力至关重要。在这里，我们采用定制的光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 成像系统来研究极低密度脂蛋白受体 (VLDLR) 敲除小鼠模型中的这些 NV。在注射造影剂之前、期间和之后对小鼠进行成像，旨在增强我们对 NV 血流动力学的理解。采用多普勒信号分析技术来计算各个 NV 内的流速。根据这些速度测量值确定注入前和注入后的流速。在两个 NV 上进行粒子跟踪，以便与多普勒速度测量进行比较分析。两种测量流速的方法在造影剂注射后表现出良好的一致性。对 NV 注入后流量的分析揭示了不同的行为。一些 NV 随时间的推移表现出稳定的流速，而另一些 NV 则表现出不稳定的迹象，流速发生显着变化，甚至在不同时间点改变流动方向。此外，在多个时间点观察到，来自某些 NV 的血流从脉络膜移动到视网膜，同时其他 NV 则显示出相反方向的血流。这些观察结果表明，在 AMD 等疾病中，脉络膜和视网膜血管网络之间存在复杂的相互作用。使用对比增强多普勒 OCT 进行进一步表征可能会提高我们对新生血管血流动力学的理解。

data.title: Dual-stage quantum-referenced 795 nm DBR laser with 3.29×10 −13 / τ stability
data.author: Suyang Wei, Zijie Liu, Xuyan Zhou, Fengxin Dong, Xiaomin Qin, Zhiyang Wang, Ziqi Lu, Zheng Xiao, Tiantian Shi, Wei Wang, Wanhua Zheng, Jingbiao Chen
data.summary: Distributed Bragg reflector (DBR) lasers have found promising prospects in quantum sensing, cold atom physics, and precision spectroscopy. However, a broader implementation is challenged by their MHz-scale linewidths and the absence of autonomous atomic resonance alignment. Here, we demonstrate a turnkey 795 nm DBR laser system locked to the Rb 85 D 1 hyperfine transition. Our approach employs a dual-stage architecture: stage 1 utilizes the Faraday anomalous dispersion optical filter (FADOF) with optical feedback, achieving automatic frequency resonance and confinement to the vicinity of the Rb 85 D 1 line, while reducing the 1/ π integral linewidth from 461.8 kHz to 28.8 kHz, and the Lorentzian linewidth from 25.8 kHz to 426.9 Hz. This mechanism is quantitatively investigated using Lang–Kobayashi equations. Stage 2 applies modulation transfer spectroscopy (MTS) to further stabilize the frequency of the optically locked laser, which yields an Allan deviation of 3.29×10 −13 / τ . Our system unlocks DBR lasers’ potential in quantum precision measurements, offering a convenient, compact, low-noise light source for atomic clocks, magnetometers, and gyroscopes.
data.title_cn: 双级量子参考 795 nm DBR 激光器，稳定性为 3.29×10 −13 / τ
data.abstract_cn: 分布式布拉格反射器（DBR）激光器在量子传感、冷原子物理和精密光谱学方面具有广阔的前景。然而，更广泛的实施面临着 MHz 级线宽和缺乏自主原子共振对准的挑战。在这里，我们展示了锁定 Rb 85 D 1 超精细跃迁的交钥匙 795 nm DBR 激光系统。我们的方法采用双级架构：第一级采用带光学反馈的法拉第反常色散滤光片（FADOF），实现自动频率谐振并限制在Rb 85 D 1 线附近，同时将1/ π积分线宽从461.8 kHz减小到28.8 kHz，将洛伦兹线宽从25.8 kHz减小到426.9 Hz。使用 Lang-Kobayashi 方程定量研究了该机制。第2阶段应用调制传递光谱（MTS）来进一步稳定光学锁定激光器的频率，从而产生3.29×10 -13 / τ 的阿伦偏差。我们的系统释放了 DBR 激光器在量子精密测量方面的潜力，为原子钟、磁力计和陀螺仪提供了方便、紧凑、低噪声的光源。
